Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a painah raang letah a va chuapaw aa hmuh hlai taco, ma letei a daw thlangpaw sahlo hrong lehei mehthaikheh cawh thi balang bei he,” tatah a tah he.
Ningruh khy tah Zisu tah Piter, Jeims le a unypaw Johan khah y he ka, aaning teitah tlaang sangpaw cung lang a kekhui he.
Ma leco aa hmekaw letah a hmuisang cawh a thlai. A hme cawh ning hratah khai ka, a chaichi cawh lailaw hratah a khai.
Ma khy cangkaw leco, aa hmekaw letah Moses le Elija a va lang he ka, Zisu khatah bia aa reihrui leimei.

Piter taco Zisu cawh, “Abuipaw, ma lehei ung heh kaa cawtah a chah ngetei. Na du caco, thlangda sangthung tah ka sah a, nama na cawtah sangkheh, Moses cawtah sangkheh, Elija cawtah sangkheh,” tatah a tah.

Bia a rei leimei chung taco meding a khaipaw takhei aaning cawh pahlong he ka, meding chung taico, “Ma heh ka dopaw ka Sawcapaw a cang, a cung lehei ka lung a lawng ngetei. A bia nge my lo!” tatah o a za ring.
A hningzuitu tah ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah ci tu he ka, aa hme cawh alui lang a khuh he.
Canghrasala Zisu cawh a vong ka, tong he ka, “Tho tua o, naa thlawzawng kheh seh,” a tah he.
Aa ka ming tihtah Zisu tah cy lyco ahohmai hmuh bei he.
Tlaang cung taitah aa za cungthlah ning takhei Zisu tah, “Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh thihnah taitah patho kaw a cang hlai vytei cawh naa hmuhpaw khah ahohmai ching khe lo,” tatah a tah he.
A hningzuitu sahlo taco Zisu cawh, “Zecawtamaw phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah Elija a vong taw hrahring a tatah aa tah?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Ahmangpaw a cang, Elija cawh a vong a ka, zezongpui khah a parai pacia a.
Canghrasala ka ca ching he, Elija cawh a vong thah ka, hnih bei he. Aa dudú khei ama cawh tua he ka, ma hraco Cawngsaw Sawcapaw zong heh aa kih letah taithuinah a ing hra a,” tatah a palei he.
Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo tah baptisma peitu Johan kong a ma ching hi tahpaw khah aa thui thai.
Zawpuipaw khah aa va chua tihtah pakhehpaw tah Zisu cawh a va ne ka, a hme letah a khuh a panai.
“Abuipaw, ka sawcapaw heh hruihri hnui ka, a taithui tu thlang, ning pa do pah ky. Me lang a bo tei ka, tui lang a tlah tei.
Na hningzuitu sahlo khatah va chuakhui neh ka, canghrasala dangsah khy bei he,” tatah a tah.

Zisu taco, “Vy zingnah a hnui lypaw le meh paleh meh pathae cawngsaw sahlo, zetih tai maw naaning khatah ka ung a? Ze tih tai maw ka lung ka ca pasua pá he a? Nyhehpaw cawh a vong khui tua o,” tatah a palei.
Zisu taco khachia cawh a hrangso ka, khachia cawh nyhehpaw chung taico ka pia ka, ma cangkaw leco, nyhehpaw cawh a dang palang.
Mataico, a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aaning teitah Zisu khaco a vong he ka, “Zecawtamaw kaaning tah kaa papia khy be?” tatah aa hae.

Zisu taco, “Naa zingnah a cawng tu cawtah a cang. Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, aihrang hmu tia tei chang zingnah naa hnui caco, ma tlaang heh, ‘Ma taihei pawlang kheh a hnei,’ tah la, a hnei thlang a. Naa cawtah a cang khy lypaw ung be.
Canghrasala ma hapaw hming heh cawh thlawchangnah le batui cahenah lypaw co papia khy cang bei he,” tatah a palei he.
Galili raang lang hmokheh tah aa va sei tihtah aa hai letah, “Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh cawngsaw sahlo kih letah luithae a cang myca a.
Aaning sahlo taco thaw a he ka, taico ningthung khy letah hringnah letah thosah a cang a,” tatah a tah he. Taico a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa nge a chia ngetei.

Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Kapernaum khua aa va phah khy taitah behnah ing ngungkhui a kheipaw sahlo cawh Piter khatah a vong he ka, “Naa cawngpahtu tah behnah ing ngungkhui cawh khei bei maw?” tatah aa hae.

Piter taco, “A khei thlang,” tatah a palei he. Piter ing chunglang a za nae tihtah Zisu taco bia ka chai ka, “Simon, zekhatamaw na rawh? Alui bui sahlo tah ngungkhui le luimai sahlo khah aho sahlo maw aa khei he? Aaning aa sawtei leh maw a cang ly leh ahringpaw sahlo khah maw?” tatah a hae.
Piter taco, “A hringpaw sahlo khah,” tatah a chai. Zisu tah, “Ma hratei a cang caco, sawtei sahlo cawh a eisah he a.

Canghrasala lungchah ly tei tua heh cawh chah be, tuiping lang va sei la, na kuipaw khah va thlah tua. Na tle tawpaw ngaw khah a kaw va ky la, tangka phaesai phaepali na hmuh a. Ma cawh va tle la, nama na caw le kama ka cawtah va khei my lo,” tatah a tah.
Ma cai leco a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka, “Vaicung painah raang letah ahomaw a lai caipaw a cang a?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu taco nyhehpaw khah y ka, aa hrong letah a dawsah.
Taico, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he naa lung a thlai tah nyheh sahlo hratah naa cang ly caco, vaicung painah raang letah a nae by bei ceh.
Macawtaco ma nyhehtei hrahei ama le ama a panypaw cawngsaw cawh vaicung painah raang letah alaicaipaw a cang a.
Taico ka ming tah ma hrahei nyhehtei a cyhlangpaw cawh kama a pa cyhlangpaw a cang.
Canghrasala pakheh kheh tah Kama a pa zingpaw nyhehtei pakheh khah a suasah caco, a hirong letah saang rianah lung pathle tah rili a thunah lang thlah he seh la, a cawtah a chah vy a.
Khazaw letei cawngsaw a sua sahpaw hming sahlo cawh aa cing a ping! Ma hapaw hming sahlo cawh aa ung ruapaw a cang thlang. Canghrasala, ma a ung sahpaw cawngsaw cawh a cing a ping!

Na kih a cang ly leh na phe tah a ca suasah caco, taichung la vathlang. Kih rahning a cang ly leh phe rahning tei chaizaw me lang vathlang cang navy co, kih cung hmo a cang ly leh a cabe hmo tei chaizaw hringnah lang a nae cawh na cawtah a chah vy.

Mataico, na meh tah a ca suasah caco, khy hly la, vathlang thlang. Meh rahning chi tah hraihming me chung lang vathlang cang navy co, meh rahkheh khatah chaizaw hringnah letah a nae cawh na cawtah a chah vy.

Ma nyheh sahlo letei pakheh hmai heh mingchuh ruapaw cang bei he, tah heh hnih my lo. Zecawtamaw tatah vaicung letei a ungpaw aaning aa vaiming sahlo tah ka Paw vaicung leteipaw a hme aa hmuh leimei thlang tah heh ka ca ching he.
Ma hlui co, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a lypaw sahlo khah pachah ruapaw tah a vongpaw a cang hi.
Zekhatamaw naa rawh? Cawngsaw pakheh tah a hnuipaw tuu zakheh lekhei sangkheh ly seh la, songkua sangkuapaw cawh tlangpa letah seisai tah a lypaw sangkheh khah hui rua pawtah sei bei maw?
Taico biahmuisui ka ca ching he, a lypaw cawh a hmuh kaw caco, a ly lypaw songkua sangkuapaw navy co, a hmuh kawpaw sangkheh cung lekhei a lawng vy syly a.
Ma hraco naa Paw vaicung leteipaw taco ma nyheh sahlo letei pakheh heh hmai aa ly rua pawtah sai bei he hi.
Na unypaw tah na cung letah a sua caco, a vaw la, naa pahning teitah naa ungning tah a panah khah va ching pase. Na rei a ca nge caco, na unypaw khah na pahnei kaw tahnah a cang.
Canghrasala na rei a ca nge ly caco, cawngsaw pakheh a cang ly leh pahning tah a chui la, ma hnikhuitu pahning a cang ly leh pathung taco hming a chuacangnah khah aa pacy sá a.

Aaning aa bia cawh a nge du lypaw tei a cang caco, khrisawbu khah ching la, khrisawbu bia hmai a nge du lypaw tei a cang caco, lawki cawngsaw a cang ly leh ngungkhui kheitu hrakhei va rawh thlang my lo.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, alui letei naa tongchaipaw cawh vaicung letah tongchai cang hrá ka, alui letei naa thlangpahpaw cawh vaicung letah thlangpah a cang hrá a.
Ma hlui co, aluicung letei cawngsaw pahning tah hming sangkheh kheh hae rua pawtah naa naw a tlah caco, ka Paw vaicung leteipaw tah ma cawh a ca tua pah thlang he a.
Zecawtamaw tatah ka ming tah cawngsaw pahning pathung tah aa pahmonah pawhe leco aaning khatah ka ung hrah,” tatah a tah.
Taico Piter cawh Zisu khatah a vaw ka, “Abuipaw, ka unypaw tah ka cung letah a sua tihtah uikhazeh maw ka ngethai a? Uisarih tai maw?” tatah a hae.
Zisu taco, “Ka ca ching, uisarih cang be. Ui songsarih aleh sarih.
Macawtaco vaicung painah raang cawh a sae sahlo khatah luibah cazing pase a dupaw siangpahrang hratah a cang.
Ahrangtho leco tangka a nuai hlupui a bahpaw cawngsawpaw cawh aa va chuakhui.
Ama taco a chang khylynah cawtah chang khy ruapaw tah a siangpahrang tah ama kha, a nupui kha, a sawtei leh kha, a hnuipaw vytei kha va zua o, tatah bia a peh.
Saecapaw taco a hme leco a khuh panai ka, ‘Pa ngethai cong ky la, a zongming teitah ka ca chang tae thlang a,’ tatah a naw.
A siangpahrang taco ningdo ngetei ka, a dycui cawh ngethai ka, a thlaw.
Canghrasala ma saecapaw cawh va sei ka, saecapaw a cang hrahpaw pakheh ama tangka a cawngtei a bahpaw khah a tong. Tle ka, a rong khei dih ka, ‘Dycui pachang myca,’ tatah a haechai.
Sae a cang hrahpaw a vesawpaw taco a khuh panai ka, ‘Pa ngethai cong la, ka ca peh tae thlang a,’ tatah a naw.
Canghrasala du be. Va sei ka, cawngsawpaw cawh dycui a chang thlu hlai vytei khah thong letah a va thlah.
Ahringpaw sae sahlo tah ma cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa ngechia ngetei ka, va sei he ka, aa siangpahrang cawh hming a chuacangnah vytei khah aa va ching.
Mataico siangpahrang taco ma saecapaw cawh a ysah he. ‘Nama sae chawly, na pa naw leimeinah cawtah dycui na pa bahpaw vytei khah ka ca ngethai.
Na cung letah ningdonah ka hnuipaw hratah na vesaw a cangpaw saecapaw cung letah ningdonah hnui bei ceh maw?’ tatah a tah.
A siangpahrang cawh a thingae ngetei ka, a bahpaw a chang thlu hlai vytei khah thong-ing a vaitupaw letah hreh ruapaw tah a peh.
Naa uny khah naa lungthing tah naa ngethai ly he a cang caco, ka Paw vaicung leteipaw tah ma hrakhei a ca tua hrá he a,” tatah a chai he.
Zisu cawh ma bia a reipaw a pachang taico Galili raang taikhei a tho ka, Jordan tuivaw raechai lang tei a ungpaw Judia raang lang khah a sei.
Cawngsaw rungpui taco zui he ka, ma leco a dang lypaw khah a dangsah he.
Farasi thaikheh sahlo cawh Ama pase rua paw takhei a vong he. “Ze rawng a cang zong tah capaw tah a nupui mah heh a phung a cang maw?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Zezong a Tuatupaw taco ahrangtho ning taco, ‘Canu le capaw tah a tua he,’ tah ka,
‘Ma rawng taco capaw tah a no le a paw khah seisai a he ka, a nupui khatah a pahlawng a ka, ma tlaw pahning cawh ngaisaw pungkheh tah aa cang a,’ tahpaw heh Capathai letah rei bang bei he ceh maw?
Macawtaco aaning cawh pahning cang khawh bei he, pakheh a cang myca he. Macawtaco Khazing tei a patongpaw he cawh cawngsaw tah pachai kheh he seh,” tatah a palei he.
“Ma hratei a cang caco, zecawtamaw Moses taco capaw tah a nupui cawh mahnah ca pei seh la, seisah my seh lo tatah naw a peh zia?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Moses tei naa nupui leh mahnah naw a ca pehpaw he cawh naa lung a khong tunah cawtah a cang. Canghrasala a thoning taco, ma hrahei cang be.

A nupui tah capaw khatah a suasai tah tlung lypaw tah nupui mah katei, nupui hringpaw a chuipaw cawngsaw cawh a pheipaw a cang. Mah ciapaw canu a chuipaw cawngsaw zong a pheipaw a cang hrah taheh ka ca ching he.”
A hningzuitu sahlo taco a hai letah, “Nupui pasae kong letah ma hratei a cang caco, nupui pasae hnui lytah ung a chah vy thlang!” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Ma bia heh ming maikaw tah cyhlang khy bei he. Khazing tah a bongpaw cawngsaw long tah aa cyhlang khy a.

Zecawtamaw tatah thaikhehpaw sahlo cawh aa pi ná tah aa ku a thi. A hringpaw sahlo cawh cawngsaw tah ma hraco tua he ka, ahringpaw taco vaicung painah raang rawng takhei nupui chui du bei he. Ma heh a tua khypaw tah tua he seh,” tatah a palei he.
Nyheh sahlo khah aa cung letah a kih pahnia seh la, thlawchangpah ná he seh tatah Zisu khaco aa va chuakhui he. Canghrasala a hningzuitu sahlo takhei aa va chuakhuipaw sahlo khah aa raw he.
Zisu tah, “Nyheh sahlo cawh Kama khatah a vong he seh, pakhang khe o, zecawtamaw tatah vaicung painah raang cawh ma hapaw sahlo aa tei khah a cang,” tatah a tah.
Aa cung letah a kih a pahnia khy taikhei ma hminghmaw taico a seihly.
Cawngsawpaw pakheh cawh Zisu kha a vong ka, “Cawngpahtu, chaizaw hringnah hmuh rua pawtah zehming chawpaw maw ka tua a?” tatah a hae.
Zisu taco, “Hming chawpaw kong cawh zecawtamaw na pa hae? Khazing suipaw a chawpaw a cang. Hringnah letah a nae na du caco, biapeh sahlo khah nge thlang,” tatah a palei.
“Zehapaw khah maw?” tatah cawngsawpaw taco a hae cakhia. Zisu taco, “Lenong kheh, a phei kheh, ru kheh, a hmang lypaw hnikhuitu cang kheh,
na no le na paw cizaw la, nama na dopaw hratah na ingpaw va do my lo,” tahpaw a cang tatah a palei.
Satlepaw taco, “Ma vytei heh cawh ka zui thlu thah, zemaw ka bah vy?” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco, “A tlingpaw cang na du caco, va sei la, na hnuipaw sahlo khah va zua la, mehsisah va pei la, vaicung letah chosung na hnui a. Mataico a vong la, va pa zui,” tatah a tah.
Satlepaw tah ma bia cawh a thui tihtah a ngechia hmo tah a sei hly. Zecawtamaw tatah ama cawh mehrung a cangnah cawtah a cang.
Mataico Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, mehrung caw taco vaicung painah raang letah a nae heh a ru caimang.
Ka ca ching vy he, mehrung tei Khazing painah raang letah a nae navy co, ceiphing kho letah sahisy a nae heh a neh vy a,” tatah a tah he.
Ma bia cawh a hningzuitu sahlo tah aa thui tihtah aa khuarawha ngetei ka, “A cang caco ahomaw pachah a cang khy a?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh ming he ka, “Ma heh cawngsaw khaco cang khy be, canghrasala Khazing caw taco a cang khy lypaw zehmai ung be,” tatah a tah.
Piter tah Zisu cawh, “Kaaning taco zezongpui seisai tah kaa ca zui hi! Mataico kaa cawtah ze rawhchai ruapaw ung maw?” tatah a tah.

Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, zezongpui patha kaw a cang tih tei, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a rungnawnah dyching letah a ty tih taco, naaning kama a pa zuipaw sahlo cawh abui dyching sanghrawhluihning letah a ty he ceh ka, Israel phinghraw hluihning khah bia naa ce he a.

Taico kama ka rawng tah a ing maw, a uny sahlo maw, a satei sahlo maw, no le paw maw, a sawtei sahlo maw, a ly maw a seisaipaw sahlo taco a leh zakheh tah aa hmuh kaw hlui tah chaizaw hringnah ry aa cy a.
Canghrasala hme a sahpaw mehlupui cawh hningkha he ka, hning a khapaw mehlupui cawh hme aa sah tae a.
Zecawtamaw tatah vaicung painah raang cawh a misur buichung letah rai a hre ruapaw kuli pakhia rua pawtah mongdi tei a piathlahpaw ly a hnuitupaw khatah a lo.
Aaning sahlo cawh ningkheh tah ngung tangka phae kheh pae pawtah a nawtlah ka, a misur buichung lang cawh a taw he.
Monglang suimehlang pakua hrawng lekhei a khia ka, zehmai tua ly tei chodo tlang letah a daw thlangpaw ahringpaw cawngsaw sahlo khah a hmuh he.
Aaning sahlo cawh, ‘Naaning zong va sei la, ka misur buichung letah rai va hre la, a tlahpaw naning tah nihlo ka ca pae he a,’ tatah a tah he.
Macawtaco aaning sahlo cawh aa va sei. Ningching hrawng tah a va khia ka zailang suimehlang pathung hrawng lekhei a va khia vy hui ka, ma hraco a va tah vy he.

Zailang suimehlang papangaw hrawng lekhei a va khia ka, a daw pahmo thlang thly pawhe ahringpaw cawngsaw sahlo khah a hmuh he. Aaning sahlo cawh, ‘Zehmai tua lytah zecawtamaw ma lehei chahningtlaw na daw thlang he ceh?’ tatah a hae he.
‘Ahohmai rai a ma peipaw ung be ca he ka,’ tatah aa chai. Aa hai leco, ‘Naaning zong va sei la, ka misur buichung letah rai va hre hra o,’ tatah a tah he.

Zailang a va phah tihtah misur buichung a hnuitupaw taco buichung a mingkaitu khah, ‘Raihretu sahlo khah y la, aa hre mai cawh pei o, a hning cai tei siapaw sahlo taikhei patho la, a hmasaw teipaw taikhah pei o,’ tatah a tah.
Zailang suimehlang papangaw hrawng letei hlangpaw raihretu sahlo cawh a vong he ka, ngung tangka cawh a lah cy he.
A hmasaw tei hlangpaw sahlo cawh aa va chua tihtah a hlu vy kaa hmuh thly a, tatah a rawhchai he. Canghrasala aaning sahlo zong cawh ngung tangka phaekheh aa hmuh cy hrah.
Ma tih taco ly a hnuitupaw khah aa phingso.
‘Ahning cai tei hlangpaw cawngsaw sahlo taco suimehlang pakheh suitei hre he ka, chahningtlaw ningling le raisah kha aa catingpaw kaaning sahlo khahei a khingpaw tah na tua he,’ tatah aa tah.
Canghrasala aaning letei pakhehpaw cawh, ‘Ka dua, na cung letah hmingchahly ka tuapaw cang be. Ngung tangka phaekheh tah hre rua pawtah na naw a tlah cang bei maw?
Na nihlo khah law la, sei. Nama ka ca pehpaw hratah a hning tei ka hlangpaw cawngsaw zong peh ka du he.
Ka tangka cung leco ka dudú tah tuanah naw hnui bei neh maw? A cang ly leh ka he a chah cawtah hei na hei a tlia tah?’ tatah a tah.
Ma hraco a hning a khapaw cawh a hmesah tae he ka, a hme a sahpaw cawh a hning aa khapaw a cang tae he a,” tatah a tah he.
Zisu cawh Jerusalem khuapui lang a seichy ning takhei a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khah a cakih lang seikhui he ka, aa hai letah,
“Jerusalem lang va sei he peh ka, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khatah luithae a cang tae a. Aaning sahlo taco thaw pawtah thaily cangsah a he ka,
pasipasa a he ka, chei a he ka, khraws letah khaipai ruapaw tah Gental cawngsaw khatah peh pachaw a cang a. Ningthungnah letah hringnah letah patho kaw a cang a!” a tah he.
Mataico, Zebedi a sawcapaw sahlo aa no cawh a sawcapaw sahlo khaco Zisu kha a vong he ka, a khuh panai ka ningdo a hae.
Zisu taco, “Zemaw na du?” tatah a hae. Canuno taco, “Na painah letah ka sawcapaw leh pahning heh pakheh na cacang lang, pakheh na cavui lang na tysah ky he tah ka du,” tatah a tah.
“Naa haepaw heh hnih bei he ceh. Ka ding lepaw tai-ingnah ny heh naa ding khy a maw?” tatah a tah he. “Kaa ding khy a,” tatah aa chai.

Zisu taco aaning cawh, “Ka ny taihei naa ding ceingei a. Canghrasala ka cacang lang le ka cavui lang tah a tynah naw cawh kama ka rei cang be. Ma hming sahlo heh cawh ka Paw tei a pa chia pahpaw sahlo aa cawtah a cang,” tatah a tah he.
Ma bia cawh a hningzuitu ahringpaw pahrawpaw tah aa thui tihtah ma tlaw uny pahning cung leco aa thing a ae.

Zisu tah hmingkheh tah y he ka, “Gental cawngsaw sahlo uhtu bui a cangpaw sahlo he taco aa rai leteipaw sahlo cung letah a bui tah a bui so he ka, bui lai sahlo cawh aa cung letah naw aa hnui ngetei tahpaw khah naa hni.
Naaning cawh ma hraco naa cang ruapaw cang be. Ma navy co naa hrong lehei mehlai cang a dupaw taco naa raihretu tah a tua seh la,
a pakhehnah cang a dupaw taco naa sae tah a tuapaw a cang.
Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh a rai hrepá pawtah cang lytah male rai hre rua pawtah le mehlupui tlang ruapaw cawtah a hringnah peh rua pawtah a vongpaw hrahei,” a tah he.
Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Jeriko khua taitah aa piathlah taikhei cawngsaw rungpui tah aa zui he.
Mehcopaw pahning cawh langpui kae lekhei a ty thlang he ka, Zisu a va sei lai tahpaw khah aa thui tihtah, “David Pathlah, Abuipaw, ning ma do ky law!” tatah a y he.
Cawngsaw rungpui taco a hrangso he ka, “De teitah ung o,” aa tah he. Canghrasala, “David Pathlah, Abuipaw, ning ma do ky law!” tatah a thang vy tah aa y he.
Zisu cawh a daw ka, a y he. “Naa cawtah ze tuapah maw naa du?” tatah a hae he.
“Abuipaw, khua hmuh khy kaa du,” tatah aa palei.
Zisu taco ningdo he ka, aa meh cawh a tongpah he. Ma cangkaw leco, khua cawh hmuh khy he ka, Ama cawh aa zui.
Jerusalem lang a va nae myca he ka, Oliv tlaang letah a ungpaw Bethfes khua aa phah tihtah Zisu tah a hningzuitu pahning khah seisah hlang he ka,
aa hai letah, “Naa hme khua lekhei va sei la, a sawtei khatah a cangpaw, la aa hrai thlangpaw naa hmuh palang a. A rui khah thlang he ceh ka, naa va hrui lai a.
Pakheh kheh tah zekhatah aa ca tah zong he tah Abuipaw tah a hia naa tah a, taico ama tah a va thlaw palang thlang a,” a tah he.
Ma heh Khazing khuavang hmang tei reipaw,
“Zion sawcanu khah ching my lo, ‘Na siangpahrang cawh nama kha a vongpaw khah mingtua, mehningnai cang ka, la a va ci lai, la teitei ceingei khah a cang,’ ” tahpaw bia a tlingnah khah a cang.
A hningzuitu sahlo cawh va sei he ka, Zisu tei a chingpaw he hrakhei aa va tua.
La puino le la teitei cawh va chuakhui he ka, aa pai sahlo cawh aa kai leco dae he ka, Zisu taco a ke.
Cawngsaw rungpui takhei aa pai sahlo cawh langpui letah phaw he ka, ma chung taco, ahringpaw cawh chingbu khah va chaw he ka, langpui leco aa phaw.

Mataico, a hmelang a seipaw le a zuilaipaw cawngsaw rungpui taco, “David pathlah cawh Hosana cang ky seh! Abuipaw ming tei a vongpaw cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh! A sangcaipaw vaicung lekhei Khazing cawh reithai tah ung ky seh!” tatah a y he.
Zisu cawh Jerusalem khuapui a nae tihtah khua pungpui co chuh he ka, “Ahomaw a cang?” tatah aa hae he.
Cawngsaw rungpui taco, “Galili raang, Nazaret khuapaw, Khazing khuavang Zisu a cang khi,” tatah aa chai he.

Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chunglang a nae ka, ma letei hming a zuapaw sahlo le a copaw sahlo khah a tingchua thlu he. Tangka a thlaipaw sahlo aa cabuai le lelai a zuapaw sahlo aa dyching sahlo khah a palehly thlu he.
Aa hai leco, “Capathai letah ma hrahei cia a cang, ‘Ka ing cawh thlawchangnah ing tah a cang a,’ canghrasala naaning taco, ‘Mehru kua,’ tah naa tua,” tatah a tah he.
Taico a mehcopaw le a songbepaw sahlo cawh Zisu khaco behnah ing letah a vong he ka, a dangsah he.

Canghrasala tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah a tuapaw khuarawha hming le behnah ingdung chung letei, “David Pathlah cawh Hosana, cang ky seh,” tatah nyheh sahlo tah aa ypaw khah aa hmuh tihtah ceh bingbi bei he.

Aaning taco, “Ma nyheh sahlo tei aa reipaw cawh na thui maw?” tatah Zisu cawh aa hae. Zisu taco, “Ka thui thlang. ‘Nyheh sahlo le hasaitei sahlo hmokaw taitah, Nama reithainah khah palang chua pawtah na cawngpah thah he,’ tahpaw khah rei bang bei he ceh maw,” tatah a palei he.
Taico aaning sahlo cawh piasai he ka, Bethani khua lang khah sei ka, ma leco ma zai cawh a va ria.
Mongdi tei khuapui lang tah a va kaw kaw ning takhei a ngai a di ngetei.

Langpui kae lekhei thuiku kung hmuh ka, a va seihno. Canghrasala a hnaw tah cy ly co zehmai hmuh be. Mataico thuiku kung cawh, “Zening tahmai thui khaw bei ceh,” tatah a tah. Ma cangkaw leco, thuiku kung cawh a ro.
A hningzuitu sahlo tah ma cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa ning a ang. “Zecawtamaw ma thuiku kung heh rairang pui tah a ro thlang,” tatah Zisu cawh aa hae.

Zisu taco, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, lung langlo lytah zingnah naa hnui caco, ma thuiku kung letei tuapaw heh naa tua khy long cang lytah ma tlaang hmai heh, ‘Sei la, rili chunglang va tlah thlah,’ tah khy he ceh ka, a hnei ka, a tlah thlang a.
Naa zing caco, Khazing letah thlawchang tei naa haepaw maikaw khah naa hmuh thlang a,” a tah he.

Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chunglang a nae ka, a cawngpah chung he takhei tlangbui macang sahlo le macang sahlo cawh Ama kha a vong he. “Ze nawhnuiná tamaw ma hming sahlo heh na tua? Ma nawhnuinah heh ahomaw a ca pei?” tatah Zisu cawh aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Bia sangkheh ka ca hae tua hrá he a. Naa pa palei khy caco, ma hming sahlo heh ze hapaw nawhnuiná tamaw ka tua tahpaw ka ca ching he a.

Johan tah baptisma pehnah naw a hnuipaw khah ze taitah maw a va chua? Khazing taitah maw, cawngsaw taitah maw?” tatah a tah he. Reisia he ka, “ ‘Khazing taitah,’ tah my peh seh la, ‘A cang caco zecawtamaw Johan cawh naa zing be?’ a ma tah a.
Canghrasala, ‘Cawngsaw taitah,’ tah my peh seh la, mingzawpui cawh kaa ci tlung he, zecawtamaw tatah aaning vytei taco Johan cawh Khazing khuavang a cang aa tah tlung,” tatah aa tah.
Macawtaco Zisu cawh, “Hnih bei peh,” tatah aa chai. Taico, Zisu tah, “Kama zong tah ma hming sahlo heh ze hapaw nawhnuiná tamaw ka tua tahpaw ca ching hrá bei neh,” a tah he.

Mataico Zisu tah, “Ma heh zekhatamaw naa rawh? Cawngsawpaw pakheh ung ka, sawcapaw pahning a hnui he. A uthuipaw kha a vaw ka, ‘Ka sawtei, atoning cawh misur buichung lang va sei la, rai va hre,’ tatah a tah.
‘Sei bei neh,’ tatah a chai, canghrasala a hning taco, sei ly co chah be tah ka, a va sei.
Mataico aa paw cawh a sawcapaw pakhehpaw khaco a vaw ka, ma hraco a va tah. A sawcapaw taco, ‘Apaw, ka sei ly camaw,’ tatah tah ka, canghrasala sei be.

Ma pahning lehei he ahomaw a paw a dunah a tuapaw cawh a cang tatah naa rawh?” a tah he. “A pakhehnah,” tatah aa chai. Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ngungkhui kheitu sahlo le hlohlangno sahlo cawh Khazing painah raang letah naa hmelang tah a ca nae khai leimei he.

Baptisma peitu Johan cawh dingnah langpui khah hmuh sá pawtah naaning khatah a vong ka, zing bei he ceh, canghrasala ngungkhui kheitu sahlo le hlohlangno sahlo taco aa zing. Taico ma heh naa hmuh khy taihei hmai a ngepachih tah zing hlui bei ceh.

Tawchingnah bia ahringpaw nge vy tua o. Misur buichung a tuapaw ly a hnuipaw pakheh a ung. A buichung cawh ruahy sah khai ka, misur so nápaw kho zong co ka, a haw nápaw siasang zong a do thah. Mataico misur buichung cawh thaikhehpaw ly a tuapaw sahlo khah hlei he ka, khuatlongnah lang a sei.
Hre cai a ne tihtah a sae sahlo khah ama a ting hangpaw pakhong pawtah khei ly a hlangpaw sahlo khaco a taw he.
Ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco sae sahlo cawh tle he ka, pakheh cawh dai he ka, pakhehpaw cawh aa thaw. A pathungnahpaw cawh alung tah aa cung.
Mataico, ahringpaw sae sahlo khah a hlu vy tah aaning sahlo khaco taw he ka, ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco ma thlythly hraco aa tua hui he.
A changnah leco a sawcapaw khah aaning sahlo khaco a va taw. ‘Ka sawcapaw cawh aa cizaw thlang a,’ tatah a tah.
Canghrasala, ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco a sawcapaw cawh aa hmuh tihtah pakheh le pakheh cawh, ‘Ma cawngsaw heh ry cytu a cang. A vong o, thé he peh ka, a ry a lah ná he peh seh,’ aa tah he.
Macawtaco ama cawh tle he ka, misur buichung alailang khah piakhui he ka, aa thaw.
Macawtaco misur buichung a hnuitupaw a va chua tihtah ma ly a hlangpaw sahlo cawh zekhatamaw a tua he a?” a tah he.
Taico aaning sahlo taco, “Ma mehchawly sahlo cawh cichui pawtah thé he ka, a misur buichung khah hre a zaw tihtah a tinghangpaw a pei khypaw ly a hlangpaw ahringpaw khah a hlei he a,” tatah aa palei.

Zisu taco, “Capathai letah rei bang bei he ceh maw? ‘Ing a sahtu sahlo tei aa hlawhpaw alung cawh a biapui caipaw alung tah a cang. Abuipaw tah ma heh tua ka, kaa mehmuh letah khuarawha a chuipaw a cang,’ tahpaw heh.
Macawtaco, Khazing painah raang cawh naaning taitah lahly cang ka, a thui a thui sápaw cawngsaw khah peh a cang he a, tah heh ka ca ching he.
Ma alung cung letei a tlahpaw cawngsaw cawh kuichy thlu he ka, ma alung tei a tlahsopaw cawngsaw he cawh a mang cici he a,” tatah a tah he.
Tlangbui macang sahlo le Farasi sahlo tah Zisu a reipaw tawchingnah bia cawh aa thui tihtah kaaning a ma tahnang tahpaw khah aa hni.
Ama tle nápaw langpui khah aa hui, canghrasala zawpuipaw khah aa ci he, zecawtamaw tatah ma cawngsaw sahlo takhei Zisu cawh Khazing khuavang a cang tatah aa tah cawtah a cang.
Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh tawchingnah bia a ching vy hui he.
“Vaicung painah raang cawh a sawcapaw nupui chui kongchuanah a tuatupaw abui khatah a lo.
Ama taco a sae sahlo khah taw he ka, kongchuanah letei aa hruipaw sahlo he khah va chuh myca he seh tatah a va tahsah he. Canghrasala va chuh du tlang bei he.

Taico a sae sahlo cawh a hlu vy tah taw he ka, ‘Aa caw tei zaibatui kaa pa chia pahpaw he hruipaw sahlo khah va ching o, ka cotungpaw sahlo le ka sahring a thypaw sahlo cawh theh thah he peh ka, zezongpui a tlang a tling thlu myca. Nupui chui kongchuanah lang cawh va chuh myca law, va tah o,’ tatah a tah he.
Canghrasala a bia cawh naw tah sah be ca he ka, pakhehpaw cawh a ly lang, pakhehpaw cawh cho palehnah lang a sei hly thlang he.
A hringpaw sahlo taco a sae sahlo khah tle he ka, hrai he ka, aa thaw he.
A buipaw cawh a thing a ae. A raekeh sahlo khah taw he ka, ma lenongpaw sahlo cawh va thawsah he ka, aa khuapui cawh me tah a va rosah he.
Mataico a sae sahlo khah, ‘Nupui chui kongchuanah cawh a tlang a tling thlu myca, canghrasala ka hruipaw cawngsaw sahlo heh va chuh tlang bei he.
Langpui a tongnah sahlo lekhei va sei la, cawngsaw naa hmuhpaw maikaw he khah kongchuanah leco va hrui o,’ a tah he.
Macawtaco, sae sahlo cawh langpui sahlo lang khah va sei he ka, cawngsaw aa hmuhpaw maikaw he khah mehchaw kha, mehchia khakhei va pahmo he ka, nupuichuinah ing cawh cawngsaw a chih thlang he.
Canghrasala, abuipaw cawh a va chuhpaw cawngsaw ming rua pawtah khei a vong tihtah nupuichuinah chaichi a hrei lytah a vongpaw cawngsawpaw khah a va hmuh.
‘Ka dua, zecawtamaw nupuichuinah chaichi a hrei lytah na va chua lalei?’ tatah abuipaw taco a hae. Cawngsawpaw cawh a rei thlaw be.
Mataico abuipaw taco a raitaw sahlo khah, ‘Ma cawngsawpaw heh a kih le a phe tongchai la, alailang amuinah caw le hawrianah hminghmaw a cangpaw lang khah vathlang o.’
Zecawtamaw tatah hruipaw cawh a hlu he, canghrasala thingpaw cawh a cawngtei he,” tatah a tah he.
Mataico Farasi sahlo cawh piathlah he ka, Zisu cawh Ama a bia khei o khy nápawtah khua aa khang.

Taico, aa hningzuitu sahlo khah Herod a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei Zisu khatah aa va taw he. Aaning sahlo taco Zisu cawh, “Cawngpahtu, nama cawh mehding cang ceh ka, Khazing langpui kong heh biahmuisui a cang naning teitah na cawngpah he tah cawh kaa hni. Cawngsaw tah miamang khypaw cang bei ceh, zecawtamaw tatah cawngsaw hme ming bei ceh,
Zekhatamaw na rawh? Siangpahrang Sizar letah ngungkhui peh heh ahmang maw hmang ly? Ma ching tua,” tatah aa tah.
Canghrasala Zisu taco, aa rawhnah a chah lypaw khah hnih ka, “Naaning cungmai raipha sahlo, zecawtamaw o na pa pachia he ceh?
Ngungkhui tho rua tei naa hmangpaw tangka phaesai cawh pa hmuhsah tua o,” tatah a tah he. Tangka cawh va tle he ka,
aa hai leco, “Aho a lingthlaw maw a cawng? Taico aho a cakhai maw a cia?” tatah a hae he.
Aaning tah, “Sizar,” tatah aa palei. Mataico aa hai letah, “Sizar a tei cawh Sizar pei la, Khazing tei cawh Khazing pei my lo,” a tah he.
Ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah aa ning a ang thlang. Macawtaco piasai he ka, a seihly he.
Ma ningcai leco thokawnah ung be a tahpaw Sadusi sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka, bia aa hae hri.
“Cawngpahtu, Moses tei a ma chingpaw cawh cawngsawpaw cawh sawteisah lytah a thih caco, a unypaw takhei lahmeno cawh nupui tah chui kaw seh la, a thipaw caw takhei sawtei a sah pápaw a cang a ma tah.
A cang caco kaa hrong letah uny pasarih a ung he. A uthui caipaw tah nupui chui ka, a thi. Sawtei sah be ca ka, a nupui cawh a nyteipaw khah a ry si.
Ma thly hraco a pahningnah le a pathungnah taikhei a pasarihnah tai a cang he.
A hning cai taco, ma canuno zong cawh a thi hrah.
Macawtaco thokawnah letah ma no cawh aa pasarih hrong letah aho a nupui maw a cang a? Aa zongmingtei tah ma canuno khah aa chui tlung,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Naa rawh sua ngetei, Capathai a cang ly leh Khazing hmingtuakhynah naa hni lynah cawtah a cang.
Thokawnah leco a chuihae cawh ung khawh a be. Vaicung letei vaiming hratah aa cang tae a.
Canghrasala thihnah taitei thokawnah kong letah Khazing tei naaning kha a reipaw cawh,

‘Kama cawh Abraham Khazing, Isak Khazing le Jakob Khazing ka cang,’ a tahpaw khah rei bang bei he ceh maw? Ama cawh mehthi aa Khazing cang be, canghrasala mehring aa Khazing a cang hri,” tatah a palei he.
Cawngsaw zawpui tah ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah a cawngpahnah khah aa ning a ang ngetei.
Zisu tah Sadusi sahlo cawh de ky tah a tua he tahpaw khah Farasi sahlo tah aa thui tihtah hmingkheh tah a pahmo he.
Aa hrong letei phungbia a thai ngeteipaw pakheh tah Zisu pase du takhei ma bia heh a hae.
“Cawngpahtu, biapeh hrong lehei zehapaw maw a biapui cai?” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco, “ ‘Abuipaw na Khazing khah na lungthing vytei, na hringnah vytei, na khuarawnah vytei khakhei do my lo,’ tahpaw heh a cang.
Ma heh a sangkhehnah le alaicaipaw biapeh a cang.
Taico a sanghningnah cawh ma khahei a lo thlang, ‘Nama na dopaw hratah na ingpaw khah do my lo,’ tahpaw heh a cang.
Phungbia vytei le Khazing khuavang sahlo aa bia vytei cawh ma biapeh sanghning lehei a pakhung thlu he,” tatah a palei.
Farasi sahlo cawh hmingkheh tah aa pahmo chung he takhei Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh,
“Khri kong lehei zekhatamaw naa rawh? Aho pathlah maw a cang?” tatah a hae he. Aaning sahlo taco, “David a pathlah,” tatah aa palei.
Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Ma hratei a cang caco, David tah Thlawpaw Pathai tah Khri khah, ‘Abuipaw,’ tatah a ypaw khah zekhatamaw a cang a? Zecawtamaw tatah David tah,
‘Abuipaw tah ka Buipaw cawh na carae sahlo khah na pherai letah ka chia hlai vytei he cawh ka cacang lang letah a ty my lo, a tah,’ tatah a tah.
David tah Khri cawh, ‘Abuipaw,’ a tah tlung, zekhatamaw David pathlah cawh a cang thai a?” tatah a tah he.
Palehnah bia kaw kheh hmai a rei khypaw ung be ca he ka, ma ning ri taico ahotahmai bia hae ngang khawh bei he.
Mataico Zisu tah zawpuipaw le a hningzuitu sahlo aa hai leco,
“Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo cawh Moses a naw hnuinah a tlepaw a cang he.
Macawtaco aa bia nge la, aa ca chingpaw he hming maikaw khah tua my lo. Canghrasala aa tuapaw hratah tua khe lo, zecawtamaw tatah aa ca chingpaw he khah aaning tah zui bei he.
Hming a rih pawpui khah tongchai he ka, cawngsaw aa saitlang letah aa khing lai he, canghrasala aaning taco, ma hming sahlo hneihnang nápawtah aa kihdong hmai calia du bei he.

Hming aa tuapaw maikaw heh cawngsaw hmuh ruapaw tah aa tuapaw a cang. Capathai khungnah bawng a tongpaipaw he khah a kypui tah tua he ka, aa angki pasuapaw letei aa pathlepaw a cong cawh zetlua tamaw a pasua.
Kongchuanah letah a chawpaw hminghmaw khah du he ka, synagog letah achaw caipaw dyching letah a ty aa du.
Chodo tlang letah cizaw hmo tah bia a ching khah du he ka, cawngsaw tah, ‘Cawngpahtu,’ tatah y khah aa du hrah.
Canghrasala naaning sahlo cawh, ‘Cawngpahtu,’ tatah a ysah khe o, zecawtamaw tatah naaning cawh, Cawngpahtu pakheh suitei hnui he ceh ka, naaning vytei cawh uny na cang he ceh.
Taico aluicung lehei ahohmai, ‘Apaw,’ tatah va y khe o, zecawtamaw tatah naaning cawh Paw pakheh suitei hnui he ceh ka, Ama cawh vaicung letei a ungpaw khah a cang.
‘Cawngpahtu,’ tatah pakheh hmai a ysah khe o, zecawtamaw tatah cawngpahtu pakheh hnui he ceh ka, Ama cawh Khri khah a cang.
Naa hrong letei alaicaipaw cawh naa raihretu a cang tae a.
Taico ama le ama a pasangpaw cawh pany cang tae a ka, ama le ama a panypaw cawh pasang a cang tae a.

Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo, naaning cungmai raipha sahlo, naa cing a ping! Cawngsaw hmekaw letah vaicung painah raang cawh naa kha. Naaning zong a nae bei he ceh, a nae dupaw sahlo zong a naesah hrah bei he ceh.

Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo, naaning cungmai raipha sahlo, naa cing a ping! Lahme ing sahlo khah chu lai he ceh ka, ma hmuh ná he seh tatah thlaw a sypui tah naa chang. Macawtaco a sah pui tah dangtah na cang tae he ceh.

Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo, naaning cungmai raipha sahlo, naa cing a ping! Cawngsaw pakheh naa behnah lang a paleh sá pawtah tlang le tui tah khua tlawng he ceh ka, a va paleh tih he tah naaning hratah hraihming sawcapaw sahlo tah a lehning tah naa tua he.

Mehco langchuitu sahlo, naa cing a ping! ‘Pakheh kheh tah behnah ing tah chia a sah caco, ma cawh zehmai pui be. Canghrasala pakheh kheh tah behnah ing sui tah chia a sah caco, ama cawh chia a sahpaw hrakhei a zui a,’ naa tah.
Naaning mehco mehruh sahlo! Zehapaw maw a lai vy? Sui maw, sui a pathai sahpaw behnah ing maw?

‘Pakheh kheh tah dangnah siasang tah chia a sah caco, ma cawh zehmai pui be, canghrasala pakheh kheh tah a cung letei a ungpaw lahsong khei chia a sah caco, chia a sahpaw hrakhei a zui a,’ tatah naa tah.
Naaning mehco sahlo! Zehapaw maw a lai vy? Lahsong maw, lahsong a pathaisahpaw dangnah siasang maw?
Macawtaco dangnah siasang tah chia a sahpaw taco dangnah siasang le a cung letei hming a ungpaw maikaw khatah chia a sahpaw a cang.
Taico behnah ing tah chia a sahpaw taco behnah ing le a chung letei a ungpaw Khazing khakhei chia a sahpaw a cang.
Mataico, vaicung tei chia a sahpaw taco Khazing abui dyching le a cung letei a typaw Khazing khei chia a sahpaw a cang.

Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo, naaning cungmai raipha sahlo, naa cing a ping! Ringthopaw hanghui, maho, esing sahlo taikhah chyhraw chykheh naa peh. Canghrasala phungbia letei a biapui caipaw dingnah, zawngenah le zingchuipaw cangnah sahlo lekhei dethlang tah naa ung. A hmetaw teipaw heh dethlang lytah a hning teipaw zong heh naa tua ruapaw a cang.
Naaning langchuitu mehco sahlo! Sisaw dingpai sua le peh tatah tui cawh thlih he ceh ka, canghrasala sahisy cawh naa langpai.

Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo, naaning cungmai raipha sahlo, naa cing a ping! Ny le pakang sahlo cawh alailang tah pathaisah he ceh ka, canghrasala a chunglang cawh dusawnah le ma zawng long rawhnah chitah a chih thlang.
Farasi mehco sahlo! Ny le pakang cawh a chunglang pathaisah taw la, mataico alailang zong khah a pathai a.

Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo, naaning cungmai raipha sahlo, naa cing a ping! Naaning cawh si araangpaw thupaw thlai, a cung lang tah a nge ngetei tlung katei, a chunglang cawh mehthi ru le a pialuipaw hming maikaw tah a chihpaw hratah na cang he ceh.
Ma hraco a cung lang co mehding ky lo he ceh ka, canghrasala a chunglang co ziatainah le chiahrunah khatah na chih he ceh.
Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo, naaning cungmai raipha sahlo, naa cing a ping! Khazing khuavang sahlo aa cawtah thlailung bing he ceh ka, mehding sahlo aa thlai cawh naa pasang.
Mataico, ‘Kaa mapaw sahlo aa chai lekhei za ung hrah peh seh la, Khazing khuavang sahlo aa thawnahpaw he letah aaning sahlo khaco a pahlawh bei peh,’ tatah naa tah.
Macawtaco Khazing khuavang sahlo a za theh pawhe pathlah sahlo naa cangpaw khah naaning teitah na phy he ceh.
Macawtaco naa mapaw sahlo aa pathopaw suanah cawh patlungpatlia thlang ca o!
Naaning pari sahlo! Naaning pari a pathlah sahlo! Hraihming lang tlah khah zekhatamaw naa cahri thai a?

Macawtaco Khazing khuavang sahlo le mehsing sahlo le cawngpahtu sahlo khah naaning kha ka va taw he. Aaning letei thaikhehpaw sahlo cawh theh a he ceh ka, khraws letah naa khaipai he a, ahringpaw sahlo cawh naa synagog sahlo letah saving rui tah chei he ceh ka, khua kheh khy khua khé tah naa cadai lai he ceh.

Ma hraco mehdingpaw Abel thisai taitah behnah ing le dangnah siasang kaa letei naa thawpaw Berekia a sawcapaw Zakaria thisai tai, aluicung letei lai sahpaw mehding aa thisai vytei cawtah sua phosah tah thaily a cangpaw na cang he ceh.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma sahlo vytei heh atochai saw aa cung lehei a tlung a.

Vy Jerusalem, Jerusalem, Khazing khuavang sahlo khah za theh he ceh ka, Khazing tah naaning khatah a tawpaw he a cawngsaw sahlo khah alung tah na va seh tei he. Aa puino tah a sawtei sahlo a mathlaw rai letah a bakhupaw he hratah, na cawngsaw sahlo cawh ui khazeh uilui maw pakhong du he neh ka, canghrasala du bei he ceh.
Mingtua hmai o, naa ing cawh a ching myca.
Ka ca ching he, ‘Abuipaw ming tah a vongpaw cawh bonghnang song cang ky seh,’ tatah naa tah hlai vytei cawh pa hmuh kaw khaw bei ceh,” tatah a tah.
Zisu cawh behnah ing taitah piathlah ka, a khiakaly lai tihtah a hningzuitu sahlo tah behnah ingpui cawh hmuhsah ruapaw takhei Ama khatah a vong he.
Zisu taco, “Ma hming vytei heh naa hmuh maw? Biahmuisui ka ca ching he. Ma letei alung phaekheh hmai heh palehly lypaw ung a be, aa zongmingtei tah palehly thlu a cang tae he a,” tatah a tah.

Zisu cawh Oliv tlaang letah a ty thlang ning takhei a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aaning teitah Ama khaco a vong he ka, “Ma hming sahlo cawh zening tamaw a cang a? Ma ching tua! Na vong nápaw caichangnah paching pakhanah cawh zemaw a cang tae a?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Ahotahmai aa ca dungkhei ly nápaw he tah a raering my lo.
Zecawtamaw tatah ka ming tah cawngsaw hlupui va chua he ka, ‘Kama heh Khri cawh ka cang,’ tah a he ka, cawngsaw hlupui khah aa dungkhei he a.
Rae a dypaw he le rae thongpang khah naa thui a, canghrasala a pahly khe lo. Ma hming sahlo cawh a ung hrahringpaw a cang he, canghrasala a changnah cang balang be.
Raang kheh le raang kheh a dy a he ka, painah le painah a dy he a. Hming hlupui letah cakaang tlung ka, aling a hrui a.
Ma vytei heh canu ny ung risaw hrang a pathonah hratah a cang.
Mataico, naaning sahlo cawh hreh ruapaw tah male kih letah peh cang he ceh ka, thaw na cang he ceh, taico kama ka rawng tahei mingphing maikaw tah aa ca hua he a.
Ma cai leco ming hlupui cawh aa zingnah taitah a paleh a he ka, a luithe a he ka, pakheh le pakheh a hua he a,
taico khuavang pakheipaw hlupui chuh a he ka, cawngsaw hlupui khah aa dungkhei he a.
Chahlynah a pungchy navai tah cawngsaw hlupui donah cawh a zochuh longmang a.
Canghrasala, a changnah tai cyky tah a dawpaw cawngsaw cawh pachah a cang a.
Taico, mingphing vytei khatah hnikhuitu cang ruapaw tah painah raang thawngchawbia cawh rei cang tae a ka, mataico caichangnah cawh a va chuh a.
Khazing khuavang Daniel tah a reipaw, ‘Rorangnah a chua khuipaw pasih padawh chuipaw,’ cawh hming pathai letah a daw thlangpaw khah naa hmuh tihtah a reitu tah a silang hnih he seh.
Judia raang letei a ungpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh tlaang cung lang sai he seh.
A ing cung letei a ungpaw cawngsaw cawh hmingbo lá pawtah ing rai lang cung kheh seh.
Ly letei a ungpaw cawh a angkilai lá pawtah ing lang tlung hrah kheh seh.
Ma ningcai cawh sawtei a phopaw canu sahlo le nysai a tlepaw no sahlo aa caw taco zetlua tamaw ningping a chui a!
Naa sai nápaw cai heh thlasih le Sabat ning tah a cang ly nápawtah thlawchang my lo.
Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing tah khazaw a tua tho ning taitah ato ning tai lehei a ung bang lypaw ningping vaisangnah alaipaw pui tlung tae a ka, ma tluhpaw cawh ung bang khawh a be.
Ma cai cawh pachingsah lypaw takhei cang my seh la, a hringpaw pakheh hmai ung a bei he, canghrasala Khazing tei a thingpaw sahlo rawng takhei pachingsah a cang tae a.
Ma tih taco pakheh kheh tah, ‘Mingtua, ma lehei Khri a ung,’ a cang ly leh, ‘ma lekhei a ung,’ tatah a ca tah caco he zing khe lo.

Zemaw tahpaw co Khri pakheipaw sahlo le khuavang pakheipaw sahlo chuh a he ka, a cang khy caco Khazing thingpaw cawngsaw sahlo hmai dungkhei pawtah arungnawpaw paching pakhanah sahlo le ningang chuipaw hming sahlo khah aa tua a.
A cai a phah hlai tah ka ca ching pacia he.
Macawtaco pakheh kheh tah, ‘Ma raangcaa lekhei a ung,’ a ca tah caco he va sei khe lo, a cang ly leh ‘Ing chung letah a ung,’ a ca tah caco he va zing khe lo.
Zecawtamaw tatah lailaw cawh nichualang taitah nitlah lang tai a kypaw hratah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongkawnah cawh a cang tae a.
Sarawh a ungnah hminghmaw leco langtaw pavaw cawh a pahmo tei he.

Ma ningcai sahlo letei ningping vaisangnah a cang khy cangkaw tei leh, ‘Ning cawh muisah cang a ka, thlawpaw zong khai khawh a be. Esi sahlo cawh avai taitah tlah a he ka, avai letei hmingtuakhynah sahlo zong cahneh a cang he a.’

Ma cai leco, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a paching pakhanah cawh avai letah a paly a ka, aluicung letei mingphing vytei sahlo cawh a cah tae he a. Hmingtuakhynah le a rungnawpaw laisuinah khatah avai meding cung letah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongpaw khah aa hmuh a.

Mataico, a vaiming sahlo khah hmoka a thangpui tah tung hmotah taw a he ka, aaning sahlo taco thingpaw sahlo khah alui ki pali taitah avai a changnah a rakheh taikhei a rahkheh a changnah tai aa pahmo he a.
Thuiku kung tai hei cawngpahnah bia heh a ngia my lo. Achawng ka chawng katei a hnaw pany a ka chuapaw naa hmuh tihtah nipui ning a ne myca tatah naa hni.
Ma hraco ma hming vytei a cang leimeipaw naa hmuh tihtah a vong kaw nápaw cai a ne myca, ingkaw hrang a va phah myca tahpaw khah hnih my lo.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma hming vytei heh a tlung hlai vytei cawh atochai cawngsaw sahlo heh thi thlu balang a bei he.
Alui le avai cawh a rawh a, canghrasala ka bia cawh a rawh by a be.
A ning le a cai cawh Paw tah cy ly co ahotahmai hnih bei he, vaicung leteipaw vaiming sahlo tahmai hnih bei he, Sawcapaw zong tah hnih hrah be.
Noah a chaining leteipaw hrakhei Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongnah cawh a cang tae a.
Zecawtamaw tatah tuipa-ia a tlung hlai tai khei Noah tuilawng chunglang a naenah tai lekhei cawngsaw cawh e he ka, ding he ka, a chui a hae he ka, a hnui he.
Taico tuipa-ia tlung katei, aaning vytei a seikhui thlu hlai tai lekhei co zehming maw a tlung a tahpaw zehmai hnih bei he. Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongnah ning leco ma hraco a cang a.
Ly letah a ungpaw cawngsaw pahning chung taikhei pakheh cawh lah cang ka, pakheh cawh seisai a cang a.
Canu pahning tah saangsuh leimei a he ka, pakheh cawh lah cang a ka, pakheh cawh seisai a cang tae a.
Macawtaco a raering my lo, zecawtamaw tatah zening tamaw naa Buipaw cawh a vong a takhah hnih bei he ceh kho.
Canghrasala, ma heh hnih my lo, ing hnuitu tah mehru cawh zai zetih cai letah maw a va chua a takhah hnih thah my seh la, achaw teitah vai a ka, a ing cawh hrawh sá a be.
Macawtaco a mai pacia tah ung my lo, zecawtamaw tatah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh naa rawh lypaw cai lekhei a vong a.
Aho khah maw zing a chuipaw le a singpaw sae, a buipaw tah a ingchungkho sae sahlo khah a cai naning teitah batui peh rua pawtah rai a pehpaw cawh a cang?
A buipaw a va tlung kaw tihtah a reipaw hratei a tuapaw a hmuhpaw sae cawh meh vaichaw a cang a.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, mapaw cawh a hnuichia vytei a mingkaitu takhei a tua a.
Canghrasala, ma saecapaw cawh mehchawly cang tah ama le ama khah, ‘Ka buipaw cawh a ry cong thlang a,’ tah seh la,
a vesaw sae sahlo khah daiphong he seh la, zu a ruipaw sahlo khatah ding le e tah ung thlang seh la,
ma saecapaw a buipaw cawh a rawh lypaw ning le pacang lypaw cai letah va tlung seh la,
a buipaw tah a saecapaw cawh caiping caimang taichung a ka, caw le hawrianah hminghmaw, cungmai raipha sahlo ungnah lekhei a ungsah hrah a.
Ma cai leco vaicung painah raang cawh aa me-ing a tle he katei, nupui a chuipaw satlepaw va dai rua pawtah a seipaw he laisaw pathai pahraw khatah a lo a.
Aaning chung taico papangawpaw cawh a hruhpaw cang he ka, a tangpaw papangawpaw cawh a singpaw a cang he.
A hruhpaw papangawpaw taco aa me-ing cawh a tle thlang he ka, canghrasala metui cawh a cakai bei he.
Canghrasala a singpaw papangawpaw cawh me-ing a tle he ka, tuithei khei metui a cakai pai he.
Nupui chui satlepaw cawh va chuh haa ngetei ka, aa zongmingtei co aa mehku ka, a ihning thlu he.
Zaicing taco, ‘Nupui chui satlepaw a va chuh myca khi! Dai tei law!’ tatah a ysang he.
Mataico laisaw pathai pahraw cawh ka tho he ka, aa me-ing cawh aa vang.
Mehruh sahlo taco mehsing sahlo cawh, ‘Na metui ma rai bang tua law, kaa metui a chang thah,’ tatah aa tah he.
‘Cang thai be, a ungpaw heh naaning kha, kaaning khaco a ma zaw a be. Metui a zuapaw khatah va sei la, naaning teitah va co hri thlang o,’ tatah aa palei he.

Canghrasala metui caw pawtah aa va sei chung taco nupui chui satlepaw cawh a va chuh. A mai pacia thah tei a ungpaw laisaw pathai sahlo cawh ama khaco nupui chui kongchuanah lang cawh aa va sei. Taico ingkaw cawh aa kha.
A hning taco, ahringpaw sahlo cawh va chuh he ka, ‘Abuipaw, abuipaw, ingkaw ma hong tua law,’ tatah aa tah.
Canghrasala, ‘Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ca hnih bei neh,’ tatah a palei he.
Macawtaco a raering my lo, zecawtamaw tatah ka vong kaw nápaw a ning le suimehlang a cai naa hni ly cawtah hei.
Taico, vaicung painah raang cawh a sae sahlo y he katei, a hnuicho a chiaso sipaw he khuatlong a thopaw cawngsawpaw khatah a lo vy hui.

Aaning leh tuakhynah aa hnuipaw naning khei pakhehpaw cawh ngung tangka thong pangaw, pakhehpaw cawh ngung tangka thonghning, pakhehpaw cawh ngung tangka thongkheh a peh he. Mataico khuatlongnah lang cawh a sei.
Ngung tangka thong pangaw a lawpaw cawngsawpaw cawh va sei palang ka, a ngung tangka cawh rai va hre naw ka, thong pangaw a miasah.
Ma hraco ngung tangka thonghning a lawpaw taco thonghning a miasah hrah.
Canghrasala, ngung tangka thongkheh a lawpaw cawngsawpaw cawh va sei ka, alui letah a kho va co ka, a buipaw a ngung tangka cawh a va no.
Khua sypui khy takhei ma sae sahlo aa buipaw cawh va tlung ka, aa ngung tangka cawh a mingpah he.
Ngung tangka thong pangaw a lawpaw taco, ahringpaw thong pangaw khah a va tle lai. ‘Abuipaw, ngung tangka thong pangaw na pa chiasosipaw khah mingtua, thong pangaw ka miasah hi,’ tatah a tah.

Abuipaw taco, ‘Na tua thai caimang, mehchaw le zingchuipaw sae! Nama cawh hming a cawng pawtei letah zingchuipaw na cangnah cawtah hming a hlupaw pui a mingkaitu tah ka ca tua a. A vong la, na buipaw a lunglawngnah heh a va hrong hrah,’ tatah a palei.
Ngung tangka thonghning a lawpaw cawngsawpaw zong cawh a vong hrah. ‘Abuipaw, ngung tangka thonghning na pa chiasosipaw khah mingtua, thonghning ka miasah hi,’ tatah a tah.

A buipaw taco, ‘Na tua thai caimang, mehchaw le zingchuipaw sae! Nama cawh hming a chiapaw tei letah zingchuipaw na cang cawtah hming a hlupaw pui a mingkaitu tah ka ca tua a. A vong la, na buipaw a lunglawngnah heh a va hrong hrah,’ tatah a palei.

Mataico ngung tangka thongkheh a lawpaw cawngsawpaw cawh a vong ka, ‘Abuipaw, nama cawh mehcicia cang ceh ka, thleci na cing lynah hming letah hre lai ceh ka, na vapaw a cang lypaw saze khah na pahmo lai tahpaw ka hni.
Macawtaco ka thlawzawng ka, va sei neh ka, na tangka khah alui letah ka va no. Mingtua, ma heh na tei cawh a cang hi,’ tatah a tah.
A buipaw taco, ‘Nama mehchawly, sae thawthi! Thleci ka va lynah hming letah ka hrepaw le ka vapaw a cang lypaw saze ka pahmo laipaw cawh na hni tah law?
Ma hratei na hni thlang tlung pawtah ka tangka khah tangkachianah letah za chia la, ka va tlung tihtah a hrang kha a mia kha hmuh a bei neh maw?’
‘Ma cawngsawpaw letei tangka heh law la, tangka thonghraw a hnuipaw cawngsawpaw khah pei o.
Zecawtamaw tatah a hnuipaw maikaw cawh peh chi vy cang a ka, a hlupui a hnui a. A hnui lypaw cawngsaw cawh a hnuitlakang pawtei hmai khah lah pah a cang a.
Taico ma chahnainah a hnui lypaw sae heh alailang muinah chunglang caw le hawrianah hminghmaw lang khah vathlang o,’ tatah a tah he.
Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a vaiming vytei khatah a rungnawnah khatah a vong tihtah a rungnawnah abui dyching letah a ty a.
Mingphing vytei cawh a hme letah a pahmo tae he ka, tuukingpaw tah mei le tuu a chaichy pawhe hratah cawngsaw khah pakheh le pakheh khah a pachai he a.
Tuu sahlo khah a cacang lang letah chiá he ka, mei sahlo khah a cavui lang letah a chia he a.

Mataico, Siangpahrang tah a cacang lang letei a ungpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh, ‘A vong tua o, naaning ka Paw tei bonghnang a songpaw sahlo, naa cy ruapaw a cangpaw vaicung painah raang, khazaw papining taitei naa cawtah pachiapaning ciapaw heh a lah tua o.
Zecawtamaw tatah ka ngaidi ka, e ruapaw naa pa peh, ka tuihrae ka, ding ruapaw naa pa peh, khuachai cang neh ka, naa ing letah naa pa tlungsah,
chaichi a phahlah neh ka, chaichi naa pa tuapah, a sah neh ka, naa pa mingkai, thongtlah neh ka, pa vai he ceh ka, naa pa baw,’ a tah he a.
Mataico, mehding sahlo taco, ‘Abuipaw, zening tamaw na ngaidipaw ca hmuh peh ka, batui kaa ca peh bang, a cang ly leh na tuihrae ka, ding ruapaw kaa ca peh bang?
Zening tamaw khuachai na cangpaw ca hmuh peh ka, kaa ing letah kaa ca tlungsah bang, a cang ly leh chaichi a phahlah ceh ka, chaichi kaa ca tua pah bang?
Zening tamaw na sawpaw kaa ca hmuh bang, a cang ly leh thongtlah ceh ka, kaa ca vai bang?’ tatah aa chai a.
Siangpahrang taco, ‘Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ka uny sahlo letei a chia caipaw cung letah naa tuapaw khah kama letah naa tuapaw a cang,’ tatah a palei he a.
Mataico a cavui lang teipaw sahlo khah, ‘Naaning chiasahpaw sahlo, Setan le a vaiming sahlo cawtah pachia ciapaw chaizaw me chunglang khah seihly o.
Zecawtamaw tatah ka ngaidi ka, e ruapaw zehmai pa pei bang bei he ceh, ka tuihrae ka, ding ruapaw zehmai pa pei bang bei he ceh,

khuachai cang neh ka, naa ing letah pa tlungsah bang bei he ceh, chaichi a phahlah neh ka, chaichi pa va so bang bei he ceh, ka saw hmotah thongtlah neh ka, pa vai tah pa baw bang bei he ceh,’ a tah he a.

Aaning sahlo taco, ‘Abuipaw zening tamaw na ngaidipaw ca hmuh peh ka, a cang ly leh na tuihraepaw khah ca hmuh peh ka, a cang ly leh khuachai cang ceh ka, a cang ly leh chaichi a phahlah ceh ka, a cang ly leh a sah ceh ka, a cang ly leh thongtlah ceh ka, ca baw lytah kaa ung?’ tatah aa tah a.
Ama taco, ‘Biahmuisui ka ca ching he. Ma cawngsaw sahlo letei a chia caipaw cung letei naa tua lypaw cawh kama ka cung letah naa tua lypaw a cang,’ tatah a palei he a.
Mataico aaning sahlo cawh chaizaw dangtahnah lang aa sei a. Canghrasala mehding sahlo cawh chaizaw hringnah lang aa sei a,” tatah a tah.
Zisu cawh ma bia sahlo vytei heh a reithlu khy taitah a hningzuitu sahlo khah,
“Naa hni thlangpaw hratah Khungsai Panawnah heh ninghning a du ka, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh khraws letah khaipai rua pawtah male kih letah peh a cang tae a,” tatah a tah he.
Mataico, tlangbui macang sahlo le macang sahlo cawh tlangbui alaicaipaw a ming Kaiafa a cangpaw a ing lekhei a pahmo he ka,
Zisu cawh aparuh teitah tlé tah thaw ruapaw takhei khua aa khang.
“Canghrasala Khungsaipanaw chung leco cang kheh seh, cawngsaw hrong letah hnahnawhnah maw chuh sua le,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu cawh Bethani khuapaw Simon mehthinghmui ing letei a ung chung takhei,
canu pakheh a vong ka, lungrang tuithei khei sathy ringthopaw, a mai a ru ngeteipaw khah va tle lai ka, Zisu cawh cabuai letah a ty thlangning takhei a lu taico a za bia.
A hningzuitu sahlo tah ma cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa thingae ka, “Zecawtamaw ma tluh amai a rupaw sathy heh a patlawh a papang?
Ma ringthopaw heh a mai sangpui tah zua tah tangka cawh mehsisah peh khypaw pui a cang caw,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu tah ma cawh hnih ka, “Zecawtamaw ma cawngsawno heh hna naa hnawh? Ka cung letah a tuapaw heh hmingchaw a cang hi.
Mehsisah cawh naaning khatah a ung paria thlang he, canghrasala kama cawh ung paria bei neh.
Ma ringthopaw heh ka pung letah a pa bia tih tahei phung ka cang nápaw cawtah a pachia a paningpaw a cang.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, khazaw letah thawngchawbia aa reinah maikaw letah ma cawngsawno tei a tuapaw heh ama monghly lynah tah rei a cang tae hrá a,” tatah a tah he.
Mataico, a hningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cangpaw Judas Iskariot aa tahpaw cawh tlangbui macang sahlo khatah va sei ka,
“Zisu cawh naa kih letah ca pei my he neh seh la, zemaw naa pa pae a?” tatah a va hae he. Ngung tangka songthung khah rei he ka, aa peh.
Ma khy taikhei Judas cawh aaning khatah Zisu a peh khy nápaw he cai chaw khah a bo thlang.

Raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah ning hmetawpaw lekhei a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka, “Zeletamaw Khungsai Panawnah zairia enah cawh na cawtah pachia he peh seh la, na du?” tatah aa hae.

Zisu taco, “Khuapui chung letei cawngsawpaw pakheh khatah va sei la, ‘Cawngpahtu tah ka ning le ka cai a ne myca. Ka hningzuitu sahlo khahei na ing letah Khungsai Panawnah heh ka tua theh be, a tah,’ tatah va ching my lo,” tatah a tah he.
Macawtaco Zisu tei a chingpaw he hrakhei a hningzuitu sahlo cawh va sei he ka, Khungsai Panawnah zairia cawh aa pachia.
Zailang leco Zisu cawh a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khaco cabuai letah a ty thlang hrah.
Taico, very aa e chung taco, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, naaning taihei pakheh tah naa pa lui a,” tatah a tah he.
Ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah aa ngechia ngetei ka, pakheh khy pakheh tah, “Abuipaw, kama cang hrahring bei neh, cang maw?” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Kama khatei bakang letah a pohruipaw cawngsawpaw tahei a pa lui a.

Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh Capathai tah a kong a ciapaw hratah a cung letah a tlung a. Canghrasala Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a luipaw cawngsaw cawh a cing a ping! Za pi lytah ung seh la, a cawtah a chah vy hripaw,” tatah a palei he.
Mataico, Ama a luipaw cawngsawpaw Judas taco, “Cawngpahtu, kama cang hrahring bei neh, cang maw?” tatah a tah. Zisu taco, “Aw, nama na cang,” tatah a chai.
Aa e chung taco Zisu tah very cawh law ka, lawngbia hlai ka, kychy ka, a hningzuitu sahlo cawh pei he ka, “Law la, e my lo, ma heh ka pungsaw a cang,” a tah he.
Mataico ny cawh law ka, lawngbia a hlai khy taikhei a hlai he. “Naa zongmingtei khei ma ny taihei ding tua hmai o.
Ma heh ming hlupui sua ngethai nápaw cawtah a laipaw ka thisai, biahrai thapaw cawh a cang.
Ka ca ching he, atoning taihei ka Paw a painah raang letah naaning khatah a thapaw ka ding ning tai ma misur hang heh ding khaw bei neh,” a tah he.
Reithainah hlaw sungkheh aa sah khy taitah Oliv tlaang lang cawh aa ke.

Taico Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh, “Ato zai lalei lehei na pa paisai thlu he ceh, zecawtamaw tatah ma hrahei Capathai letah, ‘Tuukingtu khah chei a neh ka, tuu vytei cawh a paipatlaw thlu he a.’ tatah cia a cang.
Canghrasala ka tho kaw khy taitah naaning naa hmelang tah Galili raang lang ka seihlang a,” tatah a ching he.
Canghrasala Piter taco, “Nama na kong lehei aa zongmingtei tah a ca paisai thlu hmai he tah kama cawh ca seisai by bei neh,” tatah a palei.
Zisu tah, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching, ato zai lalei lehei aa a khawng hlai tah uithung tai na pa paphahsai a,” tatah a chai.
Canghrasala Piter taco, “Nama khatah thih hrápaw a cang zong tah ca paphah sai by a bei neh,” tatah zawpui thui tah a tah. Taico ahringpaw a hningzuitu vytei zong tah ma hraco aa tah hrah.

Mataico, Zisu cawh a hningzuitu sahlo khatah Gethsemani aa tahpaw hminghmaw lang khah va sei he ka, aa hai letah, “Va sei vy neh ka, thlaw ka chang chung cawh ma lehei a ty thlang my lo,” tatah a tah he.
Piter le Zebedi a sawcapaw pahning khah Ama khatah a chui he ka, lung reithui le vaisang y tah a ung.
Taico aa hai letah, “Ka hringnah heh thih khui khypaw ngechianah khatah a chih. Ma lehei kama khatah ung thlang la, a raering my lo,” a tah he.

Mataico a cawngpe va sei ka, alui letah a bawh ka, “Ka Paw a cang khy pawtei a cang caco, ma tai-ingnah ny heh pa lah pah hly thlang. Canghrasala kama ka dunah hratah cang lytah nama na dunah hratah cang ky seh,” tatah thlaw a chang.
Mataico, a hningzuitu sahlo khaco a vong ka, aa ihning thlangpaw khah a hmuh. “Suimehlang pakheh hmai kama khatah a raering teitah ung khy bei he ceh maw?” tatah Piter khah a hae.
“Tuhsonah chunglang naa tlah ly nápawtah a raering la, thlawchang my lo. Thlawpaw taco a du thlang, canghrasala pungsaw tah ceh be,” a tah he.
A uihningnah va sei kaw ka, “Ka Paw, ma tai-ingnah ny heh ka ding ly nápawtah lahly a cang khy ly pawtei a cang caco, na dunahpaw hratah cang ky seh,” tatah thlaw cawh a va chang.
A va kaw kaw tihtah aa ihning thlangpaw khah a hmuh, zecawtamaw tatah aa meh ku tu ka, ceh bei he.
Macawtaco seisai he ka, va sei vy ka, thlaw a chang teipaw hraco a uithungnah a va chang vy.

Mataico, a hningzuitu sahlo khaco a vong kaw ka, aa hai letah, “Ato tingtai heh maw a ih he ceh ka, na hia thlang he ceh? Mingtua o, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh mehsua sahlo kih letah hlai nápaw cai a ne myca hi.
Tho la sei he peh! A pa ruiphiapaw sahlo a va chuh myca he khi!” a tah he.

Bia a rei leimei chung taco ahningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cangpaw Judas a va chuh. Ama khatah tlangbui macang le macang sahlo tei aa tawpaw he tungby le zyzi a tlepaw cawngsaw rungpui a va chui he.
A luitupaw taco aaning cawh, “Ka hnangpaw khah Ama cawh a cang a, tle my lo,” tatah paching pakhanah a peh pacia thah he.
Zisu khaco a vaw palang ka, Judas tah, “Cawngpahtu,” tatah y ka, a hnang.
Zisu taco, “Ka dua, na vonghno changpaw cawh tua thlang,” tatah a palei. Mataico cawngsaw sahlo cawh va cakang he ka, Zisu cawh aa tle.
Zisu khatah ma letei a ungpaw pakhehpaw taco a zyzi cawh pazah ka, a phe ka, tlangbui alaicaipaw a saecapaw a naw khah tuh ka, a pathai thlah.
Zisu taco, “Na zyzi khah a kong lang tei kaw, zecawtamaw tatah zyzi a lahpaw vytei cawh zyzi tah aa thih a.
Ka Paw y neh seh la, sungkheh tah a vaiming raekeh phuhraw hluihning a za pa thlawpah khy thlang he tahpaw hnih bei ceh maw?
Canghrasala, ma hraco cang tua my seh la, zekhatamaw ma hrahei a cang a tatei aa reipaw Capathai bia cawh a tling khy thai a?” tatah a tah.

Ma cai leco Zisu tah ming zawpui hai leco, “Rae a thopaw sahlo hotu ka cangnah caw tamaw tle rua pawtah zyzi le thingtai tah naa pa seihno? Ning tating tah behnah ingdung chung letah a ty neh ka, ka cawngpah he, pa tle tlung bei he ceh.
Canghrasala, Khazing khuavang sahlo ciasipaw a tling nápaw cawtah ma hming sahlo heh a va ungpaw a cang hi,” tatah a tah he. Mataico a hningzuitu vytei taco hningchai he ka, aa saisai thlu.
Zisu a tlepaw cawngsaw sahlo takhei, phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le macang sahlo a pahmonah pawhe tlangbui alaicaipaw Kaiafa a ungnah lang khah aa seikhui.
Canghrasala Piter tah langhlaw pui khei tlangbui alaicaipaw a ingdung taikhah a zuilai. Zekhatamaw hming a chuacang a, tahpaw hni du takhei a chunglang a nae thlah ka, raevai sahlo khakhei a va ty.
Tlangbui macang sahlo le Sanhedrin khongsil vytei taco Zisu thaw khy nápawtah khei bia hnihtu pakheipaw sahlo khah aa hui he.
Canghrasala zehmai hmuh bei he. Hnikhuitu pakheipaw hlupui aa va chua thlang naná teitah zehmai hmuh hlui bei he. Ahning cai letah cawngsaw pahning a hmelang va chuh he ka,
“Ma cawngsawpaw tahei, ‘Ma Khazing behnah ing heh chehthlah a neh ka, ningthung tah ka sah khy kaw thlu a,’ a tah,” tatah aa tah.
Mataico, tlangbui alaicaipaw cawh a ka daw ka Zisu cawh, “Aa bia heh palei bei he ceh maw? Ma cawngsaw sahlo tei sua aa ca pupaw heh zemaw a cang?” tatah a tah.
Canghrasala Zisu cawh de teitah a ung thlang. Tlangbui alaicaipaw taco, “Khazing hring ming tah ka ca hae. Khazing Sawcapaw Khri cawh na cang maw, ma ching tua,” tatah a tah.

Zisu taco, “Aw, na reipaw hraco a cang. Canghrasala naa zongmingtei hai letah ka rei, hmelang leco Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Cungnungcai Khazing cacang lang letah a typaw le avai meding cung letah a vongpaw khah naa hmuh a,” tatah a palei.

Mataico, tlangbui alaicaipaw cawh a chaichi khah hriachy ka, “Khazing pui a reipachia myca he! Hnikhuitu hringpaw kaa hia khawh chang maw? Khazing a reipachianah cawh ato khah naa thui thlang myca kho.
Zekhatamaw naa rawh?” tatah a tah. “Ama cawh thih tlang a tlahpaw a cang,” tatah aa chai.
Mataico, aa ci tah a hme letah chawh he ka, aa kia tah aa cabai. Ahringpaw sahlo takhei cabai he ka,
“Khri, ma ching tua, ahomaw a ca cabai?” tatah aa tah.
Piter cawh ingdung chung lekhei a ty thlang ka, saecanu pakheh cawh Ama lang khah a vong. Canuno taco, “Nama zong heh Galili Zisu khatei a ung teipaw na cang hrah,” tatah a tah.
Canghrasala aa zongmingtei hme leco a paphah, “Zemaw na rei tahpaw hnih bei neh,” tatah a tah.
Mataico, hawkaw lai lang piathlah ka, ma leco ahringpaw canuno takhei hmuh ka, ma leteipaw cawngsaw sahlo hai leco, “Ma cawngsawpaw heh Nazaret Zisu khatah a ung teipaw a cang,” tatah a tah.
“Ma cawngsawpaw cawh hnih bei neh!” tatah chia a sá tah a paphah.

Ma khy taico, a cawngpe lekhei a kae letei a dawpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh Piter khaco va sei he ka, “Nama heh aa hrong leteipaw na cang hrahring, zemaw tahpaw co na reikaw tah a bi thlang,” tatah aa tah.
Mataico Piter tah, “Ma paw cawh hnih hrahring bei neh!” tatah chia a sah ka, bia a kaang. Ma cangkaw leco, aa cawh a khawng.
Taico Piter cawh Zisu tei a hai letei bia a reipaw, “Aa a khawng hlai tah uithung na pa paphahsai a,” a tahpaw bia khah a ka thui kaw. Taico alailang piahly ka, o tlili tah a cah.
Mataico mongdi taco tlangbui macang vytei le macang sahlo cawh a tong he ka, Zisu thaw pawtah bia aa pathluh.
Zisu cawh tongchai he ka, rang uhbui Pilat khatah aa hlai.
Ma hratei Zisu aa tuapaw khah a luitupaw Judas takhei a hmuh tihtah a ngepachih caimang tei ka, ngung tangka songthung khah law ka, tlangbui macang sahlo le macang sahlo cawh a pakaw kaw he.
“Suanah a hnui lypaw cawngsaw ka luinah cawtah hei ka sua tu thlang,” tatah a tah. “Kaa cawtah zemaw a pui? Ma cawh nama na rai a cang,” tatah aa palei.
Macawtaco, Judas tah ngung tangka cawh behnah ing leco vathlang si ka, a sei. Mataico seihly ka, ama teitah thingrui tah a pathleseh.
Tlangbui macang sahlo taco ngung tangka cawh law he ka, “Ma heh tangkabawng letah sang ruapaw taco a phung cang be, lenong mai tah pehpaw tangka cang tlung ka,” tatah aa tah.
Macawtaco, ma tangka cawh raang hringpaw cawngsaw sahlo phung nápawtah bei a tuatupaw alyraang cawhnah tah hmang pawtah bia aa chaw.
Ma rawng taco ma lyraang cawh atoning tai thisai lyraang tatah aa ynahpaw a cang.
Mataico Khazing khuavang Jeremai tah a reipaw, “Israel cawngsaw sahlo tah ama amai aa thliapaw ngung tangka songthung khah law he ka,
Abuipaw tah naw a pa pehpaw hratah bei tuatupaw alyraang cawhnah lekhei aa hmang,” tahpaw tlingnah khah a cang.
Zisu cawh raang uhbui Pilat hme letah a daw thlangning taco, raang uhbui tah, “Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang cawh na cang maw?” tatah a hae. “A cang, na reipaw hraco a cang,” tatah Zisu taco a palei.
Tlangbui macang sahlo le macang sahlo tah sua aa pu tihtah zehmai chai bei he.
Mataico Pilat taco a hai letah, “Sua aa ca punah bia aa reipaw cawh thui bei ceh maw?” tatah a hae.
Canghrasala Zisu tah kawkheh hmai a palei lypaw khah raang uhbui cawh a ning a ang ngetei.
Khungsai Panawnah lehei mingzawpui tei chuasah aa dupaw thongtlah pakheh cawh raang uhbui tah a thlawpah tei he.
Ma cai leco Baraba aa tahpaw chahlynah lang tei a ming a thang ngeteipaw thongtlahpaw pakheh a ung.
Macawtaco mingzawpui a pahmoning he takhei Pilat tah, “Baraba le Khri aa tahpaw Zisu lehei aho heh maw ma thlawpah seh tah naa du?” tatah a hae he.
Hnachuanah rawng tah tlangbui macang sahlo taco Zisu cawh ama khatah aa va chuakhui tahpaw khah a hni thlang.

Pilat cawh biacenah dyching letah a ty thlangning takhei, a nupuino tah, “Ma suanah a hnui lypaw cawngsawpaw khah zekhatahmai tua kheh lo. Zecawtamaw tatah ato zamong ka mang letah ama a rawng tah ka taithui ngetei,” tatah bia a caw si.
Canghrasala tlangbui macang sahlo le macang sahlo takhei zawpuipaw khah Baraba khah thlaw la, Zisu khah theh law naa tah a, tatah aa pasy he.
Raang uhbui taco, “Ma tlaw pahning lehei aho heh maw thlaw seh tah naa pa du?” tatah a hae he. “Baraba,” tatah aa chai.
Pilat taco, “Khri aa tahpaw Zisu cawh zekhatamaw ka tua a?” tatah a hae he. “Khraws letah khaipai!” tatah aa zongmingtei co aa chai.
Pilat taco, “Zerawng tamaw? Ze hmingsua maw a tua?” tatah a hae he. Canghrasala, “Khraws letah khaipai thlang ky,” tatah a thang vy tah a y tima he.

Pilat taco cang thai khaw be, hnahnawhnah laky a chuh sua a takhah a hmuh tihtah tui khah law ka, zawpui hme leco a kih cawh a si. “Kama cawh ma cawngsawpaw a thisai lehei suanah hnui bei neh. Ma heh naaning naa tuapaw naa muaphonah a cang,” tatah a tah he.
Cawngsaw vytei taco, “A thisai taco kaaning kaa cung le kaa saw kaa ny cung letah ma zui thlang ky seh!” tatah aa chai.
Mataico Pilat tah Baraba khah a thlawpah he. Canghrasala Zisu cawh cheisah he ka, khraws letah khaipai pawtah aa kih leco a hlai he.
Mataico, raang uhbui a raekeh sahlo taco Zisu cawh raang uhbui ing lang seikhui he ka, ma letei raekeh sahlo takhei a pahmoso he.
A chaichi khah pahlu pah he ka, angki a pasuapaw a saidungpaw a hreisah he.

Mataico, abui lukhu cawtah ahling tah phiapaw lukhu a khusah he. A cacang lang kih lekhei basung a tlesah he ka, a hme letah aa khuh panai he ka, pasipasa he ka, “Juda cawngsaw aa Siangpahrang cawh khua sy hring ky seh,” tatah aa tah.
Aa ci tah chawh he ka, sungbasih khah law he ka, a lu letah ato le ato tah aa tuh.
Aa pasipasa khy taitah pai a pasuapaw a saidungpaw cawh pahluhly pah he ka, Ama a chaichi khah a hreisah kaw he. Taico khraws letah khaipai pawtah aa seikhui.
Aa seipai khei langpui letah Sairin khuapaw Simon aa tahpaw cawngsawpaw a tong he ka, khraws khah hringhrang tah aa puhsah.
Galgotha, (A silang cawh, “Luru hming,” tahnah a cang,) aa tahpaw hminghmaw aa va phah.
Ma leco Zisu cawh si kha pahlawhpaw misur zu khah ding ruapaw tah aa peh, canghrasala pateh ka, ding du be.
Aa khaipai khy taikhei a chaichi cawh basung phe he ka, a chaichy he.
Taico a ty he ka, ma taco aa cong thlang.
A lu cung letah sua a phosahnah ca aa ciapaw cawh, “MA HEH ZISU, JUDA CAWNGSAW SAHLO AA SIANGPAHRANG A CANG,” tah heh a cang.
Ama khaco damia pahning a cacang lang letah pakheh, a cavui lang letah pakheh aa khaipai hrah he.
A seithipaw sahlo takhei aa lu cathingso he ka, naisui hmo khei,
“Behnah ing chehthlah tei ningthung letah a sah kaw thlu khypaw, nama le nama a pachah tua! Khazing Sawcapaw na cang caco, khraws taikhei za cung thlah tua ca!” tatah aa tah.
Ma hraco tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le macang sahlo takhei pasipasa hrah he ka,
“Cawngsaw ahringpaw cawh pachah he ka, canghrasala ama le ama cawh a pachah khy be! Israel Siangpahrang a cang caw! Kaa zing khy nápawtah khraws taikhei cungthlah tua!
Ama cawh Khazing a zingpaw pui a cang caw! Khazing tah a du caco atoheh pachah tua seh! Zecawtamaw tatah, ‘Khazing Sawcapaw ka cang,’ tatah a tah kha!” tatah aa tah.
Ma hraco Ama khatei aa khaipaipaw he damia sahlo zong taco naisuinah bia a hlupui khei aa tah hrah.
Ningching taitah zailang suimehlang pathung tai raang pungpaluh letah muinah a tlung.
Zailang suimehlang pathung hrawnghrang leco Zisu cawh, “ Eloi, Eloi, lama sabathani?” tatah a thangpui tah a y. A silang cawh, “Ka Khazing, ka Khazing, zemaw na pa seisai?” tahnah a cang.
Ma letei a daw thlangpaw mehthaikheh tah ma cawh aa thui tihtah, “Elija a y leimei!” tatah aa tah.
Ma cangkaw leco, aa hrong letei pakhehpaw cawh va sai ka, span khah a va lah. Ma cawh misur zu a thobahlapaw letah nong ka, rahtlong letah patai ka, Zisu cawh ding pawtah a hlai.
A tangpaw sahlo taco, “Ama teitah ung cong tua seh. Ama lahthlá pawtah Elija cawh a vong maw vong ly, ming tua he peh,” tatah aa tah.
Taico Zisu cawh a thangpui tah ysang vy hui ka, a hu a ceh chung.
Ma sungkheh kaa leco behnah ing letei pai aa pazypaw cawh a cung taitah a rai tai pehning tah a pakaichy. Aling a hrui ka, alung puino sahlo a kuichy he.
Athlai sahlo a hong he ka, mehpathai a thipaw a hlupui cawh hringnah letah patho kaw a cang he.
Athlai taico ka pia he ka, Zisu a tho kaw khy taitah Jerusalem khuapui pathai lang va sei he ka, cawngsaw hlupui khakhei a va paly he.

Raekeh zakheh buipaw le Ama khatei a ungpaw Zisu a congpaw sahlo tah aling a hruipaw le hming a chuacangnah vytei khah aa hmuh tihtah aa thlawzawng ka, “Ma cawngsawpaw heh Khazing Sawcapaw a cang hrahring thlang,” tatah aa tah.
Ma letei a ungpaw canu a hlupui taco langpa tah aa cai thlang. Aaning sahlo cawh a byhia tuapah ruapaw tei Galili taitah a va zuipaw sahlo khah a cang he.
Aa hrong leco Mari Makdalin, Jeims le Josef aa no Mari le Zebedi a sawcapaw leh le aa no tahpaw a ung he.
Mataico, zailang rangsang lekhei Arimathea khuapaw Josef aa tahpaw mehrungpaw, Zisu a hning a zui hrahpaw khah a vong.
Pilat khaco a vaw ka, Zisu rawh khah va hae ka, Pilat taco raekeh sahlo khah Zisu rawh cawh pei law tatah a tah he.
Josef taco Zisu rawh cawh law ka, paithladih anaipaw a pathaipaw khei pahlong ka,
ama tei alung kho a ruipaw athlai thapaw lekhei a i sah. Thlaikaw leco alung alaipaw pui khah kha si ka, a seisai.
Mari Makdalin le ahringpaw Mari sahlo cawh athlai hmelang khei a ty thlang he.
Ring ning a ningthlamongpaw leco tlangbui macang sahlo le Farasi sahlo cawh Pilat khatah a vaw he.
“Abuipaw, ma dungkhei a hmangpaw takhei a hring thlangning tah, ‘Ningthung khy tah ka tho kaw a,’ a tahpaw kaa thui.

Macawtaco, ningthung tai cawh thlai khah achaw teitah vai law, tatah ta la, a cha a. Ma hratei a cang ly caco a hningzuitu sahlo a vong he ka, a rawh khah ru he ka, cawngsaw sahlo khah Zisu cawh thihnah taitah a tho kaw thah tatah aa tah sua he a. A changnah letei dungkheinah heh a hmetaw teipaw navy tah a paru vy sua a,” tatah aa tah.
Pilat taco, “Avaipaw phu khaco va sei o. Thlai cawh naa tuakhynah chung tah a bing khy nápawtah va tua o,” tatah a tah he.
Macawtaco va sei he ka, thlai a bing khy nápawtah alung cung leco a ngianah cawh tua he ka, avaitu sahlo cawh aa chia he.
Sabat ning khy taitah zaa kheh letei ning hmetaw caipaw mong khua dui lekhei Mari Makdalin le ahringpaw Mari cawh thlai vai ruapaw takhei a sei he.
Aling a rupui tah a hrui ka, Abuipaw a vaiming cawh avai taitah a za cung. Taico thlai lang cawh a vaw ka, alung cawh hneihly ka, a cung leco a ty thlang.
A hmuisang cawh lailaw lo ka, a chaichi cawh huihaw hratah a raang.
Raevai sahlo cawh aa thlawzawng tu thah ka, a cathing he ka, mehthi hratah aa cang thlu he.
Vaiming taco canu sahlo cawh, “Naa thlawzawng kheh seh, khraws letei aa khaipaipaw Zisu khah naa hui tahpaw ka hni.
Ama cawh ma lehei ung khawh be, a ca chingsipaw he hrakhei a tho kaw thah. A vong la, aa i sahnahpaw heh va ming hmai o.

Mataico rairang tah sei la, a hningzuitu sahlo khah va ching o, ‘Thihnah taitah tho kaw thah ka, naa hmelang khei Galili raang lang a sei thah. Ma leco naa va hmuh a.’ Atoheh ka ca ching thah he hi,” tatah a tah he.
Macawtaco canu sahlo cawh thlai taico a piathlah pahraw he. Ci hmotah le thawchah ngetei hmotah a hningzuitu sahlo ching rua pawtah khei a sai he.
Sungkheh kheh tah Zisu taco a tong he ka, “A dang pawtah,” a tah he. Ama khaco a vong he ka, a phe cawh tle he ka, Ama cawh aa beh.
Mataico Zisu tah aa hai leco, “Naa thlawzawng kheh seh. Va sei la, ka uny sahlo khah Galili raang lang za sei he seh tatah va ching o. Ma leco aa pa hmuh a,” a tah he.
Canu sahlo aa seilai leimei chung taco athlai raevai thaikhehpaw sahlo cawh khuapui chunglang va sei he ka, tlangbui macang sahlo khah hming a chuacangnah vytei khah thong aa va thuisah he.
Tlangbui macang sahlo cawh macang sahlo khatah a tongsia tih he tah khuakhangnah sangkheh aa hnui. Raekeh sahlo khah tangka hlupui pei he ka,
“ ‘A hningzuitu sahlo tah zai tah a vong he ka, kaa ihning kaa letah a rawh cawh law he ka aa seikhui,’ tah my lo.
Ma thong thuisahnah heh raang uhbui tah a thui caco, kaaning tah a chah ná tah tua a he peh ka, naaning cawh zehmai hanah ing bei ceh kaa ta he a,” aa tah.
Macawtaco, raekeh sahlo taco tangka cawh law he ka, aa chingpaw he hrakhei aa tua. Taico ma bia heh atoning tai heh Juda cawngsaw sahlo hrong letah aa kaipaza.
Mataico, a hningzuitu hluikheh sahlo cawh Zisu tah na sei he ceh tatah a chingsipaw he tlanglang sei rua pawtah khei Galili raang lang cawh a sei he.
Zisu cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa beh. Canghrasala thaikhehpaw cawh aa lung a langlo.
Mataico Zisu cawh aaning khaco a vong ka, aa hai letah, “Alui le vaicung letei nawhnuinah vytei cawh peh ka cang thah myca.
Macawtaco va sei la, mingphing vytei khah ka hningzuitu tah va tua my lo. Paw le Sawcapaw le Thlawpaw Pathai ming tah baptisma a va cang sá la,
bia ka ca pehpaw he maikaw aa zui nápawtah va cawngpah my lo. Taico caichangnah tai naaning khatah ka ung paria thlang hi,” tatah a tah he.
Khazing Sawcapaw Zisu Khri a kong thawngchawbia ahrangthonah cawh ma heh a cang.
Khazing khuavang Isaiah cabu letei ciapaw cawh, “Ka tlang ypaw cawh na hmelang ka taw a, taico Ama taco na langpui a parai a.
Raangcaa letei a y leimeipaw o taco, ‘Abuipaw cawtah langpui cawh parai la, a cawtah langpui cawh pading pah my lo,’ a tah,” tatah a tah.
Taico Johan cawh va chuh ka, sua ngethainah cawtah angepachihnah baptisma kong phungrei ka, raangcaa lekhei baptisma a cangsah he.
Taico Judia raang letei vytei le, Jerusalem khuapui letei ming vytei cawh piathlah he ka, Ama khatah sei he ka, aa suanah phy he ka, Jordan tuivaw letah baptisma a cangsah he.
Johan cawh sahisy hming tah tawpaw caise a tua ka, saving tesong a te letah a song ka, khybawh le akhui tui a e.
Taico Johan taco, “Ka hninglang tah kama navy tah a rungnaw vypaw a va sei a. Kama cawh a bung tah a phepakong rui a thlang tlangpaw hmai cang bei neh.
Kama taco tui tah baptisma ca cangsá he neh ka, canghrasala, Ama duitei taco Thlawpaw Pathai tah baptisma a ca cangsá he a,” tatah a tah he.
Ma ningcai leco Zisu cawh Galili raang, Nazaret khua taitah va sei ka, Jordan tuivaw letah Johan tah baptisma a cangsah.
Tui taitah a ka pia cangkawleh avai a hong ka, Thlawpaw cawh za cung ka, thury hratah a cung letah a cawngpaw khah a hmuh.
Taico, avai taitah, “Nama cawh ka dopaw ka Sawcapaw na cang. Na cung letah ka lung a lawng ngetei,” tatah o a za ring.
Ma khy cangkawleh leco, Thlawpaw tah Ama cawh raangcaapaw lang seisah ka,
ma raangcaapaw leco ning songli chung ung ka, Setan tah a tuhso. Ama cawh saraang sahlo khatah ung ka, vaiming sahlo tah aa mingkai.
Johan thong a tlah khy taikhei, Zisu cawh Galili raang lang sei ka, Khazing thawngchawbia cawh a y khui.
“Cai le ning a tling myca, Khazing painah raang cawh a ne myca ka, a ngepachih la, thawngchawbia heh zing myca law,” tatah a tah.
Zisu cawh Galili rili ngaekang letah a cahrong ning takhei, ngawtletu a cangpaw he Simon le a unypaw Andru cawh aso aa va leimeipaw khah a hmuh he.
Zisu tah aaning cawh, “A vong la, pa zui o, cawngsaw a tletu tah ka ca tua he a,” tatah a tah he.
Ma cangkaw leco aa so sahlo cawh seisai he ka, Zisu cawh aa zui.
A cawngpe va sei he ka, aa so sahlo khah a thei leimeipaw he Zebedi sawcapaw Jeims le a unypaw Johan khah tuilawng chung letah a hmuh he.
A hmuh cangkaw he leh aaning cawh y he ka, aa paw Zebedi cawh a hlofapaw sahlo khakhei tuilawng letah seisai he ka, Zisu cawh aa zui.
Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Kapernaum khua lang sei he ka, Sabat ning a va phah tihtah Zisu cawh synagog lang a nae ka, a cawngpah he.
A cawngpahnah cawh aa ning a ang ngetei, zecawtamaw tatah phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo hratah cang lytah nawhnuitu hratah a cawngpah caw he tah a cang.
Ma cai leco, synagog leco thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw cawngsaw pakheh ung ka,
“Nazaret Zisu, kaaning khahei zemaw na du, kaaning hlyde ruapaw tamaw na vong? Nama cawh ahomaw na cang tahpaw ka hni. Khazing Mehpathai na cang,” tatah a y.
Zisu tah, “De teitah ung! A chung taikhei ka pia!,” tatah a hrangso.
Thlawpaw pialuipaw tah ma cawngsawpaw cawh a sah pui tah cathing ka, a ysang hmotah a piathlah.

Cawngsaw vytei cawh aa ningang ngetei ka, “Ma heh zemaw a cang? Nawhnuinah chitah a cangpaw cawngpahnah a thapaw heh! Thlawpaw pialuipaw zong naw pei he ka, a bia aa nge thlang!” tatah pakheh le pakheh aa tah he.
Galili raang chung a kawkih letah Zisu kong thongpang cawh a thang thlu palang.
Synagog taitah aa piathlah cangkaw tei leh Jeims le Johan khatah Simon le Andru aa ing lang aa sei.
Simon a nupuino a no cawh asaw tah nang ka, lakhing letah a ih thlang ka, a konglang cawh Zisu khah aa ching.
Macawtaco ama khakhei a vaw ka, a kih khah tle ka, a patho. Taico, a sawnah taco thlaw ka, aaning sahlo cawh a tangtui he.
Zailang ning a tlah khy taico a sahpaw vytei le khachia tei a tlepaw sahlo cawh Ama khatah aa va chua khui he.
Khua pungpaluh co ingkaw letah a pahmo he ka,

taico Zisu tah asawnah a phingphing a hnuipaw mehlupui cawh a dangsah he. Khachia a hlupui zong papia he ka, canghrasala khachia sahlo taco Ama khah ahomaw a cang tahpaw aa hni cawtah khei aa reithlawpaw khah sai bei he.
Mongdi khua hme a se hlai letah Zisu cawh tho ka, a kingdangnah lang sei ka, ma leco thlaw a chang.
Simon le a vesaw sahlo taco, Ama cawh hui pawtah sei he ka,
Ama cawh aa va hmuh tihtah, “Cawngsaw maikaw tah aa ca huilai leimei kho,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco aaning cawh, “Ma kaekang lehei a ungpaw khua hringpaw sahlo letah zong phung ka rei khy nápawtah ma lang cawh sei he peh. Ma rawng taco ka vongpaw a cang,” tatah a tah he.
Mataico Galili raang chung vytei cahrong ka, synagog sahlo letah phungrei lai ka, khachia zong a papia lai he.
Zisu khatah thinghmuihri a ingpaw cawngsaw pakheh cawh a vong ka, a khuh panai ka, “Na du caco na pa dangsah khy se,” tatah ningdo a hae.
Zisu tah ma cawngsawpaw cawh lung a saw ngetei ka, a kia tah pazah ka, va tong ka, “Nama na dang cawh du neh ka, dang myca,” tatah a tah.
Sung sungkheh tah a thinghmuihri vytei cawh ly ka, a dang.
Zisu tah a sah pui tah raering pei ka, a seisah tlamang.

Zisu tah, “Ahohmai ching khe lo, ma duitei cawh tlangbui a va mingsah la, na dang my ca cawtah khei Moses phungbia hrakhei thuihlainah va tua la, ma pawsui co dangsah na cangpaw khah ming maikaw tah aa ca hni a,” tatah bia a patai.

Canghrasala, ma cawngsaw cawh sei ka, ma thongpang cawh reilai ka, a kaipazasah thlu. Macawtaco a seinah maikaw letah ma kong cawh reilai ka, a kaipazasah cawtah Zisu cawh langhai tah khuachung lang a nae khawh lytah a kingdangnah lekhei a ung hri. Canghrasala, kawting taiteipaw mehlupui khah Ama khatah a vong thly thly he.
Ma khy ning a cawngpe letaco, Zisu cawh Kapernaum khua lang a nae kaw tihtah zawpui takhei ing lang a va tlung kaw tahpaw khah aa thui.
Maco ingkaw hrang letah hmai ung nápaw a ung lynah tai cawngsaw cawh chuh caimang he ka, aaning sahlo cawh thawngchawbia a cawngpah he.
Mehthaikheh va chuh he ka, a songbepaw pakheh papali tah aa va puh lai.
Cawngsaw aa hlu tu cawtah Zisu kung phah khui khy lytah Zisu a ungnah dihdong ingcung lang kekhui he ka, ingcung cawh ky thlah he ka, aphia letah a ih thlangpaw meh dang lypaw cawh aa za thlah.
Zisu tah aa zingnah khah a hmuh tihtah a songbepaw cawh, “Ka dua, na suanah vytei cawh ngethai a cang,” tatah a tah.
Ma letei a ty thlangpaw he phungbia cawngpahtu thaikheh taco aa lungchung tah,
