“Ma cawngsaw heh zecawtamaw, ma hraco a tah thlang? Khazing a reipachia! Khazing tah ly co ahomaw suanah a ngethai khy?” tatah aa tah.
Ma cangkawleh cawh zemaw aa pacang tahpaw khah Zisu tah a lungthing tah hnih ka, “Zecawtamaw ma hming sahlo heh naa pacang?
Ma a songbepaw khahei, ‘Na suanah sahlo cawh ngethai a cang,’ tahpaw maw a neh vy maw, ‘Tho la, na iphaw a lah la, sei,’ tahpaw maw a neh vy?
Canghrasala, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh aluicung lehei sua ngethai khynah naw a hnui taheh ka ca hmuh sá he a,” a tah he. Taico, a songbepaw cawh,
“Tho la, na iphaw a lah la, ing lang a dih,” tatah a tah.

Ma cawngsawpaw cawh tho ka, a iphaw khah a lah ka, aa zongmingtei mehmuh leco piathlah ka a sei. Ma hming taco ming maikaw aa ningangsah he ka, Khazing cawh aa reithai. “Ma hapaw hming heh kaa hmuh bang tlung be!” aa tah.
Zisu cawh Galili tuiping ngaekang lang khah va sei kaw ka, ma leco cawngsaw hlupui tah va pange he ka, a cawngpah he.
A seipai tah Alfas a sawcapaw Levi cawh ngungkhui kheinah hming letah a typaw khah hmuh ka, Zisu taco, “Va pa zui,” tatah tah ka, taico Levi cawh tho ka, Ama cawh a zui.

Zisu cawh Levi ing letah zairia batui a e leimeining takhei, ngungkhui a kheitu mehlupui le ahringpaw mehsua sahlo cawh Ama le a hningzuitu sahlo khatah batui aa e hrui. Ama a zuipaw sahlo cawh a hlu ngetei he.

Phungbia cawngpahtu Farasi sahlo tah mehsua sahlo le, ngungkhui a kheitu sahlo khatei batui a e hruipaw khah aa hmuh tihtah a hningzuitu sahlo khah, “Zecawtamaw, mehsua sahlo le ngungkhui a kheitu sahlo khatah batui a e hrui?” tatah aa hae he.
Zisu tah ma cawh thui ka, “A dang thlangpaw taco sibui aa hia tlung be, a dang lypaw tah pui aa hia. Mehding y rua pawtah ka vong tlung be, mehsua sahlo y rua pawtah ka vong hri hi,” a tah he.

Baptisma peitu Johan hningzuitu sahlo le Farasi sahlo cawh batui a cahe he. Cawngsaw thaikheh a vong he ka, Zisu cawh, “Zecawtamaw baptisma peitu Johan hningzuitu sahlo le Farasi phunglang a zuipaw sahlo cawh batui cahe he ka, canghrasala nama na hningzuitu sahlo cawh batui cahe lytah aa ung?” tatah bia aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Sawngpaw sahlo cawh nupui a chuipaw satlepaw khatah aa ung chung taco batui a cahe tei he maw? Aaning khatah a ung thlang chung cawh batui a cahe tei bei he.
Canghrasala, nupui a chuipaw satlepaw cawh aaning taitah lahnah cai a phah tae a. Ma ning taico batui aa cahe tae thlang a.
Ahotahmai tah paithang a thapaw tah chaichi a paringpaw khah a beithlah bang bei he. Ma hratei aa tua caco, paithang a thapaw khah hruipako a ka, a caipaw paithang khah a dochy tima a.

Ahotahmai tah misurhang a hringtui khah sapho tuithei a paringpaw letah rai bang bei he. Aa rai caco, misurhang ka tho a ka, sapho tuithei khah tingchy a ka, misurhang kha, sapho tuithei zong a rawh thlu he a. Ma co cang lytah misurhang a hringtui cawh sapho tuithei a thapaw letah a rai hri a,” tatah a tah he.
Sabat ningkhehpaw letah Zisu cawh a hningzuitu sahlo khatah saze lui chung tah sei he ka, aa seipai khei a hningzuitu sahlo taco saangsu cawh aa pahrih pai lai.
Farasi sahlo tah Zisu cawh, “Mingtua, zecawtamaw Sabat ning letah tua phung a cang lypaw heh aa tua?” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “David tei a vesaw sahlo khatah aa ngaidi ngetei ning le epaw aa hia ning tei a tuapaw khah rei bang bei he ceh maw?

Abiatha tlangbui alaicaipaw a hrening cai lekhei Khazing behnah ing lang a nae ka, tlangbui sahlo tah ly co ahotahmai e phung a cang lypaw, Khazing aa dangnah very khah a e. Taico a chy khah a vesaw sahlo zong a peh hrah he kho,” tatah a chai he.
Mataico Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Sabat ning cawh cawngsaw chahnah cawtah tuapaw cang ka, cawngsaw heh Sabat ning cawtah tuapaw cang be.
Macawtaco Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Sabat Buipaw a cang,” a tah he.
Ning hringpaw letah Zisu cawh synagog lang khah va sei kaw ka, ma leco a kih a songpaw pakheh a za ung thlang.
Mehthaikheh taco Zisu cawh sua aa pu khy nápawtah a bo he ka, macawtaco Sabat ning tah ma cawngsawpaw cawh a dangsah maw dangsah ly takhah aa ngia thlang.
Zisu tah a kih a songpaw cawh, “Ming vytei hme lehei a daw tua,” tatah a tah.
Mataico aaning sahlo khah, “Sabat ning tahei chahnah tua maw a phung a cang, chahlynah maw? Hringnah pachah heh maw a phung a cang, thaw heh maw?” tatah a hae hri he. Canghrasala zehmai palei bei he.
Zisu taco a thingae hmotah aaning cawh ming he ka, aa lungku a chaw tu cawtah a ngechia ka, cawngsawpaw cawh, “Na kih pathlang,” a tah. A kih cawh pathlang ka, a dang.
Mataico, Farasi sahlo cawh piahly he ka, Zisu cawh zekhatamaw kaa thaw khy a tahpaw khah Herod a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei aa reisia.
Zisu cawh a hningzuitu sahlo khatah tuiping lang sei kaw he ka, Galili taikhei cawngsaw rungpui tah aa zui.

Zisu tei a tuapaw vytei khah aa thui tihtah Judia raang, Jerusalem khuapui, Idumia raang, Jordan tuivaw rae lang raang le Tair le Sidon khua kaekang letei a ungpaw khua sahlo taikhei cawngsaw hlupui Ama khatah a vong he.
Cawngsaw aa hlutunah cawtah aa pa pahlong tu sua a tah ka, a hningzuitu sahlo khah a cawtah tuilawng achiapaw khah ting cia tah pa pachiapah thlang my lo a tah he.
Zecawtamaw tatah mehnung hlupui khah dangsah he ka, a sahpaw maikaw tah Ama khah tong pawtah hmelang a nang he.
Thlawpaw pialuipaw sahlo tei aa tlepaw sahlo maikaw tah Ama cawh aa hmuh tihtah a hmekaw letah pohly he ka, “Khazing Sawcapaw na cang,” tatah a y he.
Canghrasala aaning sahlo cawh Ama khah ahomaw a cang tahpaw khah rei ly pawtah cyky tah bia a patai he.
Zisu cawh tlaang cung lang ke ka, Ama khatah a y dupaw sahlo khah y he ka, Ama khaco a vong he.
Aaning chung taico pahrawhluihning khah thing he ka, ma sahlo cawh, “Apostol sahlo,” tatah ming a sah he. Aaning cawh Ama khatah ung a pawtah le, phung rei tah taw a pawtah le,
khachia sahlo papianah naw aa hnui a pawtah a thingpaw he a cang.
A thingpaw pahrawhluihning cawh ma sahlo heh a cang he. Piter tatei ming a sahpaw Simon,
Zebedi sawcapaw Jeims le Johan (Boanazi a tah he, a silang cawh khalung sawtei sahlo tahnah a cang),
Andru, Filip, Barthalomeo, Mathai, Thomas, Alfas a sawcapaw Jeims, Thadia, ci le phing a dawkhuipaw Simon le,
Ama a luitupaw Judas Iskariot a cang he.
Mataico, Zisu cawh ing lang a nae ka, cawngsaw tah aa pahlong thlangnah cawtah khei Ama le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh batui hmai e thai bei he.
A sawny tah ma kong cawh aa thui tihtah, “A thinglung a hmang khawh beh,” tah he ka, ama lah a pawtah a sei he.
Phungbia cawngpahtu thaikheh, Jerusalem taitah a va chuhpaw sahlo taco, “A chung letah Belzabub a hrei ka, ma khachia sahlo buipaw thongtah khachia sahlo a papia khy he,” tatah aa tah.
Maco Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh y he ka, tawchingnah bia tei a chingpaw he cawh, “Zekhatamaw Setan taco Setan lilaw cawh a papia thai a?
Painah raang raangkheh cawh ama le ama lilaw a dy caco, ma painah raang cawh zekhatamaw a bing khy a?
Ingchungkho khokheh cawh a rai ly tei a chaichy caco, ma ingchungkho cawh a bing khy a be.
Ma hraco Setan zong ama le ama a dy tei a chaichy caco, a daw khy a be, a lydenah cai a chuh hri a.
Hmuisui tei co, meh thawtlungpaw khah tongchai taw lytah a ing chunglang a nae tah a hnuicho cawh ahomaw a lah pah khy a? A tongchai khy taitah longlong a lah khy a.
Cawngsaw heh aa suanah vytei le Khazing aa reipachianah vytei khah cawh ngethai a cang he a tahpaw biahmuisui ka ca ching he.
Canghrasala Thlawpaw Pathai a reipachiapaw duitei cawh ahohmai ngethai cang by bei he. Ama cawh chaizaw suanah a tuapaw a cang,” a tah he.
Ma bia heh, “Thlawpaw pialuipaw a chung letah a hrei,” tatei aa tah cawtah a reipaw a cang.
Mataico, Zisu a no le a uny sahlo cawh va chuh he ka, khunglai lang letah a daw thlang he ka, cawngsaw taw he ka, Zisu khah aa za ysah.
Cawngsaw hlupui tah a ty cadung thlang he ka, a hai letah, “Na no le na uny sahlo tah nama ca hui he ka, alailang letah aa ung thlang he,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Ahomaw ka no le ka uny sahlo cawh a cang he?” tatah a hae he.
Mataico a kae letei a ty cadung thlangpaw sahlo cawh ming he ka, “Ma lehei ka no le ka uny sahlo cawh a ung thlang he hi!
Ahohmai Khazing dunah a tuapaw cawh ka uny, ka satei le ka no a cang he,” tatah a tah.

Ma khy taico ning hringpaw leco Zisu tah Galili tuiping kae lekhei a cawngpah he. Ama a pahmo sopaw cawngsaw khah aa hlutunah cawtah tuilawng chunglang a nae ka, a ty ka, tuili lang a seisah. Ma chung vytei cawh zawpuipaw khah ngaekang letah a ung thlang he.
Hming hlupui khah tawchingnah bia tah cawngpah he ka, tawchingnah bia sangkheh a chingpaw he cawh,
“Ngetua hmai o! Ly a tuapaw pakheh cawh thleci va pawtah ly lang a sei.
Thleci a va leimeining takhei a chy cawh lang kae letah tlah ka, pavaw sahlo tah a va zy he ka, aa khi thlu thah he.
A chy cawh alui apawnah lungda letah tlah he ka, alui a pawnah cawtah sungkheh teitah a ka cy he.
Canghrasala ning va tha ka, a ai tih he tah thahrang aa thlah lynah cawtah a ro palang thah he.
A chy cawh ahling hrong letah tlah he ka, ahling cawh ka chang ka, a diseh thlu caw he tah saze vui bei he.
Canghrasala a chy cawh alui a chahnah letah aa tlah. Ka cy he ka, ka chang he ka, a zaw tihtah a saze cawh a leh songthung, a leh songruh, a leh zakhé tahmai a vui,” a tah he.
Taico, Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw taco ma bia heh thui he seh,” tatah a tah.
Ma khy taico Zisu cawh Ama teitah a ungning takhei apostol pahrawhluihning le a kaekang letei a pahmopaw ahringpaw cawngsaw sahlo takhei tawchingnah bia a silang khah aa hae.
Zisu tah, “Naaning cawh Khazing painah raang biaparuh hni khynah khah peh na cang thah he ceh. Canghrasala, alailang tei a ungpaw sahlo duitei cawh zezong khah tawchingnah bia tah ching a cang he.

Macawtaco, ‘A ming cawh aa ming leimei thlang a, canghrasala hmuh by a bei he. Aa naw tah aa thui leimei thlang a, canghrasala hnih thai hlui a bei he. Ma hratei a cang ly caco Khazing lang a paleh kaw sua he seh la, ngethai tah a ung pang he a,’ tatah Capathai tah a tah,” tatah a tah.
Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Ma tawchingnah bia heh hnih thai bei he ceh maw? Ma heh hmai naa hni ly caco zekhatamaw tawchingnah ahringpaw sahlo cawh naa hni thai a?
Ly a tuapaw tei a vapaw thleci cawh Khazing bia heh a cang.
Meh thaikheh cawh lang letei a tlahpaw thleci sahlo khatah a lo he. Bia khah aa thui cangkawleh Setan cawh a vong ka, aa chung letei vapaw bia cawh a lah pah thah he.
Ahringpaw cawh lungda cung letei a tlahpaw thleci sahlo khatah a lo he. Khazing bia aa thui cangkawleh lunglawng teitah aa cyhlang.
Canghrasala, thahrang aa thlah lynah cawtah khua sy parui bei he. Khazing bia rawng tah ruhanah le hrehnah a chua tihtah a pohly palang he.
Ahringpaw meh thaikheh cawh ahling hrong letei a tlahpaw thleci khatah a lo he. Khazing bia cawh aa thui thlang,
canghrasala, khazaw lung reithuinah le hnuirung dunah le a hringhrepaw dunah vytei tah thawngchawbia khah pazai thah ka, a thui thuisah khy be.

Canghrasala ahringpaw cawngsaw thaikheh cawh alui a chahnah letei a tlahpaw thleci khatah a lo he. Khazing bia cawh thui he ka, cyhlang he ka, thuisu cawh a leh songthung, a leh songruh a leh zakheh tai hmai a vui he,” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Me-ing cawh tongbai rai letah cang seh, lakhing rai letah cang seh aa chia tei maw? Me-ing tung letah chia bei he ceh maw?
No thlangpaw hming vytei cawh palang thlu cang a he ka, bakhupaw hming vytei cawh a langhai tah chuakhui a cang he a.
Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw maikaw tah ma bia heh thui he seh,” tatah a tah.
A rei vypaw cawh, “Naa thuipaw khah a chaw teitah pacang my lo! Naa hmangpaw neh ná khei neh kaw cang he ceh ka, alai vy tahmai a ca neh he a.
A hnuipaw cawh peh vy cang a ka, a hnui lypaw cawh a hnuitlakangpaw tei hmai khah lah pah a cang a,” tatah a tah he.
Zisu tah, “Khazing painah raang cawh cawngsaw pakheh tei a ly letah thleci a vapaw hratah a cang.
Ching le zai, a i tah cang seh, a hraw tah cang seh, thleci cawh ama teitah ka cy ka, ka chang ka, canghrasala, zekhatamaw a cang tahpaw hnih be.
Alui tah ama teitah saze a chuasah. A hmetaw tah a kung, a pazui tah a thuisu, taico achang tatah a chuasah he.
Hre a zaw cangkawleh sahaw cawh a lah ka, a aw he,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah a rei vypaw bia cawh, “Khazing painah raang cawh zekhatamaw a lo? Zekhatamaw kaa tawching a?
Alui letei cingpaw thleci vytei letah a chia caipaw aihrang ci khatah a lopaw a cang.

Alui letah ling he ka, a ka chang tih taco buichung thleci hrong letah a kung alaicaipaw tah a ka tua. A caibai zong alaipaw pui a cangnah cawtah pavaw zong tah a ningde letah a cawng tei he,” tatah a tah he.
Ma hapaw tawchingnah bia khah Zisu tah hmang ka, aa hnithai khynah zé tah Khazing bia khah a cawngpah he.
Tawchingnah bia hmang lytah aaning sahlo cawh cawngpah bang bei he. Canghrasala a hningzuitu sahlo khatah aaning teitah aa ungning tah zezong a chingpase kaw tei he.
Ma ning zailang leco, Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Raechai lang sei he peh,” tatah a tah he.
Zawpui cawh seisai he ka, Ama a ungnah tuilawng khei aa seikhui. Ma leco tuilawng hringpaw zong a ung hrah he.
Thlichia cawh a hrang caimang ka, tuileh cawh tuilawng chunglang tai a nae pai leimeinah cawtah tuilawng cawh tui lang a phung daimang.
Zisu cawh tuilawng a lei lang lekhei ung ka, a tynah dyching lekhei a ihning thlang. A hningzuitu sahlo taco va patho he ka, “Cawngpahtu tui lang kaa tlápaw heh na ze a ca pui bei maw?” tatah aa tah.
Zisu cawh ka tho ka, thli cawh a hrangso. Taico, tuileh cawh, “De! A cali!” a tah. Mataico, thli cawh de ka, tuileh cawh a cali he.
Taico, Ama taco a hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Zecawtamaw ma reiro co naa ci? Zingnah hnui ting bei he ceh maw?” tatah a tah he.
A hningzuitu sahlo cawh ci ngetei he ka, “Ma heh zehapaw cawngsaw maw a cang? Thli le tuileh tahmai a bia aa nge thlangpaw heh!” tatah aaning le aaning cawh aa tah he.
Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh tuiping cawh cakah he ka, Gerasin raang khah aa va phah.
Zisu cawh tuilawng taitah a cungthlah ning takhei thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw cawngsawpaw tah ama khah a tawng pawtah thlaikung taikhei a va sei.
Ma cawngsawpaw cawh thlaikung letei a ung teipaw cang ka, ahotahmai tah hraipaking tah bahrairui tahmai tongchai khy bei he.

Zemaw tah pawco a kih le a phe khah uihlupui tongchai he ka, canghrasala bahrairui khah chehchung thlu ka, a phe letei thawrui sahlo zong khah a phongchung thlu he. Ahotahmai tah ama cawh tle pakhih khy bei he.
Ching le zai, thlaikung letah le a kaekang tlaang vytei leco a khiakaly ka, ysang ka, ama le ama cawh alung tah a aw tei.
Langhlaw pui taitah Zisu cawh a va hmuh tihtah va saihno ka, a hmekaw letaco a khuh a panai.
“Cungnungcai Khazing Sawcapaw, Zisu, kama khatah zemaw na dupaw a ung? Pa hreh haitei kheh tatah Khazing ming tah ka ca naw,” tatah a thang khy chung tah a y.
Zemaw tah pawco Zisu tah ama khah, “Nama thlawpaw pialuipaw, ma cawngsawpaw a chung taikhei piathlah,” tatah a tah thah cawtah a cang.
Mataico Zisu tah, “Na ming ahomaw?” tatah a hae. Ma cawngsawpaw taco, “Kaa hlu ngeteinah cawtah ka ming cawh Thongzakheh a cang,” tatah a palei.
Taico, ma raang chung taico a pialuipaw thlawpaw sahlo cawh papia ly rua pawtah Zisu cawh a naw canei leimei thlang.
Aa kae tlaangpa lekhei lawh a e leimeipaw voh rungpui a ung he.
Khachia sahlo taco Zisu cawh, “Voh rung lang ma seisah la, aa chunglang a ma naesah thlang,” tatah aa naw.

Aaning cawh seinah naw pei he ka, thlawpaw pialuipaw sahlo cawh piathlah he ka, voh chunglang cawh a nae he. Thonghning hrawng a cangpaw voh rungpui cawh lungkang cung taitah tuiping lang khah a zythlah he ka, a thi thlu he.
Voh a mingkaitu sahlo cawh sai tlamang he ka, ma konglang cawh khuapui le khuatei vytei khah va thuisah he ka, ma hratei hming a cangpaw cawh ming rua pawtah ming hlupui khah a va chuh he.
Zisu kung aa va tlung tihtah thlawpaw a pialuipaw sahlo bupui tei aa tlepaw cawngsawpaw khah chaichi a tua ka, lungsing teitah ama khatah a za tythlangpaw khah aa hmuh tihtah aa ci ngetei.
Thlawpaw a pialuipaw sahlo tei aa tlepaw cawngsawpaw le voh sahlo cung letei hming a tlungpaw khah a hmuhpaw sahlo taco, a cangnah kong cawh zawpui khah aa ching he.
Mataico Zisu cawh aa raang taitah piathlah a pawtah aa naw.
Zisu cawh tuilawng chunglang khah a nae ning takhei khachia tei a tlepaw cawngsawpaw taco, “Nama khatah ka seilai hrá a,” tatah a naw.
Canghrasala Zisu tah sai be. “Ma navy co na ing lang va sei la, Abuipaw tei ningdo a ca tah zia le na cung letei hming rungnawpaw a tuapaw khah na sawny va ching he,” tatah a tah.
Macawtaco ma cawngsawpaw cawh sei ka, Dekapoli raang lekhei Zisu tah zetlua tamaw a cawtah hming a tuapah takhah ching longmang he ka, cawngsaw vytei cawh aa khuarawh a haa ngetei.
Zisu cawh tuilawng tah raechai lang cawh va sei kaw hui ka, tuili raechai lang letah a ung thlangning taco, cawngsaw hlupui tah aa pahlong thlang.
Ma ning taco, synagog a uhtu pakheh a cangpaw Jaira cawh a vong ka, Zisu kung a va phah tihtah a phe hrang letah a bawh ka,
“Ka sawcanu a thi daimang. Ningdo pawtei tah a vong la, a cung letah na kih pahnia la, ma tei na tua caco dang kaw a ka, a hring kaw thlang a,” tatah a sah pui tah a naw.
Macawtaco Zisu cawh Jaira khaco sei ka, cawngsaw hlupui tah zui he ka, Ama cawh aa pahlong thlang.
Ma leco, canu pakheh kung hrawhluihning chung a thi a chuh no a ung.
Sibui a hlupui tah mingkai he ka, a taithui ngetei. A hnuicho vytei pachang thlu ka, dang vy hlui lytah a pazua vy lo leimei.
Zisu thong a thui tihtah zawpui hrong leco a hninglang tah a vong ka, a chaichi dong cawh a va tong,
zecawtamaw tatah, “A chaichi chang ka tong khy caco ka dang a,” tahpaw a rawh cawtah a cang.
Ma cangkaw leco a thi cawh kih thah ka, ka sawnah taitah ka dang myca tahpaw khah a hni.
Cawngsawno tah a va tong cangkawleh cawh Zisu tah a chung taitah hmingtuakhynah a piapaw khah a hni. Zawpui lang cawh a hui ka, “Ahomaw ka chaichi a pa tong?” tatah a tah he.
A hningzuitu sahlo taco Zisu cawh, “Cawngsaw hlupui tah aa ca nuapaw khah na hmuh thlang heh saw, zekhatah zia tamaw, ‘Ahomaw a pa tong?’ na tah thlang!” tatah aa tah.
Canghrasala Zisu cawh a chaichi a tongpaw khah ahomaw a cang takhah zawpui hrong lekhei a ming lai.
Taico ma cawngsawno taco, a cung letei hming a tlungpaw khah a hninah cawtah ci ka, a cathing hmotah a phehrang letah a va bawh ka, a cangnah vytei cawh a ching thlu.
Zisu taco, “Ka sawcanu, na zingnah tah a ca dangsah. De teitah va seí la, na sawnah taco ca thlaw myca seh,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah bia a rei leimeining taco, synagog a uhtu Jaira ing taico meh thaikheh a vong he ka, “Na sawcanu cawh a thih thah, cawngpahtu khah hnahnawh ruapaw cang khawh be,” tatah aa ching.
Zisu tah aa reipaw cawh a thuisah du lytah ung ka, Jaira hai leco, “Na thlawzawng kheh seh, na zing a hy,” tatah a tah.
Piter le Jeims le Jeims a unypaw Johan tah cy ly co ahohmai a zuisah bei he.
Synagog a uhtu Jaira ing cawh aa va phah tihtah hnahnawh luri tah le caw le ysang tah a ungpaw sahlo khah a hmuh he.
Ing chunglang a nae ka, aa hai letah, “Zecawtamaw hnahnawh luri tah le cawtah naa ung? Ma nyno heh a thih tlung be, a ihning hi,” a tah he.
Canghrasala Ama cawh aa hnuiso. Aaning vytei cawh a papia khy tai he tah nyno a no le a paw le a hningzuitu pathung khakhei nyno a ungnah lang khah a nae he.
Nyno cawh a bang tah law ka, “ Talitha Kumi,” tatah a tah. A silang cawh, “Nyheh no, tho ka ca tah,” tahnah a cang.
Ma cangkawleh cawh nyno cawh tho ka, a khiathi. (Ama cawh kung hrawhluihning a cang). Ma cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa ning a ang ngetei.
Ma kong cawh ahohmai thuisah ly pawtah a sah pui tah bia a patai he. Taico, “E ruapaw sangkheh kheh pei my lo,” a tah he.
Zisu cawh piathlah ka, a cinglainah khua lang sei ka, a hningzuitu sahlo taco aa zuilai.

Sabat ning cawh va chuh ka, synagog leco cawngpah he ka, a bia aa thuipaw vytei cawh aa ning a ang ngetei. Aaning taco, “Ma cawngsawpaw heh zehapaw singnah maw aa peh? Zekhatamaw ningang chuipaw hming sahlo heh a tua khy?

Ama heh kih zungthaipaw khah cang bei maw? Mari sawcapaw Jeims, Josef, Judas le Simon sahlo aa unypaw khah cang bei maw? A satei sahlo zong kaaning khatah ma lehei ung thlang hrah bei he maw?” tah he ka, a cung letah aa lung tling be.
Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Khazing khuavang cawh a pinah khua letah le a ruachai sahlo le a ingchungkho hrong letah tah cy ly co kawkih letah pasungpanaw a cang,” a tah he.
A dang lypaw meh cawngtei cung letah a kih pahnia ka, a dang sahpaw he tah ly co, ma leco ningang chuipaw hming zehmai tua khy be.
Zingnah aa hnui lynah kong leco a khuarawh a haa. Mataico, ma kaekang hrawng letei a ungpaw khua sahlo cawh tlawng lai ka, a cawngpah lai he.
Zisu tah a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khah y he ka, thlawpaw pialuipaw cung letah nawhnuinah pei he ka, pahning longmang tah a taw he.
Bia a pataipaw he cawh, “Naa khuatlongnah cawtah cungcahrei cy ly co zehmai a pho khe la, zairia cang seh, sahre cang seh a pho khe lo. Naa angki bawng letah tangka zong a sang khe lo.
Phepakong a pakong la, canghrasala angki zing hning tah a pathai khe lo.
Ing naa tlung tih he tah ma khua naa seisai kaw hlai vytei cawh ahringpaw lang a palong khe lo.

Taico zeletahmai tah aa ca cyhlang ly caco he le a cang ly leh naa bia aa nge du ly caco, naa piathlah tihtah aaning khah raering pehnah cawtah naa phe letei luipadih khah cathing thlah si my lo,” a tah he.
Macawtaco aaning sahlo cawh piathlah he ka, cawngsaw vytei cawh aa suanah a ngepachih rua pawtah aa cawngpah he.
Khachia a hlupui papia he ka, mehdang ly a hlupui zong sathy thu he ka, aa dangsah he.

Zisu ming cawh kawkih letah a thang cawtah Herod siangpahrang tah ma vytei cawh a thui. Thaikhehpaw tah, “Baptisma peitu Johan khah thihnah taitah thosah kaw cang ka, macawtaco ningang chuipaw hmingtuakhynah a hnuipaw a cang hi,” tatah aa tah.
Thaikhehpaw sahlo taco, “Khazing khuavang Elija a cang,” aa tah. Taico thaikhehpaw tah, “Khuahlai tei Khazing khuavang pakheh kheh hapaw, Khazing khuavang a cang,” aa tah.
Canghrasala Herod tah ma bia cawh a thui tihtah, “Kama tei a lu ka taipaw Johan khah thihnah taitah thosah kaw a cang!” tatah a tah.

Abui Herod ama ceingei tah baptisma peitu Johan khah tlesah he ka, tongchaisah he ka, thong letah a thlah. Zecawtamaw tatah a nyteipaw Filip a nupuino Herodi khah nupui tah chui ka, a lung a lawngsah du cawtah a cang.
Johan tah Herod khah, “Na nytei nupui na chupaw heh a phung cang be,” tatah a mochia cawtah a cang.
Ma rawng taco Herodi tah Johan khah a lungchung tah a carae ka, thaw a du.

Canghrasala, theh khy be zecawtamaw tatah Herod taco Johan cawh mehding le mehpathai a cang tahpaw khah hnih ka, cizaw ngetei ka, a vai lai. Johan bia a reipaw cawh a thui tihtah a chungsi a vang thlang naná teitah a reipaw bia nge cawh a du thlang thly thly.

A changnah letaco Herodi cawtah a raicangpaw cai cawh a va chuh. Herod tah a pinah ningcai lekhei, uhtu bui a cangpaw sahlo le raekeh bui sahlo le Galili raang chung letei hruitu macang vytei khah kongchuanah a tuapah he.
Herodi a sawcanu cawh a za nae ka, a lang tihtah Herod le a khuachai sahlo cawh a lawng ngetei he. Herod taco nyno hai letah, “Zemaw na du? Na dupaw maikaw pa hae la, ka ca pae a,” tatah a tah.
Taico, chia a sah hmo tei a reipaw cawh, “Na pa haepaw maikaw cawh ka painah raang a chy hmai ka ca peh a tatah bia ka kaang,” a tah vy.
Nyno cawh piathlah ka a no cawh, “Zemaw ka hae a?” tatah a hae. A no taco, “Baptisma peitu Johan a lu,” tatah a tah.
Ma cangkawleh cawh nyno cawh rairang tah siangpahrang Herod khaco a za nae kaw ka, a haepaw cawh, “Baptisma peitu Johan a lu khah ato hrahring heh daabakho tah pa pei la, ka du,” tatah a tah.
Siangpahrang Herod cawh a lung reithui ngetei ka, canghrasala a khuachai sahlo hme letah bia a kaang thah cawtah khei nyno bia cawh ei du be.
Ma cangkawleh cawh raevaitu raekeh pakheh khah rairang tah taw ka, Johan a lu cawh na va tle a tatah a tah. Cawngsawpaw cawh va seí ka, thong-ing leco Johan a lu cawh va tai ka,
dabakho tah a lu cawh a va tle. Nyno cawh hlai ka, nyno taco a no cawh a peh pachaw.
Ma kong cawh Johan hningzuitu sahlo tah thui he ka, a vong he ka, a rawh cawh law he ka, thlai letah aa phung.
Apostol sahlo cawh aa va kaw kaw tihtah Zisu kae leco a pahmo he ka, aa cawngpah pawhe le aa hming tuapaw vytei khah aa ching.

Mataico cawngsaw a sei chuhchypaw aa hlutunah cawtah Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh batui e nápaw cai hmai hnui be ca he ka, a hningzuitu sahlo khah, “Kama khatah a vong la, a denah lang sei he peh, a hia cawng ná he ceh seh,” a tah he.
Macawtaco aaning longtei tah tuilawng tah a kingdangnah lang cawh aa sei.
Canghrasala, aa seipaw a hmuhpaw mehlupui takhei, aaning aa cangpaw khah aa hninah cawtah khua ting taitah va sai he ka, aaning hlai tahmai aa sei nápaw hminghmaw cawh aa phah taw.

Zisu cawh tuilawng taitah ka piathlah ka, cawngsaw zawpui khah a hmuh tih he tah kingtu a hnui lypaw tuu sahlo hratah aa cangnah cawtah khei ning a do ngetei he. Macawtaco hming hlupui kong cawngpah khah a hrang a patho.
Ning cawh tlah daimang ca ka, a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka, “Ma heh raang kingdang tah cang ka, ningkhua zong a tle ngetei myca.
Kaa kaekang khua sahlo lang sei sá la, ding e ruapaw a va cawh he seh,” tatah aa tah.

Canghrasala Zisu taco, “Naaning tah e ruapaw cawh pei o,” a tah he. Aaning taco, “Cawngsaw pakheh thlah reh chung nihlo pui a hia caw! Ma vytei co very cawh co he peh ka maw aa e ruapaw cawh kaa pae he a?” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Very tlang khazeh maw naa hnui, va seí la, va ming tua o,” a tah he. Aa va ming tihtah, “Very tlangpangaw le ngaw sanghning a ung,” aa tah.
Taico Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh cawngsaw vytei khah a phuphu tah araang cung lekhei a ty sá pawtah bia a peh he.
Ma hraco cawngsaw vytei khah zakheh phu, songngaw phu tah a tysah he.

Zisu tah very tlangpangaw le ngaw sanghning cawh law ka, avai lang a y ka, Khazing khatah lawngbia hlai ka, very tlang sahlo cawh a kychy. Mataico, a hningzuitu sahlo khah zawpui cawh rai pawtah a peh he. Mataico ngaw sanghning zong cawh ming vytei hrong leco a rai he.
Aa zongmingtei co e he ka, aa ri a vaw thlu.
A hningzuitu sahlo taco very le ngaw a tangpaw cawh pakhong he ka, baihraw hluihning chih ky tah aa dui.
Very a epaw sahlo cawh capaw puitling 5000 a cang he.
Zawpui khah a disah chung he takhei Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh rairang tah tuilawng chunglang a naesah he ka, Galili rili raechai Bethsaida khua lang khah a seisah hlang he.
Aa seisai khy tai he tah Ama cawh thlawchang pawtah tlaang cung lang a sei.
Zailangsang leco tuilawng cawh tuili a lecingcing lekhei ung ka, Zisu cawh Ama longtei tah tlaang lekhei a ung thlang.

Thli tah a rupui tah a nangnah rawng he tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa lawng khah zeh khy khawh bei he tahpaw Zisu tah a hmuh. Monglang suimehlang papali hrong lekhei Zisu cawh tui cung leco aaning lang va sei ka, aaning khah a khungsai daimang he.
Canghrasala, tui cung letei a va seipaw khah a hningzuitu sahlo tah aa hmuh tihtah athlaw a cang rua tah he ka, a ysang he.
Aa zongmingtei tah Ama cawh hmuh he ka, aa ci ngetei. Ma cangkawleh cawh Zisu tah, “Naa thlawzawng kheh seh, kama ka cang, ci khe o,” a tah he.
Mataico tuilawng lang cawh aaning khatah a nae ka, thli cawh a de. Mataico, a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa khuarawh a haa ngetei.
Aa lungku khah pachawsah aa cangnah cawtah very kong khah aa lunghaa be.
Raechai lang khah va cakah he ka, Genesaret raang khah va phah he ka, aa lawng cawh ma leco aa hrai.
Tuilawng taitah aa ka pia cangkawleh cawngsaw tah Zisu a cang tahpaw khah aa hni.
Ma letei cawngsaw sahlo cawh a kawkih ná tah sai he ka, a ung tatei aa thuinah maikaw leco, a sahpaw sahlo cawh aphia tah aa va song he.

Taico, khuapui sahlo letah cang seh, khuatei sahlo letah le raang chung letah cang seh a seinah maikaw lekhei, a dang lypaw sahlo khah chodo tlaang lekhei aa chuakhui he. A pai dong tei chang tongsah rua pawtah naw he ka, Ama a tongpaw vytei cawh a dang he.
Farasi sahlo le Jerusalem taitei a vongpaw he phungbia cawngpahtu thaikheh taco Zisu cawh cadung he ka,
a hningzuitu thaikheh cawh kih si phung a cangpaw khah zui lytah kih si lytah batui aa epaw khah aa hmuh he.
Farasi sahlo le Juda cawngsaw vytei cawh aa pupaw leh cawngpahnah phungbia hrakhei kih si taw ly co, batui e bei he.

Chodo tlaang letah hming aa cawh tih zong tah kih si ly co batui e bei he. Taico ahringpaw pupaw phung sahlo aa zuipaw ung vy ka, ma sahlo cawh ny sahlo, daabei sahlo, ketli sahlo sipathai tah hapaw sahlo khah a cang.
Macawtaco, Farasi sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah, “Zecawtamaw, na hningzuitu sahlo heh pupaw phungbia zui lytah a pathai lypaw kih tah batui aa e zia?” tatah Zisu cawh aa tah.

Zisu tah aaning cawh, “Khazing khuavang Isaiah tei naaning cungmai raipha sahlo naa kong a reihlangpaw heh a hmang caimang. Isaiah tah, ‘Ma cawngsaw sahlo tahei aa hmokaw co aa pa cizaw, canghrasala aa lungthing cawh kama taitah a hlah ngetei he.
Aa pa behpaw zong heh aa cawtah zehmai chahnai be. Aa cawngpahnah zong heh mehnung tuachawngpaw phungphe sahlo suipaw a cang he,’ tatah a cia.
Khazing biapeh sahlo laky khah seisai he ceh ka, mehnung tuachawngpaw phungbia cawh na tle hri he ceh,” tatah a chai he.
Taico aa hai letah, “Naaning naa phungbia sahlo zui nápaw cawtah Khazing biapeh sahlo hneihly cawh naa thai ngetei.
Moses tah, ‘Na no na paw cizaw my lo,’ taico, ‘A no cang seh, a paw cang seh chia a sahpaw cawh thaw a cang a,’ a tah.

Canghrasala naaning tah naa tahpaw cawh cawngsaw pakheh tah a paw a cang ly leh a no khatah, ‘Kama taitah na hmuh khy a paw bawnah cawh Korban, (A silang cawh Khazing khatah pehlai a cang thah) a cang a,’ a tah caco,
ma cawngsawpaw cawh a no a cang ly leh a paw cung letah zehmai tuasah sai khawh bei he ceh.
Naa hlai pachaw laipaw he ceh phungbia khei Khazing bia khah zelypaw tah naa cangsah. Taico, hming hringpaw sahlo zong ma hraco naa tua,” a tah he.
Zisu tah ming zawpui khah Ama khatah y kaw he ka, “Ming vytei, ka bia heh nawthlia la, hnih thai my lo.
Kaw taitah chunglang a naepaw taco cawngsaw khah papia palui be. Kaw taitah a ka piapaw duitei taco cawngsaw khah a papia palui.
Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw maikaw taco thui he seh,” a tah.
Zawpui cawh seisai he ka, ing chunglang a nae khy taitah a hningzuitu sahlo taco tawchingnah bia a silang khah aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Naaning zong ma tlua co maw naa lung a co? Kaw taitei chunglang a naepaw taco cawngsaw cawh papia palui khy be tahpaw cawh hnih bei he ceh maw?
Zecawtamaw tatah a lungthing chunglang a nae lytah a ri lang a nae ka, alailang a pia kaw thlang,” a tah he. Zisu tah ma hratei a reipaw heh zehapaw epaw hmai a pathai a tah dunah a cang.
Ma hrahei rei vy ka, “Thinglung chung taitah a kapiapaw tahei cawngsaw cawh a papia a palui tei.
Zecawtamaw tatah cawngsaw lungthing chung taihei a chaw lypaw khuarawnah sahlo, canu capaw suanah, ruhnah, lenongnah, a pheinah,
duhlui hnuinah, zia hnuinah, hinghenah, hohenah, hnachuanah, male thai pachianah, a palai a patuinah le a ningcang lytah khuasahnah tahpaw sahlo a chuh he.
Ma hmingchaw ly vytei heh chunglang taitei a ka piapaw cang he ka, cawngsaw a papia a palui sahpaw a cang he,” a tah he.
Zisu cawh ma hminghmaw cawh seisai ka, Tair khua kaekang lang a sei. Ingkheh chung letah a nae ka, ahohmai khah hnisah du bei he, canghrasala a nawh khy hlui be.
A sawcanu thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw canu pakheh cawh Zisu kong a thui cangkawleh rairang tah a vong ka, a phehrang lekhei a bawh.
Ma canuno cawh Siria pai Fonisia raang letei a pipaw, Grik cawngsaw a cang. A sawcanu chung letei khachia papia pah pawtah Zisu cawh a naw.
Zisu taco, “Sawtei leh taco aa dupaw vytei e taw he seh. Sawtei leh aa very cawh lá tah ui sahlo peh cawh a phung cang be,” tatah a tah.
Canuno taco, “A cang, Abuipaw, canghrasala cabuai rai letei a ungpaw ui sahlo taco sawtei leh didang cawh aa khi thlang hrah,” tatah a palei.
Mataico Zisu tah, “Ma hratei na pachainah cawtah hei, ing lang na dih khy. Khachia tah na sawcanu cawh a piasai thah,” tatah a tah.
Cawngsawno cawh ing lang cawh a dih ka, khachia tei a piasai thahpaw a sawcanu cawh lakhing letah a lia thlangpaw khah a hmuh.
Ma khy taico Zisu cawh Tair khua taikhei piathlah ka, Sidon khua cahrong ka, Galili rili lang cungthlah ka, Dekapoli raang lang a sei.
Ma leco cawngsaw pakheh a nawpang katei, a rei a thlaw thai lypaw cawh Ama khatah va chua khui he ka, a cung letah a kih pahnia pawtah Zisu cawh aa naw.
Zisu tah ama cawh zawpui hrong taico piathlah khui ka, a nawkho chunglang cawh a kihdong a cahro. Mataico a ci tah chawh ka, a lui cawh a tong.
Avai lang a y ka, a sah pui tah a husua ka, cawngsawpaw khaco, “ Effatha,” (A silang cawh a hong tua tahnah a cang) tatah a tah.
Ma cangkawleh cawh a naw cawh a awng ka, a lui cawh a ka catlai ka, achaw teitah bia a rei.
Zisu tah ahohmai thuisah khe lo tatah bia a patai he. Canghrasala, a hlu vy bia a patai he leh, a hlu vy tah aa reilai tima.
Cawngsaw sahlo cawh aa khuarawh a haa ngetei. Aaning taco, “A tuapaw hming vytei heh a chah caimang. A nawpangpaw hmai khua thuisah ka, a rei a thlaw thai lypaw zong a rei a thlawsah,” tatah aa tah.
Ma ningcai leco, cawngsaw hringpaw a hlupui a pahmo hui he. Epaw zehmai aa hnuilynah cawtah Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh y he ka,
“Ma cawngsaw sahlo heh kama khatah ningthung tai ung myca he ka, e ruapaw zehmai aa hnui khawh ly cawtah ka ning aa pa do ngetei.
Aa ngaidi hmotah tlungsah my he neh seh la, lang letah a baw he a. Zecawtamaw tatah mehthaikheh cawh langhlaw pui taitah a va chuhpaw aa cang cawtah,” a tah he.
A hningzuitu sahlo taco, “Ma raang kingdang lehei ma vytei mehnung dang ruapaw lawh heh ahomaw a hmuh khy a?” tatah aa chai.
Zisu tah, “Very tlang khazeh maw naa hnui?” tatah a hae he. “Tlangsarih,” tatah aa chai.

Ming zawpui cawh alui letah a tysah he. Ma khy taico very tlangsarih cawh law ka, Khazing khatah lawngbia a hlai khy taitah ky chy ka, a hningzuitu sahlo cawh zawpui khah rai rua pawtah a peh he. A hningzuitu sahlo tah zawpui cawh aa rai he.
Ngadih a cawngpe hnui pai he ka, ma caw zong taco alawngnah bia hlai ka, a hningzuitu sahlo khah raipai law a tah he.
Aa dawngkasawny co e he ka, aa ri a vaw ngetei. Taico, a hningzuitu sahlo tah ebangpaw cawh pakhong he ka, baisarih chih ky tah aa dui.
Ma letei very a epaw he cawh patling 4000 hrawng a tah he. Mataico Zisu tah zawpui cawh ing lang a disah he.
Ma khy taico a hningzuitu sahlo khatah tuilawng chunglang a nae he ka, Dalmanutha pai lang aa sei.
Farasi sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka, bia aa hae. Ama khah pase du tah vaicung langtei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah tua khah aa sia.
A hu a sah pui tah sua ka, “Atochai cawngsaw tahei zecawtamaw ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah heh aa du tlong? Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma hapaw hming cawh peh cang a bei he,” tatah a tah.
Taico, aaning cawh seisai he ka, tuilawng chunglang cawh a nae ka, Galili tuiping raechai lang a sei.
A hningzuitu sahlo tah very a pho monghly he ka, tuilawng chung leco aaning khatah tlangkheh tei suipaw a ung.
Taico Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh, “Farasi sahlo le Herod raangri taikhei a vai la, a raering my lo,” tatah a tah he.
A hningzuitu sahlo tah, “Very kaa hnui ly cawtah a reipaw a cang,” tatah pakheh le pakheh a tah tlungmang he.
Zisu tah aa reipaw bia khah hnih ka, aaning khah, “Zecawtamaw very naa hnui lypaw kong naa rei leimei? Ato tingtai hnih thai ting bei he ceh maw? Naa lung a ku achaw caw tamaw?
Meh hnui thlang tlung pawtah hmuh bei he ceh maw? Naw hnui thlang tlung pawtah thui bei he ceh maw? Taico a thui thlang bei he ceh maw?
Mehnung 5000 caw tei very tlang pangaw ka chy ning takhei a hluipaw khah bai khazeh maw naa dui kha?” tatah hae he ka, “Baihraw hluihning,” tatah aa chai.
Taico Zisu tah, “Taico mehnung 4000 caw tei very tlang sarih ka chy ning takhei a hluipaw bai khazeh maw naa dui vy kha?” tatah hae he ka, “Bai sarih,” tatah aa chai.
Zisu taco, “Ma naná co hmai hnih thai ting bei he ceh maw?” tatah a tah he.
Bethsaida khua cawh va phah he ka, mehcopaw pakheh khah cawngsaw thaikheh tah va chua khui he ka, tongpá pawtah Zisu cawh aa naw.
Taico mehcopaw cawh a kih tah tle ka, khua lailang a piakhui. A mehkho leco a ci tah chawh ka, a cung letah a kih chia ka, “Zehming sangkheh chang na hmuh maw?” tatah a hae.
Mehcopaw cawh a ka hui ka, “Cawngsaw hmuh he neh ka, thingkungpaw sahlo aa seilaipaw ky aa lo,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah a meh cung leco a kih cawh a chia kaw. Taico a meh cawh ka dui ka, khuahmuh kaw ka, zezongpui khah a sepaw teitah a hmuh khy he.
Taico Zisu tah a ing lang a disah ka, “Khua chunglang a nae kaw kheh lo,” tatah a tah.
Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Sisaria Filipi a kaekang letei khuatei sahlo lang cawh a sei he. Aa seilaining taco, a hningzuitu sahlo khah, “Cawngsaw tah aho aa pa tah maw?” tatah a hae he.

A hningzuitu sahlo tah, “Thaikhehpaw tah baptisma peitu Johan a cang aa ca tah, thaikhehpaw tah Elija a cang ca tah he ka, ahringpaw taco Khazing khuavang pakheh kheh cawh a cang aa ca tah,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu tah, “Naaning tah saw aho a cang naa pa tah maw?” tatah a hae he. Piter tah, “Nama cawh Khri cawh na cang,” tatah a chai.
Zisu tah Ama a kong khah ahohmai ching khe lo tatah raeringnah a peh he.

Taico, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw tah taithuinah a hlupui ing ka, macang sahlo le tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah hlawh a he ka, aa thaw a. Canghrasala ningthung khy tah a tho kaw a, tatah cawngpah hrang a patho he.
Ma bia cawh a sepaw teitah Zisu tah a ching he. Taico, Piter taco a cakih lang seikhui ka, a mochia.

Canghrasala Zisu cawh a paleh ka, a hningzuitu sahlo khah ming he ka, Piter cawh a raw. “Setan, kama tai hei seihly! Khazing lang hming pacang ly ceh tah cawngsaw lang hming na pacang vy hri hi,” tatah a tah.
Taico Zisu tah a hningzuitu le zawpui cawh Ama khatah y he ka, “Ahohmai zui a pa dupaw cawh ama a dunah khah seisai seh la, a khraws cawh a puh seh la, pazui seh.
Zecawtamaw tatah a hringnah pachah a dupaw taco hly a ka, canghrasala, Kama le thawngchawbia rawng tah a hringnah a hlypaw taco a pachah a.
Cawngsaw pakheh tah khazaw heh a pungpaluh tah hnui seh la, a thlawpaw a sung caco zemaw a cawtah a chahnai a?
Cawngsaw tah a thlawpaw khah hmuh kaw pawtah zemaw a peh khypaw a ung?

Atochai a pheinah chai le, suanah chai lehei Kama le ka bia a zawkhuipaw maikaw cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw tah a Paw rungnawnah le a vaiming pathai sahlo khatah a za cung tihtah a zawkhui hra he a,” tatah a tah he.

Mataico, aaning cawh, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma lehei a daw thlangpaw sahlo hrong lehei Khazing painah raang cawh hmingtuakhynah khatah a va tlungpaw aa hmuh hlai taco mehthaikheh cawh thi balang bei he,” tatah a tah.
Taico, ningruh khy tah Piter le Jeims le Johan cawh Zisu tah tlaang sangpaw lang a kekhui he. Ma leco aaning teitah aa ungning tah Zisu cawh aa hmekaw leco a hmuisang cawh a thlai.
A chaichi cawh raang ngetei ka, a khaipaleh he. Cawngsaw tei aa rangsah khypaw navy tah a rang vy syly he.
Aa hmekaw leco Elija le Moses cawh a va lang he ka, Zisu khatah bia aa rei hrui leimei.

Piter taco Zisu cawh, “Cawngpahtu, ma lehei ung heh kaa cawtah a chah ngetei. Thlangda nama na cawtah sangkheh, Moses cawtah sangkheh, Elija cawtah sangkheh tatah sangthung sah a he peh,” tatah a tah.
Aa ci tu cawtah zemaw ka rei a tahpaw hmai hnih be.
Taico aa cung letah meding cawh va thang ka, aaning cawh pahlong he ka, meding chung taico, “Ma heh ka dopaw ka Sawcapaw a cang, a bia nge my lo!” tatah o a za ring.
Aa kaekang cawh a hui tlamang he ka, Zisu tah cy ly co ahohmai hmuh bei he.
Tlaang cung taitah aa za cungthlah ning takhei Zisu tah, “Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh thihnah taitah a tho kaw hlai vytei cawh naa hmuhpaw khah ahohmai ching khe lo,” tatah a tah he.
Ma kong khah aa lung chung letah a cingkai thlang he ka, canghrasala aaning le aaning cawh, “Thihnah taitah tho kaw, a tahpaw heh ze silang maw a cang?” takhah aa reisia.
Taico Zisu cawh, “Zecawtamaw phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah Mesiah hlai tah Elija a vong taw hrahring a, aa tah?” tatah aa hae.

Zisu tah, “Elija cawh a vong taw hmuisui ka, zezongpui khah a parai pacia thlu. A cang caco, zecawtamaw Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a sah pui tah tai-ing a ka, hlawh a cang a tatah Capathai letah cia a cang?
Canghrasala, ka ca ching he, Elija cawh a vong thah ka, Capathai letah ciapaw tei hrakhei aa dudú khei ama cawh aa tua thah,” tatah a palei he.
A hningzuitu ahringpaw sahlo aa kung aa va phah tihtah cawngsaw hlupui tah za pahlong thlang he katei, phungbia cawngpahtu thaikhehpaw sahlo khatah bia a za ei leimeipaw he khah aa hmuh.
Zawpui takhei Zisu aa hmuh cangkawleh aa khuarawha ka, va saihno he ka, aa va dai.
Zisu tah, “Aaning sahlo khatah ze kong maw na ei leimei he ceh?” tatah a hae he.
Zawpui hrong taitah pakhehpaw tah, “Cawngpahtu, ka sawcapaw cawh khachia tah a tle cawtah a rei zong thlaw khy be ca ka, nama khatah ka va seikhui.

Khachia tah a chuahno ning maikaw leh alui letah a va chai. A ci tatabu chuh ka, a haw ria ka, a hruipaking tei. Na hningzuitu sahlo heh khachia papia pá pawtah naw he neh ka, canghrasala papia khy bei he,” tatah a tah.
Taico Zisu tah, “Vy zingnah a hnui lypaw cawngsaw sahlo, ze tih tai maw naaning khatah ka ung a? Ze tih tai maw ka lung ka ca pasua pá he a? Nyhehpaw cawh a vong khui tua o,” a tah he.
Taico nyhehpaw cawh a vong khui he. Khachia tah Zisu khah a hmuh cangkawleh nyhehpaw cawh alui letah phongchai ka, ama le ama hmai a hni lytah a paleh a pathae ka, a ci tatabu zong a chuh thlu.
Zisu tah, “Ma hratei a ungpaw heh zekhah cai maw a tah?” tatah nyhehpaw a paw khah hae ka, “A nyheh teitah,” tatah a paw taco a tah.
Taico a paw taco, “Me chunglang bo ka, tui chunglang zong thlah ka, uihlupui a thaw daimang tei. Na tua khy caco, ning ma do la, ma baw ky law,” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco, “Na tua khy caco na tah maw? Zingnah a hnuipaw caw taco zezong tua khy a cang,” tatah a tah.
Ma cangkaw leco, a paw cawh, “Ka zing hmuisui, ka zing vy nápaw cawtah pa baw ky law,” tatah a tah.

Zawpui tah aaning lang a va ne vy leimeipaw he khah a hmuh tihtah Zisu tah thlawpaw pialuipaw cawh a hrangso ka, “Nama, a naw a pangpaw le a rei a thlaw thai lypaw thlawpaw, nyhehpaw chung taikhei piathlah la, zening tahmai a nae kaw khawh kheh tatah bia ka ca peh,” tatah a tah.
Khachia cawh ka sang ka, nyhehpaw khah a sah pui tah cathing si ka, a chung taico a piathlah. Nyhehpaw cawh mehthi rawh lo ka, macawtaco cawngsaw vytei tah, “A thi thah,” tatah aa tah.
Canghrasala, Zisu tah a bang tah tle ka, patho ka, a ka daw.
Taico Zisu cawh ing chunglang a nae khy taitah a hningzuitu sahlo tah, “Zecawtamaw kaaning tah kaa papia khy be?” tatah aparuh teitah aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Ma hapaw hming heh cawh thlawchangnah tah cy ly co zetahmai papia khy cang be,” tatah a palei he.
Ma hminghmaw taico Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh piathlah he ka, Galili raang cahrong pai tah aa sei. Zisu tah zeletamaw aa ung tahpaw khah ahohmai hnisah du bei he.

Zecawtamaw tatah a hningzuitu sahlo khah a cawngpah leimei ning he cawtah a cang. Aaning cawh, “Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh cawngsaw sahlo kih letah luithae a cang myca a. Aaning sahlo taco aa thaw a, taico ning thung khy letah a tho kaw a,” a tah he.
Canghrasala a rei dupaw khah aa hni ly naná teitah Ama khah hae hri ngang bei he.
Kapernaum khua khah va phah he ka, ing chunglang a nae ka, a hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Langpui lekhei zemaw na ei lai leimei he ceh?” tatah a hae he.
Canghrasala palei bei he. Zecawtamaw tatah langpui letei a ei laipaw he cawh kaaning hrong lehei ahomaw alai caipaw a cang a takhah a cangnah cawtah.
Zisu cawh a ty ka, a hningzuitu hluihning khah y he ka, “Ahohmai alaicaipaw cang a dupaw cawh a nytaw caipaw tah a tua seh la, ming maikaw raihretu tah a tua seh,” a tah he.
Nyhehpaw cawh law ka, aa hrong letah a dawsah. Pawng ka, aa hai letah,
“Ahohmai kama ka ming tah ma hapaw nyhehtei heh a cyhlangpaw cawh kama a pa cyhlangpaw a cang. Ahotahmai kama a pa cyhlangpaw cawh a pa tawtupaw a cyhlangpaw a cang,” a tah he.
Johan taco, “Cawngpahtu, cawngsaw pakheh tah na ming tah khachia a papia leimeipaw hmuh he peh ka, kaa bu cawngsaw a cang lynah cawtah tua kheh law tatah kaa thly,” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco, “Thly khe o, ka ming tah ningang chuipaw hming a tuapaw taco, a tua khy taikhei co a ry hlai leco pa reipachia a beh.
Ahohmai a ma cakhae lypaw maikaw cawh kaa cawngsaw a cang he.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ahohmai, Khri tei naa cangnah cawtah ka ming tah tui cakaw ny kheh tei hmai a ca peipaw he cawh aa longmai cawh hmuh lytah ung hrahring a bei he.
Taico pakheh kheh tah Kama a pa zingpaw nyhehtei pakheh khah a suasah caco a hirong letah sangrianah lung pathle tah rili chunglang thlah he seh la, a cawtah a chah vy a.
Na kih tah a ca suasah caco, taichung la, vathlang. Kih rahning tah a de thai lypaw hraihming me lang tlah navy co, kih hnui ly tei chaizaw hringnah chunglang a nae cawh na cawtah a chah vy.
Na phe tah a ca suasah caco, taichung la, vathlang. Phe rahning chi tei hraihming chunglang tlah navy co, phe lytah chaizaw hringnah chunglang a nae cawh na cawtah a chah vy.
Mataico na meh tah a ca suasah caco, khy hly thlang. Meh rahning chitah hraihming lang tlah navy co Khazing painah raang chunglang meh rakheh khatah a nae khah na cawtah a chah vy.
Hraihming chung leco, ‘Salung zong thi be ca he ka, me zong de beh.’
Cawngsaw maikaw cawh me khei paci hratah aesah a cang he a.
Paci cawh a chah, canghrasala a aenah a ly caco, zekhatamaw na aesah khy khaw a? Paci hratah ae la, pakheh le pakheh a dorai teitah ung my lo,” a tah he.

Ma khy taico Zisu cawh ma hminghmaw taico piathlah ka, Judia raang le Jordan tuivaw rae lang khah a sei. Ma leco cawngsaw hlupui cawh Ama khatah a vong hui he ka, a tua teipaw hratah aaning cawh a cawngpah he.
Ama khah pase du tah Farasi thaikheh sahlo cawh Ama khatah a vong he. A hai letah, “Capaw tah nupui mah heh a phung a cang maw?” tatah aa hae.
Ama taco, “Moses tah zekhatamaw phungbia a ca peh he?” tatah a palei he.
Aaning taco, “Moses tei bia a mah pehpaw cawh capaw tah a nupui cawh mahnah ca a ciapah caco, a mah khy thlang,” tatah aa tah.
Taico Zisu tah, “Moses tei ma phungbia a ca cia pahpaw he cawh naa lung a khong tunah cawtah a cang.
Canghrasala, a hrangthoning taco, ‘Khazing tah canu le capaw tatah a tua he.’
‘Ma rawng taco capaw tah a no le a paw khah seisai a he ka, a nupui khatah a pahlawng a ka,
ma tlaw pahning cawh ngaisaw pungkheh tah aa cang a.’ Macawtaco aaning cawh pahning cang khawh bei he, pakheh a cang myca he.
Macawtaco, Khazing tei a patongpaw he cawh cawngsaw tah pachai kheh he seh,” tatah a palei he.
Ing chunglang a nae kaw khy tai he tah a hningzuitu sahlo tah ma kong khah Zisu aa hae.
Zisu tah, “A nupui mah katei, ahringpaw canu a chuipaw cawh a nupui khah a pheisaipaw a cang.
Ma hraco canu tah a pasae khah kawsai tah capaw ahringpaw khatah a pahlawng caco, a pasae a pheisaipaw a cang hrah,” tatah a tah he.
Taico, Zisu tah tong he seh la, bonghnang song he seh tah du tah nyhehtei sahlo khah va chua khui he ka, canghrasala, a hningzuitu sahlo tah aa raw he.
Zisu tah ma cawh a hmuh tihtah a thingae ka, aa hai letah, “Nyheh sahlo cawh kama khatah a vong he seh, pakhang khe o. Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing painah raang cawh ma hapaw sahlo aa tei khah a cang.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Khazing painah raang cawh nyheh hratei a cyhlang lypaw taco a chung lang a nae by a be,” tatah a tah.
Taico nyhehtei sahlo cawh aa bang tah tle he ka, aa cung letah a kih pahnia ka, bonghnang a song he.
Zisu cawh khuatlong pawtah a tho ning takhei cawngsaw pakheh va sai ka, a hmekung letah a khuh a panai. “Cawngpahtu chaw, chaizaw hringnah ka hmuh khy nápawtah zemaw ka tua a?” tatah a hae.
Zisu taco, “Zecawtamaw a chawpaw na pa tah? Khazing tah cy ly co ahohmai a chawpaw ung bei he.
Biapeh sahlo cawh na hni thlang. ‘Lenong kheh, a phei kheh, ru kheh, ahmang lypaw bia hnikhuitu cang kheh, dungkhei hmang kheh, na no le na paw cizaw my lo,’ tahpaw sahlo a cang he,” tatah a tah.
Ma satlepaw taco, “Cawngpahtu, ma hming vytei heh cawh ka nyheh ning taitah ka zui ciapaw longtei a cang,” tatah a chai.

Zisu tah ama cawh ming ka, a cung letah donah a hnui. “Hming sangkheh na by. Va sei la, na hnuipaw vytei va zua la, mehsisah khah tangka va pei la, vaicung letah chosung na hnui a, taico a vong la, pa zui,” tatah a tah.
Ma bia cawh a thui tihtah satlepaw cawh a hme a chia. Ama cawh mehrung a cangnah cawtah a ngechia hmotah a sei hly.
Zisu tah a kaekang leco ming ka, a hningzuitu sahlo hai letah, “Mehrung cai taco Khazing painah raang letah a nae heh a ru caimang!” tatah a tah.
A hningzuitu sahlo tah ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah aa khuarawh a haa ngetei. Canghrasala Zisu tah, “Ka sawtei sahlo, Khazing painah raang letei a nae heh a ru caimang!
Mehrung tei Khazing painah raang letah a nae navy co ceiphing kho letah sahisy a nae heh a neh vy a,” tatah a tah vy he.
A hningzuitu sahlo taco, aa ningang hmotah, “A cang caco, ahomaw pachah a cang khy a?” tatah aaning le aaning a tah he.
Zisu tah aaning cawh ming he ka, “Ma hming heh cawngsaw caw taco cang khy be, canghrasala, Khazing caw taco a cang khy lypaw zehmai ung be,” a tah he.
Piter tah Zisu cawh, “Kaaning taco zezongpui seisai tah kaa ca zui hi,” tatah a tah.

Zisu tah, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, kama ka rawng tah le, thawngchawbia rawng tah a ing maw, a uny sahlo maw, a satei sahlo maw, a no maw, a paw maw, a sawtei sahlo maw, a ly sahlo maw, a seisaipaw maikaw cawh,

ato hringchung cai lehei a leh zakheh tah aa hmuh a. Ing sahlo, uny sahlo, satei sahlo, no sahlo, sawtei sahlo le, ly sahlo khahei hrehnah zong khah aa hmuh a. Mataico a va chuh lepaw cai letah chaizaw hringnah zong aa ting a.
Canghrasala, a hme a sahpaw mehlupui cawh hningkha he ka, a hningkhapaw cawh hme aa sah tae a,” tatah a tah he.

Jerusalem khuapui lang cawh seichy he ka, Zisu tah langhme a chuilai he. A hningzuitu pahrawhluihning sahlo cawh aa khuarawha ka, ahringpaw a zuipaw sahlo zong taco aa ci. A hningzuitu pahrawhluihning cawh aaning teitah Zisu tah seihly khui he ka, a cung letei a va tlung lepaw khah a ching he.

Zisu tah, “Atoheh Jerusalem khuapui lang sei he peh ka, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khatah luithae a cang a. Aaning sahlo taco thaw pawtah thaily cangsah a he ka, Gental cawngsaw sahlo kih letah peh a cang a.
Ma sahlo taco pasipasa he ka, aa ci tah chawh a he ka, basung tah chei a he ka, aa thaw a. Ningthung khy taitah a tho kaw a,” a tah he.
Taico, Zebedi sawcapaw leh Jeims le Johan cawh Zisu khatah a vong he. A hai leco, “Cawngpahtu, kaa ca haepaw maikaw ma tuapah law tah kaa du,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Naa cawtah ze hming maw ma tuapah seh tah naa du?” tatah a hae he.
Aaning taco, “Na painah a rungnawpaw letah na cacang lang pakheh, na cavui lang pakheh a ma tysah la, tah kaa du,” tatah aa palei.
Zisu taco, “Naa haepaw heh hnih thai bei he ceh. Ka ding lepaw tai-ingnah ny heh naa ding khy a maw? Thihnah baptisma ka ing ruapaw zong naa ing khy a maw?” tatah a tah he.
Aaning taco, “Kaa ding khy a,” tatah aa chai. Zisu taco, “Ka ding ruapaw tai-ingnah ny zong ding he ceh ka, ka ing ruapaw thihnah baptisma zong naa ing a.
Canghrasala, ka cacang lang le ka cavui lang tah a tynah naw cawh kama ka rei cang be. Ma hming sahlo cawh Khazing tei a pachia pahpaw sahlo aa cawtah a cang,” tatah a tah he.
Ma bia cawh a hningzuitu ahringpaw pahraw tah aa thui tihtah Jeims le Johan aa cung leco aa thing a ae ngetei.

Taico, Zisu tah hmingkheh tah y he ka, “Gental cawngsaw sahlo uhtu bui a cangpaw sahlo taco aa rai leteipaw sahlo cung letah abui tah a bui so he ka, builai sahlo cawh aa cung letah naw aa hnui ngetei tahpaw khah naa hni.
Naaning sahlo cawh ma hraco naa cang ruapaw cang be. Ma navy co, naaning hrong lehei mehlai cang a dupaw taco, naa raihretu tah a tua seh la,
a pakhehnah cang a dupaw taco, cawngsaw maikaw sae tah a tuapaw a cang.
Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh a rai hrepá pawtah cang lytah male rai hre rua pawtah le mehlupui tlang ruapaw cawtah a hringnah peh rua pawtah a vongpaw hrahei,” a tah he.

Mataico Jeriko khua aa va phah. Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo le ming rungpui cawh Jeriko khua taitah aa piathlah ning takhei, Timai a sawteipaw Bartimai, mehcopaw cawh kih do pawtah langpui kae letah a ty thlang.
Taico Nazaret Zisu a cang tahpaw a thui cangkawleh, “David Pathlah, Zisu, ning pa do ky law!” tatah a thangpui tah a y.
Cawngsaw hlupui tah raw he ka, de teitah ung thlang aa tah. Canghrasala, “David Pathlah, ning pa do ky law!” tatah a thang vy tah a y.
Zisu cawh a daw ka, “Va y tua o,” tatah a tah he. Taico mehcopaw cawh va y he ka, “Na thawchah seh, a daw! Ama tah a ca y,” tatah aa tah.
A angkilai cawh vathlang ka, a catho ka, Zisu khaco a va sei.
Zisu taco, “Na cawtah ze tuapah maw na du?” tatah a hae. Mehcopaw taco, “Cawngpahtu, khuahmuh khy ka du,” tatah a palei.
Zisu taco, “Sei myca, na zingnah tah a ca dangsah thah,” tatah a tah. Ma cangkaw leco khuahmuh ka, Zisu a seinah lang khah a zui.
Jerusalem lang a va nae myca he ka, Oliv tlaang letah a ungpaw Bethfes le Bethani khua aa phah tihtah Zisu tah a hningzuitu pahning khah a seisah hlang he.

Aa hai letah, “Naa hme khua lekhei va seí la, khuachung naa nae cangkawleh he ceh ahotahmai aa ke bang lypaw la teitei a hrai thlangpaw khah naa hmuh a. A rui khah thlang he ceh ka, ma lang heh naa va hrui a.
Pakheh kheh tah, ‘Ze rua tamaw ma hrakhei naa tua?’ aa ca tah caco he, ‘Abuipaw tah a hia, ma lehei a va chia kaw palang a,’ tatah tah my lo,” a tah he.
Mataico va seí he ka, langpui kae letei ing a hawkaw tung letei aa hrai thlangpaw, la teitei cawh aa hmuh.
A rui aa thlang ning takhei aa kae letei a dawpaw sahlo tah hmuh he ka, “Zemaw la teitei rui khah naa thlang?” tatah aa tah he.
Zisu tei a chingpaw he hrakhei chai he ka, cawngsaw sahlo taco seikhui thlang o, aa tah he.
La teitei cawh Zisu kung va tlung khui he ka, a cung letah aa pai sahlo dae he ka, Zisu tah a ke.
Taico cawngsaw hlupui tah langpui leco aa pai sahlo phaw he ka, mehthaikheh cawh lyraang letei chingbu khah va chaw he ka, aa phaw pah hrah.
Mataico, a hmelang tei a seipaw sahlo le, a hninglang tah a zuipaw sahlo taco, “Hosana! Abuipaw ming tei a vongpaw cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh.
Kaa mapaw, David painah raang, a va tlung leimeipaw cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh. Hosana! A sangcainah vaicung lekhei Khazing cawh reithai tah ung ky seh.” tatah a y he.

Zisu cawh Jerusalem khuapui lang a nae ka, behnah ing lang khah a va seí. Zezongpui khah ming ka, canghrasala zailang a cang thah cawtah piathlah kaw ka, a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khakhei Bethani khua lang aa sei kaw.
A ningthlamongpaw cawh Bethani khua taitah aa piathlah ning takhei Zisu cawh a ngai a di.

Langpa tah thuiku kung a bu a chaw ngeteipaw khah va hmuh ka, a thui ung maw tahpaw ming pawtah a va seihno. Canghrasala a va phah tih taco, a thui tih cai a cang lynah cawtah a hnaw tah cy ly co zehmai hmuh be.
Mataico thuiku kung khah, “Ahotahmai tah na thui ca e khawh kheh he seh,” tatah a tah. Ma bia a reipaw cawh a hningzuitu sahlo zong tah aa thui.

Zisu cawh Jerusalem khuapui a va phah tihtah behnah ingdung chunglang khah a va nae. Behnah ing letei hming a zuapaw sahlo le a copaw sahlo khah tingchua thlu he ka, tangka a thlaipaw sahlo aa cabuai le thury a zuapaw sahlo aa dyching sahlo khah a palehly thlu he.
Zua ruapaw hming khah behnah ingdung cahrong tah tlelai khah ahohmai sai bei he.

Taico aaning sahlo a cawngpah ning he tah a reipaw cawh, “Capathai letah ma hrahei cia cang bei maw? ‘Ka ing cawh mingphing vytei cawtah thlawchangnah ing tatah aa tah a.’ Canghrasala naaning taco, ‘Mehru kua,’ tah naa tua,” a tah he.

Tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco ma bia cawh thui he ka, Ama khah thaw khy nápaw langpui hui hrang aa patho. A cawngpahnah takhei ming zawpui aa lung khah tong tu ka, macawtaco Ama khah aa ci.
Zailang a va chua tihtah Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh khuapui chung taikhei a piathlah he.
A ningthlamongpaw mongdi tah aa seipai khei thuiku kung cawh a hrang tai a ro thahpaw khah aa hmuh.
Piter tah a thui thlang cawtah Zisu hai leco, “Cawngpahtu, mingtua, chia na sahpaw thuiku kung kheh a ro thlu thah khi,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah, “Khazing khah zing my lo.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he. Pakheh kheh tah ma tlaang heh, ‘Sei la, rili chung lang a va thlah,’ tah seh la, lung langlo tah ung lytah a reipaw khah a zing caco, ma hraco tuapah a cang a.
Macawtaco ka ca ching he, thlawchang tah naa haepaw khah kaa hmuh thah tatah naa zing caco, ma cawh peh na cang a he ceh.
Mataico, thlawchang tah na daw tihtah na cung letei hmingchahly aa tuapaw maikaw khah ngethai la, ma pawsui co vaicung letei a ungpaw na Paw Khazing tah na suanah vytei khah a ca ngethai hrah a.
Canghrasala, cawngsaw hringpaw suanah khah na ngethai ly caco, vaicung letei na Paw Khazing tah na suanah khah ca ngethai hrah a be,” tatah a chai.
Jerusalem lang khah va tlung kaw he ka, Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chung letei a khiakaly ning tah tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le macang sahlo khah Ama khatah a vong he.
Aaning taco, “Ze nawhnuiná tamaw ma hming sahlo heh na tua? Ahomaw ma hming sahlo heh tua pawtah nawhnuinah a ca pei?” tatah aa hae hri.
Zisu tah, “Bia sangkheh ka ca hae tua hrá he a. Pa palei la, ma hming sahlo heh zehapaw nawhnuinah tamaw ka tua tahpaw ka ca ching hrá he a.
Johan tah baptisma cangsahnah naw a hnuipaw khah vaicung taitah maw, cawngsaw taitah maw? Pa ching tua o,” tatah a palei he.
Reisia he ka, “Vaicung taitah tah my peh seh la, ‘A cang caco zecawtamaw Johan cawh naa zing be?’ a ma tah a.
Canghrasala, ‘Cawngsaw taitah,’ kaa tah a maw?” tatah aa reisia. Aaning tah zawpui khah aa ci he, zemaw tah pawco cawngsaw maikaw tah Johan cawh Khazing khuavang hmuisui a cang tatah aa tah.
Macawtaco Zisu khatah, “Hnih bei peh,” tatah aa tah. Zisu tah, “Kama zong tah ma hming sahlo heh zehapaw nawhnuiná tamaw ka tua tahpaw ca ching hra bei neh,” a tah he.

Taico Zisu tah tawchingnah bia tah a ching he. “Cawngsawpaw pakheh tah misur buichung a tua. A buichung cawh ruahy sahkhai ka, misur so nápaw kho zong co ka, a haw nápaw siasang zong a do thah. Mataico misur buichung cawh male khah hlei he ka, khuatlongnah lang a sei.
Hre cai a cang tih taco a sae pakheh khah ama a tinghangpaw pakhong paw takhei ly a hlangpaw sahlo khaco a taw.
Canghrasala aaning taco ama cawh tle he ka, dai he ka, kih longpaw tah aa kawsah kaw.
Taico, a sae hringpaw taw kaw ka, ma cawngsawpaw cawh a lu letah phong he ka, ningzaw chuipaw tah aa tua.
A sae hringpaw taw kaw hui ka, ama zong cawh aa thaw. Ahringpaw sae sahlo khah a hlu vy tah taw he ka, thaikhehpaw cawh dai he ka, thaikhehpaw cawh aa thaw he.
Taw ruapaw pakheh suipaw a hnui myca. Ma cawh a dopaw, a sawcapaw khah a cang. ‘Ka sawcapaw cawh aa cizaw a,’ tah ka, a changnah leco a sawcapaw cawh a taw.
Canghrasala, ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco, ‘Ma cawngsaw heh ry cytu a cang. A vong la, thae he peh, taico a ry heh kaa cawtah cang ná seh,’ tatah pakheh le pakheh aa tah he.
Taico, ama cawh tle he ka, aa thaw khy taitah misur buichung alailang khah aa vathlang.
Ma tih taco misur buichung a hnuitupaw takhei zemaw a tua a? Va seí ka, ly a hlangpaw sahlo khah thé he ka, misur buichung khah ahringpaw khah a hlei he a.
Capathai letah rei bang bei he ceh maw? ‘Ing a sahtu sahlo tei aa hlawhpaw alung cawh a biapui caipaw alung tah a cang.
Abuipaw tah ma heh a tuapaw cang ka, kaa mehmuh letah khuarawha a chuipaw a cang,’ a tahpaw khasaw,” tatah a tah he.

Taico, Juda hotu sahlo taco Ama tle nápaw langpui khah aa hui, zecawtamaw tatah tawchingnah bia a reipaw cawh aaning a rei hnopaw he a cang takhah aa hni. Canghrasala zawpui khah aa cinah caw he tah Ama cawh aa seisai kaw.
Ma khy taico, Ama a bia khei Zisu khah tle pawtah Farasi sahlo le Herod a hningzuitu mehthaikheh khah aa taw he.

Zisu khaco a vong he ka, “Cawngpahtu, nama cawh zingchuipaw na cangpaw kaa hni. Cawngsaw tah miamang khypaw cang bei ceh, zecawtamaw tatah cawngsaw hme ming bei ceh. Canghrasala Khazing langpui khah biahmuisui a cang naning teitah na cawngpah tei he. Siangpahrang Sizar letah ngungkhui peh heh ahmang maw hmang ly?
Kaa pé maw, pé ly?” tatah aa hae. Canghrasala Zisu tah cungmai raipha aa cangpaw khah a hmuh tihtah, “Zecawtamaw o na pa pachia he ceh? Denari tangka cawh va tle la, pa mingsah tua o,” a tah he.
Tangka cawh va tle he ka, “Aho lingthlaw maw a cawng? Aho cakhai maw a cia?” tatah aaning sahlo cawh a hae he. Aaning tah, “Sizar,” tatah aa palei.
Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Sizar a tei cawh Sizar khah pei la, Khazing a tei cawh Khazing pei my lo,” tah he ka, aaning sahlo cawh aa ning aa ang ngetei.
Ma khy taico, thokawnah ung be a tahpaw Sadusi sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka, bia aa hae hri.

“Cawngpahtu, Moses phungbia letah cawngsawpaw cawh sawtei sah lytah a nupui khah a thih sai caco, a unypaw takhei lahmeno cawh nupui tah chui kaw seh la, a thipaw caw takhei sawtei sahlo a sah pápaw a cang a tah.
Uikheh cawh uny pasarih ung he ka, a uthui caipaw tah nupui chui ka, sawtei sah lytah a thi.
A pahningnahpaw tah ma lahmeno cawh chui kaw ka, canghrasala sawtei sah lytah a thih sai hrah. A pathungnahpaw zong ma hraco a cang hrah.
Aa pasarih co cawngsawno cawh chui he ka, sawtei sah lytah a thi he. A hning cai tah ma canuno zong cawh a thi hrah.
Macawtaco thokawnah letah ma canuno cawh aho a nupui maw a cang a? Aa pasarih tah ma canuno khah aa chui tlung,” aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Naa rawh sua ngetei, Capathai a cang ly le Khazing hmingtuakhynah naa hnilynah cawtah a cang.
Aa thipaw aa tho kaw tih taco, a chuihae cawh ung khawh a be. Vaicung letei vaiming hratah aa cang tae he a.

Mehthi sahlo thokawnah kong leco Moses cabu letei chingbu me tah a kangpaw kong lekhei Khazing tah, ‘Kama cawh Abraham Khazing, Isak Khazing, Jakob Khazing ka cang,’ tatah a tahpaw khah rei bang bei he ceh maw?
Ama cawh mehthi aa Khazing cang be, canghrasala mehring aa Khazing a cang hri. Naa rawh sua caimang!” tatah a palei he.

Phungbia cawngpahtu pakheh a vong ka, ma hratei bia a ei leimeipaw he khah a thui. Zisu tah achaw teitah a palei he tahpaw khah a hmuh tihtah, “Biapeh vytei hrong lehei zehapaw maw a biapui cai?” tatah a hae.
Zisu tah, “Biapeh a biapui caipaw cawh ma heh a cang, ‘Israel cawngsaw sahlo nawthlia tua o. Abuipaw suipaw heh Khazing cang ka, Khazing ahringpaw ung bei he.
Abuipaw na Khazing khah na lungthing vytei, na hringnah vytei, na khuarawnah vytei, na thawzaang vytei tah do my lo.’
Taico a sanghningnah cawh, ‘Nama na dopaw hratah na ingpaw khah do my lo,’ tah a cang. Ma sanghning navy hei alai vypaw biapeh ung be,” tatah a chai.
Phungbia cawngpahtu tah, “Cawngpahtu, a chah ngetei, Abuipaw suipaw heh Khazing cang ka, Khazing ahringpaw ung bei he na tahpaw heh a hmangpaw a cang.

Khazing khah na lungthing vytei, na hnithainah vytei, na thawzaang vytei tah do la, na ingpaw khah nama na dopaw hratah do cawh mero pehlainah vytei le, thuihlainah vytei navy tah biapui vy a cang,” tatah a palei.
Zisu tah ma cawngsawpaw tei, singvang ngetei tah bia a paleipaw cawh a hmuh tihtah, “Khazing painah raang khatah a hlah bei ceh,” tatah a tah. Ma khy taico ahotahmai tah bia hae ngang khawh bei he.
Zisu tah behnah ingdung letei a cawngpah ning he takhei, ma bia heh a hae he. “Zecawtamaw phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah Khri cawh David pathlah a cang tatah aa tah?
David tah Thlawpaw Pathai tei a reipaw cawh, ‘Abuipaw tah ka Buipaw cawh, na carae sahlo khah na phe rai letah ka chia hlai vytei he cawh ka cacang lang letah a ty my lo a tah,’ tatah a tah.
David ama ceingei tah, ‘Abuipaw,’ a tah tlung, zekhatamaw Khri cawh David sawcapaw a cang thai a?” tatah a tah he. Ming rungpui taco a bia cawh lungtho teitah aa nge thlang.

Ma hratei Zisu tah a cawngpah ning he takhei, “Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khah a raering my lo. Aaning cawh a ngepaw angki pasuapaw a hrei tah chodo tlaang letah a khia lai le cawngsaw tah cizaw hmotah bia a ching khah aa du.
Synagog letah achaw caipaw dyching letah a ty du he ka, kawngchuanah letah achaw caipaw hminghmaw khah aa du.
Lahme sahlo ing khah chu he ka, zawpui hmuh rua tah a sypui tah thlaw aa chang. Ma sahlo cawh a sah caipaw dangtahnah aa ing tae a,” a tah he.

Zisu cawh behnah ing lekhei tholong thingkawng lang a hui khei a ty ka, zawpui vytei tah tholong aa chia leimeipaw khah a ming thlang. A hnuirungpaw mehlupui tah tangka hlupui khah tholong kawng leco aa thlah.
Canghrasala mehsisah lahmeno pakheh cawh a vong ka, tholong kawng leco phaesai phaehning, tangka phaekheh mai tluh a cangpaw tei cawh a thlah hrah.
Taico Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo khah y he ka, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma mehsisah lahmeno tahei aho navy zong tah a hlu vy tholong a thlah.
Ahringpaw cawh aa hnuipaw a hluipaipaw chung taikhei aa peh. Canghrasala ma lahmeno heh cawh a dongchia hmotah a hringnah cawtei a hnuipaw vytei a peh thlu hi,” a tah he.
Taico Zisu cawh behnah ing taitah a piathlah ning takhei, a hningzuitu pakheh tah, “Cawngpahtu, mingtua hmai! Alung sahlo aa lai zia kheh! Ing sahlo aa rungnaw zia kheh!” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco, “Ma ing rungnawpaw vytei heh na hmuh maw? Alung phaekheh hmai heh palehly lypaw ung a be, a zongmingtei tah palehly thlu a cang tae he a,” tatah a palei.
Zisu cawh behnah ing raechai tlaang, Oliv tlaang cung letah a ty thlang ning takhei, Piter le Jeims le Johan le Andru takhei Ama khah,
“Ma hming sahlo cawh zening tamaw a cang a? Taico, zehapaw paching pakhanah maw a ung a tahpaw ma ching tua?” tatah a paruh teitah aa hae hri.
Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Ahotahmai aa ca dungkhei ly nápaw he tah a raering my lo.
Ka ming tah cawngsaw hlupui va chua he ka, ‘Kama heh Ama cawh ka cang,’ tah a he ka, cawngsaw hlupui khah aa dungkhei he a.
Rae a dypaw he le rae thongpang naa thui tihtah a pahly khe lo. Ma hming sahlo cawh a ung hrahringpaw a cang he. Canghrasala, a changnah cang balang be.
Raang kheh le raang kheh a dy a he ka, painah le painah a dy he a. Hming hlupui letah aling a hrui a ka, cakaang a tlung a. Ma vytei heh canu ny ung risaw hrang a pathonah hratah a cang.

Achaw teitah a raering my lo. Ca tle a he ka, biacenah letah aa ca chuakhui tae he a. Synagog letah zong aa ca chei he a. Uhtu bui sahlo le siangpahrang sahlo hme letah bia hnihtu cang pawtah kama ka rawng tah na daw tae a he ceh.
Canghrasala ma hming sahlo a cang hlai tahei thawngchawbia heh mingphing vytei khatah rei taw a cang a.

Ca tle a he ka, biacenah hme letah aa ca chuakhui tih he tah ze bia maw kaa rei a tahpaw pacang tah naa thlawzawng kheh seh. A cai a phah tihtah rei ruapaw cawh peh cang tae he ceh ka, ma cawh rei thlang my lo. Zecawtamaw tatah ma bia a reipaw cawh naaning cang lytah Thlawpaw Pathai khah a cang hri a.
Uny le uny, paw le saw sahlo cawh thihnah tai a luithae he a. Sawtei leh tah no le paw khah thihnah tai aa dy he a.
Kama ka rawng tah ming vytei tah aa ca hua he a, canghrasala, a changnah tai zingnah letah cy ky tah a dawpaw cawngsaw cawh pachah a cang a.

‘Rorangnah a chua khuipaw pasih padawh chuipaw,’ cawh hming pathai letah a daw thlangpaw khah naa hmuh tihtah a reitu tah a silang hnih he seh. Judia raang letei a ungpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh tlaang cung lang sai he seh.
Ing cung letei a ungpaw cawh hmingbo lá pawtah ing chunglang a nae kheh seh.
Ly letei a ungpaw cawh a angkilai lá pawtah a ing lang tlung hrah kheh seh.
Ma ningcai cawh sawtei a phopaw canu sahlo le nysai a tlepaw no sahlo aa caw taco zetlua tamaw ningping a chui a!
Ma hming sahlo heh thlasih chung tah a cang ly nápawtah thlawchang my lo.
Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing tah khazaw a tua thoning taitah atoning tai lehei a ung bang lypaw ningping vaisangnah cai cang tae a ka, ma tluh hapaw cawh ung bang khawh a be.
Ma ning sahlo cawh Khazing tah pachingsah lytah ung my seh la, ahringpaw pakheh hmai ung a bei he. Canghrasala a thingpaw a cawngsaw sahlo rawng tah ma ning sahlo cawh a pachingsah a.
Ma tih taco, pakheh kheh tah, ‘Mingtua, ma lehei Khri a ung,’ a cang ly leh, ‘Ming tua, ma lekhei a ung khi!’ aa ca tah caco he zing khe lo.

Zemaw tahpaw co Khri pakheipaw sahlo le khuavang pakheipaw sahlo chuh a he ka, a cang khy caco Khazing thingpaw cawngsaw sahlo hmai dungkhei pawtah paching pakhanah sahlo le ningang chuipaw hming sahlo khah aa tua a.
Macawtaco a raering my lo, a cai a phah hlai tah zezong ka ca ching pacia he.
Canghrasala, ma hanah le reithuinah cai khy taico, ‘Ning cawh muisah cang a ka, thlawpaw zong khai khawh a be.
Esi sahlo zong avai taitah tlah a he ka, avai letei hmingtuakhynah sahlo zong cahneh a cang he a.’
Ma tih taco, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh hmingtuakhynah le rungnawnah khatah meding hrong letah a vongpaw khah cawngsaw tah aa hmuh tae a.
A vaiming sahlo cawh taw he ka, a thingpaw sahlo cawh alui ki kipali taitah le, alui a changnah taitah avai sahlo aa changnah tai khah aa pahmo he a.
Thuiku kung tai hei cawngpahnah bia heh a ngia my lo. A chawng ka chawng katei, a hnaw pany a ka chuapaw naa hmuh tihtah nipui ning a ne myca tah naa hni.
Ma hraco, ma hming vytei heh a cang leimeipaw naa hmuh tihtah cai a nae myca, ingkaw hrang a va phah myca tahpaw khah hnih my lo.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma hming vytei heh a tlung hlai vytei cawh atochai cawngsaw sahlo heh thi thlu balang bei he.
Alui le avai cawh a rawh a, canghrasala, ka bia cawh a rawh by a be,” tatah a tah he.
Taico a rei vypaw cawh, “A ning le a cai cawh Paw tah cy ly co ahotahmai hnih bei he, vaicung letei vaiming sahlo tahmai hnih bei he, Sawcapaw zong tah hnih hrah be.
A raering my lo. A mai pacia my lo! Ma cai cawh zening tamaw a cang a tahpaw hnih tlung bei he ceh.
Cawngsaw khua a tlawngpaw khatah a lo. A ing khah seisai ka, a sae sahlo khah aa hre ruapaw rai cacy khah a ching si he. Ingkaw a congtupaw khah achaw teitah za vai my lo tatah bia a patai si.
Macawtaco, a raering my lo, zecawtamaw tatah ing a hnuitu cawh zailang letah maw, zaicing letah maw, aakhawng tamaw, mongdi tamaw, zening tamaw a va kawkaw a takhah hnih tlung bei he ceh.
Rawh ly pui tah a va tlung caco na ihning thlangpaw khah ca hmuh pang le.
Naaning khatei ka reipaw heh ming vytei khatah ka reipaw a cang. A raering my lo!” tatah a tah he.

Khungsai Panawnah le Raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah cawh ninghning suipaw a du tihtah tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco Zisu cawh aparuh teitah tle tah thaw nápaw khua khah aa khang.
“Canghrasala, Khungsaipanaw chung leco cang kheh seh, cawngsaw tah hnahnawhnah aa tua sua a,” tatah aa tah.

Zisu cawh Bethani khuapaw, Simon mehthinghmui ing letah batui a e leimei ning takhei canu pakheh a vong ka, lungrang tuithei khei, sathy ringthopaw, a mai a ru ngeteipaw a va tle. Ma sathy ringthopaw cawh nard thingkung taitei lahpaw nard a patahpaw taitah tuapaw a cang. Tuithei cawh khuichy ka, Zisu lu leco sathy cawh a bia.
Ma letei a ungpaw mehthaikheh cawh aa thingae ngetei ka, “Zecawtamaw ma tluh a mai a rupaw sathy heh a patlawh a papang?
Mehnung pakheh kung kheh hlo navy tah a hlu vy tahmai zua seh la, ma tangka cawh mehsisah pei he seh la, chah vy bei maw?” aa tah. Taico, canuno cawh a sah pui tah aa raw.
Zisu tah, “Ama tua tah tua thlang seh, zecawtamaw ama cawh hna naa hnawh? Ka cung letah a tuapaw heh hmingchaw a cang.
Mehsisah cawh naaning khatah ung paria thlang he ka, naa du caco zening tahmai naa bong khy thlang he. Canghrasala kama cawh ung paria bei neh.
Ka pung cung letei sathy a pa biapaw heh a tua khy pawtei khah a tuapaw a cang. Phung ka cang nápaw cawtah a pachia hlangpaw a cang.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, khazaw letah thawngchawbia aa reinah maikaw letah ma cawngsawno tei a tuapaw heh ama monghly lynah tah rei a cang tae hrá a,” a tah he.
Mataico, a hningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cang hrahpaw Judas Iskariot cawh tlangbui macang sahlo khatah Zisu cawh luithae pawtah a va sei.
Ma kong cawh aa thui tihtah aa thawchah ngetei ka, tangka kaa ca pae a aa tah. Macawtaco, Judas cawh aaning khatah Zisu a peh khy nápaw he cai chaw khah a bo thlang he.

Raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah ning a hmetawpaw, Khungsai Panawnah Tuu teitei thuihlainah ning leco, a hningzuitu sahlo tah Zisu cawh, “Zeletamaw Khungsai Panawnah zairia enah cawh na cawtah pachia he peh seh la, tah na du?” tatah aa hae.
Macawtaco, a hningzuitu pahning cawh taw he ka, “Khuapui chung a va nae la, beirai tah tui a cuilaipaw capaw pakheh langpui letah naa tong he ceh. Ama cawh zui my lo.
Ma cawngsaw a naenahpaw ing a hnuitupaw khah, ‘Cawngpahtu tah ka hningzuitu sahlo khatah Khungsai Panawnah zairia kaa e nápaw, ka mehlai khang cawh zeletamaw a ung a tah,’ tatah naa hae a.
Ama taco, a cung khang a kypaw pui, achaw teitah tingtua ciapaw a ca hmuh sá he a. Ma leco kaa dawngkasawny cawtah va tingtua my lo,” a tah he.
Taico, a hningzuitu cawh va seí he ka, khuapui chunglang cawh a va nae he ka, Zisu tah a ching pawtei he hrakhei hming sahlo cawh aa va hmuh. Macawtaco Khungsai Panawnah zairia cawh aa pachia.
Zailang leco Zisu cawh a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khakhei a vong he.
Cabuai cawh cadung he ka, batui aa e leimeining takhei Zisu tah, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, naa hrong tai hei pakheh, kama khatei batui a e hrahpaw tahei a pa lui a,” tatah a tah.
Aa dawngkasawny co aa ngechia ngetei ka, pakheh khy pakheh tah, “Kama cang hrahring bei neh?” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Naaning hluihning chung lehei pakheh kama khatah pakang kangkheh letah very a e hrahpaw heh a cang a.

Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh Capathai tah a kong a ciapaw hratah a cung letah a tlung a. Canghrasala, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a luipaw cawngsaw cawh a cing a ping! Za pi lytah ung seh la, a cawtah a chah vy hripaw,” tatah a palei he.
Aa e chung taco, Zisu tah very khah law ka, lawngbia a hlai khy taitah kychy ka, a hningzuitu sahlo cawh pei he ka, “Law la e my lo, ma heh ka pung a cang,” tatah a tah.
Ma khy taico ny cawh law ka, lawngbia a hlai khy taikhei hlai he ka, aa zongmingtei tah ma ny taico aa ding.
Taico Zisu tah, “Ma heh ming hlupui cawtah a laipaw ka thisai, biahrai thapaw cawh a cang.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Khazing painah raang letah a thapaw tah ka ding hlai vytei cawh misurhang heh ding khaw bei neh,” a tah he.
Reithainah hlaw sungkheh aa sah khy taitah Oliv tlaang lang aa ke.

Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Naa dawngkasawny tah na pa paisai thlu he ceh, zecawtamaw tatah ma hrahei Capathai letah cia a cang. ‘Kama tah tuukingtu khah chei a neh ka, tuu vytei cawh a paipatlaw thlu he a,’ a tahpaw hrakhei.
Canghrasala, ka thokaw taitah naaning naa hme lang tah Galili raang lang ka seihlang a,” a tah he.
Piter taco, “Aa zongmingtei tah ca paisai thlu hmai he seh la, kama cawh ca seisai by bei neh,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching, ato zai lalei lehei aa uihning a khawng hlai letah uithung tai na pa paphahsai a,” tatah a chai.
Taico Piter taco, “Nama khatah ka thih hrápaw a cang zong tah ca paphah sai by a bei neh,” tatah a tah vy. A hningzuitu vytei zong tah ma hraco aa tah hrah.
Gethsemani aa tahpaw hminghmaw lang cawh sei he ka, Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo hai leco, “Thlaw ka chang kaa letah ma lehei a za ty thlang my lo,” a tah he.
Piter le Jeims le Johan cawh Ama khatah a chui he ka, lung reithui le vaisang tah a ung.
Aa hai letah, “Ka hringnah heh thih khui khypaw ngechianah khatah a chih. Ma lehei ung thlang la, a raering my lo,” a tah he.
Aa hmelang a cawngpe va sei vy ka, alui letah a bawh ka, a cang khy caco, ma tai-ingnah cai tahei pa khungsai ky seh, tatah thlaw a chang.

Zisu tah, “Abba, Apaw, nama na caw taco zezong a cang khy thlang. Ma tai-ingnah ny heh kama taitah lawhly thlang. Canghrasala, kama ka dunah hratah cang lytah nama na dunah hratah cang ky seh,” tatah thlaw a chang.
Taico, a hningzuitu sahlo khaco a vong kaw ka, aa za ihning thlangpaw khah a hmuh. Piter hai letaco, “Simon, na ihning maw? Suimehlang pakheh hmai a raering teitah ung khy bei ceh maw?
Tuhsonah chung lang naa tlah ly nápawtah a raering la, thlawchang my lo. Thlawpaw taco ahmangpaw hming tua cawh a du thlang, canghrasala pungsaw duitei cawh a thaw a dia,” tatah a tah.
Va sei kaw ka, ma thlythly hraco thlaw a chang kaw hui.
A va kaw kaw tihtah aa ihning thlu thlangpaw khah a hmuh, zecawtamaw tatah aa meh ku tu ka, ceh bei he. Zehratamaw bia kaa chai a tahpaw hmai hnih bei he.

A uithungnah letah a vong kaw hui ka, aa hai leco, “Ato tingtai heh maw a ih he ceh ka, naa hia thlang he ceh? A zaw myca! A cai a phah myca! Mingtua o, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh mehsua sahlo kih letah hlai a cang myca.
Tho tua o! Sei he peh! A pa luitupaw cawh a va chuh myca hi!” a tah he.

Ma hratei bia a rei leimei ning taco a hningzuitu hluihning chung letei pakheh a cangpaw Judas cawh a va chuh. Ama khatah tlangbui macang le phungbia cawngpahtu le macang sahlo tei aa tawpaw he cawngsaw rung cawh zyzi le thingtai a tle he ka, a va chuh hrah he.
A luitupaw taco aaning cawh, “Ka hnangpaw khah Ama cawh a cang a, tle la, a vaitu sahlo khatah seikhui my lo,” tatah paching pakhanah a peh pacia thah he.
Zisu khaco a vaw palang ka, Judas tah, “Cawngpahtu,” tatah y ka, a hnang.
Cawngsaw sahlo taco Zisu cawh aa tle.
Mataico, ma letei a daw thlangpaw pakheh taco a zyzi cawh a chua ka, Tlangbui alaicaipaw a saecapaw a naw khah tuh ka, a pathai thlah.
Taico Zisu tah, “Rae a thopaw sahlo hotu ka cangnah caw tamaw tle pawtah zyzi le thingtai tah naa pa seihno?

Ning tating tah naaning khatah ung neh ka, behnah ingdung letah zong cawngpah he neh ka, naa pa tle tlung be. Canghrasala, ma hrahei a cangpaw cawh Capathai bia patling a hy cawtah a cang,” tatah a tah.
Taico aa dawngkasawny tah Ama cawh hningchai he ka, aa saisai thlu.
Taico satle pakheh paithladih sui a buhpaw takhei Zisu cawh a zuilai. Ama cawh aa tle tihtah,
a pai cawh thlethlah si ka, a tahlong teitah a sai.
Zisu cawh tlangbui alaicaipaw ing lang khah seikhui he ka, ma leco tlangbui macang vytei le macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khah a va chuh hrui he.
Piter tah langhlaw pui tah Ama cawh zuilai ka, tlangbui alaicaipaw ingdung chung taikhah a zuilai. Ma leco raevai sahlo khakhei me a ai ka, a palung.
Tlangbui macang sahlo le Sanhedrin khongsil vytei taco, Zisu aa thaw khy nápawtah a suanah khah hui he ka, canghrasala zehmai hmuh bei he.
Cawngsaw hlupui tah hing le he tah Zisu reipachianah khah rei he ka, canghrasala pakheh le pakheh aa reipaw khah a lo tlang be.
Taico thaikhehpaw cawh a daw he ka, Zisu kong letah ma hingbia heh rei he ka,
“A reipaw kaa thuipaw cawh, ‘Ma behnah ing cawngsaw tei sahpaw heh chehthlah a neh ka, ningthung chung letah cawngsaw tah sah lypaw ka padaw kaw a,’ a tah,” tatah hing bia cawh aa rei.
Canghrasala, pakheh le pakheh aa bia cawh a lo tlang hlui be.
Mataico, tlangbui alaicaipaw cawh aa hme letah a daw ka, Zisu hai letah, “Aa bia heh palei bei he ceh maw? Ma cawngsaw sahlo tei sua aa ca pupaw heh zemaw a cang?” tatah a hae.
Canghrasala Zisu cawh de teitah a ung thlang. Tlangbui alaicaipaw taco, “A laisuipaw Khazing Sawcapaw Khri cawh na cang maw?” tatah a hae vy.
Zisu taco, “Ka cang, taico Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Cungnungcai Khazing cacang lang letah a ty ka, avai meding cung letah a vongpaw khah na hmuh a,” tatah a tah.
Tlangbui alaicaipaw cawh a chaichi khah hriachy ka, “Hnikhuitu ahringpaw kaa hia khawh maw?
Khazing a reipachianah cawh naa thui thlang myca kho. Zekhatamaw naa rawh?” a tah he. Aa dawngkasawny co thaw tlang a tlah aa tah.

Ma khy taico, mehthaikheh tah Zisu cawh aa ci tah chawh he ka, a meh pamai he ka, aa kia tah aa cabai. “Ahomaw a ca cabai, ma ching tua!” tatah aa tah. Taico raevai sahlo taco Zisu cawh seikhui he ka, aa tuh.
Piter cawh ingdung chung letah a ung thlang ning taco, tlangbui alaicaipaw ing letei rai a hrepaw sae canu cawh a kae lang a vong.
Piter cawh me a ai thlangpaw khah a hmuh tihtah va mingchai ka, “Nama zong heh Nazaret Zisu khatei a ungteipaw na cang hrah,” tatah a tah.
Canghrasala Piter tah a paphah ka, “Zemaw na rei tahpaw hnih bei neh, thuithai hrah bei neh,” tatah tah ka, hawkaw lang khah a sei.
Ma sae canu taco va hmuh kaw hui ka, a kaekang letei a daw thlangpaw he sahlo aa hai leco, “Ma cawngsawpaw heh aa hrong leteipaw pakheh a cang hrah hi,” tatah a tah.

Piter cawh a paphah vy hui. A cawngpe khy lekhei ma letei a dawpaw sahlo takhei Piter cawh, “Nama heh aa hrong leteipaw na cang ceingei. Zemaw tah pawco Galili cawngsaw na cangnah cawtah,” tatah aa tah.
Taico Piter tah chia a sah ka, “Ma cawngsaw naa reipaw heh ka hnipaw cang hrahring be,” tah ka, bia a kang.
