Ma cangkawleh leco aa cawh a uihningnah a khawng. Taico Piter cawh Zisu tah a hai letei bia a reipaw, “Aa uihning a khawng hlai tah uithung na pa paphahsai a,” a tahpaw khah a thui kaw. Taico a ngechia ka, otlili tah a cah.
Mongdi taco, tlangbui macang sahlo le, macang sahlo le, phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le, Sanhedrin khongsil vytei cawh bia cawh aa pathluh. Zisu cawh tongchai he ka, raang uhbui Pilat khatah aa hlai.
Pilat taco, “Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang cawh na cang maw?” tatah a hae. Zisu tah, “A cang, na reipaw hraco a cang,” tatah a palei.
Tlangbui macang sahlo taco Zisu cawh a phingphing tah sua aa pu.
Pilat taco a hai letah, “Aaning khah bia paleh a bei he ceh maw? Aa ca pupaw vytei heh ming tua hmai!” tatah a hae vy.
Canghrasala Zisu taco kaw kheh hmai palei be. Pilat cawh a khuarawh a haa ngetei.
Khungsai Panawnah lehei ming zawpui tei chuasah aa dupaw thongtlah pakheh cawh raang uhbui tah a thlaw pah tei he.
Cawngsaw pakheh Baraba aa tahpaw, rae a tho ning tah lee a nongpaw sahlo khatah a pahlawh hrahpaw cawh thong-ing chung letah a ung.
Zawpui sahlo cawh a vong he ka, tuateipaw phung hratah tua pá pawtah Pilat khah aa hae.
Pilat taco, “Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang heh ma thlawpah seh tah naa du maw?” tatah a hae he.
Hnachuanah rawng tah tlangbui macang sahlo taco Zisu cawh ama khatah aa va chuakhui tahpaw khah a hni thlang.
Canghrasala tlangbui macang sahlo taco zawpui sahlo cawh Baraba ma chuapah hri tatah rei pawtah aa pasy he.
Taico Pilat taco, “Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang naa tahpaw heh saw zekhatamaw ka tua a?” tatah a hae he.
Zawpui vytei taco, “Khraws letah khaipai thlang!” tatah a y he.
Pilat taco, “Ze rawng tamaw? Ze hmingsua maw a tua?” tatah a hae he. Canghrasala zawpui taco, “Khraws letah khaipai thlang ky,” tatah a thang vy tah a y vy he.
Zawpuipaw lungtlingsah a dunah cawtah Baraba cawh thlawpah he ka, Zisu cawh chei sah he ka, khraws letah khaipai pawtah Zisu khah raekeh sahlo khatah a hlai he.
Zisu cawh raekeh sahlo tah abui ing Praetoriam aa tahpaw ingdung chunglang seikhui he ka, raekeh sahlo cawh aa dawngkasawny tah aa pahmo he.
Taico Zisu cawh pai a saidungpaw a buh sah he ka, abui lukhu cawtah ahling tei phiapaw lukhu khah a lu letah a khusah he.
Taico, “Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang cawh palawngpali tah ung seh,” tatah a y he.
A lu letah sungbasih tah ato le ato tah tuh he ka, aa ci tah chawh he ka, aa khuh panai he ka, aa beh pakhei.
Taico aa pasi aa pasa khy taitah pai a pasuapaw a saidungpaw cawh pahlu pah he ka, Ama a chaichi khah aa hrei sah kaw he. Taico khraws letah khaipai pawtah aa sei khui.
Taico, khuatei lang tah khua a va tlawngpaw Sairin khuapaw, Alekzandar le Rufa aa paw Simon cawh langpui letah tle he ka, khraws khah hringhrang tah aa puh sah.
Zisu cawh Galgotha, (A silang cawh luru hming tahnah a cang,) aa tahpaw hminghmaw lang aa seikhui.
Taico, mura sii khatah pahlawhpaw misur zu khah pei he ka, canghrasala Zisu tah ding du be.
Taico, khraws leco aa khaipai. A chaichi cawh a chaichy he ka, pakheh cy tah ze heh maw kaa ting a tah hni du tah basung aa phe.
Aa khaipainah cai cawh mong suimehlang pakua a cang.
Sua aa phosahnah bia, ca tei aa ciapaw cawh, “JUDA CAWNGSAW AA SIANGPAHRANG A CANG,” tah heh a cang.
Ama khatah damia pahning, a cacang lang letah pakheh, a cavui lang letah pakheh aa khaipai hrah he.
Capathai tah, “Ama cawh mehsua sahlo khatah reipai a cang hrah,” a tahpaw bia cawh a tling.
A seithipaw sahlo takhei aa lu cathingso he ka, naisui hmo khei, “Behnah ing chehthlah tah ningthung letah a sah kaw khypaw cang bei ceh maw?
Khraws taikhei za cung thlah la, nama le nama a pachah ca!” tatah aa pasi aa pasa.
Ma hraco tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco, pasipasa hrah he ka, “Cawngsaw ahringpaw cawh pachah he ka, canghrasala ama le ama cawh a pachah khy beh!

Israel Siangpahrang Khri cawh atoheh kaa mehmuh lehei khraws taikhei cungthlah tua, maco ca hmuh a peh ka, kaa ca zing a,” tatah aa tah. Ama khatei aa khaipai hrahpaw he takhei naisuinah bia a hlupui khei aa tah hrah.
Ningching suimehlang hluihning hrong taitah zailang suimehlang pathung tai raang pungpaluh letah muinah a tlung.
Zailang suimehlang pathung leco Zisu cawh, “ Eloi, Eloi, lama sabathani?” tatah a thangpui tah a y. A silang cawh, “Ka Khazing, ka Khazing, zecawtamaw na pa seisai?” tahnah a cang.
Ma letei a daw thlangpaw mehthaikheh tah ma cawh aa thui tihtah, “Nawthlia tua, Elija a y!” tatah aa tah.

Taico cawngsaw pakheh va sai ka, span cawh misur zu a thobahlapaw letah nong ka, rahtlong letah patai ka, Zisu cawh ding pawtah a hlai. “Ama teitah ung cong tua seh, Ama lahthlah pawtah Elija cawh a vong maw, vong ly mingtua he peh,” tatah a tah.
Taico Zisu cawh a thangpui tah y ka, a thi.
Behnah ing letei pai aa pazypaw cawh a dong taitah a hrang tai pehning tah a hriachy.
A hme letei a daw thlangpaw raekeh zakheh buipaw tah Zisu a ypaw le zekhatamaw a thih tahpaw khah a hmuh tihtah, “Ma cawngsaw heh Khazing Sawcapaw a cang hrahring thlang,” tatah a tah.
Canu thaikhehpaw tah langpá tah aa cai thlang. Aa hrong leco, Mari Makdalin, a sui vypaw Jeims le Josef aa no Mari le Salomi a ung hrah he.
Ma canu sahlo cawh Zisu, Galili raang letah a ungning tei a zuilaipaw le, a byhiapaw a tuapahpaw sahlo khah a cang he. Ama khatah Jerusalem lang a vong hrahpaw canu a hlupui zong a ung hrah he.
Ma ning cawh Pachiapaningnah Ning, Sabat ning hlai teipaw ning khah a cang. Zailang a va phah tihtah,

Arimathea khuapaw, khongsil chung letah aa cizaw ngeteipaw Josef cawh Khazing painah raang a va tlung lepaw hnabeisuinah a hnui ngeteipaw cang ka, ama cawh Pilat khatah raechah ngetei tah a vaw ka, Zisu rawh cawh a va hae.
Zisu cawh a thi thah tahpaw Pilat tah a thui tihtah a ning a ang ngetei. Raekeh zakheh buipaw khah y ka, “A thi thah maw?” tatah a hae.
“Zisu cawh a thi thah,” tatah raekeh buipaw tei a reipaw khah a thui tihtah Zisu rawh cawh Josef khah a peh.
Taico Josef tah paithladih a naipaw co ka, a rawh cawh lawthlah ka, paithladih co pahlong ka, alung kho aa ruipaw thlai leco a isah. Taico alung a laipaw pui khah thlai kaw lekhei a palia.
Mari Makdalin le Josef a no Mari tah Zisu aa phungnahpaw hming cawh aa hmuh.
Sabat ning a chang tihtah Mari Makdalin le, Jeims a no Mari le, Salomi taco Zisu rawh thu ruapaw sathy ringthopaw khah aa cawh.
Zaa kheh letei ning hmetaw caipaw mong lang ning a chua khy taitah thlai lang cawh a vaw he.
Langpui leco, pakheh le pakheh khah, “Ahomaw thlaikha a ma hongpah a?” tatah a tah he.
Canghrasala thlai cawh ming he ka, thlaikha alung alaipaw pui cawh a hneihly thah.
Thlai chunglang cawh a nae he ka, satlepaw pakheh cawh angkilai arangpaw a hrei ka, cacang lang chang letah a ty thlangpaw khah hmuh he ka, a pahly ngetei he.
Ma satlepaw taco, “Naa thlawzawng kheh seh, khraws letei aa khaipaipaw Nazaret Zisu khah naa hui tahpaw ka hni. A tho kaw thah! Ma lehei ung khawh be. Aa i sahnahpaw heh mingtua o.
Canghrasala va sei la, a hningzuitu sahlo le Piter khah, ‘Ama tah a ca chingpaw he hrakhei naa hme lang khei Galili raang lang sei ka, ma leco naa hmuh tae a,’ a tah tatah va ching o,” tatah a tah.
Canu sahlo cawh thlawzawng hmotah le ci hmotah thlai taico rairang teitah chuhthlah he ka, a sai he. Aa ci tu rawng tah khei ahohmai bia a ching bei he.
Zaa kheh letei ning hmetaw caipaw, a thokaw ning mongdi tah Zisu cawh a chung taitei khachia sangsarih a papiapah no Mari Makdalin khakhei a paly taw.
Mari Makdalin taco Zisu khatei a za ungpaw sahlo, mangchia sá tei, a cah leimeipaw sahlo khaco va seí ka, a thuisah he.
“Zisu cawh hring thlang ka, ka hmuh,” tatah a chingpaw he khah aa thui tihtah zing bei he.
Ma khy taico Zisu cawh a hningzuitu taitah pahning khatah khuatei lang aa tlawngnah lekhei a hmuisang a macangpaw tah a paly.
Ma tlaw cawh va kawkaw he ka, a tangpaw aa vesaw sahlo khah aa ching he, canghrasala zing hlui hrah bei he.

Ahning cai letah Zisu cawh a hningzuitu hluikheh sahlo batui aa e leimeining takhei a va paly. Zingnah aa hnuilynah cawtah le a tho kaw khy taitei a hmuhpaw sahlo tei aa chingpaw he zing pawtah aa lung a khong tu cawtah khei a chinghring he.
Aa hai letah, “Khazaw pungpaluh letah sei la, tuapaw hming vytei khatah thawngchawbia heh va rei my lo.
Aho aa cang zong tah zing katei, baptisma a cangpaw maikaw cawh pachah a cang he a. Canghrasala a zing lypaw maikaw cawh sua phosah a cang he a.
Ma ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah tahei a zingpaw sahlo cawh a zui longmang he a. Kama ka ming tah khachia aa papia a, reithapaw zong tah aa rei a.
Pari zong aa kia tah tle he ka, thihnah si zong aa ding hrah hmai tah zekhatahmai a tua a bei he. A dang lypaw cung letah aa kih zong pahnia a he ka, a dang he a,” a tah he.
Taico Abuipaw Zisu cawh aaning khatah bia a rei khy taitah vaicung lang lahchy cang ka, Khazing cacang lang letah a ty.

Taico, a hningzuitu sahlo cawh sei he ka, kawkehnah letah thawngchawbia cawh aa reilai. Abuipaw tah aaning cawh hrekhui he ka, aaning a zuilaipaw he ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah takhei aa bia sahlo cawh a pacysah.
Mehchaw cai a cangpaw Theofila, mehlupui tah kaa hrawng letei hming a va tlung ciapaw kong khah cia a pachia cy he ka,
cia a pachiapaw he cawh mehkho ceingei tei a hmuh tawpaw sahlo le phung a reilaipaw sahlo he tei aa ma chingpaw hrakhei a cang.
Macawtaco kama zong tah a hrangthonah taitah zezong a raering teitah ka khiahle khy taitah a pazui naning tei hratah na cawtah ciapah heh a chah thly a tatah ka rawh.
Aa ca cawngpah pawhe vytei khah biahmuisui a cang tahpaw na hni khy nápawtah.

Herod cawh Judia raang letah siangpahrang a cangning takhei Zakaria aa tahpaw tlangbui pakheh ung ka, ama cawh tlangbui Abija phu leteipaw a cang. A nupui Elizabet zong cawh tlangbui Aron hring a cang.
Aa pahning tah Khazing hme letah a dingkong teitah khua a sahpaw cang he ka, suise a kawh ly tei Abuipaw biapeh le a phung le lang vytei khah a zuipaw a cang he.
Canghrasala Elizabet cawh cing ka, sawteisah bei he. Aa pahning co, aa kung a macang ngetei myca he.
Uikhehpaw cawh Zakaria phu khah aa raihre nápaw cai cawh va chuh ka, Zakaria cawh Khazing hmekaw leco tlangbui rai cawh hre ka,
tlangbui cangnah rai a rainah phung tei hratah basung phe he ka, ama cawh Abuipaw behnah ing chung letei ringthopaw me tei ropaw rai khah a ting.
Ringthopaw me ronah cai a va chua tihtah Khazing beh rua pawtei a pahmopaw zawpui sahlo cawh khungthing lang lekhei thlaw aa chang.
Mataico, Abuipaw vaiming cawh ama khatah a va paly ka, ringthopaw ronah siasang cacang lang lekhei a daw thlang.
Zakaria tah ama cawh a hmuh tihtah a pahly ka, a ci ngetei.
Canghrasala vaiming taco, “Zakaria ci kheh, Khazing tah na thlawchangnah khah a ca thui pah. Na nupui Elizabet tah sawcapaw a ca sah pah a. A ming cawh Johan na sá a.
Na thawchahnah le na lung a tlingnah ngetei a cang a. A pinah cawtah ming hlupui khah aa lung a lawng a.
Abuipaw mehmuh letah mehlai a cang a. Zu le ahringpaw rui khy a cangpaw zong khah ding hrahring a be. A no chung taitah Thlawpaw Pathai tah a chih ciapaw a cang a.
Israel cawngsaw mehlupui khah Abuipaw aa Khazing khatah a va chui kaw he a.

Taico, Elija a hmingtuakhynah le a thlawpaw tah Abuipaw hmelang tah a sei a. Paw sahlo lungthing cawh aa sawtei sahlo lang letah le bia a nge lypaw sahlo cawh singnah a cangpaw dingnah lang letah a hui sá he a. Cawngsaw vytei khah Abuipaw cawtah a maipacia rua pawtah a pachia a paning he a,” tatah a tah.
Zakaria tah vaiming hai letaco, “Ma cawh zehratamaw a cang khy a? Kama zong mehtaa cang myca neh ka, ka nupui zong kung macang pui a cang myca?” a tah.
Vaiming taco, “Kama Gabriel cawh, Khazing hmekaw letah a dawpaw ka cang. Ma kong thawngchawbia heh nama ching rua tah tawpaw ka cang.

Mataico nama cawh ma hming vytei heh a va tlung thlu hlai vytei na rei thlaw khy khaw bei ceh. Zecawtamaw tatah ma cai a tling tih tei, a va tlung lepaw ka reipaw bia khah na zing lynah cawtah,” a tah.
Ma chung cawh zawpui vytei tah ama cawh heh thlang he ka, zecawtamaw behnah ing chung letah ma tlua co a ry zia tatah aa khuarawh a haa thlu.

A ka piathlah tihtah aaning sahlo khah bia a ching khy khawh bei he. Behnah ing chung lekhei apalynah a hmuh tahpaw khah aa hni. Zemaw tahpaw co, a kihtua khei bia khah a ching he ka, a rei cawh thlaw khy hlui be.
Mataico a raihrenah cai cawh a chang tihtah ing lang khah a dih.
Ma khy taico a nupui Elizabet cawh sawtei pho ka, thlah pangaw chung a nawh.
Elizabet taco, “Ma heh Abuipaw tah ka cawtah a tuapaw a cang, atoning cai lehei a dukhuinah cawh palangsah ka, ming vytei hrong letei ka ningzawnah khah a pa lahpah hly myca,” tatah a tah.
Taico, a thlahruhnah leco, Khazing tah vaiming Gabriel cawh Galili raang Nazaret khua lang khah taw ka,
David teisaw a cangpaw Josef tah chui ruapaw tei a pahapaw laisaw pathai khakhei a taw. Ma laisaw pathai a ming cawh Mari a cang.
Vaiming cawh ama khaco va sei ka, “Na kih ka ca tle, nama cawh dukhuinah a sangpui a cypaw na cang. Abuipaw cawh nama khatah a ung,” a tah.
Mari cawh ma bia rawng taco a lung hna a hnawh ngetei ka, ma heh zehapaw kihtlenah maw a cang sialia, tatah a khuarawh a haa thlang.
Canghrasala vaiming taco a hai letah, “Mari, ci kheh, Khazing dukhuinah na hmuh myca.
Sawtei pho ceh ka, sawcapaw na sá a. A ming tah Zisu tatah na tah a.
Ama cawh mehlai cang a ka, Cungnungcai Khazing Sawcapaw tatah y a cang a. Abuipaw Khazing tah a pathlahtu paw David abui dyching khah a pae a.
Jakob mingphing sahlo cung letah bia a hnui paria a. A painah raang cawh changnah hnui be,” a tah.
Mari taco, “Zekhatamaw ma hming heh a cang thai a? Kama cawh laisaw pathai pui ka cang caw!” tah ka,
vaiming taco, “Thlawpaw Pathai cawh na cung letah tlung ka, Cungnungcai Khazing hmingtuakhynah tah a ca bakhu a. Macawtaco, mehpathai a va pi lepaw cawh Khazing Sawcapaw tatah y a cang a.
Na sawny no Elizabet tahmai a tá khy tah sawtei a sá a. A cing tatei aa tah teipaw khah atoheh cawh a thlahruhnah a cang myca.
Khazing khaco a cang khy lypaw zehmai ung be,” tatah a palei.
Mari taco, “Kama cawh Abuipaw a saecanu ka cang, na reipaw hratah ka cung letah tlung ky seh,” tatah a tah. Mataico, vaiming tah ama cawh a seisai.
Ma ningcai leco Mari cawh a pachia ka, Judia raang tlaang cung letei a ungpaw khua lang khah rairang tah a sei.
Zakaria ing leco a nae ka, Elizabet cawh a kih a tle.
Mari tei bia a chingpaw khah Elizabet tah a thui tihtah a chung letei a ungpaw ny cawh a pathlo ka, Elizabet cawh Thlawpaw Pathai tah a chih.
A thangpui tah y ka, “Canu vytei letah bonghnang a ting cai no cang ceh ka, na sah lepaw ny zong bonghnang a tingpaw a cang!
Canghrasala zecawtamaw ma tlua hei dukhuinah ka ting tu tlong! Ka Buipaw a no, kama khatah na vong thlangpaw heh!
Na kih tlenah o khah ka naw tah a thui cangkaw tei leh ka chi chung letei a ungpaw ny cawh a lawng ka, a pathlo.
Abuipaw tah ama khatei bia a reipaw, a va tlung ceingei a, tatei a zing no cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh,” tatah a tah.
Taico Mari taco, “Ka hringnah tahei Abuipaw cawh reithai ka,
ka thlawpaw cawh Khazing, a pa Pachahtu cung letah a lawng.
A saecanu a ny pahnai zia cawh monghly be ca ka, atoning ri taihei co, chai a va chuh lepaw letei cawngsaw vytei tah bonghnang a ting no aa pa tah a.
Meh thawtlungpaw taco, ka cawtah hming rungnawpaw a tua myca, a ming cawh a pathai.
Chaikheh hning chaikheh Ama a cizawpaw sahlo he cung letah a ningdonah a palang.
A kiá tah hming rungnawpaw sahlo cawh tua ka, aa lungchung tei a palai a patuinah a hnuipaw sahlo khah a papaipatlaw thlu he.
Uhtu bui sahlo khah aa buidyching taitah dawh thlah he ka, canghrasala nytawpaw sahlo cawh a cuicaling he.
A ngaidipaw sahlo cawh hming chawpaw tah aa rivawsah he ka, canghrasala mehrung sahlo cawh aa kih longpaw tah a kawsah he.
A sae Israel cawh bawkhang ka, Abraham le a pathlah sahlo
letei a zaangsawnah cawh chaizaw tah a thui paria thlang ka, kaa mapaw sahlo letei a reipaw zong tai khah,” a tah.
Mari cawh Elizabet khaco thlah thung hrawng a ung khy taitah ing lang a tlung kaw.
Elizabet cawh ny a hnuinah ning le thlaw cawh va tling ka, sawcapaw a sah.
A ingpaw le a sawny sahlo tah Abuipaw tah a cung letah a zaangsawnah alaipui tah a langsah tahpaw aa thui tihtah a lawng khui ngetei he.
Ningreh ning taco nysai cawh a cingpatai rua pawtah va sei he ka, a ming cawh a paw ming Zakaria sah kaw pawtah aa tah.
Canghrasala a no tei a tahpaw cawh, “Cang be, Johan tatah ypaw a cang,” a tah.
Aaning sahlo taco, “Naa sawny hrong letah ma hapaw ming a phopaw cawh aa ung tlung be,” aa tah.
Taico a paw cawh kihtua tah nypaw ming heh aho tah paseh la maw na du tatah aa hae.
Ama taco, “Ca cianah calung pa pei law,” tatah a kih tuapah he ka, “A ming cawh Johan a cang,” tatah cia ka, cawngsaw vytei cawh aa khuarawh a haa thlang.
Ma khy cangkaw leco, a lui cawh a catlai ka, a hmo a ka caw ka, bia ka reichua ka, Khazing khah a reithai.
Ingpaw sahlo vytei cawh ningang tah ung he ka, tlaang raang a cangpaw Judia raang cawngsaw vytei taco, ma kong longtei khah aa rei.
Ma aa thuipaw maikaw cawh aa khuarawh haa ka, “Ma nypaw heh zemaw a ka lo tae tu a?” tatah aa tah tlungmang. Abuipaw hmingtuakhynah kih cawh a cung letah a ungnah cawtah a cang.
A paw Zakaria cawh Thlawpaw Pathai tah chih ka, bia phy ka,
“Abuipaw, Israel Khazing cawh reithai tah ung ky seh. Zemaw tah pawco, Ama cawh a vong ka, a cawngsaw sahlo cawh a tlang myca he.
A sae David pathlah taikhei pachahnah ki cawh kaa cawtah a patung myca.
Abuipaw tah khuahlai ning taitei Khazing khuavang mehpathai sahlo hmang tei bia a ma taipaw cawh,
kaa carae sahlo le a ma huapaw sahlo taitah pachah rua pawtah a cang.
Khazing tah kaa mapaw sahlo cung letah zawnge a neh ka, ka biahrai pathaipaw cawh ka cingkai a, a tah.
Kaa mapaw Abraham khatah ma biatainah a tuapaw cawh
kaaning khah kaa carae kih chung taitah pachah chua pawtah le ciphang lytah le pathainah le ding ná tah,
kaa hring chung vytei a hmekung letah a rai kaa hre khy nápaw cawtah a cang.
Ka sawtei, nama cawh Cungnungcai Khazing khuavang tatah y na cang a; zecawtamaw tatah Abuipaw langpui parai pawtah a hme letah na sei lai a.
A cawngsaw sahlo khah naa suanah ngethai a cangnah thongtah pachahnah naa hmuh a, tatah na ching he a.
Zecawtamaw tatah kaa Khazing cawh ningdo a thaipaw le a ningnaipaw a cang, pachahnah khainah cawh avai taitah kaa cung letah khaisah ka,
thihnah ningpahli le muinah chung letah a ungpaw sahlo cung letah khai sá pawtah le kaaning khah denah langpui lang chuithlah rua pawtah a cang,” tatah a tah.
Taico nysai cawh ka changchy ka, thlawpaw lang letah thawzaang ka hnui longmang ka, Israel mingphing sahlo letei a va phyhlang hlai vytei cawh raangcaa lekhei khua a sah.
Ma ningcai leco Sizar Augusta tah Rom painah raang chung letei a ungpaw vytei mehlu rei rua pawtah bia a chua.
Ma hming heh Kuirinia cawh Siria raang letah raang uhbui a hrening letei mehlu reinah a ung taw caipaw a cang.
Cawngsaw vytei cawh aaning aa thokehnah khua cacy lang khah ming cia rua pawtah a sei he.
Josef zong Galili raang Nazaret khua taitah Judia raang David khua Bethlehem lang cawh sei rua pawtah a tho. Ama cawh David hring le a pathlah taitei a chuhpaw a cangnah cawtah.
Chui ruapaw tei a pahapaw Mari, ny a chai daimangpaw khaco ming cia rua pawtah a sei.
Ma letei aa ungning taco ny a hnui nápaw ning le thlaw cawh va tling ka,
taico sa-uthui cawh sah ka, sawcapaw a cang. Pai tah pahlong he ka, sahring lawhkong letah aa isah, zecawtamaw tatah khuabuh letah aa tlung nápaw hminghmaw ung khawh be.
Taico ma kaekang phong leco tuukingtu sahlo ung he ka, zai tah aa tuu sahlo cawh aa mingkai he.
Abuipaw a vaiming cawh a za paly ka, Abuipaw rungnawnah taco aa kaekang vytei cawh khaisah thlu ka, tuuking sahlo cawh aa ci ngetei.
Canghrasala Abuipaw a vaiming taco, “Ci khe o, cawngsaw vytei caw pawtah thawngchawbia a lawng a chuipaw ka va ca tlungkhui pah he hi.
Atoning heh naa cawtah David khua letah Pachahtu a pi, Ama cawh Khri le Abuipaw a cang.
Ma heh naa cawtah paching pakhanah a cang a. Nysai pai tei pahlongpaw, sahring lawhkong letei aa isah thlangpaw cawh naa hmuh a,” a tah he.
Ma cangkawleh cawh sung sungkheh tah vaiming rungpui cawh Khazing reithai hmo khei vaiming khaco a za paly he ka,
“Cungnungcai Khazing cawh reithai tah ung ky seh, a dukhuinah aa cung letah a ungpaw aluicung cawngsaw sahlo khaco denah ung paria thlang seh,” aa tah.

Vaiming sahlo vaicung lang aa sei kaw taico, tuuking sahlo taco, “Atoheh a tho he peh seh la, Bethlehem khua lang cawh sei he peh. Abuipaw tei a ma chingpaw hming a va tlungpaw cawh ming rua pawtah sei he peh,” aa tah he.
Taico rairang tah sei he ka, Mari le Josef le sahring lawhkong letei aa isah thlangpaw nysai khah aa va hmuh.
Aa va hmuh khy taico, ma nysai konglang vytei, vaiming tei a chingpaw he hratah aa va hmuhpaw kong khah aa reilai longmang.
A thuipaw vytei sahlo taco, tuukingtu sahlo tei bia aa reipaw khah aa khuarawh a haa ngetei thlu.
Canghrasala Mari duitei taco ma hming vytei cawh a lungthing tah pacang ka, a cingkai.
Aa thuipaw hming vytei le aa hmuhpaw maikaw cawh aa chingpaw he hratah a cangnah cawtah tuukingtu sahlo tah Khazing cawh rungnawnah le reithainah hlai he ka aa ungnah lang a kaw kaw he.
Ningreh a va tling ning leco, a cingpa cawh tai he ka, a ming tah Zisu aa sah. Ma ming cawh sawtei a pho hlai tah vaiming tei a peh si ciapaw ming khah a cang.
Moses phungbia hratah a pathaisahnah cai cawh a tling tihtah Josef le Mari taco Abuipaw letah hlai rua pawtah Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang aa seikhui.
Abuipaw phungbia letah, “Capaw sa-uthui maikaw cawh Abuipaw cawtah patliapaw a cang he,” tatah ciapaw hratah.
Taico Abuipaw phungbia tei a reipaw zui nápaw athuihlainah caw pawtah thury bokheh a cang ly leh lelai a nypaw tei punghning tah aa hlai pawtah aa va seipaw a cang hrah.

Ma ningcai leco Jerusalem letah cawngsaw pakheh Simeon aa tahpaw, mehding le mehse ngeteipaw a ung. Israel mingphing cung letei thlaw palungtu a va tlung lepaw cawh heh thlang ka, Thlawpaw Pathai cawh a cung letah a ung.
Thlawpaw Pathai tah Abuipaw Khri a hmuh hlai vytei cawh thi balang bei ceh tatah a thuisah ciapaw a cang.
Thlawpaw chuithlah ná tah behnah ingdung chunglang cawh a nae ka. Moses phungbia naning tei hratah a cung letah tua ruapaw cawtah nysai Zisu cawh a no le a paw tah aa va chuakhui.
Simeon taco nysai cawh pawng ka, Khazing cawh ma hrahei a reithai,
“Vy, Cungnungcai Abuipaw nama tei bia na pa pataipaw hrakhei atoheh na sae cawh thlawlung teitah na pa thihsah myca a.
Ka mehkho tah na pachahnah cawh a hmuh myca,
ming vytei mehmuh letei na pachia ciapaw khah le,
Gental cawngsaw sahlo cawtah khainah cawh palangsah pawtah le na cawngsaw Israel cawngsaw sahlo rungnawnah ruapaw cawtah,” a tah.
A no le a paw cawh nysai konglang a reipaw bia cawh aa khuarawh a haa ngetei.

Taico Simeon taco aaning cawh bonghnang song he ka, a no Mari khah ma hrahei a tah, “Ma nysai heh Israel cawngsaw mehlupui a posahly rua pawtah le mehlupui a padawchy tu cawtah rawhpaw a cang. Ama cawh Khazing taitah a va chuhpaw paching pakhanah cawngsaw hlupui tei aa cakhae lepaw cawh a cang a.
Ma taikhei cawngsaw hlupui aa khuarawnah khah palang a cang tae a. Taico nama na thinglung zong zyzi tah a ca thipahleh tae a,” a tah.
Khazing khuavangno pakheh, Asher phing leteipaw, Fanuel a sawcanu Ana ung hrah ka, ama cawh a taa ngetei myca. Ama cawh dongcang ka, a pasae khatah kung sarih ung hrui he ka,
ma khy taico kung songreh le kung pali tai lahmeno a cang. Behnah ing seisai bang lytah ching le zai batui cahe hmotah thlawchang katei Khazing a beh teipaw a cang.
Ma ningcing taco aaning lang a vong ka, Khazing khatah alawngnah bia a hlai. Jerusalem pachahnah a heh paw sahlo maikaw hai leco ma nysai kong heh a ching he.
Josef le Mari tah Abuipaw phungbia tei a hia a tahpaw maikaw aa tua panging thlu khy taikhei Galili raang aa ungnah khua Nazaret lang cawh aa paleh kaw.
Taico nysai cawh ka lai vy longmang, a thaw ka tlung vy longmang ka, singná tah chih ka, Khazing dukhuinah cawh a cung letah a ung.
Kung tating tah Zisu a no le a paw cawh Khungsai Panawnah hmang rua pawtah Jerusalem lang a sei tei he.
Zisu cawh kung hrawhluihning va tling ka, a phunglang tei hratah Panawnah lang cawh aa sei.
Panawnah a chang khy taico a no le a paw cawh ing lang aa va kaw kaw ning tah nyhehpaw Zisu cawh Jerusalem lekhei ung patle ka, canghrasala aaning taco hnih bei he.
Aa hrong letah a ung thlang rua tah he ka, ning kheh chung a sei he. Mataico a vesaw sahlo le a sawny hrong letah aa huilai.
Ama cawh aa hmuh khawh ly tih taco, Jerusalem khuapui lang khah hui rua pawtah aa paleh kaw he.
Ningthung a tling khy tah behnah ingdung chung lekhei, aa va hmuh kaw. Cawngpahtu macang sahlo khakhei a za ty thlang ka, aa bia khah nge he, hae hri he, a za tah leimei.
A chaipaw he bia le a hnithai zia, aa thuipaw maikaw cawh aa ning a ang ngetei.

A no le a paw tah Ama cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa khuarawh a haa thlang. A no taco, “Ka sawcapaw, zecawtamaw ma hrahei na ma tua? Na paw khatah thlawzawng hmotah pui kaa ca huilai leimei kata caw!” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco, “Zecawtamaw naa pa hui? Ka Paw ing letah ka ung ruapaw a cang tahpaw heh hnih bei he ceh maw?” a tah he.
Canghrasala, aa hai letei bia a reipaw cawh a silang hnih bei he.
Mataico, aaning khatah Nazaret khua lang cawh sei ka, aa reingé tah a ung. Canghrasala a no taco ma hming vytei heh a lungchung letah a pacung thlang.
Taico Zisu cawh kachang vy lai, ka sing vy lai longmang ka, Khazing le cawngsaw dukhuinah a tong.

Tiberias Sizar abuinah kung hrawhluipangaw a tling kung, Pontia Pilat cawh Judia raang uhtu a cangning takhei Herod cawh Galili raang uhbui cang ka, a unypaw Filip cawh Ituria le Trakoniti raang uhbui cang ka, Lusinia cawh Abilen raang uhbui cang ka,
Anas le Kaiafa tlangbui alaicaipaw aa cangning takhei, raangcaa letei a ungpaw Zakaria a sawcapaw Johan cung lekhei Khazing bia cawh a va tlung.
Jordan tuivaw kaekang raang vytei lang cawh seilai ka, sua ngethainah cawtah angepachihnah baptisma kong phung a rei lai.
Khazing khuavang Isaiah cabu letei, “Raangcaa letei a y leimeipaw o taco, ‘Abuipaw a cawtah langpui parai la, a cawtah langpui pading pah my lo.
Saiho maikaw cawh nai la, tlaang le tlangby maikaw cawh panai my lo. Lang a kuikalehpaw cawh pading la, a bykhi a bylypaw cawh pamai my lo.
Taico, cawngsaw maikaw tah Khazing a pachahnah cawh aa hmuh a,’ tatah a tah,” tatah ciapaw hrakhei.

Johan tah ama khatah baptisma cang ruapaw tei a va chuhpaw zawpui sahlo he cawh, “Naaning pari cangmai pathlah sahlo, Khazing thingaenah a va chuh leimeipaw heh saisai rua pawtah aho tamaw a ca ching he?

Na ngepachihnah he ceh cawh a thuipa tah palang my lo. ‘Abraham pathlah sahlo kaa cang peh,’ tatah tah leimei khe o. Ka ca ching he hi, Khazing taco ma alung sahlo heh Abraham sawtei sahlo tah a tua khy thlang he hi.
Thinghrang maikaw letah ahrui aa chia thlu thah. Thui chaw a thui lypaw thingkung maikaw cawh hyhly tah me lang bo a cang he a,” a tah he.
Zawpuipaw tah, “A cang caco zemaw kaa tua a?” tatah aa hae.
Johan taco, “Angki zing hning a hnuipaw tah a hnui lypaw khah chaichy seh la, e ruapaw a hnuipaw tah a hnui lypaw cawh pei hrah seh,” tatah a chai he.
Ngungkhui a kheipaw sahlo zong cawh baptisma cang hrá pawtah a vong he ka, “Cawngpahtu, zemaw kaa tua a?” tatah aa hae.
“Khei ruapaw navy tah a hlu vy tah va khei lai khe o,” a tah he.

Mataico raekeh thaikhehpaw sahlo tah, “Kaaning saw zemaw kaa tua a?” tatah aa hae. “Male tangka chu lai khe la, ahmang lypaw tah cawngsaw luithae lai khe o, naa hlo letah naa lungtling thlang seh,” tatah a tah he.
Zawpui taco a ngete ly ngetei tah heh thlang he ka, aa dawngkasawny co, Johan heh Khri a cang thlang thly a, tatah aa rawh.

Johan tah aa dawngkasawny hai leco, “Kama taco tui tah baptisma ka ca cangsah he. Canghrasala kama navy tah a rungnaw vypaw a va chuh a. Kama cawh a phepakong rui a thlang tlangpaw hmai cang bei neh. Ama taco Thlawpaw Pathai le me tah baptisma a ca cangsá he a.
Saze zeinah cawh a kiá tah tle ka, phuhri letah saze cawh a zei a, achang khah apaang letah rai a ka, asi khah a thi thai lypaw me lang a bo a,” tatah a tah he.
Taico Johan tah zawpui vytei cawh a phingphing tah pasynah bia ching he ka, aaning cawh thawngchawbia a cawngpah he.
Canghrasala, Johan tah abui Herod cawh a nytei nupui Herodi a chunah kong letah le ahringpaw chahlynah hming a tuapaw vytei kong letah a mochia tihtah,
Herod tah ma vytei cung letah a chahchipaw cawh Johan khah thong-ing chung letah a hrai.
Ming vytei baptisma aa cang tlungmang ning takhei, Zisu zong cawh baptisma a cang hrah. Taico thlaw a chang leimei ning taco avai cawh a hong.
Thlawpaw Pathai cawh thury hratah a cung letah a za cung. Taico avai taitah o za ring ka, “Nama cawh ka dopaw Ka Sawcapaw na cang, na cung letah ka lung a lawng ngetei,” tatah a tah.
Zisu cawh phungrei a patho ning tahei kung songthung hrawng a tah. Ama cawh Josef sawtei aa tah. Josef cawh Heli a sawtei,
Heli cawh Mathat a sawtei, Mathat cawh Levi a sawtei, Levi cawh Melkhi a sawtei, Melkhi cawh Janai a sawtei, Janai cawh Josef a sawtei,
Josef cawh Matathia a sawtei, Mathathia cawh Amos a sawtei, Amos cawh Nahum a sawtei, Nahum cawh Esli a sawtei, Esli cawh Nakai a sawtei,
Nakai cawh Matha a sawtei, Matha cawh Matathia a sawtei, Matathia cawh Semein a sawtei, Semein cawh Josek a sawtei, Josek cawh Joda a sawtei,
Joda cawh Joanan a sawtei, Joanan cawh Rhesa a sawtei, Rhesa cawh Zerubabel a sawtei, Zerubabel cawh Shealtia a sawtei, Shealtia cawh Neri a sawtei,
Neri cawh Melkhi a sawtei, Melkhi cawh Adi a sawtei, Adi cawh Kosam a sawtei, Kosam cawh Elmadam a sawtei, Elmadam cawh Er a sawtei,
Er cawh Josua a sawtei, Josua cawh Eliezer a sawtei, Eliezer cawh Jorim a sawtei, Jorim cawh Mathat a sawtei, Mathat cawh Levi a sawtei,
Levi cawh Simeon a sawtei, Simeon cawh Judah a sawtei, Judah cawh Josef a sawtei, Josef cawh Jonam a sawtei, Jonam cawh Eliakim a sawtei,
Eliakim cawh Melea a sawtei, Melea cawh Mena a sawtei, Mena cawh Matatha a sawtei, Matatha cawh Nathan a sawtei, Nathan cawh David a sawtei,
David cawh Jesi a sawtei, Jesi cawh Obed a sawtei, Obed cawh Boaz a sawtei, Boaz cawh Salmon a sawtei, Salmon cawh Nashon a sawtei,
Nashon cawh Aminada a sawtei, Aminada cawh Ram a sawtei, Ram cawh Hezron a sawtei, Hezron cawh Perez a sawtei, Perez cawh Judah a sawtei,
Judah cawh Jakob a sawtei, Jakob cawh Isak a sawtei, Isak cawh Abraham a sawtei, Abraham cawh Tera a sawtei, Tera cawh Nahor a sawtei,
Nahor cawh Seruk a sawtei, Seruk cawh Reu a sawtei, Reu cawh Pelek a sawtei, Pelek cawh Eba a sawtei, Eba cawh Shelah a sawtei,
Shelah cawh Kainan a sawtei, Kainan cawh Arpaksa a sawtei, Arpaksa cawh Shem a sawtei, Shem cawh Noah a sawtei, Noah cawh Lamek a sawtei,
Lamek cawh Methusela a sawtei, Methusela cawh Enok a sawtei, Enok cawh Jared a sawtei, Jared cawh Mahalale a sawtei, Mahalale cawh Kenan a sawtei,
Kenan cawh Eno a sawtei, Eno cawh Seth a sawtei, Seth cawh Adam a sawtei, Adam cawh Khazing a sawtei a cang.
Zisu cawh Thlawpaw Pathai tah chih ka, Jordan tuivaw taitah va kaw kaw ka, Thlawpaw taco raangcaa lang a seikhui.
Ma leco Setan tah ning songli chung tuhso ka, ma chung vytei cawh zehmai a e lynah cawtah a hning taco a ngai a di.
Setan taco, “Khazing Sawcapaw na cang caco, ma alung heh very tah cang law tah ca!” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco, “Khazing bia letah ma hrahei ciapaw a cang, ‘Cawngsaw heh very suipaw tah aa hring tlung be!’ ” tatah a chai.
Setan taco Zisu cawh tlaang sangpaw lang kekhui ka, khazaw painah raang vytei khah sungkheh tah hmuhsah ka,
taico a hai letah, “Ma vytei nawhnuinah le a rungnawnah heh ka ca pae a, zecawtamaw tatah ma heh kama letah pehpaw cang thah he ka, ka dupaw maikaw cawh ka peh khy he.
Macawtaco, na pa beh caco, ma vytei heh na tei a cang a,” a tah.
Zisu taco, “Capathai letah ma hrahei cia a cang, ‘Abuipaw na Khazing khah beh la, Ama a rai suipaw hre my lo,’ tah a cang,” tatah a palei.
Setan tah Zisu cawh Jerusalem khuapui lang seikhui ka, behnah ing a sangcainah ing cung lekhei a dawsah ka, “Khazing Sawcapaw na cang caco, ma taihei a zythlah tua.
Zecawtamaw tatah ma hrahei cia a cang, ‘Nama na kong lehei Khazing tah a vaiming sahlo khah naw pei a he ka,
na phe cawh alung letah na khong ly nápawtah aa kiá tah aa ca caling a,’ a tah,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah, “Abuipaw na Khazing cawh hnehsah kheh, tahpaw a cang,” tatah a chai.
Setan tah Zisu cawh ma vytei hrahei a tuhso khy taitah hmelang cai a raicangpaw cawtah a seisai.
Thlawpaw Pathai thawtlungnah khatah Zisu cawh Galili raang lang a paleh kaw ka, a konglang cawh khuapui kaekang vytei letah a thang.
Aa synagog sahlo letah cawngpah he ka, ming vytei tah Ama cawh aa reithai.
A changchynah khua Nazaret khua lang cawh sei ka, Sabat ning taco a tua teipaw phung hratah synagog lang kha a nae. Taico capathai rei pawtah a daw.
Khazing khuavang Isaiah bia, sapho lingpaw cabu cawh a kih letah aa hlai. Ma cabu cawh pathlang ka, ma hratei ciapaw khah a hmuh,

“Abuipaw Thlawpaw cawh ka cung letah a ung, zecawtamaw tatah mehsisah sahlo hai letah thawngchawbia rei rua pawtah kama cawh sathy thu tah a pa thing. Thong letei a tangpaw sahlo he piachuanah ruapaw tlang y pawtah pa taw ka, a mehcopaw sahlo mehvang sápaw le tlaihnawh a cangpaw sahlo thochua rua pawtah le,
Abuipaw dukhuipaw kung kong y khui rua pawtah,” tahpaw heh.
Mataico sapho lingpaw cabu cawh ling kaw ka, a kaitu khah pei ka, a ty. Synagog chung letei ming vytei taco a cung letah aa meh aa chia thlu thlang.
Aa hai leco, “Atoning letah ma Capathai heh naa thuipaw tei hrahei a tling myca,” a tah he.
Ming maikaw tah a kong chaw rei he ka, a kaw taitei ningdonah bia a chuhpaw cung leco aa ningang ngetei thlu ka, “Ma heh Josef a sawcapaw khah cang bei maw?” aa tah.

Zisu tah aa hai leco, “Ma phungthluh bia heh naa pa reiso hrahring tae hi, ‘Sibuipaw, nama le nama a dangsah tua, Kapernaum khua letei na tuapaw kaa thuipaw khah ma na changchynah khua lehei tua hrah!’ tahpaw heh.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Khazing khuavang cawh ama a pinah khua leco cyhlang bei he.
Khazing khuavang Elija chai lekhei, Israel raang chung letah lahme hlupui a ung he. Kung thung le a chy khua kaang ka, raang pungpaluh letah cakaang a thaw tah a tlung.
Canghrasala Elija cawh Israel raang lahme maikaw khatah taw cang hlui be. Sidon raang, Zarefat khua letei a ungpaw lahme khatah suipaw taw a cang.

Mataico, Khazing khuavang Elisha chaining zong takhei, Israel raang chung letah mehthinghmui hlupui a ung he. Canghrasala Siria cawngsaw Naaman tah cy ly co ahohmai a dangsah tlung bei he,” tatah a tah he.
Synagog letei a ungpaw ming vytei tah aa thui tihtah aa thing aa ae ngetei.
Tho he ka, Ama cawh khua lailang papia he ka, aa khuathui tlaang, lungkang lang nang thlah pawtah aa seikhui.
Canghrasala zawpui hrong taikhei a zuh thlah ka, a seihly.
Ma khy taico Galili raang, Kapernaum khua lang cawh cungthlah ka, Sabat ning tah zawpui khah a cawngpah he.
A bia cawh nawhnuinah chi tah a cangnah cawtah a cawngpahnah cawh aa khuarawh a haa thlang.
Synagog leco, thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw cawngsaw pakheh ung ka, a thangpui tah y ka,
“Vy, Nazaret Zisu, kaaning khahei zemaw na du? Kaaning hlyde ruapaw tamaw na vong? Nama cawh ahomaw na cang tahpaw ka hni, Khazing Mehpathai na cang,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah, “De teitah ung! A chung taikhei ka pia,” tatah a hrangso. Ma khy taico thlawpaw pialuipaw tah ma cawngsawpaw cawh ming vytei mehmuh leco phongchai ka, hmaw phosah lytah a piathlah.

Cawngsaw vytei cawh aa ningang thlang ka, pakheh le pakheh khah, “Zehapaw cawngpahnah maw a cang he? Naw hnuinah le hmingtuakhynah khatah thlawpaw pialuipaw zong naw pei he katei, aa pia thlangpaw heh!” tatah aa tah he.
Taico Zisu kong thongpang cawh ma raang kaekang vytei cawh a thang thlu.
Zisu cawh synagog taitah piathlah ka, Simon ing lang a nae. Simon a nupuino a no cawh asaw tah a sahpui tah nang ka, Zisu cawh bawnah aa haepah.
Zisu tah a bung hno ka, a sawnah khah raw ka, a sawnah taco a thlaw. Sungkheh tah ka tho ka, aaning sahlo cawh a tangtui he.
Ning a va tlah lang leco asawnah phingphing a hnuipaw vytei khah Zisu khatah va chua khui he ka, aa cung letah a kih pahnia cy ka, aaning sahlo cawh a dangsah he.

Ma hlui co, mehlupui chung taitah khachia sahlo khah pia he ka, “Nama cawh Khazing Sawcapaw na cang,” tatah a y he. Canghrasala aaning cawh Zisu tah raw he ka, Khri a cang tahpaw aa hni cawtah khei aa rei thlawpaw khah sai bei he.
Mong khua va dui ka, Zisu cawh a kingdangnah lang khah sei ka, zawpui tah Ama khah aa hui. Taico a ungnah aa va phah tihtah aaning khah seisai khawh ly rua pawtah tle a pachia he.
Canghrasala Zisu tah, “Khua hring lang zong letah Khazing painah raang thawngchawbia ka rei hrah ruapaw a cang, ma ruapaw taco tawpaw cang tlung neh ka,” a tah he.
Taico Judia raang synagog sahlo letah a cawngpah lai longmang he.
Ningkhehpaw cawh Zisu cawh Genesaret tuiping ngaekang leco a daw thlang. Cawngsaw zawpui taco a pungso thlang he ka, Khazing bia cawh aa nge.
Ngaw a tlepaw sahlo tei aa so aa suh kaa letei aa seisaipaw tuilawng sanghning khah ngaekang letah a hmuh.
Simon a tei a cangpaw tuilawng chunglang cawh a nae ka, “Ngaekang taitah tui le chung vy lang hrui vy bang law,” tatah Simon cawh a tah. Taico a ty ka, zawpui cawh tuilawng taico a cawngpah he.
Bia a reipaw a pachang taico Simon hai letah, “Tui a thunah vypaw lang pange la, ma leco na so khah va tua,” tatah a tah.
Simon taco, “Hruitupaw, zaikhuadui reithui ngetei tah va he peh ka, sangkheh hmai tle bei peh. Canghrasala, nama na bia tei hratah ka va thlang tua a,” tatah a palei.
Ma hraco tua he ka, ngaw a hlupui a o cawtah aa so sahlo zong a kychy pai thlu.

Mataico, tuilawng ahringpaw letei a ungpaw sahlo khah va ma baw law tatah aa kiá tah aa kui he. Mataico a vong he ka, tuilawng sanghning tah ngaw cawh dui he ka, a chi tu cawtah tuilawng cawh tui lang a phungpai daimang he.
Simon Piter tah ma hming vytei cawh a hmuh tihtah Zisu phehrang letah a bawh ka, a hai leco, “Mehsua ka cang, Abuipaw, pa seisai thlang law,” a tah.
Ama le a vesaw sahlo cawh ngaw hlupui aa tlenah cawtah khei aa khuarawh haa ngetei ka,
Simon a vesaw sahlo a cangpaw Zebedi sawcapaw leh Jeims le Johan cawh aa khuarawh aa haa ngetei hrah. Mataico Zisu tah Simon hai letah, “Ci kheh, atohei co cawngsaw na tle myca he a,” tatah a tah.
Macawtaco tuilawng sahlo khah ngaekang lang piakhui he ka, zezongpui seisai tah Zisu cawh aa zui.

Zisu cawh khuapui hrawng letei khua kheh letah a ungning taco, thinghmuihri tei a pahlong thlangpaw cawngsawpaw pakheh Ama khatah a vong ka, Zisu a hmuh cangkawleh alui letah a khuh panai ka, ma hrahei naw ka, “Abuipaw na du caco na pa dangsah khy,” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco a kiá tah va pazah ka, ama cawh va tong ka, “Na dang cawh du neh ka, dang myca,” tatah a tah. Ma cangkaw leco, a thinghmuihri vytei cawh a pathai.

Taico, Zisu tah ma hrahei bia patai ka, “Ahohmai ching khe lo, ma duitei cawh va sei la, tlangbui a va ming sah la, Moses phungbia hrakhei thuihlainah va tua, mapaw suico dangsah na cangpaw khah ming maikaw tah aa ca hni a,” a tah.
Canghmaisala, Zisu a konglang cawh a thang vy lo leimei ka, mehlupui tah a bia nge pawtah le aa sawnah pawhe dangsah rua pawtah Ama cawh aa va pange.
Canghrasala Zisu cawh a kingdangnah lang sei tah thlawchang pawtah a piathlah tei.

Ningkheh cawh Zisu tah a cawngpah leimeining he tah Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo, Galili raang khua ting taitah le Judia raang khua ting taitah le Jerusalem khuapui taitei a va chuhpaw sahlo cawh a ty thlang hrah he ka, a sahpaw sahlo he dangsah rua pawtah Abuipaw thawtlungnah cawh a cung letah a ung.
Mehthaikheh tah a songbepaw pakheh a iphaw khatah a ka song lai he ka, ing chunglang a nae khui tah Zisu kung tlungkhui pawtah a pachia he.

Cawngsaw aa hlutunah cawtah a kung phahkhuinah lang hmuh be ca he ka, ingcung lang aa kekhui. Ing aa daepaw lungphae khah hneihly he ka, cawngsawpaw cawh iphaw chitah zawpui hrawng lekhei Zisu hme lalei leco aa za thlah.
Zisu tah aa zingnah khah a hmuh tihtah a songbepaw hai leco, “Ka dua, na suanah vytei cawh ngethai a cang,” tatah a tah.
Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco, “Ma cawngsaw heh ahomaw a cang? Khazing reipachianah bia a rei hi! Khazing tah ly co ahomaw suanah a ngethai khy?” tatah aa lungchung tah aa pacang.
Zisu tah aa lungchung rawhnah cawh hnih ka, “Zecawtamaw ma hrahei naa lungchung tah naa pacang?
‘Na suanah sahlo cawh ngethai a cang,’ tahpaw maw a neh vy maw? ‘Tho la, sei,’ tahpaw maw a neh vy?
Canghrasala, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh aluicung lehei sua ngethai khynah naw a hnui taheh ka ca hmuh sá he a,” tah ka, a songbepaw hai letaco, “Tho la, na iphaw a lah la, ing lang a dih,” tatah a tah.
Sung sungkheh tah aa hmekaw leco a daw ka, a iphaw cawh law ka, Khazing reithai hmotah ing lang cawh a dih.
Ming maikaw cawh aa ningang ngetei ka, Khazing khah reithai he ka, “Atoning heh hming khuarawha chuipaw kaa hmuh hi,” aa tah tlungmang.
Ma khy taico Zisu cawh piathlah ka, ngungkhui a kheipaw Levi aa tahpaw cawh ngungkhui kheinah hming letah a tythlangpaw khah hmuh ka, “Va pa zui,” tatah a tah.
Taico Levi cawh tho ka, zezongpui seisai tah Zisu cawh a zui.
Mataico Levi tah Zisu cawtah a ing letah lawhdangnah rungnaw ngeteipaw a tuapah. Ngungkhui a kheipaw mehlupui le ahringpaw mehlupui khah aaning khatah batui aa e hrah.

Canghrasala Farasi le aa phu a cangpaw phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco, Zisu hningzuitu sahlo hai leco, “Zecawtamaw ngungkhui a kheitu sahlo le ahringpaw mehsua sahlo khatah naa e naa ding lai?” tatah aa mochia he.
Zisu tah aa hai leco, “A dang thlangpaw tah sibui aa hia tlung be, a dang lypaw tah pui aa hia!
Mehding y rua pawtah ka vong tlung be, mehsua sahlo khah aa suanah a ngepachihsah rua pawtah ka vong hri hi,” tatah a chai he.

Aaning sahlo taco Zisu hai letah, “Baptisma peitu Johan a hningzuitu sahlo cawh batui cahe tah thlawchang tei he ka, Farasi phunglang aa zuipaw sahlo zong tah ma hraco aa tua tei hrah. Canghrasala nama na hningzuitu sahlo heh e le ding tah aa ung thlang,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Songpaw sahlo cawh nupui a chuipaw satlepaw khatah aa ung chung taco batui a cahe tei he maw?
Canghrasala nupui a chuipaw khah aa hrong taitei aa seikhuinah cai khah a phah tae a. Ma taico aa cahe tae thlang a,” tatah a palei he.

Ma tawchingnah bia zong heh Zisu taco a ching he, “Ahotahmai paithang a thapaw khah hriachy tah chaichi a paringpaw khah a beithlah bang bei he. Ma hratei aa tua caco a thapaw khah a rawhrang a ka, a paringpaw letei a thapaw aa baipaw zong khah a tlah hrá be.

Mataico ahotahmai misurhang a hringtui khah sapho tuithei a paringpaw letah rai bang bei he. Aa rai caco, misurhang a hring taco sapho tuithei cawh tingchy a ka, taico misurhang khah zuh thlu a ka, sapho tuithei zong a rawh thlu a.
Ma navy co, misurhang a hringtui cawh sapho tuithei a thapaw letah rai hripaw a cang.
Cawngsaw maikaw tah misurhang ahlungpaw aa ding khy taitah a thapaw ding du khawh bei he. ‘A hlungpaw a chah vy,’ aa tah,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu tah Sabat ningkhehpaw cawh saze lui cahrong ka, a hningzuitu sahlo taco saangsu cawh pahrih he ka, aa kih letah rua he ka, aa e lai.
Farasi cawngsaw thaikheh tah Zisu cawh, “Sabat ning letah tua phung a cang lypaw zecawtamaw naa tua?” tatah aa tah he.
Zisu taco, “David tei a vesaw sahlo khatah aa ngaidi ning tei a tuapaw khah rei bang bei he ceh maw?
Khazing behnah ing lang a nae ka, tlangbui sahlo tah ly co ahotahmai e phung a cang lypaw, Khazing aa dangnah very khah a e! Taico a chy khah a vesaw sahlo zong a peh hrah he kho!” tatah a palei he.
Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Sabat Buipaw a cang,” a tah he.
Sabat ning vypaw leco Zisu cawh synagog lang a nae ka, a cawngpah he. Ma leco cawngsawpaw pakheh a cacang lang kih a songpaw a ung.
Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco Zisu cawh sua aa pu khy nápawtah a bo he ka, Sabat ning tah ma cawngsawpaw cawh a dangsah maw dangsah ly takhah aa ngia thlang.
Canghrasala, Zisu tah aa lungchung tei aa pacangpaw khah hnih thlang ka, a kih a songpaw hai leco, “Ming vytei hme lehei tho la, a daw,” tatah a tah. Taico tho ka, a daw.
Ma khy taico Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Sabat ning tahei chahnah tua maw a phung a cang, chahlynah maw? Hringnah pachah heh maw a phung a cang, thaw heh maw?” tatah a hae he.
A kaekang leteipaw sahlo cawh ming he ka, ma cawngsawpaw hai leco, “Na kih pathlang,” tatah a tah. Taico a kih cawh pathlang ka, a dang.
Canghrasala, Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo cawh aa thingae ngetei ka, Zisu cawh zekhatamaw tua he peh seh la, a cha a, tahpaw khah pakheh le pakheh aa reisia.
Ma cai leco Zisu cawh thlawchang rua pawtah tlaang cung lang ke ka, a zing zaikhuadui Khazing khatah thlaw a chang.
Mong khua va dui ka, a hningzuitu sahlo cawh y he ka, pahrawhluihning khah thing he ka, aaning sahlo cawh apostol rai a khing he.
Simon (Piter tatei ming sahpaw) a unypaw Andru, Jeims, Johan, Filip, Barthalomeo,
Mathai, Thomas, Alfas sawcapaw Jeims, ci le phing a dawkhuipaw Simon,
Jeims a sawcapaw Juda le Zisu a luitu paw Judas Iskariot a cang he.

Zisu cawh aaning sahlo khaco seithlah ka, bai arainah letah a ung. Ama a hning a zuipaw he mehlupui le Judia raang le Jerusalem khuapui, Tair le Sidon khua rili ngaekang raang sahlo taitah mehlupui a va chuh he.
A bia khah nawthlia rua pawtah le a sawnah pawhe zong dangsah rua pawtah aa va chua. Thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw sahlo zong he tah dangnah aa hmuh.
Mehlupui tah Ama khah tong khy cy a zong he. Zecawtamaw tatah Ama taikhei hmingtuakhynah khah pia ka, aaning vytei cawh a dangsah he.
A hningzuitu sahlo cawh ming he ka, “Naaning sisahpaw sahlo bonghnang naa ting, Khazing painah raang cawh naa cawtah a cang.
Ato letei a ngai a dipaw sahlo bonghnang naa ting, naa ri a vaw tae a. Ato letei a cah leimeipaw sahlo bonghnang naa ting, na hnui tae he ceh.

Cawngsaw sahlo tah aa ca hua tih he tah bonghnang naa ting, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a cawngsaw naa cangnah rawng tah ca patlia a he ka, naa zy ca lang a he ka, naa ming aa ca pachia tih he tah bonghnang naa ting.

Ma ning taco naa thawchah seh la, lunglawng thawchah tah a pathlo my lo, zecawtamaw tatah vaicung letah naa longmai rungnaw ngeteipaw a ung. Ma hrahei aaning aa pathlahtu sahlo he takhei Khazing khuavang sahlo khah aa za tua tei he.
Canghrasala naaning mehrung sahlo naa cing a ping, zecawtamaw tatah a nawngnah cawh naa hmuh thlu thah.
Ato letei naaning a ri a vawpaw sahlo naa cing a ping, zecawtamaw tatah naa ngai a di tae a. Naaning ato letei a hnui leimeipaw sahlo naa cing a ping, naa ngechia a ka, na cah tae he ceh.
Cawngsaw maikaw tah aa ca pachaw tih he tah naa cing a ping. Ma hrahei aaning a pathlahtu sahlo tah khuavang pakheipaw sahlo khah aa za tua tei he.
Canghrasala, ka bia naw a thliapaw sahlo, ka ca ching he hi, naa carae sahlo cawh va do la, a ca huapaw sahlo cung leco chahnah va tua my lo.
Chia a ca reipahpaw he sahlo cawh bonghnang song my lo, a ca zongtepaw sahlo cawh thlawchangpah my lo.
Pakheh kheh tah na bai rakheh lang a ca cabai caco, a rakheh lang zong khah cong pah vy thlang. Pakheh kheh tah na pai a ca lah pah caco, na angkilai lah zong ei kheh.
A ca haepaw maikaw cawh pei la, na hnuipaw a ca lah pahpaw he cawh hae kaw khawh khe lo.
Na cung letah tua he seh tah na dupaw hrakhei male cung letah va tua my lo.
Naaning a ca dopaw suipaw naa do caco he zemaw amia naa hmuh a? Mehsua zong tah ma hapaw cawh aa tua thlang hrah.
Naa cung letah a chahpaw cawngsaw cung letah naa chahpaw takhei zemaw amia naa hmuh? Mehsua zong tah ma hapaw cawh aa tua thlang hrah.
A ca pei kaw khypaw he hming naa hleipaw he takhei zemaw amia naa hmuh? Mehsua sahlo zong tahmai a ialia tah hmuh kaw rua taco aaning le aaning a hlei thlang hrah he.

Canghrasala naa carae sahlo khah va do la, aa cung letah chahnah va tua my lo. Hmuh kaw hrah du tah male hming va hlei khe lo. Mataico longmai rungnawpaw hmuh a he ceh ka, Cungnungcai Khazing sawtei sahlo naa cang a he ceh. Zecawtamaw tatah Ama cawh mehsua le mehchawly cung letah a vei a sy.
Naa Paw vaicung leteipaw tah zaangsawnah a ca hnuipaw he hratah zaang a saw cy my lo.
Male bia cepah khe la, naaning zong biace pah cang hrá bei ceh. Ahohmai thaily va cangsah khe o, naaning zong thaily ca cangsah hrá bei he. Ngethai la, naaning zong ngethai na cang hrá he ceh.
Pei la, peh na cang hrá he ceh. Achaw teitah neh pá tah, baichai tah, carawh pai tah a chihluinah tai peh naa cang he ceh. Na hmangpaw nehnah pawtei khei aa ca neh pah kaw hrá a,” a tah he.
Ma tawchingnah bia zong heh a chingpai he, “Mehco tah mehco cawh lang a chui khy a maw? Aa pahning tah khobatlung lang tla bei he maw?
A cawngpaw cawh a cawngpahtu cung letah ung be. Canghrasala, a tlungtlianah tai a cawng khy taitah a cawngpahtu hratah a cang hrah a.
Nama na mehkho letei thingphae khah pacang taw lytah na unypaw mehkho letei thingpatlaw khah zecawtamaw na mingpah?

Nama na mehkho chung letei thingphae khah a hmuh tlung lytah zekhatamaw na unypaw cawh, ‘Na mehbang khah ca tho pá neh,’ na tah khy? Naaning cungmai raipha sahlo naaning naa mehkho letei thingphae khah thohly taw la, taico naa unypaw a mehkho letei mehbang cawh tho pá pawtah a se pawtah na hmuh khy a.
Thingkung cawh a kung a chah caco, a thui a chah, a kung a chiahru caco thui chia a thui.
Thingkung maikaw cawh aa thui tah hni a cang he. Thuiku cawh ahling kung taitah lo bang bei he. A cang ly leh misur thui cawh ahling kung taitah lo bang hrah bei he.

Mehchaw taco a lungchung letei a pacungpaw a chawpaw taikhei hmingchaw chuasah ka, mehchawly taco a lungchung letei achaw lypaw a pacungpaw taikhei hming chahly a chuasah. A kaw taitei a reichuapaw cawh a lungchung letei a chihluipaw khah a cang.
Ka reipaw tua tlung lytah zecawtamaw, ‘Abuipaw, Abuipaw,’ tatah naa pa y?
Kama kha a vong katei, ka bia khah thui tah a zuipaw cawh zekhamaw a lo tahpaw ka ca ming sá he a.

Ma hapaw cawngsaw cawh ing a sahpaw, a thuh pui tah atung kho co katei, alung puino cung letei a bingpaw khatah a lo he. Khua a rupui tah va so ka, tuisai tah ing cawh nang ka, canghrasala a calawh be, achaw teitah sahpaw a cangnah cawtah.

Canghrasala, kama khatah a vong katei, ka bia khah thuí tah a zui tlung lypaw cawh alui cakhawngpaw letei a tung padawpaw a cy lypaw ing khatah a lo. Khua a rupui tah va so ka, ing cawh a nang tihtah pohly palang ka, a dawngkasawny tah a rawh cehceh,” a tah he.
Taico Zisu tah ma bia vytei cawh zawpui thuí tah a rei khy taitah Kapernaum khua lang a sei.
Ma leco raebuipaw a saecapaw, a buipaw tei a do ngeteipaw cawh a sah ka, a thi daimang tei.
Ma raebuipaw taco Zisu kong cawh a thui tihtah Juda macang thaikheh cawh taw he ka, Zisu cawh a vong seh la, a saecapaw heh va dangsah ky seh tatah va naw law a tah he.
Zisu kung aa va tlung tihtah hmuisui teitah naw he ka, “Ma cawngsaw heh bong tlang a tlahpaw a cang.
Kaa mingphing a dopaw cang ka, kaa synagog zong heh Ama tah a sahpaw a cang,” tatah aa tah.

Macawtaco Zisu cawh aaning khaco a sei. Ing a va phah daimang letah raebuipaw taco a vesaw sahlo cawh taw he ka, ma hrahei a va chingsah he. “Abuipaw, reithui a lah du kheh, ka ing heh nama na naenah tlangpaw cang be.
Macawtaco kama zong nama kha a vong tlangpaw tah a rawh hrah bei neh. Canghrasala bia kaw kheh teitah na rei caco, ka saecapaw cawh a dang thlang a.

Kama zong nawhnuinah rai letah a ungpaw cang neh ka, ka rai letah raekeh sahlo a ung hrah he. Pakheh cawh, ‘Sei,’ tah neh ka, sei ka, pakheh cawh, ‘A vong,’ tah neh ka, a vong. Ka saecapaw cawh, ‘Ma heh tua,’ tah neh ka, a tua thlang,” tatah a chingsah he.

Zisu tah ma bia cawh a thui tihtah a ningang ngetei ka, a va zuipaw he zawpui lang cawh a hui ka, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Israel mingphing chung letah hmai ma tluh zingnah heh hmuh bang bei neh,” a tah he.
Mataico raebuipaw tei a tawpaw sahlo he khah ing aa va phah kaw tihtah a saecapaw khah a dang thahpaw khah aa hmuh.
Ma khy cangkaw tei leco, Zisu cawh Nain aa tahpaw khua lang khah a sei. A hningzuitu sahlo le zawpuipaw cawh Ama khatah a sei hrah he.
Khuapui a naenah hawkaw aa phah daimang ning taco mehthi rawh a ka songlai he ka, mehthi cawh lahmeno a hnuitlakangpaw sawcapaw a cang. Khuachung cawngsaw zawpui zong a no khatah a ka seilai hrah he.
Abuipaw tah lahmeno cawh a hmuh tihtah ningdo ngetei ka, “Cah kheh,” tatah a tah.
Taico ka ke thlah ka, rawh kong cawh va tong ka, rawh kong a pupaw sahlo cawh a daw thlang he. “Satle, tho law, ka ca tah,” tatah a tah.
Mehthi cawh a ty ka, bia a ka rei. Taico Zisu tah a no cawh a peh kaw.

Aa dawngkasawny tah ci he ka, aa ningang pai tah ka, Khazing khah aa reithai. “Kaa hrawng letah Khazing khuavang rungnawpaw a va paly hi, Khazing cawh a cawngsaw sahlo bong rua pawtah a vong myca hi!” aa tah.
Ma Zisu kong heh Judia raang pungpaluh le a kaekang raang lekhei a thang thlu.
Johan hningzuitu sahlo taco ma konglang vytei khah Johan cawh aa ching. Johan tah a hningzuitu pahning khah y he ka,
Abuipaw khatah ma bia heh hae rua pawtah a taw he. “Nama heh a vong lepaw cawh na cang maw? A cang ly leh ahringpaw maw kaa haw a?” tatah a va tahsah he.

Ma cawngsaw sahlo cawh Zisu kung aa va tlung tihtah a hai leco, “Baptisma peitu Johan tah, ‘Nama heh a vong lepaw cawh na cang maw? A cang ly leh ahringpaw maw kaa haw a?’ tatah nama hae rua pawtah a ma sia,” tatah aa tah.
Ma ningcai ceingei leco Zisu tah a sahpaw le a dang lypaw mehlupui le thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw sahlo he cawh dangsah he ka, a mehcopaw zong khah khua a hmuhsah kaw he.

Zisu tah Johan tei a va tawpaw he sahlo hai leco, “Va sei kaw la, naa hmuhpaw le naa thuipaw heh Johan cawh va ching my lo. Mehco sahlo tah khua aa hmuh, a songbepaw zong lang a sei he, thinghmuihri a ingpaw sahlo zong dang he ka, a naw a pangpaw sahlo tah khua aa thui. A thipaw zong tho kaw he ka, mehsisah zong tah thawngchawbia aa thui myca.
Kama ka kong letei lung langlo tah a ung lypaw cawngsaw cawh bonghnang a ting,” tatah a palei he.

Johan tei a tawpaw sahlo aa sei khy taico Zisu tah zawpui sahlo hai leco Johan konglang khah a ching he. “Ze ming ruapaw tamaw raangcaa lang naa sei? Thli tei a taikalypaw tuiphi kung ming ruapaw tamaw?

Ma hratei a cang ly caco, ze ming ruapaw tamaw naa sei? Chaichi chaw a tuapaw cawngsaw ming ruapaw tamaw? Cang tlung be, chaichi amai a rupaw a tua katei, hmingchaw sangsaw a hnuipaw he cawh siangpahrang ing letah pui aa ung ky caw!
A cang caco, ze ming ruapaw tamaw naa sei? Khazing khuavang ming ruapaw tamaw? A cang, Khazing khuavang navy tah a lai vypaw kong ka ca ching he.
Ma heh Khazing bia letei ciapaw Ama a kong cawh a cang, ‘Ka tlang ypaw cawh na hmelang ka taw a, na hme letei na langpui a parai ruapaw tah!’
Ka ca ching he hi, canu tei sahpaw saw leco Johan navy tah alai vypaw ahohmai ung bei he, canghrasala Khazing painah raang letei a chia caipaw hmai heh Johan navy tah alai vy,” a tah.

Cawngsaw vytei ngungkhui a kheipaw sahlo takhei hmai, Zisu bia cawh aa thui tihtah Khazing langpui a ding tahpaw khah aa lung a tling. Zemaw tah pawco, aaning sahlo cawh Johan tei baptisma a peh ciapaw sahlo aa cangnah cawtah a cang.
Canghrasala, Farasi le phungbia a thai ngeteipaw sahlo he taco Khazing tei aa cawtah khua a khang pahpaw he khah aa ei. Zecawtamaw tatah aaning sahlo cawh Johan baptisma hmai a cang balang bei he.
Zisu tah, “Atochai cawngsaw heh zekhatamaw ka tawching he a? Zekhamaw a lo he?

Aaning sahlo cawh chodo tlang letei a ty thlangpaw nyheh sahlo khatah a lo he. ‘Phipahli ca tungpah he peh ka, naa lang tlung be. Mehthi hlawsah he peh ka, naa caw tlung be,’ tatah aaning leh aaning a tahpaw nyheh sahlo khatah a lo he.
Zecawtamaw tatah baptisma peitu Johan cawh va chuh ka, very e lytah le misurhang ding lytah ung ka, ‘Khachia tah a pahrang,’ tatah naa tah.
Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vong ka, e ka, ding ka, ‘Ding le e suipaw a pacang, mehsua sahlo le ngungkhui a kheitu sahlo vesaw,’ naa tah.
Canghrasala, singnah cawh a hming tuapaw sahlo takhei ahmang takhah a palang,” tatah a tah.
Farasipaw a cangpaw pakheh tah Zisu cawh zaibatui e pawtah a hrui. Macawtaco, Farasipaw ing lang cawh a vaw ka, e pawtah a ty.
Canu pakheh mehsua ngetei no, ma khua letei a ung hrahpaw taco Zisu cawh Farasipaw ing letah zaibatui a e leimei tahpaw khah a thui. Sathy ringthopaw cawh lungrang tuithei khei a va tle.
Taico a hninglang tah a phe hrang leco a daw ka, cah ka, a phe cawh a mehthli tah pacingsah thlu ka, ma khy taico a sang tah hruh ka, a phepazaw cawh hnang ka, ringthopaw cawh a bia.

Zisu zaibatui e a hruipaw Farasipaw taco, ma cawh a hmuh tihtah a lungchung tah, “Ma cawngsaw heh Khazing khuavang a cang caco, a phe a hre leimeipaw heh ahomaw a cang, zehapaw canu maw a cang tahpaw heh a hni ruapaw a cang, mehsua no cang tlung ka,” tatah a pacang.
Zisu taco, “Simon, bia ka ca ching dupaw a ung,” a tah. Farasipaw Simon taco, “Cawngpahtu, pa ching tua,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah, “Cawngsaw pahning tah khalui hnui he ka, pakhehpaw tah ngung tangka 500, pakhehpaw tah ngung tangka songngaw tatah lui aa bah he.
Aa pahning taco aa khalui cawh chang khy va vei lytah aa ung. Macawtaco tangka a hnuitupaw taco a ngethai va vei he. A cang caco, aaning pahning lekhei aho tamaw a do vy a, tatah na rawh?” a tah.
Simon taco, “A hlu vy a ngethaipaw khah a cang thly a, tatah ka rawh,” tatah a chai. Zisu tah, “Na rawhpaw a hmang ngetei,” tatah a tah.

Mataico Zisu cawh cawngsawno lang cawh a hui ka, Simon hai leco, “Ma no heh na hmuh maw? Na ing chunglang ka za naening tah phe sinah ruapaw tui pa pei bei ceh. Canghrasala ma cawngsawno tahei co ka phe heh a mehthli tah si ka, a sang tah a hru.
Nama taco pa hnang bei ceh, canghrasala ma no tahei co ka za naenah taikhei ka phe hnang khah tai be.
Nama taco ka lu letah zong sathy pa thu bei ceh, canghrasala ma no tahei co ka phe letah ringthopaw a bia.

Ma rawng tahei ka ca ching, a suanah a hlu ngeteipaw cawh ngethai a cang myca, macawtaco cawngsawno takhei a do ngetei. Canghrasala, a cawngtei ngethai a cangpaw taco a cawngtei tah a do hrah,” tatah a tah.
Mataico Zisu tah cawngsawno cawh, “Na suanah cawh ngethai a cang thah,” tatah a tah.
Aa hrong letei a ung hrahpaw khuachai sahlo taco, “Suanah hmai a ngethaipaw heh ahomaw a cang?” tatah aaning le aaning khah aa tah he.
Zisu tah cawngsawno cawh, “Na zingnah tah a ca pachah thah, thlawlung teitah va sei my lo,” tatah a tah.
Ma khy taico Zisu cawh khuapui le khuatei tlawnglai longmang ka, Khazing painah raang kong thawngchawbia cawh a y khui lai. A hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khah Ama khatah a sei hrah he.

Canu thaikheh, a sawnah taitah a dangsahpaw sahlo le thlawpaw pialuipaw a papia pahpaw he sahlo zong Ama khatah a ung he. Ma canu sahlo hrong leco thlawpaw pialuipaw sangsarih a papia pahpaw Mari (Makdalin aa tahpaw) le,
Herod cho a mingkaitu Kuza a nupuino Joana le Susana le ahringpaw sahlo a cang he. Ma sahlo cawh aaning aa hnuicho teitah Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo a bawkhangpaw a cang he.
Khua keh ná tah mehnung hlupui Zisu khatah a vong he ka, a pahmo ning he takhei ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he.
“Ly a tuapaw pakheh cawh thleci va pawtah ly lang a sei. Thleci a va leimeining takhei a chy cawh lang kae letah tlah ka, cawngsaw tah aa phe tah ci he ka, pavaw sahlo tah aa khi thlu thah he.
A chy cawh lungda letah tlah he ka, aa ka cy tihtah aa thahrang aa thlah nápaw alui a pacingpaw a ung lynah cawtah a ro kaw palang thah he.
A chy cawh ahling hrong letah tlah he ka, ahling khaco cyhrui he ka, ahling taco a diseh thah he.

A chy cawh alui chahnah letah tlah ka, ka cy ka, a thuisu tua ka, a vapaw navy tah a leh zakheh tah a hlu vy a chuh.” Ma bia heh a thangpui tah rei ka, “Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw taco ma bia heh thui he seh,” tatah a tah.
A hningzuitu sahlo taco ma tawchingnah bia silang cawh aa hae hri.

Zisu tah aa hai leco, “Khazing painah raang biaparuh hni khynah cawh peh na cang thah he ceh. Canghrasala, ming hringpaw hai leco tawchingnah bia tah ka rei. Macawtaco, ‘Ming thlang he ka, hmuh a bei he, thui thlang he ka, hnih thai a bei he.’
Tawchingnah bia silang cawh ma heh a cang. Thleci cawh Khazing bia heh a cang.
Langpui letei a tlahpaw sahlo cawh bia cawh thui he ka, Setan khah a vong ka, zing tah pachah aa cang ly nápawtah bia cawh aa lungchung taitah a lah pah he.

Lungda cung letei a tlahpaw sahlo cawh Khazing bia cawh thui he ka, lunglawng teitah aa cyhlang. Canghrasala, thahrang hnui bei he. Aa zingnah cawh sungkheh tei cai caw longlong cang ka, ruhanah a chua tihtah a pohly palang he.

Ahling hrong letei a tlahpaw thleci sahlo asilang cawh Khazing bia cawh thui he ka, canghrasala tungtuh khuasahnah lungreithuinah le rungnah le anawngnah tah diseh kaw thlu he katei, aa pui a tling thai lypaw cawngsaw sahlo khah a cang he.

Canghrasala, alui a chahnah letei a tlahpaw sahlo cawh lung hmuisui teitah Khazing bia cawh thui he ka, a tle he ka, a thuisu a tuanah tai teria teitah aa zuipaw cawngsaw sahlo khah a cang he,” a tah.
Zisu taco, “Ahotahmai tah me-ing a vang tihtah lakhing rai letah maw abai rai letah maw chia bang be. Ing chung lang a naepaw maikaw tah a khaipaw aa hmuh khy nápawtah me-ing tung letah aa chia tei.
Palang ly rua pawtah nopaw hming zehmai ung be. Taico hni ly rua pawtah paphipaw zehmai ung be, palangsah thlu a cang a.
Macawtaco naa nawthliapaw khah achaw teitah pacang my lo. A hnuipaw cawh peh vy cang a he ka, a hnui lypaw cawh a hnuitlakangpaw tatei a rawhpaw hmai khah lah pah a cang a,” tatah a tah.
Taico, Zisu a no le a uny sahlo cawh Ama khah a tong rua pawtah a vong he. Canghrasala, cawngsaw aa hlutunah cawtah a va nae khy bei he.
Cawngsaw pakheh tah Zisu cawh, “Na no le na uny sahlo tah a tong ca du he ka, khunglai letah a daw thlang he,” tatah a ching.
Zisu taco, “Khazing bia thui ka, a zuipaw sahlo heh ka no le ka uny sahlo cawh a cang he,” tatah a palei.
Ningkheh cawh Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Galili tuiping raechai lang sei he pei,” a tah he. Macawtaco tuilawng chunglang cawh a nae he ka, aa sei.
Tuilawng tah aa seilai leimeining taco Zisu cawh a ihning. Tuiping leco thlichia a va hrang ka, aa lawng cawh tui lang a nong thlu daimangnah cawtah ciphang ngetei tah a ung he.

A hningzuitu sahlo tah Ama cawh va patho he ka, “Hruitupaw, Hruitupaw, tui lang kaa tlah thlu he peh hi,” tatah aa tah. Zisu cawh ka tho ka, thli le tuileh cawh a hrangso he ka, thli cawh de ka, tui cawh a cali he.

“Naa zingnah cawh zeletamaw a ung thlu?” tatah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh a tah he. Ci le ningang hmotah, “Ma heh zehapaw cawngsaw maw a cang? Thli le tuileh zong tah a bia aa nge thlangpaw heh,” tatah pakheh le pakheh a tah tlungmang he.
Galili tuiping raechai lang letei a ungpaw he Gerasin raang cawngsaw sahlo aa ungnah cawh aa va phah.

Zisu cawh ngaekang lang a cungthlah cangkawleh ma khua letei a ungpaw khachia tei a tlepaw cawngsawpaw taco a va tong. Ma cawngsawpaw heh a thlekalong tei a ungpaw, ing letah zong a ung lypaw, thlaikung letah a ungteipaw a cang.
Zisu a hmuh cangkawleh sang ka, a phehrang leco a bawh ka, a thangpui tah a y. “Cungnungcai Khazing Sawcapaw, Zisu, kama khatah zemaw na dupaw a ung? Pa hreh haitei kheh tatah ka ca naw,” a tah.

A chung letei thlawpaw pialuipaw khah ka pia tatah Zisu tah bia a peh cawtah khei a cang. Ma paw cawh uihlupui khachia taco, a hraipakingnah cawtah a kih le a phe letah bahrairui tah khi he ka, aa vai. Bahrairui tah aa hrai naná teitah chehchung thlu ka, khachia taco lyraangpaw lang a tingchua tei.
Zisu tah, “Na ming ahomaw?” tatah a hae. “Ka ming cawh Thongzakheh a cang,” tatah a palei. Khachia a hlupui tah aa pahrangnah cawtah.
Taico khachia sahlo taco, Zisu cawh a ping thai lypaw khobatlung lang ma thlah haitei kheh tatah aa naw canei leimei thlang.
Aa kae tlangpa lekhei lawh a e leimeipaw voh rungpui ung he ka, khachia sahlo taco Zisu cawh ma voh rung sahlo aa chunglang kheh a ma naesah thlang, tatah naw he ka, Zisu tah a naesah he.
Khachia sahlo cawh ma cawngsawpaw chung taico piathlah he ka, voh chunglang cawh a nae he. Voh rungpui sahlo cawh tuiping lang a zythlah he ka, a thi thlu he.
Voh rungpui a mingkaitu sahlo taco ma hming vytei cawh aa hmuh tihtah sai tlamang he ka, khuapui chung le khuatei lekhei aa rei lai.

Taico zawpui sahlo cawh piathlah he ka, zehratamaw a cang tahpaw khah ming rua pawtah a sei he. Zisu kung aa va tlung tihtah khachia sahlo tei, aa piasaipaw cawngsawpaw khah aa va hmuh. Lungsing teitah caise a tua katei, Zisu kae letah a za tythlangpaw khah aa hmuh. Macawtaco aa ci ngetei.
A hmuhpaw cawngsaw sahlo taco, khachia sahlo tei aa tlepaw cawngsawpaw a dangnah kong khah cawngsaw hringpaw aa ching lai he.
Mataico Gerasin raang letei a ungpaw cawngsaw vytei taco aa ci tunah cawtah Zisu khah aa raang taitah piathlah a pawtah aa naw. Macawtaco tuilawng chunglang cawh a nae ka, a sei.
Khachia sahlo tei aa piasaipaw cawngsawpaw taco, “Nama khatah ka seilai hrá a,” tatah naw ka, canghrasala, Zisu taco kawsah kaw ka, a hai leco,

“Ing lang a dih la, Khazing tah zetlua tamaw na cawtah hming a ca tuapah tahpaw khah va ching hri law,” a tah. Mataico cawngsawpaw cawh piathlah ka, Zisu tah zetlua tamaw a cawtah hming a tuapah tahpaw khah khua cawngsaw vytei cawh a ching he.
Zisu cawh a va kaw kaw tihtah cawngsaw hlupui tah dai he ka, aaning sahlo cawh a va tlungpaw a heh thlangpaw a cang he.
Taico Jaira aa tahpaw synagog a uhtu cawh a vong. Zisu a phehrang leco a bawh ka, a ing lang a vong rua pawtah a naw.
A sawcanu hnuitlakangpaw, kung hrawhluihning a tah no cawh a thih daimangnah cawtah a cang. Zisu a seilai ning taco zawpui tah buh thlang he ka, aa nanghly pai lai leimei he.
Ma leco canu pakheh kung hrawhluihning chung a thi a chuh no ung ka, a hnuicho vytei sibui letah pachang thlu thah ka, ahotahmai dangsah khy bei he.
Zisu a hninglang tah a vong ka, a pai dong cawh tong ka, ma cangkaw leco, a thi cawh a kih.
“Ahomaw a pa tong?” tatah Zisu tah hae he ka, aa dawngkasawny teitah ca tong bei peh aa tah. Piter taco, “Hruitupaw, zawpui tah ca buh thlang he ka, aa ca nangpaipaw a cang,” a tah.
Canghrasala, Zisu tah, “Pakheh kheh tah a pa tong, ka chung taitah hmingtuakhynah a pia, ma rawng taco ka hni,” a tah.
Mataico canuno taco Zisu tah a pa hni myca tahpaw a hni tihtah a thlawzawng ka, a phehrang leco a bawh ka, zawpui hme leco a cangnah silang le sung sungkheh tah a dangnah kong khah a ching.
Mataico Zisu tah a hai leco, “Ka sawcanu, na zingnah tah a ca dangsah, de teitah va seí my lo,” a tah.
Zisu tah bia a rei leimei ning taco, synagog a uhtu Jaira ing taico cawngsaw pakheh a vong ka, “Na sawcanu cawh a thi thah, cawngpahtu heh hnahnawh du khawh kheh,” a tah.
Ma bia cawh Zisu tah thui ka, Jaira hai letaco, “Na thlawzawng kheh seh, zing la, na sawcanu cawh a dang a,” tatah a tah.
Jaira ing cawh a va phah tihtah Piter le Johan le Jeims le nyno a no le a paw tah cy ly co ahohmai ing chunglang a naesah bei he.
Ma chung vytei cawh cawngsaw hringpaw taco nyno cawh ngechia tah aa cawkhui leimei. Zisu tah, “Cah tua khe o, nyno heh a thih tlung be, a ihning hi!” tatah a tah he.
A thi tahpaw aa hni thlangnah cawtah khei Zisu cawh aa hnuiso.
Canghrasala, Zisu tah nyno cawh a kiá tah tle ka, “Ka sawcanu, tho law,” a tah.
A thlawpaw cawh va kaw kaw ka, ma cangkaw leco, nyno cawh a ka dawchua. Taico Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh nyno heh e ruapaw sangkheh kheh pei my lo, tatah a ching he.
A no le a paw cawh aa khuarawha thlang ka, canghrasala, Zisu tah aaning cawh hming ungzia khah ahohmai ching khe lo, tatah a tah he.
Zisu tah apostol hluihning cawh Ama khatah a y he. Khachia vytei papia lai pawtah le asawnah vytei zong dangsah lai pawtah nawhnuinah le hmingtuakhynah pei he ka,
aaning cawh Khazing painah raang kong reilai rua pawtah le a dang lypaw sahlo zong dangsah lai rua pawtah a taw he.
Aa hai leco, “Khua tlawngnah caw pawtah cungcahrei, sahre, chingco, tangka le cai le se a hluipaw zehmai a cakai khe o.
Naa naenah pawhe ceh ing leco ma khua taitei naa seithlah kaw hlai vytei cawh ung thlang my lo.
Ma khua cawngsaw taco aa ca cyhlang du ly caco he aaning sahlo raering pehnah tah ma khua taico naa piathlah tihtah naa phe letei luipadih khah cathingthlah si my lo,” a tah he.
Taico aaning sahlo cawh piathlah he ka, khua kheh hning khua khé co sei lai he ka, aa seilainah maikaw leco, thawngchawbia rei lai he ka, a dang lypaw sahlo zong aa dangsah lai he.
Abui Herod taco hming ungzia vytei cawh a thui tihtah a lung hna a hnawh ngetei. Zecawtamaw tatah baptisma peitu Johan khah thihnah taitah a tho kaw tatah mehthaikheh tah aa tah.
Thaikhehpaw sahlo taco Elija a paly tatah aa tah. Mehthaikheh huipaw taco khuahlaining tei Khazing khuavang letei pakhehkheh khah a hring kaw aa tah.
Canghrasala Herod taco, “Johan cawh a lu ka tai thah tlung, ma hratei a kong ka thuipaw heh ahomaw a cang!” a tah. Ma cawngsaw cawh hmuh a pachia.
Apostol sahlo cawh aa va tlung kaw tihtah aa tuapaw hming kong khah Zisu cawh aa ching. Taico aaning sahlo cawh a chui he ka, Bethsaida aa tahpaw khua lang cawh aaning teitah aa sei.

Canghrasala zawpui taco ma cawh hnih he ka, Ama cawh aa zuilai. Zisu tah zawpui vytei cawh achaw teitah mingkai he ka, Khazing painah raang kong khah ching he ka, dangnah a hiapaw sahlo khah a dangsah he.

Zailang ning a tlah cai letah apostol hluihning cawh Ama khatah a vong he ka, “Ma lehei ung nápaw le e ruapaw zong ung be. Macawtaco zawpui vytei heh na disah pawhe a cang. Kaa kaekang khua le ly sahlo lehei ungnah le e ruapaw a va hui he seh, zecawtamaw tatah kaa ungnah heh raang kingdang cang tlung ka,” aa tah.

Zisu taco, “Naaning tah e ruapaw cawh pei o,” a tah he. Aaning taco, “Ma vytei cawngsaw e ruapaw tahei kaa va cawh seh tah lypaw co, kaaning khaco very tlangpangaw le ngaw sanghning long kaa hnui!” aa tah.
Capaw puitling longtei tah 5000 hrawng a tah he. Canghrasala Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Zawpui khah songngaw phu longmang tah a tysah o,” a tah he.
A reipaw hratah hningzuitu sahlo taco tua he ka, ming vytei cawh a ty he.
Very tlangpangaw le ngaw sanghning cawh law ka, avai lang a y ka, Khazing khatah lawngbia hlai ka, very tlang sahlo cawh a kychy. Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo cawh zawpui cawh rai pawtah a peh he.
Aa zongmingtei co e he ka, aa ri a vaw thlu. Taico a hningzuitu sahlo taco aa ebangpaw cawh pakhong he ka, baihraw hluihning chih ky tah aa dui.

Uikheh cawh Zisu cawh Ama teitah thlaw a chang leimeining takhei a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Ama khatah a ung thlang he. Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Zawpuipaw tah aho aa pa tah maw?” tatah a hae he.

Aaning sahlo taco, “Thaikhehpaw tah baptisma peitu Johan aa ca tah, thaikhehpaw tah Elija a cang ca tah he ka, ahringpaw taco khuahlai tei Khazing khuavang sahlo letah pakheh kheh khah a va hring kaw aa ca tah,” tatah aa palei.
Zisu tah, “Naaning tah saw aho a cang naa pa tah maw?” tatah hae he ka, Piter tah, “Nama cawh Khazing taitei a vongpaw Khri na cang,” tatah a chai.
Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh ma kong heh ahohmai ching ly rua pawtah araeringnah a peh he.

Taico Zisu tah, “Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh taithuinah a hlupui ing ka, macang sahlo le tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah hlawh a he ka, aa thaw a. Canghrasala, a ningthungnah letah hringnah letah thosah kaw a cang a,” tatah a tah he.
Mataico aa zongmingtei hai leco, “Ahohmai zui a pa dupaw cawh ama a dunah khah seisai seh la, a khraws cawh ning tating tah a puh seh la, pazui seh.
A hringnah pachah a dupaw taco sung a ka, canghrasala Kama ka cawtah a hringnah a sungpaw taco a hringnah a pachah a.
Cawngsaw pakheh tah khazaw heh a pungpaluh tah hnui seh la, a hringnah a hly caco a cawtah zemaw a chahnai a?

Ahohmai Kama le ka cawngpahnah bia a zawkhuipaw maikaw cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh vaicung letei vaiming pathai sahlo khatah a rungnawnah le Paw rungnawnah kha a za cung tihtah ma cawngsaw cawh a zawkhui hrá a.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma lehei a daw thlangpaw sahlo hrong lehei mehthaikheh cawh Khazing painah raang aa hmuh hlai taco thi balang bei he,” a tah.
Zisu tah ma bia a rei khy taitah ningreh hrawng lekhei Piter, Johan le Jeims cawh Ama kha a chui he ka, thlawchang rua pawtah tlaang cung lang a kekhui he.
Thlaw a chang leimeining tah a mehme pho zia cawh a thlai ka, a caise sahlo cawh lailaw a ky ning tei, akhaipaw tluá khei a khai.
Cawngsaw pahning Moses le Elija cawh,
vaicung rungnawnah khatah a za lang he ka, Zisu khatah bia aa rei. Jerusalem khuapui letah a thihnah thongtah Khazing a tingaipaw a patling nápaw kong khah aa rei.
Piter le a vesaw sahlo cawh a ihning he ka, canghrasala a ka hraw tih he tah a rungnawnah le cawngsaw pahning Ama khatah a daw thlangpaw he khah aa hmuh.

Cawngsaw tlaw tah Zisu cawh aa seisai leimeining tah Piter taco a hai letah, “Hruitupaw, ma lehei ung heh kaa cawtah a chah ngetei. Thlangda nama na cawtah sangkheh, Moses a cawtah sangkheh, Elija a cawtah sangkheh tatah sangthung sah a he peh,” a tah. (Piter cawh zemaw ka rei tahpaw hmai hnih be.)
A rei leimeining taco meding va thang ka, aaning cawh pahlong he ka, meding chung letah aa ungnah cawtah aa ci ngetei.
Meding chung taico o va ring ka, “Ma heh ka Sawtei, ka thingpaw cawh a cang. Ama a bia cawh nge my lo,” tatah o a za ring.

O tah ma hratei a rei khy taico Zisu cawh Ama longtei a cangpaw khah aa hmuh. A hningzuitu sahlo tah ma cawh aa chung letah a cingkai thlang he ka, aa hmuhpaw kong khah ma ning taco ahohmai ching bei he.
A ningthlamongpaw tlaang cung taitah aa za cung chuh ning takhei cawngsaw rungpui taco Zisu cawh a va tong he.
Zawpui chung taico pakhehpaw cawh ka ychua ka, “Cawngpahtu, ka sawtei pa mingpah tua tatah ka ca naw, Ama heh ka sawtei hnuitlakangpaw a cang.
Thlawpaw pialuipaw tah tua ka, sung sungkheh tah sangsah ka, hruipakingsah ka, a ci tatabu zong a pia thlu tei. Cai cuitei suipaw piasai ka, a hlyde daimang tei.
Ma cawh papia rua pawtah na hningzuitu sahlo naw he neh ka, canghrasala papia khy bei he,” a tah.

Zisu taco, “Vy zingnah a hnui lypaw le meh paleh meh pathae sahlo, zetih tai maw naaning khatah ka ung a? Zetih tai maw ka lung ka ca pasua pá he a? Na sawtei cawh ma lehei a vong khui tua,” tatah a palei.

Nyhehpaw cawh a va sei leimeining takhei hmai khachia taco alui letah paliahly ka, a hruipakingsah. Canghrasala Zisu tah thlawpaw pialuipaw cawh a hrangso ka, nyhehpaw cawh dangsah ka, a paw khakhei a peh kaw.
Taico aaning vytei cawh Khazing a rungnaw zia khah aa khuarawh a haa. Ming vytei cawh Zisu a tuapaw hming kong letah khuarawha tah aa ung thlang ning taco Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh,
“Naaning ka ca ching lepaw he bia heh achaw teitah nawthlia tua o. Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh cawngsaw sahlo kih letah luithae a cang myca a,” a tah he.
Canghrasala, a hningzuitu sahlo taco a rei dupaw khah hnih thai bei he. A silang khah nokhai aa cangnah cawtah khei tle khy be ca he ka, hae hri ngang bei he.
A hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa hrong letah ahomaw alai caipaw a cang a tahpaw bia khah a ei hrang aa patho.
Aa rawhnah cawh Zisu tah hnih ka, nyhehpaw tei khah law ka, a kae letah a dawsah.

Mataico aa hai letah, “Ahohmai Kama ka ming tah ma hapaw nyhehtei heh a cyhlangpaw cawh Kama a pa cyhlangpaw cang ka, Kama a pa cyhlangpaw cawh a pa tawtupaw a cyhlangpaw a cang. Naa hrong letei a chia caipaw heh alaicaipaw cawh a cang a,” a tah he.
Johan taco, “Hruitupaw, cawngsaw pakheh tah na ming tah khachia a papia leimeipaw hmuh he peh ka, kaa bu cawngsaw a cang lynah cawtah kaa thly,” a tah.
Zisu tah, “Thly khe o, a ma cakhae lypaw maikaw cawh naa cawngsaw a cang he,” a tah.
Vaicung lang lahchy a cang nápaw cai khah a nenah cawtah khei, Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang sei pawtah a pachia.
Mataico zuaky sahlo khah hmelang a seisah hlang he. Aaning cawh a cawtah hming pachiapaning hlang rua pawtah Samaria cawngsaw aa khua lang khah a nae he.
Canghrasala Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang sei a tingnah cawtah khei ma khua letei cawngsaw sahlo taco pasungpanaw bei he.
Ma cawh a hningzuitu Johan le Jeims tah aa hmuh tihtah a hai letah, “Abuipaw aaning sahlo a kangseh ruapaw he tahei avai taitah me za tlahsah peh seh la, tahpaw na ma dukhui maw?” tatah aa tah.
Canghrasala Zisu cawh a hui ka, aaning sahlo cawh a raw he.
Taico aaning sahlo cawh khua hring lang aa sei.
Langpui letah aa seilai leimeining taco cawngsaw pakheh tah, “Na seinah maikaw lang ka ca zui a,” a tah.
Zisu tah, “Sihatei sahlo tah kua hnui he ka, pavaw sahlo zong tah bu aa hnui. Canghrasala Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a lu pahnia nápaw hminghmaw hmai hnui be,” tatah a palei.
Cawngsaw hringpaw pakheh cawh, “Va pa zui law,” a tah. Canghrasala ma cawngsaw taco, “Abuipaw, va seí neh ka, ka paw ka va phung taw a,” tatah a palei.
Zisu tah a hai letah, “A thipaw cawh mehthi tah phung thlang he seh, nama duitei cawh sei la, Khazing painah raang thawngchawbia va rei my lo,” tatah a tah.
Cawngsaw pakheh a vong vy hui ka, “Abuipaw, na seinah maikaw letah ka ca zui a. Canghrasala, kaw kaw taw neh ka, ka sawny aa kih ka tlesi taw he a,” a tah.
Zisu tah, “Ahohmai alui paleh patho tlung katei, a hninglang a hui kaw leimeipaw cawh Khazing painah raang letah rai a hre tlangpaw cang bei he,” tatah a palei.
Ma khy taico Abuipaw tah a hningzuitu ahringpaw songsarih le pahning khah thing he ka, pahning longmang tah Ama a sei nápaw khua maikaw le hminghmaw maikaw lang khah hmelang a thlaw hlang he.
Aa hai leco, “Saze hre ruapaw hlu ngetei ka, canghrasala a hretu cawh a cawngtei he. Macawtaco saze lui a hnuitu Abuipaw cawh raihretu sahlo khah saze lui lang taw rua pawtah hae my lo.
Sei tua o, naaning sahlo cawh chahnia hrong letei tuu teitei sahlo hratah ka ca taw he.
Tangkabawng cang seh, sahre cang seh, phepakong cang seh a cakai khe la, lang letah ahohmai aa kih tle khe lo.
Ing na nae tih he ceh tah ahmasaw cai tah, ‘Ma ing lehei denah ung ky seh,’ tah my lo.
Ma cawngsaw cawh denah sawtei a cang caco, naa reipaw denah cawh a cung letah a tlung a, ma hratei a cang ly caco naaning naa cung lang a va kaw kaw a.
Ma ing leco ung la, aa ca pehpaw he maikaw khah e la, ding thlang my lo. Raihretu cawh a raihrenah mai hmuh rua tah a tlah. Ingkheh hning ingkheh a palong lai khe lo.
Khuachung lang a nae he ceh ka, ingtlung aa ca pa-awng tih he tah aa ca pehpaw he maikaw khah e thlang my lo.
A dang lypaw sahlo khah dang sá la, Khazing painah raang tah a ca ne my ca he, tatah ching my lo.
Canghrasala, khuachung a nae he ceh ka, ingtlung aa ca pa-awng ly caco he, langlaipui sahlo lekhei sei la, ma hrahei tah my lo,
‘Naa khua luipadih kaa phe letei a kapaw hmai kaa cathingthlah hi, ma duitei cawh ma heh hnih my lo. Khazing painah raang cawh a ne myca,’ tatah tah my lo.
Ma heh ka ca ching he, biacenah ning taco ma khua navy co Sodom khua tai-ingnah hmai khah a zia a ung vy a.

Vy Korazin khua na cing a ping! Vy Bethsaida khua na cing a ping! Naaning letei tuapaw ningang chuipaw hming khah Tair le Sidon khua letah tuapaw cang he seh la, buri pai a buh a tah mecang letah a ty a he ka, a ngepachih syly tha he a.
Canghrasala, biacenah ning leco Tair le Sidon khua tei aa ingpaw cawh naaning navy tah a zia a ung vy tae a.
Taico, nama Kapernaum khua, avai tai kheh calia na cang maw? Cang bei ceh. Hraihming lang na tlahthlah a.

Naa rei a ca ngepaw maikaw he cawh kama ka rei a pa ngepaw a cang he. Naaning a ca hlawhpaw maikaw he cawh kama a pa hlawh paw a cang he. Canghrasala kama a pa hlawhpaw maikaw he cawh a pa tawtu a hlawhpaw a cang he,” a tah he.
Songsarih le pahning tlaw he khah lunglawng teitah va tlung kaw he ka, “Abuipaw, khachia vanghru sahlo zong tahmai na ming tah kaa rei aa ma nge,” tatah aa ching.
Zisu tah, “Setan khah lailaw hratah vaicung taitei a za tlahthlahpaw ka hmuh.
Pari sahlo le tlangcekawng sahlo zong tlaipabainah naw le naa caraepaw te khynah naw ca pei he neh ka, zetahmai a ca sawsah khy bei he.
Ma duitei cawh thlawpaw pialuipaw zong tah naa rei aa ca nge caw he tah a lawng khe o. Canghrasala vaicung letah naa ming cia a cangnah cawtah a lawng hri my lo,” tatah a palei he.

Ma ningcai leco Zisu cawh Thlawpaw Pathai thongtah a lawng ngetei ka, “Ka Paw, alui le avai Buipaw, ka ca reithai, mehthai mehsing sahlo caw taco, ma hming sahlo heh nawh ceh ka, nyheh hapaw sahlo khatah na palang. A cang, ka Paw, ma cawh nama na lawngnah cawh a cang,” a tah.

Zisu cawh ma hratei thlaw a chang khy taico zawpui sahlo lang cawh ma hrahei bia rei ka, “Hming vytei heh ka Paw tah a pa peh thlu thah he. Paw tah ly co Sawcapaw heh ahomaw a cang tahpaw ahotahmai hnih bei he.
