Taico, Sawcapaw le Sawcapaw tei hnisah rua pawtah a thingpaw he tah ly co Paw cawh ahomaw a cang tahpaw ahotahmai hnih bei he,” a tah.
Mataico, a hningzuitu sahlo lang khah a hui ka, aaning ei teitah ching he ka, “Naa hmuhpaw hming a hmuhpaw mehkho sahlo cawh bonghnang aa ting.

Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Khazing khuavang le abui sahlo mehlupui tah naa hmuhpaw heh hmuh aa du ngetei cy hrah naná teitah hmuh bei he. Naa thuipaw heh thui aa du ngetei hrah naná teitah za thui bei he,” tatah a tah he.
Uikheh cawh phungbia a thai ngeteipaw pakheh cawh Zisu pase du tah a daw ka, “Cawngpahtu, chaizaw hringnah ka hmuh khy nápawtah zemaw ka tua a?” tatah a hae.
Zisu tah, “Khazing phungbia letah zemaw a cia? Zekhatamaw na hni?” tatah a hae hri kaw.

Phungbia a thai ngeteipaw taco, “ ‘Abuipaw na Khazing khah na lungthing vytei, na hringnah vytei, na thawzaang vytei le na khuarawnah vytei tah do my lo.’ Mataico, ‘Nama na dopaw hratah na ingpaw khah do my lo,’ tahpaw he a cang,” tatah a chai.
Zisu tah, “Na pachaipaw ahmang ngetei, ma hraco va tua la, na hring a,” a tah.
Canghrasala, ama teitah thai a cangsah khah a dunah cawtah, “Ka ingpaw cawh ahomaw a cang?” tatah a hae kaw.

Zisu tah palei ka, “Cawngsaw pakheh Jerusalem khua taitah Jeriko khua lang a seithlah. Ma langpui leco damia sahlo tah hrawh he ka, a caise vytei pahlu pah thlu he ka, thi daimang tah aa dai khy taitah aa seisai.
Tlangbui pakheh cawh ma lang a za sei hrah ning khatah a tong ka, damia sahlo tah aa daipaw cawngsaw khah a hmuh tihtah khungsai ka, lang kang rakheh lang tah a cahri.
Ma paw hraco Levi mingphing pakhehpaw tah ma hminghmaw cawh va phah hrah ka, a hmuh tihtah khungsai ka, langkae lang co a cahri sai thlang hrah.
Canghrasala, Samaria cawngsawpaw pakheh cawh khua tlawng hrah ka, damia sahlo tei aa daipaw cawngsawpaw ungnah khah va phah hrah ka, a hmuh cangkawleh ning a do ngetei.
A vawhno ka, a hmaw vytei khah sathy le misurhang thupah ka, a tongchai pah khy taitah ama a kelaipaw, la cung lang cawh khing ka, khuabuh lang seikhui ka, ma leco a mingkai.

A ningthlamongpaw leco, ngung tangka phaehning cawh chua ka, khuabuh a hnuitupaw cawh pei ka, ‘Ma cawngsaw heh achaw teitah mingkai la, ka va kaw kaw tihtah a hluipaw tei na changpaw maikaw cawh ka ca chang kaw thlu tae a,’ a tah.
Ma tlaw pathung hrong lehei ahomaw damia sahlo tei aa hrawhpaw cawngsaw a ingpaw cawh a cang tatah na rawh?” tatah a hae.
Phungbia a thaipaw taco, “A cung letei ningdonah a hnuipaw khah a cang a, tah ka rawh,” tatah a chai. Zisu tah, “Sei la, ma hraco va tua hrah,” tatah a tah.
Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo khah khua aa tlawnglai ning tah khua khuakheh va phah he ka, ma leco canuno pakheh Martha aa tahpaw tah a ing letah a tlungsah he.
Martha cawh Mari aa tahpaw chuahruino pakheh a hnui. Ama cawh Abuipaw phehrang letah a ty ka, a bia reipaw khah a nawthlia.

Canghrasala, Martha cawh raihrepaw ahlunah cawtah a rai a hnawh ngetei. Zisu khatah a vong ka, “Abuipaw, ka nyteino tei rai kama longtei a pa váso thlangpaw heh a pui tah bei ceh maw? Kama baw rua pawtah pa chingpah law,” a tah.
Abuipaw taco, “Martha, Martha, hming hlupui cawtah lung reithui tah na ung,
canghrasala hming sangkheh suipaw a hia. Mari tah achaw vypaw a thingpaw heh ama taitah lah pápaw cang be,” a tah.

Ningkheh cawh Zisu cawh hminghmaw sangkheh letah thlaw a chang leimei. Thlaw a chang khy taico a hningzuitu pakheh tah a hai letah, “Abuipaw, Johan tah a hningzuitu sahlo a cawngpah pawhe hrakhei thlawchang ma cawngpah hrah,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah, “Thlaw naa chang tihtah ma hrahei chang my lo. ‘Vy kaa Paw, na ming cawh cizaw tah ung seh. Na painah tlung ky seh.
Ning ting kaa hiapaw batui ma pei my lo.
Kaa cung letei suanah a tuapaw kaa ngethai pawhe hrakhei kaa suanah ma ngethai hrah my lo. Tuhsonah lang a ma chui kheh lo,’ ” tatah a tah.
Taico Zisu tah ma hrahei a tah he, “A bianapaw tah naa hrong letah pakheh cawh vesaw pakheh hnui ka, ama khaco zaicing tah a vaw ka, ‘Ka dua, very tlangthung tah pa cui theh,
zecawtamaw tatah khua a tlawngpaw ka vesawpaw va tlung ka, zehmai peh ruapaw hnui bei neh,’ tatah a va tah.
Taico ing chung letei a ungpaw taco, ‘Hna pa hnawh tua kheh, ingkaw zong ka hrai thlu thah, ka sawtei leh zong kama khatah a ih thlu myca he, tho tah zehmai ca pei khy bei neh,’ tatah a chai.
Ka ca ching he a, vesaw chaw a cangnah cawtah tho lytah le very khah peh lytah ung hmai seh la, a hae lawnglia caco tho ka, a dunah zé tah a peh thlang a.
Macawtaco ka ca ching he a, hae la, peh na cang a he ceh, hui la, naa hmuh a, khong la, ingkaw hong pah na cang a he ceh.
Ahohmai a haepaw cawh peh a cang he a, a huipaw taco hmuh a ka, ingkaw a khawngpaw cawh hongpah a cang a.
Naaning paw a cangpaw sahlo, naa sawtei leh tah ngaw ca hae my he seh la, pari naa pae he maw?
Aatui ca hae he seh la, tlangcekawng naa pae he maw?
Naaning mehchahly tahmai naa sawtei leh hmingchaw peh zia naa hni caco, vaicung letei naa Paw taco Thlawpaw Pathai a haepaw sahlo khah ze tlua tamaw a peh vy chichi he a!” a tah he.
Zisu tah a rei a thlaw thai lypaw chung taikhei khachia khah a tingchua. Khachia a piathlah tihtah a rei a thlaw thai lypaw cawngsaw cawh a rei ka thlaw ka, mingzawpui khah aa ning a ang thlang.
Canghrasala aaning chung taitah thaikhehpaw taco, “Khachia sahlo buipaw Belzabub thongtah khachia sahlo a papia khy he,” tatah aa tah.
Ahringpaw sahlo taco, Ama khah pase du tah vaicung lang tei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah ma tuapah law, tatah aa tah.
Zisu tah aa rawhnah khah hnih ka, aa hai letah, “Ze painah raang hmai, aaning le aaning aa dy caco he a rawh thlu he a. Taico ingchungkho khokheh zong a rai ly tei a chaichy caco he a rawh hrá he a.
Setan zong ama le ama a dy caco, zekhatamaw a painah raang cawh a daw khy a? Ma bia heh Belzabub thongtah khachia sahlo a papia he naa tah cawtah ka reipaw a cang hi.

Atoheh kama tah Belzabub thongtah khachia khah ka papia pawtei a cang caco, naaning a ca zuipaw sahlo he takhei saw aho thong tamaw aa papia? Macawtaco aaning cawh naaning bia a ca cepahtu a cang he a.
Canghrasala, khachia sahlo khah Khazing hmingtuakhynah thongtah ka papia pawtei he a cang caco, Khazing painah raang cawh naaning khatah a tlung thah tahnah a cang.
Mehthawtlung pakheh tah hrainang a hlupui khatah a ing khah a vai thlang chung taco a hnuichia vytei a bing.
Canghrasala ama navy tah a thawtlung vypaw tah dy katei, a pahneh tih taco, a paichaipaw hrainang vytei khah lah pah ka, a hringpaw a lahpaw hming vytei khah a rai thlu he.
Ahohmai kama lang a bai lypaw cawh a pa caraepaw a cang, kama a pa pahmo khui lypaw cawh a papaipaw a cang.

Thlawpaw pialuipaw cawh cawngsawpaw chung taitah a ka piathlah tihtah raangcaa raangro lekhei a hianah hminghmaw hui tah a khiakaly ka, hmuh be. Mataico, ‘Ka piasaipaw ing lang khah ka pange kaw thlang a,’ tatah a tah.
Ing cawh a va phah tihtah longkarong tah ung ka, pathai pahling teitah chiapaw a cangpaw khah a hmuh.

Taico sei ka, ama navy tah a sua vypaw he ahringpaw thlawpaw pialuipaw pasarih a va chui he ka, ma ing cawh aa pahrang. Taico ma cawngsawpaw cawh athoning tei navy khei, a hning tei a dawhming cawh a pazua vy syly,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah ma hming vytei heh a rei leimeining taco, zawpui hrong taikhei canu pakheh cawh ka y chua ka, “Nama a ca sahtu le hnabae tui tei a ca cawngtu cawh bonghnang a ting caimang,” a tah.
Zisu taco, “Canghrasala, Khazing bia khah thui tei, a bia a zuipaw he cawh bonghnang aa ting vypaw a cang he,” tatah a chai.

Cawngsaw rungpui aa va hlu vy leimeining takhei Zisu taco, “Atochai cawngsaw heh a chah ly caimang he. Ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah aa hae, canghrasala Khazing khuavang Jonah paching pakhanah khah tah cy ly co zehmai peh cang a bei he.
Nineve khua cawngsaw cawtah Jonah cawh paching pakhanah a cangpaw hrakhei Cawngsaw Sawcapaw zong heh atochai cawngsaw cawtah paching pakhanah a cang hrah.

Biacenah ning leco thuilang Abuino Shiba cawh a daw a ka, ato chai cawngsaw sahlo heh thaily a cang sá he a. Zecawtamaw tatah ama cawh Solomon a singnah bia nge rua pawtah alui a changnah taitah va sei ka, canghrasala atoheh Solomon navy tah a lai vypaw ma lehei a ung thlang.

Biacenah ning leco Nineve khua cawngsaw sahlo cawh atochai cawngsaw khahei a daw hrui he ka, sua aa phosah tae he a, zecawtamaw tatah ma tlaw taco Jonah a bia reipaw rawng tah angepachihnah aa hnui, taico atoheh ma lehei Jonah navy tah a rungnaw vypaw a ung thlang.

Ahotahmai me-ing aa vang tihtah a langlynah hminghmaw letah maw, tongbai rai letah maw chia bang bei he. Ing chunglang a naepaw tah a khaipaw aa hmuh khy nápawtah me-ing tung letah me-ing khah a chia tei.
Na meh heh na pung cawtah me-ing a cang. Na meh a chah caco, na pungpaluh zong khah khainá tah a chih. Canghrasala na meh a chah ly caco, na pung zong muiná tah a chih.
A raering my lo, naa chung letei a ungpaw khainah cawh muinah cang be kho.
Macawtaco na pungpaluh cawh khai ná tah a chi tei, na pungsaw a zehapaw letah hmai muinah a ung ly caco, me-ing a khainah tei a ca khaisopaw hrakhei na pung cawh a khai a,” a tah.
Bia a rei khy taico Zisu cawh Farasi pakheh tah batui e hrui pawtah a hrui. Macawtaco va sei ka, a ty ka, cabuai khah a hia thlang.
Canghrasala, Zisu cawh Farasi phung a cangpaw e hlai tah kih si khah tua be ca ka, Farasipaw tah a kih a si lypaw khah a hmuh tihtah a khuarawh a haa.
Mataico Abuipaw tah a hai leco, “Naaning Farasi cawngsaw taco ny le pakang sahlo alailang khah pathaisah he ceh ka, canghrasala, naa chunglang cawh chahlynah le dusawnah long teitah a chih.
Naaning mehruh sahlo, alailang a tuatu Khazing takhei a chunglang zong tua hrah bei maw?
Canghrasala naa pakang le naa ny chung letei a ungpaw khah mehsisah va pei la, naa cawtah zezongpui a pathai thlang a.

Naaning Farasi sahlo, naa cing a ping, zecawtamaw tatah naa buichung taitei a chuhpaw hmekhuh, hanghui le aihnaw sihnaw taikhah chyhraw chykheh khah Khazing naa peh naná teitah dingnah le Khazing do khah naa thlawdaw. A hmetaw teipaw heh dethlang lytah ahning teipaw zong heh naa tua ruapaw a cang.
Farasi sahlo, naa cing a ping, zecawtamaw tatah synagog letah achaw caipaw dyching letah a ty du he ceh ka, chodo tlaang letah cizaw hmo tah bia a ching khah naa du.
Naa cing a ping, zecawtamaw tatah naaning cawh ngianah a ung lypaw athlai, ahotahmai hni ly tei aa tlaichai teipaw hratah na cang he ceh,” tatah a tah.
Phungbia a thai ngeteipaw hrong letei pakheh tah, “Cawngpahtu, ma vytei hming na rei tih lehei kaaning zong na ma zongte hrah,” tatah a chai.

Zisu tah, “Naaning phungbia a thai ngeteipaw sahlo naa cing a ping, zecawtamaw tatah cawngsaw khah aa pho khy lypaw behnah phung hmingrih khing he ceh ka, naa vuhsah he. Naaning duiteisai cawh aaning baw rua pawtah naa kihdong hmai calia du bei he ceh.
Naa cing a ping, zecawtamaw tatah naa pupaw sahlo tei aa za nongpaw he Khazing khuavang sahlo caw takhei thlailung sahlo naa bing he.
Macawtaco naa pupaw sahlo aa tuasanah khah naa naw a tlah khui hrah he tahnah a cang, aaning tah Khazing khuavang sahlo khah aa nong he, naaning tah aa thlailung naa bing.
Macawtaco Khazing singnah tei a reipaw cawh, ‘Khazing khuavang le apostol sahlo khah aaning khatah thlaw he neh ka, thaikheh khah theh a he ka, thaikhehpaw khah aa hrae he a,’ a tah.
Macawtaco atochai cawngsaw sahlo cung lehei khazaw hrangthonah taitei aa thawpaw he Khazing khuavang vytei aa thisai rawng tah dangtahnah a tlung tae a.

Abel thisai taitah dangnah siasang le behnah ing pathai kaa letah aa thawpaw Zakaria thisai tai a cang a. A cang, ka ca ching he, ma vytei cawtah hei atochai cawngsaw sahlo heh dangtah a cang tae he a.

Naaning phungbia a thai ngeteipaw sahlo, naa cing a ping, zecawtamaw tatah hninah ingkaw cabi khah law he ceh ka, naa seikhui. Naaning duiteisai cawh a nae bei he ceh, taico a nae dupaw khah naa pakhang tlung he,” tatah a tah.
Ma hminghmaw taico Zisu cawh a piathlah tihtah Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah thaw tah cakhae he ka, hming a hlupui kong khah hae cakhia he ka,
ma pawsui co a reichiapaw bia khei aa tle khy a.

Ma cai leco cawngsaw thonghlupui a pahmo caw he tah pakheh le pakheh a tlaichai pai leimei he ka, Zisu tah ahmasaw cai tah a hningzuitu sahlo hai letah ma hrahei a rei. “Cungmai raipha a cangpaw Farasi sahlo raangri khah a raering my lo.
No thlangpaw hming maikaw palang cang a he ka, biaparuh zong phy a cang he a.
A muinah letah naa reipaw zong a khainah letah thui cang a ka, inah khang letei naa reipaw biaparuh zong khah ing tlungkhu taitah phy a cang he a.
Ka huivesaw sahlo, ka ca ching he, pungsaw a theh khypaw sahlo khah ahohmai ci khe lo. Aa thaw khy taikhei zehmai tua khy khawh bei he.

Canghrasala ahomaw naa ci ruapaw a cang takhah ka ca hmuh sá he a. Pungsaw zong thaw khy taitei hraihming lang zong thlah khynah naw a hnuipaw Khazing khah ci hri my lo. A cang, ka ca ching he, Ama cawh ci my lo.
Baibaw pavaw sangpangaw khah tangka phaesai phaehning tah zua bei he maw? Canghrasala, sangkheh tei hmai khah Khazing tah monghly be.
Ahmangpaw tei co, naa lu letei sangbu sahlo hmai rei thlu a cang he. Zehmai ci khe o. Naaning cawh baibaw pavaw sahlo navy tah na sungnaw vy he ceh.
Cawngsaw hmekung letei Kama a pacang khuipaw cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw tah Khazing vaiming sahlo hme letah ka cangkhui hrá a.
Canghrasala, ahohmai cawngsaw hrong letah Kama a pa paphahsaipaw cawh Khazing vaiming sahlo hme letah ka paphah sai hrá a.
Taico ahohmai Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a reipachiapaw maikaw cawh ngethai khy cang thlang he ka, Thlawpaw Pathai a reipachiapaw maikaw cawh ngethai khy cang a bei he.
Synagog sahlo le uhtu bui sahlo le nawhnuitu sahlo aa hme letah chuakhui naa cang tihtah zekhatamaw a reicakai neh ka, zemaw ka rei a tahpaw khah naa thlawzawng kheh seh.
Zecawtamaw tatah ma cai letei naa rei ruapaw khah Thlawpaw Pathai tah a ca ching tae he a,” tatah a tah.
Zawpui hrong taitah cawngsaw pakheh tah Zisu hai letah, “Cawngpahtu, ka unypaw khah ry chaichy pawtah pa chingpah law,” a tah.
Zisu taco, “Cawngsawpaw, naa pahning kaa letah biacetu le ry chytu tah ahomaw naw hnuinah a pa pei?” tatah a chai.
Mataico aa zongmingtei hai letah, “A raering teitah ung my lo! Du hlui hnuinah a phingphing khah a raering my lo. Cawngsaw hringnah heh a hnuipaw rungnah letah a pahnia be,” a tah.
Mataico aa hai letah ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he, “Mehrungpaw pakheh a ly cawh kungvui a chah ngetei.
Ama le ama cawh, ‘Zekhatamaw tua neh seh la, a chah a? Ka saze chia nápaw hminghmaw hmai a ung khawh tlung be,’ a tah.
Taico a reipaw cawh, ‘Ma hrahei ka tua a. Ka sachai heh chehthlah a neh ka, alai vypaw ka sá a, ma leco ka saze vytei le ka hmingbo sahlo ka chia a.
Taico kama le kama khah, “Kung hlupui cawtah hmingchaw a hlupui hnui ceh ka, a nawng teitah ung la, e la, ding la, a nawng my lo,” tatah ka tah a,’ tatah a tah.
Canghrasala Khazing tah, ‘Mehruhpaw! Ato zai hrahring lehei na thi a. Macawtaco na cawtah na pacungpaw hming vytei cawh aho tamaw a lah a?’ tatah a tah.
Ama a caw suipaw tah hming pacung katei, Khazing letah a rung lypaw cawngsaw maikaw cawh ma hraco a cang a,” tatah a tah.
Mataico Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo hai letah, “Macawtaco ka ca ching he, naa hringnah cawtah zemaw kaa e a, a cang ly leh naa pung cawtah a buh a sai ruapaw kong letah naa lung reithui kheh seh.
Hringnah heh e le ba navy tah sungnaw vy ka, pung heh chaichi navy tah a sungnaw vy.

Ra-aw khah pacang tua hmai, thleci cing be ca he ka saze zong hre bei he, sachai zong hnui bei he, a cang naná teitah Khazing tah a cong thlang he. Naaning cawh pavaw navy tah a sungnaw vypaw cang bei he ceh maw!
Naa hrong letah ahomaw a lungreithuinah rawng tah a hringnah cai suimehlang pakheh chang a chahchi khy?
Ma hratei hming a chia pawtei hmai naa tua khy tlung lypaw tah zecawtamaw a hringpaw hming cawtah lungreithui tah naa ung?

Lili pangpa sahlo khah zekhatamaw aa ka cy tahpaw pacang tua o. Rai hre bei he, chaichi a taw bei he. Canghrasala ma heh ka ca ching he, siangpahrang Solomon hmai khah ma tlua khei a laisui thlang naná teitah ma pangpa sahlo letei kung kheh tlua khei hmai pasang cang be.
Vy naaning zingnah a cawngpaw sahlo, alui letah atoning ka cy katei, ningthlamong me lang aa bo thlangpaw araang hmai a pasangpaw Khazing taco naaning cawh a ca pasang vy chichi he a.
Macawtaco, naa ding naa e ruapaw kong pacang tah lung reithui tah ung khe lo.
Zecawtamaw tatah ma hapaw hming sahlo cawh lawki cawngsaw sahlo zong tah aa hui teipaw cang hrah ka, naa Paw vaicung leteipaw tah naa hiapaw khah a hni thlang.
Canghrasala a painah raang khah hui la, ma hming vytei zong heh peh na cang thlang a he ceh.
Phu cawngtei sahlo, ci khe lo. Zecawtamaw tatah naa Paw tah a painah raang a ca pehpaw he khah a lung a lawngpaw a cang.

Naa hnuichia sahlo khah zua la, mehsisah sahlo khah pei my lo. A cai thai lypaw tangkabawng khah a zaa la, mehru tei aa ruh khylynah le luichaw tei aa e khylynah hming, vaicung letah aa chang khaw lypaw chosung sahlo cawh pacung my lo.
Zecawtamaw tatah naa chosung a ungnah letah naa lungthing cawh a ung hrá a.
Rai hre pawtah caise a tua pacia tah ung la, me-ing vang cia tah chia my lo.
Nupui chui kongchuanah hming taitah a va tlung kawpaw aa buipaw cawh a va chua cangkawleh ingkaw a khong tihtah rairang teitah hongpah rua pawtah a heh thlangpaw a saecapaw sahlo hratah ung my lo.

Aa buipaw tah a hraw hmotei a heh thlangpaw he sae sahlo, a va chuahnopaw sahlo he cawh meh vaichaw a cang he. Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ama cawh raihrenah caise a tua ka, cabuai cadung sá he ka, ama hrahring tah a tuitang he a.
Zaicing tamaw a cang ly leh ma navy co a haa vy tah a va tlung tih letah hmai a mai pacia teitah aa za haw thlangpaw khah aa buipaw tah a hmuh caco he, ma sae sahlo cawh meh vaichaw a cang he a.
Canghrasala ma heh hnih my lo. Ing hnuitu tah mehru cawh ze cai letah maw a va chua a takhah hnih thah my seh la, a ing cawh hrawh sá a be.
Macawtaco a mai pacia tah ung my lo, zecawtamaw tatah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh naa rawh lypaw cai lekhei a vong a,” tatah a tah.
Piter taco, “Abuipaw, ma tawchingnah bia heh kaaning longtei maw na ma ching, a cang ly leh ming vytei caw tamaw?” tatah a hae.
Abuipaw taco, “Aho khah maw zing a chuipaw le a singpaw, a ingchungkho sae sahlo khah a cai naning teitah batui peh rua pawtah a buipaw tah rai a pehpaw mingkaitu cawh a cang?
Aa buipaw a va tlung kaw tihtah ma hratei a tuapaw a hmuhpaw sae cawh meh vaichaw a cang.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma paw cawh a hnuichia vytei a mingkaitu takhei a tua a.
Canghrasala a bianapaw tah a saecapaw taco ama le ama khah, ‘Ka buipaw cawh a va tlung nápaw a ne be,’ tatah tah ka, zuding saw e tah ung ka, ahringpaw sae canu le sae capaw sahlo khah a dai he.

Ma saecapaw a buipaw cawh a rawh lypaw ning le a pacang lypaw cai letah va tlung a ka, a buipaw tah ma sae capaw cawh caiping caimang tah taichung a ka, a zing lypaw sahlo ungnah lekhei a ungsah hrah a.
A buipaw dunah hni thlang tei, rai hre pawtah a mai pacia tei a ung lypaw le a buipaw dupaw a tua lypaw sae cawh ui hlupui tah chei a cang a.

Canghrasala, a buipaw dunah hni ly hmotei dangtah tlang a cangpaw suanah a tuapaw cawh a cawng vy tah chei a cang a. A hlupui peh a cangpaw cawh a hlupui hae kaw a cang a. A hlupui kai sahpaw cawh a hlu vy tah hae kaw a cang he a,” a tah.
Ma hrahei a rei vy, “Alui heh me tah ro rua pawtah pui ka vong. Kang myca seh la, tah ka du caimang!
Canghrasala baptisma cang nátah tai-ingpaw hnui neh ka, ma ka patlung ka patlia hlai cawh ka lung rei a thui caimang.
Aluicung lehei denah chuasah rua pawtah a vong tatah maw naa parawh? Cang be, pachai pawtah a cang hri.
Atotei ri hei co ingchungkho ingkheh letah a ungpaw cawngsaw papangaw hrong letah a pachai he ka, pathungpaw tah pahningpaw khah dy he ka, pahningpaw tah pathungpaw khah aa dy tae he a.

Paw leh tah aa sawtei leh khah dy a he ka, sawtei leh tah aa paw leh khah aa dy he a. No leh tah aa sawcanu leh khah dy a he ka, sawcanu letah aa no leh khah aa dy he a. Sawcapaw no leh tah myno leh khah dy a he ka, myno leh tah aa pasaepaw no leh khah aa dy tae he a,” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco mingzawpui hai letah, “Nitlah lang tah meding a ka chuhpaw naa hmuh tihtah sungkheh tah, ‘Khua a so a!’ tah he ceh ka, ma hraco a so tahtah.
Thuilang tah thli a hrang tihtah, ‘Ning a paling tae a!’ tah he ceh ka, a paling tahtah.
Cungmai raipha sahlo! Alui le avai ming he ceh ka, ningkhua zemaw a lo a tah cawh naa hni. Zekhatah zia tamaw atochai hming ung zia a silang heh naa ching pase thai be?
Zecawtamaw naaning teitah zemaw ahmang tah cawh naa pacang thai be?

Naa caraepaw khatah biacetu hme letah chua pawtah naa sei tihtah langpui letah a rai khy nápaw khah a zawng my lo. Ma hratei na tua ly caco biacetu hme letah ca chuakhui ka, biacetu tah nawhnuitu kih letah ca hlai sua a ka, taico thong letah thlah na cang sua a.
Ka ca ching, tangka lia ruapaw na lia thlu hlai vytei cawh thong taitah chuh khy khaw bei ceh,” tatah a tah.
Ma ningcai taco ma letei a ungpaw cawngsaw thaikheh taco Zisu hai letah raang uhbui Pilat tei Galili cawngsaw thuihlainah aa tua leimei ning tah a thaw sahpaw he kong khah aa ching.
Zisu tah, “Ma hratei thihnah a ingpaw Galili cawngsaw sahlo he khah ahringpaw Galili cawngsaw sahlo navy tah aa sua vy rawng tah a cang tatah maw naa rawh?
Cang be tah ka ca ching he! Naaning zong na ngepachih ly caco he ceh na lyde hra he ceh.

A cang ly leh Siloam ing a sangpaw a cing ning tah a naiseh pawhe cawngsaw pahrawhluireh khah Jerusalem khuapui chung letei a ungpaw a hringpaw cawngsaw sahlo navy tah aa sua vy cawtah a cang naa tah maw?
Cang be tah ka ca ching he! Naaning zong na ngepachih ly caco he ceh na lyde hra he ceh,” a tah he.
Taico Zisu tah ma tawchingnah bia heh ching he ka, “Cawngsawpaw tah a buichung letah thuiku kung kung kheh cing ka, a thui maw thui ly tatah a va ming tihtah zehmai hmuh be.
Macawtaco buichung a mingkaipaw hai letah, ‘Ma thuiku kung heh a thui maw, thui ly tatah kung thung chung mingkai neh ka, zehmai hmuh bei neh. Hyhly! Cholui chang a pahry,’ tatah a tah.
Buichung a mingkaipaw taco, ‘Abuipaw, ato kung kung kheh chung tei heh cawh ming cawng tua, a kaekang heh thlo pá neh ka, alui achawpaw ka bia a.
Hangkung lang a thui caco chah thlang ka, ma hratah cang ly tei a thui ly caco, hyhly thlang lepui ceh,’ a tah,” tatah a tah.
Sabat ning tah Zisu tah synagog sangkheh letah a cawngpah leimeining he takhei,
kung hrawhluireh chung khachia tah a tlepaw canuno a za ung. A kai a king thlu thah ka, a pathlang khy bingbi lytah a ung myca.
Zisu tah ma no cawh a hmuh tihtah a hmelang va chuh law tatah y ka, “Cawngsawno, nama cawh na ciacung lynah taco a ca thlaw myca,” a tah.
Taico a cung letah a kih pahnia ka, sungkheh teitah canuno cawh a ka pathlang khy ka, Khazing khah a reithai.

Sabat ning tah Zisu tah cawngsaw a dangsah cawtah synagog a uhtu cawh a thingae ka, zawpuipaw khah, “Raihrenah ning ningruh a ung, Sabat ning rei lytah ma ningruh chung leco a vong tah na dangsah bei he ceh,” tatah a tah he.
Abuipaw tah a hai letah, “Naaning cungmai raipha sahlo! Ahotahmai Sabat ning tah a co cang seh, a la cang seh, naa ing taitah thlaw he ceh ka, tui ding sá pawtah seikhui thlang bei he ceh maw?
A cang caco Abraham pathlah a cangpaw, Setan tei kung hrawhluireh chung hrai katei a sahpaw heh Sabat ning zong tah dangsah pápaw cang bei maw?” a tah he.
Ma hratei bia a palei tih he taco Ama a caraepaw vytei khah aaning a zeh. Canghrasala zawpuipaw taco a tuapaw hming ningang chuipaw vytei cawtah khei aa thaw a chah ngetei.
Zisu tah, “Khazing painah raang cawh zekhatamaw a lo? Zekhatamaw kaa tawching a?
Cawngsawpaw pakheh tah a ly chung letah a lingpaw aihrang ci khatah a lo. Aihrang ci cawh ka chang ka, thingkung tah a ka tua ka, pavaw sahlo tah a cai sahlo letah a cawng tei he,” a tah.
Taico Zisu tah a tah vypaw cawh, “Khazing painah raang cawh zekhatamaw kaa tawching a?
Canuno tah vedi hongkheh lekhei raangri pahlawh ka, a nong chi. Ma raangri taco vedi cawh a tho sahpaw hratah a cang,” a tah.
Taico Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang a seinah langpui letah khuapui zong khuatei zong pae pai lai ka, a cawngpah lai he.
Cawngsaw thaikheh tah, “Abuipaw, meh cawngtei long maw pachah a cang he a?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu taco, ma hrahei a tah he, “Ingkaw a bawpaw lang tah a nae pawtah thaw tah a zong my lo, zecawtamaw tatah ka ca ching he, cawngsaw a hlupui tah a nae zaa he ka, a nae khy bei he.

Ing hnuitu khah tho ka, a ingkaw khah a kha tae a. Taico naaning cawh ingkaw khungthing lang tah ingkaw khah khong he ceh ka, ‘Abuipaw ingkaw ma hong ky law,’ tatah naa ta a. Canghrasala ama taco, ‘Ze taitah maw naa va chua? Naaning cawh ca hnih bei he neh,’ tatah a ca tah tae he a.
Mataico naaning tah, ‘Nama khatah kaa e hrui, kaa ding hrui tei kha, kaa khuatlang letah na ma cawngpah tei kha saw,’ naa tah a.
Canghrasala ama taco, ‘Naaning zong ca hnih bei he neh, zelang tamaw naa va chua tahpaw hnih bei neh. Naaning hming chahly a tuapaw vytei ka kae taitah seihly o!’ a ca tah tae he a.

Naaning vytei cawh alailang letah vathlang cang he ceh ka, Abraham le Isak le Jakob le Khazing khuavang vytei cawh Khazing painah raang chung lekhei naa hmuh tae he a. Ma tih taco cá he ceh ka, naa haw naa ria tae a.
Cawngsaw cawh nichua, nitlah, thuilang, tlanglang tah a vong a he ka, Khazing painah raang lawhdangnah hming lekhei a ty he a.
Ma tih taco ato letei a hningcaipaw zong heh a hme a sahpaw cang he ka, ato letei a hme a sahpaw zong heh a hningcaipaw a cang tae he a,” tatah a tah.
Ma ning taco Farasi thaikhehpaw tah Zisu kha a vong he ka a hai letah, “Ma hminghmaw taihei piathlah la, hmingkheh kheh lang sei. Herod tah thaw a ca du,” tatah aa ching.
Zisu tah, “Va sei la, ma sihatei khah va ching o, ‘Atoning zong, ningthlamong zong, khachia sahlo tingchua he neh ka, a dang lypaw ka dang sá he a. A ningthung ning tah ka rai cawh ka paling a.’
Zekhatah a cang zong tah atoning, ningthlaw le hazaining tai cawh ka sei longmang thlang a. Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing khuavang cawh Jerusalem khuapui khungthing lang letah thih phung cang be!

Vy Jerusalem! Jerusalem! Khazing khuavang sahlo khah za theh he ceh ka, Khazing tah naaning khatah a tawpaw he a cawngsaw sahlo khah alung tah naa vaseh tei he. Aa puino tah a sawtei leh a mathlaw rai letah a bakhupaw he hratah naa cawngsaw cawh uikhazeh uilui maw pakhawng du he neh ka, canghrasala du bei he ceh!
Mingtua hmai o, naa ing cawh a ching myca. Ka ca ching he, ‘Abuipaw ming tah a vongpaw cawh bonghnang song cang ky seh,’ tatah naa tah hlai vytei cawh pa hmuh kaw khaw bei ceh,” tatah a tah.
Sabat ning leco Zisu cawh Farasi sahlo letei hruitu pakheh ing lang khah batui hrong pawtah a sei tihtah Ama cawh achaw teitah aa ngia lai.
Ma leco a hmekaw letah cawngsawpaw pakheh thlingnah hri a ingpaw a ung.
Zisu tah Farasi sahlo le phungbia a thai ngeteipaw sahlo cawh, “Sabat ning letah dangsah heh a phung a cang maw cang ly?” tatah a tah he.
Canghrasala a cali thlang he. Macawtaco cawngsawpaw cawh va hre ka, dangsah ka, a seisah.

Mataico aa hai letah, “Naaning hrong letah pakheh tah Sabat ning letah a sawtei pakheh a cang ly leh a co tungpaw sangkheh khobatlung lang tlah my seh la, rairang tah chuahly a bei maw?” tatah a tah he.
Maco, a rei nápaw hnih bei he.
Hruipaw cawngsaw sahlo tah cabuai letah a tynah achawpaw a thingpaw he khah Zisu tah a hmuh tihtah aaning cawh ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he.
“Pakheh kheh tah nupui chuinah letah a ca hrui tih he tah a tynah achawpaw lekhei a ty khe lo. Nama navy tah a puimaw vypaw cawngsaw pakheh zong a hrui mai a.
Ma hratei a cang caco, naa pahning tah a ca hruipaw he kong a chuatupaw a vong ka, ‘Na tynah khah ama heh tlui,’ a ca tah a. Mataico ningzaw tah a chawly caipaw hming lekhei na ty a.

Canghrasala aa ca hrui tih he tah a nai caipaw hming lekhei a ty o. Maco a ca hruitupaw he a vong tihtah ama taco, ‘Ka dua, achaw vypaw hming lang a palong,’ a ca tah a. Ma tih taco male hme letah upanah na hmuh a.
Ahohmai ama le ama a pasangpaw cawh nytaw tah ung ka, ama le ama a panaipaw cawh pasang a cang a,” a tah he.

Mataico, Zisu tah kong a chuatupaw cawh, “Ching batui a cang ly leh zairia na tua tihtah na vesaw sahlo, na uny sahlo, naa sawny sahlo, a cang ly leh naa ingpaw mehrung sahlo khah hrui khe lo. Na hrui caco he aaning tah nama khah ca hrui kaw hrá he ka, chang kaw na cang tha a.
Canghrasala lawhdangnah na tua tihtah dawngchiapaw, ciacung lypaw, a phe a cabepaw le a mehcopaw khah hrui hri la, bonghnang song na cang a.
Aaning tah aa ca chang khy ly tahmai mehding thokawnah letah chang kaw na cang a,” tatah a tah.
Aaning hrong letei pakheh ama kha cabuai a cadung hruipaw taco a thui tihtah Zisu cawh, “Khazing painah raang letei lawhdangnah letah batui a epaw cawngsaw cawh meh vaichaw a cang a,” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco, “Pakhehpaw cawh kongchuanah rungnawpaw pachia ka, cawngsaw hlupui a hrui he.
Kongchuanah cai a zaw tihtah aa hruipaw he khah, ‘A vong myca o, zezong a tlang a tling thlu myca,’ tatah ching pawtah a sae khah a taw.
Canghrasala aa zongmingtei khei biasi aa phe thlu. A pakhehnahpaw taco, ‘Atotei khah alui co neh ka, va ming pawtah sei ka du. Pa ngethai ky,’ a tah.
Ahringpaw taco, ‘Atotei khah co tungpaw ching pangaw co neh ka, aaning khah hnehsá pawtah seipaw ka cang. Pa ngethai ky,’ a tah.
Ahringpaw vy taco, ‘Atotei khah nupui chui neh ka, macawtaco a vong thai bei neh,’ a tah.

A sae cawh a vong kaw ka, ma bia cawh a buipaw khah a ching. Mataico ing a hnuitupaw cawh a thingae ka a sae cawh, ‘Khuapui letei langpui sahlo le ing kaa leh ing kaa letei lang sahlo lang rairang tah va sei la, a dawngchiapaw, a ciacung lypaw, a mehcopaw le a phesongpaw khah va chuakhui o,’ a tah.
A sae taco, ‘Abuipaw, na pa chingpaw hrakhei tua neh ka, canghrasala ing chung letah chih balang bei he,’ tatah a tah.
Taico, a buipaw tah a sae cawh, ‘Langpui sahlo lang le arangchung lang va sei la, ka ing chih ky tah cawngsaw chuasah my lo.
Ka ca ching, ka hruipaw sahlo he takhei co, ka lawhdangnah batui heh pateh khy bei he,’ a tah,” tatah a tah.
Zawpuipaw cawh Zisu khatah khua tlawnglai he ka, Zisu tah aaning lang cawh a hui ka,
“Ahohmai kama kha a vong katei a no le a paw, a nupui le a saw sahlo, a uny sahlo le a satei sahlo le ama a hringnah hmai khah kama navy tah a do vypaw cawh ka hningzuitu cang khy be.
Taico, ma leh khraws a puá tah a pa zui lypaw cawh ka hningzuitu cang khy be.
Naaning hrong letah aho tamaw ingsang sah du seh la, a hnuipaw tangka tah a palingnah tai a zy maw tahpaw hni rua tah patih patong taw a bei maw?
A hrang patho thah katei, a paling khy lypaw tei a cang caco, aa hmuhpaw maikaw tah ama cawh aa hnuiso a.
‘Ma cawngsawpaw tahei ingsah patho ka, paling khy khawh be,’ aa tah a.

A cang ly leh abui pakheh cawh abui hringpaw dy rua pawtah sei seh la, ama dy rua pawtah mehnung thongki khatah a va seipaw pakheh khah mehnung thonghraw khatah a te khy a maw tahpaw cawh pacang taw a bei maw?
Te khy bei neh takhah a hni caco, a caraepaw langhlaw letah a ung chung takhei ai-awhtu sahlo thlaw tah arainah a hae a.
Ma hraco naaning zong naa hnuipaw maikaw naa seisai ly caco, ka hningzuitu cang khy bei he ceh.
Paci cawh a chah, canghrasala a aenah a ly caco zekhatamaw aa aesah kaw khy a?
Alui a chah sápaw cawtah chah be ca ka, ingding tah tua rua tah zong chah be, vathlang ruapaw suipaw a cang thlang a. Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw maikaw taco, ma bia heh thui he seh,” tatah a tah.
Taico ngungkhui kheitu sahlo le ahringpaw mehsua sahlo cawh Zisu a bia nge rua pawtah aa dawngkasawny teitah a pahmo he.
Canghrasala Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco, “Ma cawngsawpaw tahei mehsua sahlo achaw teitah chai he ka, aaning khatah batui a e thlang dei e,” tatah a phing he.
Mataico Zisu tah aaning cawh ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he.
“Naaning hrong letah pakheh tah a hnuipaw tuu zakheh lekhei sangkheh ly seh la, songkua sangkuapaw khah arangchung letah seisai tah a lypaw tuu khah seihno tah a hmuh kaw hlai vytei hui bei maw?
Taico, a lypaw tuu khah a hmuh kaw tihtah lunglawng teitah a saitlang letah khing ka, ing lang a tlung.
Mataico a vesaw sahlo le a ingpaw sahlo khah y he ka, ‘A pa lawng khui law, ka tuu a lypaw ka hmuh kaw thah e,’ a tah he.
Ka ca ching he, ma hraco mehding a ngepachih a hia lypaw songkua pakua navy co, a ngepachihpaw mehsua pakheh cung lekhei vaicung letah alawngnah a hlu vy.
A cang ly leh canuno pakheh tah ngung tangka phaehraw hnui seh la, phaekheh hly tua seh. Ma no taco me-ing vang tah ing phih a ka, a hmuh hlai tai achaw teitah hui a bei maw?
Ma no taco ma tangka cawh a hmuh tihtah a vesaw sahlo le a ingpaw sahlo khah y pakhong he ka, ‘A pa lawng khui law, a lypaw tangka khah ka hmuh thah e,’ tatah a tah he.
Ma hraco ka ca ching he, angepachihpaw mehsua pakheh cung lehei Khazing a vaiming sahlo hme letah alawngnah a ung,” tatah a tah.
Zisu tah a bia cawh reipazo ka, “Cawngsawpaw pakheh ung ka, sawcapaw pahning a hnui.
A nyheh vypaw tah a paw cawh, ‘Apaw, ka ting vypaw ry pa pei law,’ tah ka, macawtaco a paw tah a hnuipaw khah aaning cawh a chaichy he.
Khua sy a ry hlai tah a sawcapaw a nyheh vypaw taco a hnuipaw vytei cawh pakhong ka, langhlaw pui raang lang seihly ka, ma leco a tangka vytei cawh a nawngnangnah letah a hmang thlu.
A hnuipaw vytei a hmang thlu khy taikhei ma raang chung vytei leco cakaang a thaw tah tlung ka, ama cawh a phahlah pawngchang tah a ung myca.
Mataico ma raang letei cawngsawpaw pakheh khatah a vaw ka, a hlofa. Ma cawngsawpaw taco voh lawh a pei ruapaw tah ly lang a taw.
A ngai a di tu cawtah voh lawh khah hmai e du ngetei ka, canghrasala e ruapaw ahohmai a peipaw ung bei he.
A lung ka sing ka, ama tei co, ‘Ka paw ing letei a hlofapaw sahlo tahmai e ruapaw a hlupui hnui he ka, kama cawh ma lehei ngaidi tah ka thi daimang myca!
Tho a neh ka, ka paw kha ka sei a. Taico, “Ka paw, Khazing hme le na hme letah ka sua myca.
Na sawtei tah tlang hmai a tlah khawh bei neh, canghrasala, na raihrepaw sahlo letei pakheh hratah pa tua ky law,” tatah ka tah a,’ a tah.
Macawtaco tho ka, a paw khaco a sei. Canghrasala langhlaw pui letah a va sei leimeining takhei a paw taco va hmuh ka, ning a do ngetei. Va saihno ka, a pongchai ka, a hnang.
A sawcapaw taco, ‘Apaw, Khazing hme le na hme letah ka sua myca. Kama cawh na sawcapaw tah tlang hmai a tlah khawh bei neh,’ tatah a tah.
Canghrasala a paw taco a sae sahlo cawh, ‘Pai achaw caipaw khah rairang tah va tle la, a buh sá o. A kihdong lekhei kihsapadi a hro sá la, a phe lekhei phepakong a pakong sá o.
A thy caipaw co tungnypaw khah va hrui la, theh my lo. Kongchuanah tuá tah a nawng he peh.
Ma ka sawcapaw heh thi ka, a kahring kaw, ama cawh ly ka, ka hmuh kawpaw a cang,’ tatah a tah. Mataico lawhdangnah cawh aa tua.
Ma chung cawh a sawcapaw uthuipaw cawh ly letah a ung thlang. Ing lang ka tlung ka, ing kae a va phah tihtah hlaw o le aa langpaw py khah a thui.
Macawtaco sae pakheh khah y ka, ‘Zemaw naa tua?’ tatah a hae.
Ma saecapaw taco, ‘Na nyteipaw va kaw kaw ka, a bing teitah a va kaw kaw cawtah na paw tah a thy caipaw co tungnypaw khah a thaw,’ tatah a tah.
Uthuipaw cawh a thingae ka, ing chunglang a nae du khawh be. Macawtaco a paw cawh piathlah ka, a va naw.

Canghrasala a paw hai leco, ‘Rawh tua hmai! Kung ma vytei heh sae hratah ca hrepah neh ka, na reipaw zong nge lytah ung bang bei neh. Ma naná co hmai ka vesaw sahlo kha a nawng nápaw cawtah mei teitei hmai pa pei bang bei ceh.
Canghrasala ma na sawcapaw tahei na tangka vytei khah hlohlang no khatah hly thlu ka, ing lang a va kaw kaw tihtah a caw taco a thy caipaw co na thawpah!’ tatah a tah.
A paw taco, ‘Ka sawcapaw, nama cawh kama khatah ung leimei thlang ceh ka, ka hnuipaw vytei heh na tei a cang.
Canghrasala a lawngnah dy tua tah kaa lawngpaw he peh a cang, zemaw tah pawco ma na nyteipaw heh thi ka, a ka hring kaw, ama cawh ly ka, hmuh kawpaw a cang,’ tatah a palei,” tatah Zisu tah a tah.
Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Mehrung pakheh ung ka, hming a mingkaitu pakheh a hnui. Hming a mingkaitu taco mehrungpaw a cho le pe sahlo cawh a longdepaw tah a tua tatah pu a cang.
Macawtaco ama cawh mehrungpaw tah y ka, ‘Na kong ka thuipaw heh zekhatamaw a cang? Rai na hrepaw cazing papei, zecawtamaw tatah ka hming mingkaitu cang khy khawh bei ceh,’ a tah.
Hming a mingkaitu taco ama le ama cawh, ‘Zemaw ka tua a? Ka buipaw tah ka rai a pa lah pah thah. Alui che pawtah thawzaang hnui tlung be ca neh ka, kih do pawtah ka ning a zeh tlung.
A cang caco, zemaw ka tua a tahpaw ka hni myca! Ma hratei ka tua caco, ka rai a chang tihtah cawngsaw tah aa ing letah aa pa tlungsah du a,’ tatah a tah.
Maco a buipaw khatei luibah a hnuipaw sahlo khah pakheh cy tah y he ka, a pakhehnah khah, ‘Ka buipaw cawh khazeh maw na bah?’ tatah a hae.
‘Oliv sathy galon pung zareh,’ tatah a palei. Hming a mingkaitu taco, ‘Na cazing law la, rairang tah a ty la, galon pung zapali tatah cia,’ tatah a ching.
Mataico a pahningnah cawh, ‘Nama saw khazeh maw na bah?’ tatah a hae. ‘Changvuh bai thongkheh,’ tatah a palei. Ma cawngsawpaw zong cawh, ‘Na cazing law la, zareh tatah cia,’ tatah a tah.

Ma hming a mingkaitu mehdih lypaw tei singthai tei hming a tuapaw cawh a buipaw tah a pachaw ngetei. A hmang, khazaw cawngsaw heh aaning aa mehnung hui khatei aa cawtah aa tuanah kong leco Khazing a khainah letei a ungpaw cawngsaw navy tah a sing vy he.
Ka ca ching he, khazaw cho le pe heh vesaw hnui nápawtah hmang o. Ma hratei naa tua caco, naa cho a chang tihtah chaizaw ing letah naa ung he ceh.
Ahohmai a chia pawtei letah zingchui pawtah a ungpaw cawh alaipaw zong letah zingchuipaw cang tei ka, ahohmai a chia pawtei letah zing a chui lypaw cawh alaipaw zong letah zing chui hrah be.
Macawtaco, khazaw hnuirungnah letah zingchuipaw naa cang ly caco, rungnah hmuisuipaw letah ahomaw a ca zing he a?
Taico, cawngsaw hringpaw hnuicho letah zingchuipaw naa cang ly caco ahomaw naa tei rua pawtah hming a ca pei he a?

Aho sae tahmai abui pahning aa rai hre khy be. Pakheh a hua ka, pakheh a do a, a cang ly leh pakheh cung letah zingchuipaw tah ung a ka, pakheh khah ze tah rei a be. Khazing rai kha, tangka rai kha hre pakong khy bei ceh,” tatah a ching he.
Tangka a dupaw Farasi sahlo tah ma bia cawh thui he ka, Zisu cawh aa hmo aa miaso.

Zisu tah aaning cawh, “Cawngsaw mehmuh letah thai a cangsah he ceh ka, canghrasala naa lungthing cawh Khazing tah a hni. Cawngsaw tah a sungsah ngeteipaw heh Khazing mehmuh leco pasih a chuipaw a cang.

Moses phungbia le Khazing khuavang bia sahlo cawh baptisma peitu Johan chai tai khah a cang he. Ma cai ri taico Khazing painah raang thawngchawbia cawh rei leimei tah cang ka, ming hlupui cawh ma langpui chunglang khah a chuchei tah a nae he.
Khazing phungbia cabu chung letei a chia caipaw, casung tei deipaw tei hmai heh lahly navy co, alui le avai a lypaw hmai heh a neh vy syly a.
A nupui mah katei ahringpaw canu a chuipaw cawh a pheipaw a cang. Mah ciapaw canu a chuipaw capaw cawh a pheipaw a cang,” tatah a tah.
A rei vypaw cawh, “Mehrungpaw pakheh, saidungpaw paithladih anaipaw a tua katei, ning tating tei a nawng teitah khua a sahpaw a ung.
Kih dopaw, a ming Lazaru aa tahpaw, hmawchia tei a pahlong thlangpaw khah a hawkaw letah chia he ka,
mehrungpaw a cabuai taitah didang a tlahpaw khah e rua pawtah a du ngetei. Ui sahlo taco a vong he ka, a hmaw khah aa liapah tei.
Kih dopaw cawh a thihnah cai a va phah tihtah vaiming tah ama cawh Abraham kae letah aa seikhui. Mehrungpaw zong cawh thi hrah ka, aa phung.
Vaisang ngetei tei a ungnah hraihming taikhei, a cung lang cawh a kahui ka, langhlaw pui lekhei Abraham le a kae letei Lazaru khah a hmuh he.

Taico Abraham cawh y ka, ‘Ka paw Abraham, ning pa do la, Lazaru khah taw la, a kih dong khah tui letah nong seh la, ka lui a cakaw nápawtah za pa thlah so ky seh, zecawtamaw tatah ma me lehei ka tai tu myca,’ tatah a tah.

Canghrasala Abraham taco, ‘Ka sawtei, na hring chung tei hming chawpaw na cypaw vytei khah a thui thlang bei ceh maw? Ma ning lekhei Lazaru taco hmingchahly a cy kho. Canghrasala, atoheh cawh ama cawh ma lehei a hnaw pangang he ka, nama cawh taisai na tai myca.

Ma hlui co, na kaa le kaa kaa lehei khobatlung a thuh ngeteipaw ung ka, macawtaco ma taihei nama kha a va sei dupaw sahlo aa va sei khy lypaw hratah ma taikhei kaaning khatah ahohmai va cakang khy hrá bei he,’ tatah a palei.
Mataico mehrungpaw taco, ‘Ka ca naw, ka paw! Lazaru khah ka paw ing lang taw la,
uny papangaw hnui he neh ka, aaning cawh a raeringnah va pei he seh la, ma tai-ingnah hming lang heh aa va sei ly nápawtah,’ tatah a tah.
Abraham taco, ‘Moses le Khazing khuavang sahlo hnui thlang he ka, aaning aa bia cawh nge thlang he seh,’ tatah a palei.
Mehrungpaw taco, ‘Cang be, ka paw Abraham, a thi ciapaw tah aaning kha aa va sei caco, aa ngepachih thlang he a,’ tatah a tah.
Canghrasala Abraham taco, ‘Moses le Khazing khuavang sahlo aa bia aa nge ly caco, thihnah taitah a thokawpaw aa ung tahmai tah aa bia zong nge hlui a bei he,’ tatah a palei,” tatah Zisu tah a tah.
Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo hai leco, “Cawngsaw a suasahpaw hming sahlo a ung paria thlang he a. Canghrasala suanah a chuakhuipaw mehnung cawh a cing a ping.
Ma nyhehtei sahlo lehei pakheh hmai heh a suasahpaw cawh a hirong letah saangrianah lung pathle tah rili lang thlah he seh la, a cawtah a chah vy a.
Macawtaco a singkang my lo. Na unypaw tah suanah a tua caco, chinghring la, a ngepachih caco ngethai my lo.
Ning kheh tah uisarih na cung letah sua katei, uisarih nama kha a vong tah, ‘Ka ngepachih,’ a ca tah caco ngethai my lo,” a tah he.
Apostol sahlo tah Abuipaw cawh, “Kaa zingnah heh changchysah vy law!” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Aihrang hmu tia tei chang zingnah naa hnui caco, ma siasahming kung heh, ‘A phehly la, rili letah va cy law,’ tah khy he ceh ka, naa bia a ca nge thlang he a.
Naaning hrong letah pakheh tah alui a paleh ruapaw tamaw, tuu a king ruapaw tamaw sae pakheh hnui seh la, arangchung lang tah a va tlung tihtah, ‘A vong la, a ty la batui e,’ naa tah a maw?
Ma hraco tah lytah, ‘Batui pa tuapah, a pachia la, ka ding ka e chung vytei heh pa ungpai thlang, ma khy taico na ding na e tae hra a,’ tah hri bei maw?
Ma a saecapaw tah a chingpaw hratah a tua cawtah a buipaw tah a cung letah a lawng hlui be.
Ma hraco naaning khatah chingpaw vytei heh naa tua thlu khy taitah hmai, ‘A chahnai lypaw sae kaa cang he peh, kaa hre ruapaw rai pui kaa hre hi,’ tah my lo,” a tah he.
Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang a seining takhei, Samaria le Galili raangri khei a sei lai.
Khua khuakheh chunglang a nae ka, thinghmuihri a ingpaw pahraw cawh Ama khatah a tong he. Langhlaw pui khei a daw he ka,
a thangpui tah, “Zisu, Abuipaw, ning ma do ky law!” tatah a y he.
Aaning cawh a hmuh tih he tah Zisu taco, “Sei la, tlangbui sahlo khah a va hmuhsah my lo,” a tah he. Taico, aa seining tah langpui letah a dang he.
Aaning chung taitah pakhehpaw cawh ka dang tahpaw khah a hni tihtah Khazing khah a thangpui tah reithai hmo khei a va kaw kaw.
Zisu a phehrang lekhei a bawh ka, alawngnah bia a rei. Ma cawngsaw cawh Samaria mingphing a cang.
Zisu tah, “Dang sahpaw khah pahraw cang bei he maw? Pakuapaw saw zeletamaw aa ung?
Ma mingphing hringpaw rei ly hei a vong tah Khazing reithainah a hlaipaw pakheh chang ung be dei he?” tatah a tah.
Mataico Samaria cawngsawpaw hai leco, “Tho la sei, na zingnah tah a ca dangsah,” tatah a tah.
Uikheh cawh, Farasi sahlo tah zening tamaw Khazing painah raang cawh a va tlung a tatah aa haepaw khah, Zisu tah, “Khazing painah raang cawh naa hmuh khy pawtah va tlung a be.
Cawngsaw tah, ‘Ma lehei a ung, a cang ly leh ma lekhei a ung,’ tah khy bei he, zecawtamaw tatah Khazing painah raang cawh naa chung letah a ungnah cawtah a cang,” tatah a palei he.
Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo hai leco, “Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh ningkheh tachang hmuh naa du ngetei nápaw ning le cai khah a va tlung tae a, canghrasala hmuh khy a bei ceh.
Cawngsaw hlupui tah, ‘Ama cawh ma lekhei a ung khi, a cang ly leh ma lehei a ung hi,’ tatah aa ca tah he a. Ama cawh hui pawtah piahly khe lo.
Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongnah ning leco lailaw ky katei, avai a ki rakheh taitah a ki rakheh lang a khaipalehpaw hratah a cang tae a.
Canghrasala a hmasaw letaco hming a hlupui khah tai-ing taw a ka, atochai cawngsaw tahei aa hlawh tae a.
Noah a chai ning leteipaw hrakhei Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongnah cawh a cang tae a.

Cawngsaw sahlo cawh Noah tuilawng chunglang a naenah ning tai lekhei e he ka, ding he ka, a chuihae he ka, a hnui he. Mataico tuipa-ia cawh tlung ka, aaning vytei cawh aa dawngkasawny tah a hlyde thlu he.
Ma heh Lot a chai ning teipaw khakhei a lo. Cawngsaw sahlo cawh e he ka, ding he ka, co he ka, zua he ka, cing he ka, ing aa sah.
Canghrasala Lot tah Sodom khua a piasaining tah me le me a epaw kaa cawh avai taitah za so ka, aaning cawh aa dawngkasawny tah a ro cehceh he.
Ma tei hraco Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vong kaw ning taco a cang hra a.
Ma ning leco ing cung letei a ungpaw cawh ing chung letei a hmingbo lá pawtah a nae kheh seh. Ma hraco ly letah a ungpaw ahohmai hming sangkheh kheh lá pawtah ing lang kawkaw kheh seh.
Lot a nupuino khah a thui thlang my lo.
A hringnah pachah a pachiapaw taco sung a ka, a hringnah a sungpaw taco a pachah a.
Ka ca ching he, ma zai leco lakhing sangkheh letah a ih hruipaw cawngsaw pahning chung taikhei pakheh cawh lah cang ka, pakheh cawh seisai a cang a.
Canu pahning tah saang suh hrui a he ka, pakheh cawh lah cang a ka, pakheh cawh seisai a cang a.
Cawngsaw pahning ly chung letah ung he ka, pakheh cawh lah cang a ka, pakheh cawh seisai a cang a,” tatah a tah.
“Abuipaw, zeletamaw ma hming cawh a tlung a?” tatah aa hae. Zisu taco, “Sarawh a ungnah hming leco langtaw pavaw cawh a pahmo tei he,” tatah a palei he.
Mataico Zisu tah lungdong lytah thlaw aa chang paria nápawtah cawngpahnah cawtah tawchingnah bia khah a hningzuitu sahlo a ching he.
Aa hai letaco, “Khuapui khua kheh letah Khazing a ci lypaw le cawngsaw zetah a rei lypaw biacetu pakheh a ung.
Taico ma khuapui letei a ungpaw lahme no pakheh taco ama khatah a vaw ka, ‘Ka caraepaw cung letah a dihpaw teitah bia pa cepah ky law,’ tatah a naw cakhawng leimei thlang.
Ma biacetupaw taco uihlupui a bia cawh a ei. Canghrasala, a changnah leco ama le ama cawh, ‘Khazing ci ly le cawngsaw zetah rei lytah ung hmai my neh seh la,
ma lahmeno heh cawh hna a pa hnawh leimeinah cawtah a bia cawh ka cepah thlang a. Ma pawsui co, a vong khaw be ca ka, ka rei pa pathui khaw be,’ a tah,” tatah a tah.
Taico Abuipaw taco, “Mehding lypaw biacetu tei a reipaw heh nawthlia tua o!
Khazing tah Ama a thingpaw cawngsaw, ching le zai tei ama khatah a y leimeipaw sahlo aa cai tah a dingpaw biacenah cawh tuapah lytah a ung a maw? Aaning bawkhang paw taco a hongsang a beh.
Ka ca ching he, a dingpaw biacenah cawh rairang tah a tuapah he a. Ma duitei cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongkaw tihtah alui lehei zingnah a hnuipaw he hmuh siama he maw?” tatah a tah.
Thaikheh aaning le aaning mehding a tah ngetei he katei, cawngsaw maikaw a minghnawh pawhe sahlo khah Zisu tah ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he.
“Cawngsaw pahning cawh behnah ing lang thlawchang rua pawtah sei he ka, pakheh cawh Farasi cang ka, pakhehpaw cawh ngungkhui kheitu a cang.

Farasipaw cawh a daw ka, ama a kong thlaw a changpaw cawh, ‘Vy Khazing, cawngsaw hringpaw, damia sahlo, chahlynah a tuapaw sahlo, a pheilaipaw sahlo, a cang ly leh ma ngungkhui kheitu hrahei ka cang lynah cawtah ka ca long.
Zaa kheh letah ning hning batui cahe tei neh ka, ka hmuhpaw vytei taitah chyhraw chykheh ka peh tei,’ tatah a tah.
Canghrasala ngungkhui kheitu cawh langhlaw pui lekhei a daw ka, avai lang hmai a y ngang lytah a cacanghnaw khah a cung ka, ‘Vy Khazing, mehsuapaw kama heh ning pa do ky law,’ a tah.

Ka ca ching he, Farasipaw khah cang lytah ma ngungkhui a kheitupaw khah Khazing hme letah thaicangsah cang tah ing lang a dihpaw cawh a cang. Ahohmai ama le ama a pasangpaw cawh panai cang ka, ama le ama a panaipaw cawh pasang a cang a,” a tah.
Zisu tah tong he seh la, bonghnang song he seh tah du tah hasaitei sahlo khah aa va chua khui he. Ma cawh a hningzuitu sahlo tah hmuh he ka, aa raw he.
Canghrasala Zisu tah nyheh sahlo cawh Ama kha y he ka, “Nyheh sahlo cawh Kama khatah a vong he seh, pakhang khe o! Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing painah raang cawh ma hapaw sahlo aa tei khah a cang.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Khazing painah raang cawh nyheh hratei a cyhlang lypaw taco a chunglang a nae by a bei he,” a tah.
Uhtu a cangpaw pakheh tah Zisu cawh, “Cawngpahtu chaw, chaizaw hringnah ka hmuh khy nápawtah zemaw ka tua a?” tatah a hae.
“Zecawtamaw a chawpaw na pa tah? Khazing tah cy ly co ahohmai achawpaw ung bei he.
Biapeh sahlo cawh na hni thlang, ‘A phei kheh, lenong kheh, ru kheh, ahmang lypaw bia hnikhuitu cang kheh, na no le na paw cizaw my lo,’ tahpaw khah,” tatah Zisu tah a chai.
Uhtu paw tah, “Ma vytei heh cawh ka nyheh ning taitah ka zui ciapaw long tei a cang,” a tah.

Ma cawh Zisu tah a thui tihtah a hai leco, “Hming sangkheh naa by ning thlang. Na hnuipaw vytei zua la, mehsisah khah tangka va pei la, vaicung letah chosung na hnui a. Mataico a vong la, pa zui,” tatah a tah.
Ma bia cawh a thui tihtah a nge a chia ngetei, zecawtamaw tatah ama cawh mehrung a cangnah cawtah a cang.
Zisu tah ama cawh ming ka, a hai leco, “Mehrung cai taco Khazing painah raang letah a nae heh cawh a ru caimang!
Hmuisui tei co, mehrungpaw tei Khazing painah raang letah a nae navy co, ceiphing kho letah sahisy a nae heh a neh vy a,” tatah a tah.
Ma bia a thuipaw sahlo taco, “Ma hratei a cang caco ahomaw pachah a cang khy a?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu tah, “Cawngsaw caw tei a cang khy lypaw heh Khazing caw taco a cang khy,” tatah a palei he.
Piter tah a hai leco, “Kaa hnuipaw vytei seisai tah kaa ca zui hi,” a tah.

Zisu tah aa hai leco, “Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, Khazing painah raang cawtah a ing cang seh, a nupui cang seh, a uny sahlo cang he seh, a no le a paw cang he seh, a sawtei leh cang he seh a seisaipaw taco,
ato cai letei hmuh ruapaw a leh hlupui aa hmuh hlui tah a va chuh lepaw cai letah chaizaw hringnah zong aa hmuh a,” a tah he.
Zisu tah a hningzuitu hluihning cawh thokhui he ka, ma hrahei a ching he. “Jerusalem khuapui lang seichy he peh ka, Khazing khuavang sahlo tei Cawngsaw Sawcapaw kong aa ciapaw vytei khah a tling a.
Ama cawh Gental cawngsaw sahlo kih letah peh a cang a. Aaning taco hnuiso he ka, pasipasa he ka, aa ci tah chawh he ka, basung tah chei a he ka, aa thaw a.
Ningthung ning letah a thokaw a,” tatah a tah he.
A hningzuitu sahlo tah ma bia cawh thuithai bingbi bei he. A silang khah nokhai aa cangnah cawtah a reipaw kong cawh zemaw a cang tah hnih bei he.
Zisu cawh Jeriko khua a nae cai lekhei, mehcopaw pakheh cawh kih do pawtah langpui kae letah a ty thlang.
Cawngsaw rungpui aa seipaw khah a thui tihtah zehming maw a tlung, tatah a hae he.
“Nazaret Zisu a va sei!” tatah aa ching.
Mehcopaw taco, “David Pathlah, Zisu, ning pa do ky law!” tatah a y.
Langhme a chuipaw sahlo taco raw he ka, de law aa tah. Canghrasala ma cawngsawpaw cawh, “David Pathlah, ning pa do ky law!” tatah a y tima.
Zisu cawh a daw ka, ma cawngsawpaw cawh kama khatah a vong khui law, a tah he. A kae a va phah tihtah Zisu taco ma cawngsawpaw cawh,
“Na cawtah ze tuapah maw na du?” tatah a hae. “Abuipaw, khuahmuh khy ka du,” tatah a palei.
Zisu taco a hai letah, “Khuahmuh myca, na zingnah tah a ca dangsah thah,” tatah a tah.
Ma cangkaw leco, khuahmuh khy ka, Khazing khah reithai ka, Zisu cawh a zui lai. Ma cawh cawngsaw vytei tah aa hmuh tihtah Khazing khah aa reithai hrah.
Zisu cawh Jeriko khua lang a nae ka, khua chung cawh a cahrong.
Ma khua leco cawngsaw pakheh a ming Zakia aa tahpaw ung ka, ngungkhui kheitu bui pakheh cang ka, a dong a chah ngetei.
Ama taco Zisu cawh ahomaw a cang tahpaw khah hmuh du ngetei ka, canghrasala a ding a nai tunah cawtah cawngsaw rungpui tah pakhang he ka, hmuh khy be.
Macawtaco a hmelang va sai ka, Zisu hmuh du taco a va sei nápaw langpui letei saikamur thuiku kung cawh a ke.
Zisu tah ma hminghmaw cawh va phah ka, a kahui ka, a hai leco, “Zakia, rairang tah za cung. Atoning heh na ing letah ka tlung a,” tatah a tah.
Mataico rairang tah za cung ka, Zisu cawh a lawng ngetei tah a cyhlang.
Cawngsaw vytei tah ma cawh hmuh he ka, “Mehsuapaw khuatlung cang rua pawtah a sei thlang,” tatah a phing tlungmang he.

Canghrasala, Zakia cawh a daw ka, Abuipaw hai leco, “Mingtua! Abuipaw, ato hrahring heh ka cho a chy cawh mehsisah pei he neh ka, ahohmai ka dungkhei pawhe aa ung caco, a leh pali tah ka chang kaw he a,” tatah a tah.
Zisu taco a hai letah, “Atoning heh ma ing lehei pachahnah a va tlung myca, zecawtamaw tatah ma cawngsaw zong heh Abraham pathlah a cang hrah.
Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a lydepaw sahlo hui rua pawtah le pachá pawtah a vongpaw a cang,” a tah.

Ma bia aa nge leimeining taco tawchingnah bia sangkheh khah a ching vy he. Zecawtamaw tatah Jerusalem khua khah phah daimang tei ca ka, cawngsaw vytei tah Khazing painah raang cawh a va lang palang a tatah aa rawh.
Zisu taco, “Abui hring a cangpaw pakheh cawh siangpahrang cangnah lah rua pawtah le va kaw kaw rua pawtah raang langhlaw pui lang a sei.
A sei hlai tah a sae pahraw khah y he ka, mina tangka phaehraw khah a peh he. ‘Ka va tlung hlai vytei ma tangka hei cho paleh naw my lo,’ a tah he.
Canghrasala, a khuasaw tah aa huanah cawtah a hninglang tah cawngsaw khah taw he ka, ‘Ma cawngsaw heh kaa siangpahrang rua tah du bei peh,’ tatah aa va chingsah he.
Canghrasala ama cawh siangpahrang tah tua thah he ka, ing lang cawh a va tlung kaw. Mataico tangka a peh sipaw a sae sahlo khah khazeh cy maw a miasah he tah hni du takhei a ysah he.
A pakhehnah cawh a vong ka a hai leco, ‘Abuipaw, na mina tangka khah phaehraw ka miasah,’ tatah a tah.
A buipaw tah, ‘Na tua thai caimang, ka sae chaw! Hming a chia pawtei letah zingchui pawtah na ungnah cawtah hei khuapui khua hraw a uhtu na cang a,’ tatah a palei.
A pahningnah cawh a vong ka, ‘Abuipaw, mina tangka khah phaepangaw ka miasah,’ a tah.
A buipaw taco, ‘Nama zong khuapui khua pangaw a uhtu na cang a,’ a tah.
Mataico, a sae hringpaw a vong ka, ‘Abuipaw, na mina tangka phaekheh cawh ma heh a cang, pai tah pahlong neh ka, achaw teitah ka chia thlang.
Nama cawh mehcicia cang ceh ka, ka ca ci. Na chiapaw a cang lypaw zong law ceh ka, na cingpaw a cang lypaw zong na hre tei,’ tatah a tah.
A buipaw taco, ‘Sae chah ly, nama na bia tei hratah bia ka ca cepah a. Kama cawh mehcicia, ka chia lypaw zong law neh ka, ka cing lypaw zong ka hrepaw cawh na hni, cang maw?
A cang caco, zecawtamaw ka tangka cawh amia a ungnah letah na chia be? Chia la caw, ka va tlung tihtah a mia ka hmuh a,’ tatah a palei.
Mataico a kae letei a dawpaw sahlo khah, ‘Ma cawngsawpaw a mina tangka heh chu la, mina tangka phaehraw a hnuipaw khah pei o,’ a tah he.
Aaning taco, ‘Abuipaw, ama cawh mina tangka phaehraw a hnui thah!’ aa tah.
Aa hai leco, ‘Ka ca ching he, ahohmai a hnuipaw cawh peh chi vy a cang a. Canghrasala, zehmai a hnui lypaw cawh a hnuitlakangpaw tei hmai khah lah pah a cang a.
Macawtaco, aa siangpahrang caw tei a pa du lypaw he le ka carae a cangpaw sahlo khah ma lehei va chua khui la, ka hmekaw lehei thae o,’ tatah a palei he,” tatah a tah.
Zisu cawh ma bia a rei khy taico Jerusalem lang sei pawtah hme lang a sei.
Oliv tlaang aa tahpaw letei a ungpaw Bethfes le Bethani khua khah aa phah daimang ning tah a hningzuitu pahning khah a seisah hlang he.
“Naa hme khua lekhei va sei la, khuachung naa nae tih he ceh tah ahotahmai aa ke bang lypaw la teitei a hrai thlangpaw naa hmuh a. A rui khah thlang he ceh ka, ma lang heh naa va hrui a.
Pakheh kheh tah, ‘Zecawtamaw ma a rui khah naa thlang?’ tatah ca tah my he seh la, ‘Abuipaw tah a hia,’ tah my lo,” a tah he.
A taw hlangpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh va sei he ka, Zisu tei a ching pawtei he hrakhei aa va hmuh.
La teitei cawh a rui aa thlang leimeining tah a hnuitupaw sahlo takhei aaning cawh, “Zecawtamaw naa thlang?” tatah aa hae he.
Aaning taco, “Abuipaw tah a hia,” tatah aa palei he.
La teitei cawh Zisu khatah va chuakhui he ka, a kai letah aa pai sahlo dae he ka, Zisu cawh aa kesah.
A sei nápaw langpui lekhei cawngsaw taco aa pai sahlo cawh aa phaw.

Oliv tlaang lang tah a za cung chuhpaw langpui kae a va phah tihtah a hninglang tah aa zuipaw ming rungpui cawh aa hmuhpaw ningang chuipaw vytei rawng takhei a lawng ngetei he ka, o thangpui khei Khazing cawh aa reithai.
“Abuipaw ming tah a vongpaw siangpahrang cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh! Vaicung letah denah ung seh la, Cungnungcai lekhei rungnawnah ung ky seh,” aa tah.
Zawpui hrong letah a ungpaw Farasi thaikheh taco Zisu cawh, “Cawngpahtu, na hningzuitu sahlo heh raw tua o,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Ka ca ching he, aaning heh aa de tahmai tah alung sahlo heh a y chua he a,” tatah a palei he.
Jerusalem cawh phah daimang myca he ka, khuapui cawh hmuh ka, a cawkhui.
“Ze tamaw denah heh nama khatah a chuakhui a taheh atoning heh hnih tua la, taheh ka du caimang, canghrasala atoheh cawh na hmuh ly rua pawtah nokhai na cang myca.
Na carae sahlo tah nama tuh nápawtah raetuhnah ing ca sahso he ka, ca cadung he ka, a kawkih tah a ca dawkhai he ka, khunglai hmai na piathlah khylynah cai a phah tae a.

Nama le na hawkaw chung letei a ungpaw sahlo cawh alui letah aa ca nangpabai thlu he a. Khazing nama khatei a vongnah cai khah a hnih lypaw hratah na tuanah cawtah na chung letei alung sangkheh tei hmai palehly lytah aa seisaipaw ung a be,” tatah a tah.
Mataico Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chunglang a nae ka, hming a zua leimeipaw sahlo khah a tingchua he.
Aa hai leco, “Capathai letah ma hrahei cia a cang, ‘Ka ing cawh thlawchangnah ing tah a cang a,’ canghrasala naaning taco, ‘Mehru kua,’ tah naa tua,” a tah he.

Ning tating tah behnah ing leco cawngpah he ka, canghrasala tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le zawpui hrong letei hruitu sahlo taco, Ama cawh thaw pawtah khua aa khang leimei thlang.
Cawngsaw vytei cawh a bia reipaw khah aa lung a cang tu thah cawtah zekhatamaw kaa tua a, tahpaw khah hnih khy bei he.

Ning kheh cawh Zisu tah zawpui khah behnah ingdung chung letah cawngpah he ka, thawngchawbia a ching leimeining he takhei, tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo cawh macang sahlo khakhei Ama khatah a vong he ka,
“Ze nawhnuinah tamaw ma hming sahlo heh na tua? Ma nawhnuinah heh ahomaw a ca pei? Ma ching tua,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Bia sangkheh ka ca hae tua hrá he a.
Johan tah baptisma pehnah naw a hnuipaw khah vaicung taitah maw, cawngsaw taitah maw?” tatah a palei he.
Reisia he ka, “ ‘Khazing taitah,’ tah my peh seh la, ‘Zemaw Johan cawh naa zing be?’ a ma tah a.
Canghrasala, ‘Cawngsaw taitah,’ tah my peh seh la, zawpuipaw tahei alung tah aa ma vaseh a, zecawtamaw tatah aaning tahei Johan cawh Khazing khuavang a cang tah tlung he ka,” aa tah.
Macawtaco, “Ze taitah maw tahpaw hnih bei peh,” tatah aa chai.
Zisu taco, “Kama zong tah ma hming sahlo heh ze hapaw nawhnuiná tamaw ka tua tahpaw ca ching hrá bei neh,” tatah a tah he.
Zisu taco ma tawchingnah bia heh zawpuipaw khah a ching he. “Cawngsawpaw tah misur buichung tua ka, male khah hlei he ka, a sypui ry pawtah khua a tlong.
Hre cai a cang tihtah a sae pakheh khah ama a ting hangpaw pakhong pawtah ly a hlangpaw sahlo khaco a taw. Canghrasala ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco a sae cawh dai he ka, kih longpaw tah aa kawsah kaw.
A sae hringpaw khah taw kaw ka, canghrasala ma paw zong cawh dai he ka, ningzaw chuipaw tah tua he ka, zehmai peh lytah aa kawsah hrah.
A pathungnah a va taw vy tihtah ma paw zong cawh hmaw phosah he ka, khungthing lang aa vathlang.
Mataico misur buichung a hnuitupaw taco, ‘Zekhatamaw ka tua a? Ka dopaw ka sawcapaw heh ka taw a. Ama heh cawh aa cizaw phung thlang pui ta,’ a tah.
Canghrasala ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco ama cawh aa hmuh tihtah, ‘Ma cawngsaw heh ry cytu a cang, thé he peh ka, a ry a lah ná peh seh,’ aa tah.
Macawtaco ama cawh misur buichung alailang khah piakhui he ka, aa thaw. Ma tih taco misur buichung a hnuitupaw takhei aaning sahlo cawh zekhatamaw a tua he a?
Va seí ka, ly a hlangpaw sahlo khah thé he ka, misur buichung khah ahringpaw khah a hlei he a,” a tah he. Ma bia cawh zawpui tah aa thui tihtah, “Ma hraco cang thai by be!” aa tah.
Zisu tah aaning cawh mingpai he ka, “A cang caco, Capathai letei aa ciapaw heh zemaw a silang a cang? ‘Ing a sahtu sahlo tei aa hlawhpaw alung cawh, a biapui caipaw alung tah a cang,’ tahpaw heh.
Ahohmai ma alung cung letei a tlahpaw cawngsaw cawh kuichy thlu he ka, ma alung tei a tlahsopaw cawngsaw heh cawh a mang cici he a,” a tah he.

Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le tlangbui macang sahlo tah ma tawchingnah bia a reipaw cawh aaning a rei hnopaw he a cang takhah hnih he ka, Ama tle nápaw langpui khah aa hui. Canghrasala zawpui khah aa ci he.

Zisu cawh tai lytah ngia thlang he ka, mehding hratah a tua pakheipaw he cawngsaw a ngiatu sahlo khah aa taw he. Rom raang uhtu bui a hmingtuakhynah le a nawhnuinah chung letah Zisu khah aa hlai khy nápaw cawtah a reipaw bia khei Zisu khah tle pawtah a pachia he.

Macawtaco male a ngialaipaw sahlo tah Zisu cawh, “Cawngpahtu na reipaw le na cawngpahnah heh ahmangpaw cang ka, aho hme hmai ming lytah Khazing langpui khah biahmuisui a cang naning teitah na cawngpah he tahpaw kaa hni.
Macawtaco kaa cawtah Sizar letah ngungkhui peh heh ahmang maw hmang ly?” tatah aa tah.
Zisu tah a zia aa thaipaw khah hnih ka, aa hai leco,
“Denari tangka phae pa hmusah tua o. Aho lingthlaw le cakhai maw a cia?” tatah a tah.
Aaning taco, “Sizar a lingthlaw le cakhai,” tatah aa palei. Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Sizar a tei cawh Sizar pei la, Khazing a tei cawh Khazing pei my lo,” a tah he.
Ma zawpui hme letei a reipaw bia lekhei a suanah cawh tle khy bei he. Taico a biachainah khah aa ningang ka, a de thlang he.
Mehthi thokawnah ung be a tahpaw Sadusi thaikheh cawh Zisu kha a vong he ka bia aa hae.

“Cawngpahtu, Moses phungbia letah cawngsawpaw cawh sawtei sah lytah a nupui a thih sai caco, a unypaw takhei lahmeno cawh nupui tah chui kaw seh la, a thipaw caw takhei sawtei sah pápaw a cang, a tah.
Uikheh cawh uny pasarih a ung he. A uthui caipaw tah nupui chui ka, sawtei sah lytah a thi.
Mataico, a pahningnahpaw tah lahmeno cawh chui kaw ka, a thih sai hui.
A uny a pathungnah a cangpaw taco chui vy ka, a thih sai hrah. Aa pasarih co, ma canuno cawh chui cy he ka, sawteisah lytah a thi thlu he.
A hning cai tah ma canuno zong cawh a thi hrah.
Macawtaco thokawnah letah ma canuno cawh aho a nupui maw a cang a? Aa pasarih tah ma canuno khah aa chui tlung,” aa tah.
Zisu taco, “Khazaw cawngsaw heh aa chui aa hae he.
Canghrasala, mehthi sahlo patho kaw a cang tihtah ma cai letei a ung tlang pawtei rawhpaw cawngsaw sahlo aa cai leco a chuihae cawh ung khaw a be.
Vaiming hratah cang he ka, thi khy khaw bei he. A thokawpaw sawtei sahlo aa cangnah cawtah aaning cawh Khazing sawtei a cang myca he.
Canghrasala chingbu me tei a kangpaw phungpaw lekhei Moses tahmai tah mehthi sahlo aa thokawpaw khah palang ka, Abuipaw cawh ‘Abraham Khazing, Isak Khazing, Jakob Khazing’ a cang a tah.
Ama cawh mehthi aa Khazing cang be, canghrasala mehring aa Khazing a cang. Zemaw tah pawco ma cawngsaw vytei cawh Khazing mehmuh letaco a hring he,” tatah a palei he.
Phungbia cawngpahtu thaikheh tah, “Cawngpahtu, bia na paleipaw he a chah caimang,” tatah aa chai.
Taico ahotahmai bia hringpaw hae ngang khawh bei he.
Taico, Zisu tah aa hai leco, “Ze silang tamaw Khri cawh David pathlah aa tah?

David ama ceingei tei a reipaw cawh, ‘Abuipaw tah ka Buipaw cawh, na carae sahlo khah na phe rai letah ka chia hlai vytei he cawh, ka cacang lang letah a ty my lo a tah,’ tatah a tahpaw khah Reithainah Hlaw cabu letah a cia.
David tah Khri cawh, ‘Abuipaw,’ a tah tlung, zekhatamaw David a sawcapaw cawh a cang thai a?” a tah he.
Zawpuipaw tah aa nge thlang chung takhei Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh,

“Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khah a raering my lo. Aaning cawh a ngepaw angki a pasuapaw a hrei tah a khia lai du he ka, chodo tlaang lekhei cizaw hmotah bia a ching khah aa du hlui tah synagog letah a chaw caipaw dyching letah a ty du he ka, kawngchuanah letah achaw caipaw hminghmaw khah aa du.
Lahme sahlo aa ing khah chu he ka, male hmuh ruapaw tah thlaw a sypui tah aa chang. Ma hapaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh a sah caipaw dangtahnah aa ing tae a,” tatah a tah he.
Zisu cawh a kahui ka, mehrung sahlo tei behnah ing tholong thingkawng chunglang aa tholong aa thlah leimeipaw khah a hmuh.
Mehsisah lahmeno tei phaesai phaehning a thlah hrahpaw zong khah a hmuh.
“Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma mehsisah lahmeno tahei aho navy zong tah a hlu cai tholong a thlah.
Ma sahlo vytei tahei co aa hnuipaw a hluipaipaw chung taikhei aa peh. Canghrasala ma lahmeno tahei co a dongchia hmo tah a hringnah caw tei a hnuipaw vytei a peh thlu hi,” a tah he.
A hningzuitu thaikheh taco behnah ing khah a hmui a ngepaw alung sahlo tah le Khazing letei hlaipaw cho le pe sahlo tei aa pasangpaw kong cawh aa rei leimei. Canghrasala Zisu tah,
“Ma lehei naa hmuhpaw vytei he alung phaekheh hmai heh palehly lypaw a ung lynah cai a va chuh tae a. Aa zongmingtei hei va hly thlu a cang tae he a,” a tah he.
Aaning sahlo taco, “Cawngpahtu, ma hming sahlo cawh zening tamaw a cang a? Taico ze hapaw paching pakhanah maw a ung a?” tatah aa hae.
Zisu taco, “Aho tahmai aa ca dungkhei ly nápaw he tah a raering my lo. Ka ming tah cawngsaw hlupui va chua he ka, ‘Kama heh Ama cawh ka cang, cai a ne myca,’ aa tah tae a. Ma sahlo cawh zui khe lo.
Raetuhnah le raang chung letah rae a dynah thongpang naa thui tihtah a pahly khe lo. Ma hming sahlo heh a tlung taw ruapaw a cang, canghrasala a changnah cang balang be,” tatah a palei he.
Mataico aa hai letah, “Raang kheh le raang kheh a dy a he ka, painah le painah a dy he a.
Aling a sah pui tah a hrui a, hming hlupui letah cakaang le ngae-y asawnah a tlung a. Mataico, cichuipaw hming sahlo le paching pakhanah a rungnawpaw sahlo avai taitah a lang a.

Canghrasala, ma vytei hlai tahei ca tle he ka, aa ca hrai he a. Synagog sahlo lang ca seikhui he ka, thong aa ca thla he a. Siangpahrang sahlo le uhtubui sahlo hme letah ca chuakhui he ka, ma vytei heh naa pa zuinah rawng tah a cang a.
Ma heh naa cawtah ka kong reinah caichaw a cang a.
Naaning a rungvai nápaw cawtah zekhatamaw bia kaa rei a tatah lung reithui tah naa ung ly nápawtah naa thinglung a pacy pacia my lo.
Naa carae ahohmai tah aa ca te khy ly nápaw he tah le aa ca ei khy ly nápaw he tah bia sahlo le singnah ka ca pae he a.
Naa no sahlo le naa paw sahlo, naa uny sahlo, naa sawny sahlo le naa huivesaw sahlo tahmai tah ca luithae a he ka, meh thaikheh cawh aa ca thaw he a.
Kama ka rawng tah cawngsaw vytei tah aa ca hua he a.
Canghrasala, naa lu cung letei sangbu bukheh hmai lyde a be.
Cy ky tah a daw la, hringnah naa cy a.
Raekeh sahlo tah Jerusalem khuapui aa cadungpaw naa hmuh tihtah a ry hlai tah a rawh a, tah cawh naa hni a.

Mataico Judia raang letei a ungpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh tlaang cung lang sai he seh la, khuapui leteipaw sahlo cawh pia he seh. Taico khuapui alailang leteipaw sahlo cawh khuapui chunglang a nae kheh he seh.
Ma heh cawh dangtah nápaw cai, Khazing bia letei a ciasipaw vytei a tling nápaw khah a cang.

Ma ning cawh sawtei a phopaw canu sahlo le nysai a tlepaw no sahlo aa caw taco zetlua tamaw ningping a chui a! Raang chung letah rorangnah alaipaw pui tlung ka, Khazing thingaenah tah ma mingphing heh a carae he a.

Aaning cawh zyzi tah thaw cang he ka, thaikheh cawh raang ting letah sae tah seikhui a cang he a. Khazing tah Gental cawngsaw sahlo cawtah a pachiapaw cai a tlingnah tai Jerusalem cawh Gental cawngsaw sahlo taco aa phe tah aa tlaichai a.
Ning, thlawpaw le esi sahlo letah paching pakhanah a ung he a. Rili tuileh a thopaw le a pyraw rawng tah aluicung raang sahlo cawh thlawzawng le ningping tah a ung he a.
Khazaw letei hming a va tlung lepaw khah aa hninah cawtah le avai hmingtuakhynah sahlo zong cahneh aa cang a cawtah mehnung cawh ci tu he ka, a cathing he a.
Ma cai leco aaning tah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw khah hmingtuakhynah le rungnawnah khatah meding hrong letah a vongpaw khah aa hmuh a.
Ma hming sahlo cang hrang a pathoning tahei a daw la, a huichy my lo, zecawtamaw tatah naaning tlang nápaw cai cawh a ne myca,” tatah a tah he.
Ma khy taico Zisu tah aaning cawh ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he. “Ma thuiku kung le thingkung ahringpaw vytei sahlo heh mingtua hmai o!
A chawng a ka thopaw naa hmuh tihtah nipui ning a ne myca tahpaw naa hni.
Ma hraco ma hming sahlo heh a cang leimeipaw naa hmuh tihtah Khazing painah raang cawh a ne myca tah hnih my lo.
Biahmuisui ka ca ching he, ma hming vytei heh a tlung hlai vytei cawh atochai cawngsaw sahlo heh thi thlu balang bei he.
Alui le avai cawh a rawh a, canghrasala ka bia cawh a rawh by a be.
A raering my lo, ma tei a cang ly caco a nawngsenah, zu ruinah le tungtuh khuasahnah lungreithuinah takhei ca nai a he ka, ma ning takhei ahui hratah rawh ly pui tah a ca o pang he a.
Ma ning cawh aluicung pungpaluh letei a ungpaw cawngsaw vytei cung letah a tlung a.
A va chuh lepaw vytei taitah naa lua khy nápawtah le Cawngsaw Sawcapaw hme letah na daw pacy khy nápaw he ceh tah a mai pacia tah ung paria thlang la, thlawchang my lo,” a tah he.
Ning tating tah Zisu taco behnah ing letah cawngpah he ka, zailang maikaw cawh Oliv tlaang aa tahpaw letah zai hmang rua pawtah a piathlah tei.
Taico ming vytei cawh a bia nge rua pawtah mongdi tah behnah ing leco a va chuh tei he.
Raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah le Khungsai Panawnah aa tahpaw a ne myca ka,
tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah Zisu thaw khy nápaw lang le si khah aparuh teitah aa hui, zecawtamaw tatah zawpuipaw khah aa ci he.
Mataico, a hningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cangpaw Iskariot aa tahpaw Judas chung letah Setan cawh a nae.
Taico Judas cawh tlangbui macang sahlo le behnah ing a mingkaitu abui sahlo khatah sei ka, zekhatamaw Zisu a luithae a tahpaw kong khah aa reisia.
Aa thawchah ngetei ka, tangka peh rua pawtah aa naw a tlah.
Judas zong cawh a lungtling ka, zawpui aa ung ly kaa tah aa kih letah Zisu hlai khy nápaw caichaw khah a haw thlang.
Mataico Khungsai Panawnah cawtah tuu teitei tah thuihlainah ning a cangpaw raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah ning cawh a va phah.
Zisu tah Piter le Johan cawh taw he ka, “Sei la, kaa cawtah Khungsai Panawnah zairia enah cawh va pachia tua o,” a tah he.
Aaning taco, “Zeletamaw va pachia he seh tah na du?” tatah hae he ka,
Zisu taco, “Khuapui chung a va nae la, beirai tah tui a cui laipaw capaw pakheh tah a ca tong he a. Ama a naenah ing lang va zui he ceh ka,
ing a hnuitupaw khah, ‘Cawngpahtu tah ka hningzuitu sahlo khatah Khungsai Panawnah zairia ka e nápaw mehlai khang zeletamaw a ung, a tah,’ tatah naa hae a.
Ama taco a cung khang a kypaw pui, tingtua cia tei a cangpaw khah a ca hmuh sá he a. Ma leco va pachia my lo,” tatah a palei he.
Piter le Johan cawh seithlah he ka, Zisu tah a chingpaw he hrakhei hming sahlo cawh aa va hmuh. Ma leco Khungsai Panawnah zairia cawh aa pachia.
A cai a va tling tihtah Zisu le Ama apostol sahlo taco cabuai cawh aa cadung.
Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah, “Kama cawh ruhanah ka ing hlai tahei naaning khatah ma Khungsai Panawnah zairia e hrui heh ka du ngetei.
Macawtaco ka ca ching he, Khazing painah raang letah ma Khungsai Panawnah tlingnah cai a tlung hlai vytei ma zaibatui heh e kaw khaw bei neh,” tatah a tah he.
Taico ny khah law ka, Khazing letah alawngnah bia hlai ka, “Ma misurhang ny heh law la, a hlai pachaw my lo.
Ka ca ching he, Khazing painah raang a va chuanah tai ma misurhang heh ding kaw khaw bei neh,” tatah a tah he.

Taico very cawh law ka, Khazing khatah lawngbia a hlai khy taitah kychy ka, aaning cawh pei he ka, “Ma heh naa cawtah ka pehpaw ka pung cawh a cang hi. Kama monghly ly nápawtah tua tei my lo,” a tah he.
Ma hraco zairia aa e khy taitah ny cawh law ka, “Ma ny heh naa caw tei a laipaw, ka thisai tei tuapaw biahrai thapaw cawh a cang.
Kama a pa lui a paw cawngsawpaw cawh ma lehei kama khatah cabuai letah a ung.
Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh Khazing bia thlia ciapaw hratah a thi a. Ma duitei cawh Ama a luipaw cawngsaw cawh a cing a ping,” tatah a tah he.
Aaning le aaning cawh ahomaw ma hming heh a tua a, tatah aa hae he.
Aaning hrong letah ahomaw alaicai a, tahpaw bia a einah zong khah aa hrong letah a chuh.
Zisu taco aa hai letah, “Gental cawngsaw sahlo cung letei abui sahlo cawh a buisah ngetei he ka, aa nawhnuinah aa hmangpaw cawh, ‘A ca bawngtu ka cang he peh,’ tatah aaning le aaning a tah he.
Canghrasala naaning cawh aaning hratah ung khe lo! Naa hrong letei alaicaipaw cawh a chia caipaw hratah ung hri seh la, uhtu a cangpaw taco sae hratah ung hri seh.
Ahomaw alai vy? Cabuai letei a typaw maw batui a peitu maw? Cabuai letei a typaw cawh lai vy bei maw? Canghrasala kama cawh male rai hrepah tu pakheh hratah naa hrong letah ka ung hi.
Naaning cawh hanah ka ingpaw vytei letah a pa dawkhuitu na cang he ceh.
Taico ka paw tah painah raang a pa pehpaw hratah naaning khah ca pei hrá he neh ka,
macawtaco ka painah raang letei ka cabuai letah e he ceh ka, naa ding a. Abui dyching letah a ty he ceh ka, Israel phinghraw hluihning khah bia naa ce he a.
Simon, Simon, lythlopaw tah sacang a vangpaw hratah Setan tah naaning khah hnehsah a pawtah nawhnuinah hmuh a du my ca.
Canghrasala Simon, na zingnah cawh a po ly nápawtah na cawtah thlaw ka chang thah. Taico kama lang na va hui kaw tihtah na uny sahlo khah thawzaang pei my lo,” a tah.
Canghrasala Piter taco, “Abuipaw, nama khatah thongtlá tah thihnah tai ka mai thlang,” tatah a palei.
Zisu taco, “Ka ca ching, Piter, atoning aa a khawng hlai tahei na pa hninah lehei uithung tai na pa paphahsai a,” tatah a chai.

Mataico, Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh, “Tangka ly, sahre lytah le phepakong lytah ka ca taw tih he tah ze na phahlahnah he ceh a ung maw?” tatah a hae he. Aaning sahlo taco, “Ung be,” tatah aa tah.
Zisu tah aa hai leco, “Canghrasala atoheh cawh tangka naa hnui caco a kai la, sahre zong a kai la, taico zyzi naa hnui ly caco naa angki pasuapaw khah zua la, co my lo.

Ma hrahei Capathai letah ciapaw a cang, ‘Taico ama cawh hmingsua a tuapaw sahlo khatah reipai a cang a.’ Ma heh kama letah a tling ruapaw a cang tah ka ca ching he. A cang, ka kong a ciapaw heh a tlingnah cai a phah leimei myca,” a tah he.
A hningzuitu sahlo taco, “Abuipaw, mingtua, zyzi sanghning a ung thlang hi,” tatah aa tah. Zisu taco, “A zaw seh,” tatah a palei he.
Zisu cawh a tua teipaw hrakhei Oliv tlaang lang cawh sei ka, a hningzuitu sahlo tah Ama cawh aa zui.
A hminghmaw cawh aa phah tihtah aa hai leco, “Tuhsonah chung lang naa tlah ly nápawtah thlawchang my lo,” a tah he.
Ama cawh aaning khah a cawngpe va long he ka, a khuh panai ka, thlaw a chang.
“Vy Ka paw, na naw a tlah pawtei a cang caco ma tai-ingnah ny heh kama taitah law hly thlang. Canghrasala kama ka dunah hratah cang lytah nama na dunah hratah cang ky seh,” a tah.
Vaicung taitah vaiming pakheh cawh ama kha a za paly ka, thawzaang a peh.
Taico a lung rei a thui tunah cawtah khei lungsaw chingching tah thlawchang vy hui ka, a mathlai cawh thi di hratah alui letah a tlah.
A thlawchangnah taitah tho ka, a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei a vaw kaw tihtah aa ihningpaw khah hmuh ka, ngechia tah aa ung cawtah aa thaw a chang.
“Zemaw naa ihning thlang? Tho la, tuhsonah chunglang naa tlah ly nápawtah thlawchang my lo,” tatah aaning cawh a tah he.

Ma hratei a rei leimeining taco cawngsaw rungpui va chuh he ka, aaning sahlo cawh a hningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cangpaw Judas aa tahpaw takhei a va seikhui he. Zisu cawh hnang rua pawtah khei a va ne.
Canghrasala Zisu tah ama cawh, “Judas, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh hnang ceh ka maw, na luithae a?” tatah a tah.
Zisu a hningzuitu sahlo tah, hming a cang leimeipaw khah aa hmuh tihtah, “Abuipaw, kaa zyzi hei kaa tuh a he maw?” tatah aa tah.
Taico aa hrong letei pakhehpaw tah tlangbui alaicaipaw a sae capaw khah tuh ka, a cacang lang tei a naw khah a pathai thlah.
Canghrasala Zisu tah, “Ma khah a zaw myca,” tatah a tah. Taico cawngsawpaw a naw khah tong ka, a dangsah.

Mataico Zisu tah Ama a va seihnopaw tlangbui macang sahlo le behnah ing a congpaw sahlo aa bui sahlo le macang sahlo he khah, “Zyzi le thingtai kha naa va seipaw heh kama cawh rae a thopaw he hotu tamaw ka cang?
Ning tating tah naaning kha behnah ing letah ung tei neh ka, ka cung letah naa kih naa thlah tlung be. Canghrasala ato cai heh cawh muinah tei a uhpaw naaning naa cai a cang,” a tah he.
Mataico Zisu cawh tle he ka, seikhui longmang he ka, tlangbui alaicaipaw a ing chunglang taikhah a naekhui he. Piter tah langhlaw pui khei a zuilai.
Canghrasala inghme a le lekhei me tua he ka, me a ai tah a ty cadungnah pawhe lekhei Piter cawh aaning sahlo khakhei hmingkheh tah a ty hrah.
Saecanu pakheh tah Piter ma letei a typaw khah a hmuh. Ma no taco ama cawh va mingchai ka, “Ma cawngsawpaw heh Zisu kha a ungpaw a cang,” a tah.
Canghrasala ma cawh a paphah ka, “Cawngsawno, Ama heh hnih bei neh,” tatah a tah.
A cawngpe ung ka pakhehpaw tah Ama cawh hmuh ka, “Nama zong aa hrong letei pakheh na cang,” a tah. Piter taco, “Cang bei neh,” tatah a palei.
Suimehlang pakheh tluh lekhei ahringpaw pakheh tah, “Ma cawngsawpaw heh Galili cawngsaw a cangnah cawtah hei Zisu kha a ungpaw a cang hrahring,” a tah.
Piter taco, “Na rei leimeipaw kong heh hnih bei neh,” tatah a palei. Ma hratei a tah leimeining taco aa cawh a khawng.
Abuipaw cawh Piter lang cawh a hui ka, a va ming. Taico Piter cawh Abuipaw tei a hai letei a reipaw, “Atoning heh aa a khawng hlai tah uithung na pa paphah sai a,” a tahpaw khah a thui kaw.
Taico alailang piathlah ka, o tlili tah a cah.
Zisu cawh a congpaw raevai sahlo takhei pasipasa he ka, aa cabai.
Aaning sahlo taco a meh pamai he ka, “Ma ching tua, nama Khazing khuavang! Ahomaw a ca tuh?” aa tah.
Taico ma sahlo taco Ama cawh aisainah bia a hlupui tah aa tah.
Khua hme a se cangkawleh biacetu macang a cangpaw sahlo cawh tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khakhei hmingkheh tah a tong he ka, Zisu cawh aa hme lekhei aa va chuakhui.
“Khri cawh na cang maw? Ma ching tua,” aa tah. Zisu tah, “Ka ca ching zong he tah pa zing bei ceh.
Ka ca hae zong he tah pachai bei ceh.
Canghrasala ma taihei co, Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Cungnungcai Khazing a cacang lang letah a ty myca a,” tatah a chai he.
Aa zongmingtei co, “Khazing Sawcapaw cawh na cang maw?” tatah aa hae. Zisu taco, “Khazing Sawcapaw na cang tatei naa reipaw cawh ahmang,” tatah a palei he.
Mataico aaning taco, “Ze hringpaw biahninah maw kaa hia khawh? Ama a hmo taitah ma bia kaa thui thah taico,” tatah aa tah.
Mataico a pahmopaw vytei cawh tho he ka, Zisu cawh raang uhbui Pilat khatah aa seikhui.

Taico, Ama cawh sua pu he ka, “Ma paw tahei kaa mingphing a pingpaly tah a hruipaw he kaa hmuh. Ama tahei Sizar khatah ngungkhui pei khe law tah ka, Khri a cangpaw siangpahrang ka cang a tah,” tatah aa tah.
Macawtaco Pilat tah Zisu cawh, “Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang cawh na cang maw?” tatah a hae. “A cang, na reipaw hraco a cang,” tatah Zisu tah a palei.
Mataico, Pilat tah tlangbui macang sahlo le zawpuipaw cawh, “Ma paw sua pho rua pawtah hei a chahlynah zehmai hmuh bei neh,” tatah a thang he.

Canghrasala aaning sahlo taco, “Ama tahei Judia raang pungpaluh letei cawngsaw sahlo cawh a cawngpah ná tah hnahnawhnah a chuasah. Galili taitah a patho ka, ma tai heh a va phahpaw a cang,” tatah thaw tah aa rei.
Ma cawh a thui tihtah Pilat taco, “Ma paw heh Galili cawngsaw maw a cang?” a tah he.
Zisu cawh Herod a uhnah rai letei a ungpaw Galili raang cawngsaw a cang tahpaw khah Pilat tah a hni tihtah ma ningcai letei Jerusalem letah a ung thlangpaw Herod khakhei a seisah khui he.

Herod tah Zisu a hmuh tihtah a lung a lawng ngetei, zecawtamaw tatah cai sypui hmuh a za du ngetei cawtah a cang. Zisu a thong khah a za thui teinah cawtah ningang chuipaw hming sahlo a tuapaw khah ka hmuh myca a, tatah a hnabei a sui.
Bia a hlupui hae cakhia ka, canghrasala Zisu tah zehmai chai be.
Tlangbui macang le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo cawh ma leco a daw thlang hrah he ka, Zisu cawh a sah pui tah sua aa pu leimei.
Mataico, Herod le a raekeh sahlo tah Zisu cawh hnuiso he ka, aa pasi aa pasa. Pai achaw ngeteipaw a buhsah he ka, Pilat khatah aa seisah kaw.
Ma ning taico Pilat le Herod cawh huivesaw a cang he. Ma hlai taco a za carae tei he.
